Ato kubmun cok, sun damnyi boukwe kimdarandum to kuboka sun ninyi mamun ababyi boukwe kibdandarur,’ Musa biryi ato eboka kerek sekeiamwe asi nungnun,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou ura, Er Yesus biryi Musa kerek sengna etereramunyi bisi ato ebmou, “Kan ebmarim to ara diboka ebmarim ati, a ebmarim to asi diblilibde kunubminyi uca, iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwandum,” ebmou.
Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou bok, anyi biryi, “Libdandobtinyi,” tenebmou ura, ato eboka tubto asibdenmou, “Nun ninyi mamun ara unanyi do?” eboka asibdenmou

Uca, Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou, “Ninyi tentok Yerusalem atei aryi, ‘Yerikho atei bindobkwan,’ tenen mangkau yurbanmou. Asi bisik noutam aryi ukula don nang urasintam boboka karerdarbaninto kubmou. Ba, ukula don nang aryi er bona bobdobmou dinyi akikwe nirya dorona kum kubmai, erda er ongon aling ababyi nirya kwilikloboka er nong ara kulab-kulab eboka onmai ani, dibmanto kou ura, deibloboka binsekdobmai.
Asi, aminda tam ara Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirinanyi bibabyi mangkau aryi neik bisik akwe yurbanmou. Ani, anyi oblobmai asing eibmou cok, bisik leiboka kiringdorbinmou.
A neiktoto kuboka Bait Allah dam wa irmilinanyi, Lewi yalanyi tentok ababyi neik bisik akwe yurbanmou. Ani, anyi oblobmai asing eibmou cok, bisik leiboka kiringdorbinmou.

Ura aminda ara Samaria mutuknyi sun Yahudi yala nang ab tonkwa ninyi bun ton kum ururdaramnyi atei nang tentok yurbanmou. Ani, ukula don nang aryi oblobmainyi dam binmou ura, diramwe uca, oblobmainyi bisi asing eibmou. Ura, er boukwe mitik kum aryi boukwe sangkuruk-sangkuruk ebmou.

Ba, anyi oblobmaia dam tingbinmou ura, anyi dilaka asi anggur me ab ninyi kwetena ab aryi likdongoboka liboka kwetebmou. Ato kuboka sirya kwetebmou ura, tomobtaleboka er bukmou bisam keledai dub burdirbindoka bobinmou ani, tiya dekoka man ai dongorbinmou ci, kwetebmou.

Ura, ambutum toa ara tiya dekoka man ai damnyi bisi keil uang dengna weik dinyi bitinyi karebmou ura, ato ebmou, ‘Kanci anyi kalingdamin ci, kweterandum! Anyi kweteramin ci, kan co bok yuk-yuk dinyi dengnaminyi to ara aminda ni tamuryanyi tum aryi kanbabyi unubkwankin,’ ebmou.

Ati, kan tenebmarim ara a winiryi nang aryi kubmai dinyi ara unanyi kubmou dinyi asi oblobmai boukwe bobmou ci, ‘Ninyi mamun boukwe kibdarur,’ ebmou dinyi lak kibmou do?” Ato eboka Er Yesus biryi Musa kerek sengna eterenanyi bisi asibdenmou.

Uca, Musa kerek sengna eterenanyi biryi ato ebmou, “Oblobmainyi bisi boukwe aryi er boukwe sangkuruk-sangkuruk ebmou ba, kwetebmounyi bisi, ‘Ninyi mamun boukwe kibdarur,’ ebmou to lak kibmou,” ebmou. Ura, Er Yesus biryi anyi bisi ato ebmou, “Bindobminyi ura, a kekebmarim to kuboka ninyi mamun asi boukwe kiboka kunubkwandum!” ebmou.
Er Yesus ab Er miliramnyi nang ab bisik noutam banmai ci, atei tentok binmai. Binmai ura, akatei ner si Marta biryi sunsi naboka er ai du dongobmou.
A ner Marta bira er weit ner si ara Maria. Maria bira Er Yesus yan dam buryandoka Er Yesus eterenmou uram asi kekenmou.

Bok, Marta bira mambul kanya bobdobmou ci, sunsi du dongobmou. Ura, Marta biryi Er Yesus dam tingyandoka ato ebmou, “Nai, Kanda ni weit ner aryi taklobokmanir ba, ni yuk mambul doboka yina kiknirminingmasin dinyi ara Kanda malyi tenebmanirim do? Kanci ersi, ‘Kan du ner milirbirum,’ ebminyi ba, ni miliyanici ura, tonkwa yina kiknibdeibdobkwansinim,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi Marta bisi ato ebmou, “Se Marta, Marta, kanci yina kikninmasirim dinyi ababyi teleb kunmasirim bok, erda kan biramnyi yuk-yuk dinyi ati weikto mambul kanya bon dinyi aryi orminingdarandem.

Bok, iya bikdob dinyi ara tentok kurur. Ati, Maria biryi wibdobmar dinyi ara iya teleb dinyi asi wibdobmar ci, kanya luknubdongoboka Ni uram enman asi kekenmar. Ati, kanci bisik sengminingninto kunmarima mem!” ebmou.

Uki tentok tum aryi Er Yesus biryi mutuk tentok bukoka Er Imtamnyi bisi molonmou. Ani, sirya molobmou ura, Ersi miliramnyi nang ninyi tentok aryi Er Yesus bisi ato ebmou, “Nai, Yohanes ninyi me dongoramunyi biryi er miliramnyi nang asi, ‘Er Imtamnyi bisi molona ara ato eboka molobdobkwandarur,’ eboka eterebwe to, Kanci nunbabyi, ‘Er Imtamnyi bisi molona ara ato eboka molobkwandarur,’ eboka eterebsurum,” eboka molobmou.
Ba, Er Yesus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi molobdobkwamamunyi ura, ato eboka molobdobkwandarur,
‘Nai Imtam Kurumnyi,
Ninyi nirya aryi, “Iya Teleb kurumnyi,” eboka Kan si ererdeikina teleb.
Kanda iya weik sienyi kurum ati, Kanci lebdeiboka kaliksimin ba, ninyi nirya aryi Kan arungdeirisin uram dobdobting.
Arub aryi yina yibkwamabyi kikimanto Kanci karebsurum.
Ninyi aryi nunsi malyi dinyi kubdongobmasingnyi asi nunci tuba kum teneiramib to,
Kanbabyi neiktoto nun malyi kun dinyi asi tuba kum teneibsiminci.
Tonda, isa aryi yandoka, “Malyi kubting,” tenen dumdesici ba,
Kanda Imtamnyi biryi bisik sekoka lebdobsurum.’
Ato eboka molobkwandarur!” ebmou.

Ura, Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang asi ton ato ebmou. Ara, “Sun kankan aryi ninyi tentok anaboka lukunda dukduk en aryi er kwit bisi bindoka, ‘Ni kwit, ni ninyi bun bisik ai yibanmang cok, ni ai yanmang ba, niryi du dongobkwaman dinyi utotoa ton kum deibman ati, kan roti kwaning tokol winiryi tiya karebnurum ba, aminda aryi kanbabyi unubkwankin,’ erdarur.
Ato ebmamunyi bok, anyi biryi ato esurur, ‘Nun kamursininmasirima mem! Nun bublan sirya tirikdobmabci, ni nerabwe mabwe ab sirya mabdobmab ati, ni kwit, niryi bukoka kum dobkarebkwankin,’ erdarur.

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, anyi biryi, ‘Ni kwit,’ tenena ara ‘Burongna ni li,’ tenebdandaturyok, erda molobmatunyi biryi yandoka alyi kum asa aryi titik-titik eboka molordanmamunyi deyok aryi, bukoka er molobdobmaci dinyi dorkarerdandarur,” eboka kikliboka eterebmou.

Ato kikliboka eterebmou cok, “A deyok aryi, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, unanyi biryi molobdobci ura, ersi karebkwande. Ba, unanyi biryi ingkirikdobci ura, erci eibdobkwande. Ba, unanyi biryi ai bublan congom-congom ebdobci ura, erti ai bublan kukeibkwande. A deyok aryi, sun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi karebkwansir ati molobdobdarur. Ba, sunci lak eibdobkwandum ati ingkirikdobdarur. Ba, iya bublan sunti kukeibkwansir ati, ai bublan congom-congom ebdobdarur.
Dantam nang aryi er nai bisi er mi aryi mekinaiya molobdobmaci bok, mekinaiya unumna kwatima dorkarenung do? Ato ton kum kunung. Erda, sun mabwe aryi molobdobmanyi dinyi to dorkareraming.
Tonda, dantam nang aryi er nai bisi er mi aryi kirim du molobdobmaci bok, kirim du unumna kalum dorkarenung do? Ninyi tentok aryi sun mabwe asi ato ton kum kunung.

Ati, sun yu kanya bondarur nang ababyi, sunci ninyi karena diboka bingdarur ci, sun mabwe-nermabwe aryi sun molobmangnyi dinyi to dorkarendarur. Ati, Er Imtamnyi namin kanya borutnyi bira wanok molobdobmangnyi nang ati Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus kareransir,” Er Yesus biryi ato eboka eterebmou.

Uki tentok tum aryi Er Yesus biryi, ninyi tentok isa kanya wekamwe ba, uram kum eramwe asi isa kanya yakdonokmou. Ba, a isa kanya anabkaboka yibarou ura, anyi bira uram ebkalibmou ba, ninyi ilinto aryi, “Nai kobe,” tenebmai.
Bok, a nang kankan aryi ton yuk nang ara ato ebmai, “Erci isa kanya yakdonokmar ara isa sienyi si Beelzebul mikib aryi yakdonokmar,” ebmai.
Ba, ton yuk nang ara, “Ersi dubdetibyi,” tenebmai ura, Er Yesus bisi ato ebmai, “Imtam aryi yanaminyi ura, ilil tenen dinyi ton kiknibderum,” ebmai.

Ato ebmai bok, Er Yesus biryi sun tenebmai kanya bikmou ura, ato ebmou. “Weik sienyi kalingnande mutuk asi mar bordaramingnyi ura, orsengdaraming, tonda sun mining ai abala mar bordaramingnyi ura, tonkwa antaniboka kum kuroraming. Erda bongwalwalardaraming.

Ato ara isa sienyi Iblis kalingnande mutuk nang aryi bokdandoka mar bobdating ura, er kalingnande mutuk nang nirya obsekdating. Ati, sunci Nisi, ‘Isa sienyi si Beelzebul mikib aryi isa kanya asi yangdonokmar,’ ebmanurum ara diboka kum ebmanurum. Nira er kalingnande mutuk tamnyi kum kunun.

Ati, sunci Nisi, ‘Isa sienyi si Beelzebul mikib aryi isa kanya mer asi yangdonongdur,’ tenebmanurum ara malyi to tenebmarum ati, Niryi sunsi asirdena ton asibdenkwinsin, sun Yahudi yala nang ababyi isa kanya mer asi yangdonongnung ara unanyi mikib aryi yangdonongnung do? Isa sienyi mikib aryi do? Er Imtamnyi mikib aryi do? Sunda unatoa ati, sun mining yala nang ati, ‘Er Imtamnyi mikib aryi isa kanya mer yangdonongnung,’ tenendarur bok, Niti tenenindarur ara, ‘Beelzebul mikib aryi isa kanya mer yangdonongdur,’ tenenindarur do? Sun mining atei nang ara, ‘Beelzebul mikib aryi isa kanya yakdonokman kum,’ tenen dinyi ara bingnung ati, sunci Nisi tatab-tatab erdongonmanumunyi ura, ‘Talyi tatab-tatab en kum,’ eboka lak ebsiting.

Bok, Niryi Er Imtamnyi mikib aryi isa mer asi yakdonokmanyi asing eibmamunyi ura, sunci ato tenen bikwandarur. ‘ “Er Imtamnyi bira mikib weik kuboka arukdeibkwansir talak ara nun dam yanmarci kunmar,” tenebkwandarur,’ tenen ukubmanun,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, Er Yesus biryi isa kanya yakdonokmou deyok ati tubto kikliboka sunsi ton ato ebmou. “Ninyi tentok aryi mikibnyi kiknibdandoka yin mar kikniboka er ai kalingdoraunte ura, er bona talena ara tentok ababyi ton kum waningdante.
Bok, ninyi tentok iya mikib kobdobnyi yandoka dub ererdaranturyi yin mar kiknirante dinyi nirya dalubte ura, ersi milibmating nang ati bokeibte. Ura, mikibnyi kimdarante ababyi surukum ebte.

Ati, unanyi biryi Nisi kum miliranirinyi bira erda Ni mar ordananyi kurandiryi. Ba, unanyi biryi Ni ab tonkwa ninyi naboka Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe kum bulurdeiriranimnyi bira erci yakdonokoka bongwalwalarsinirande,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ton ato kuboka eterebmou, “Isa kanya ara ninyi kanya dam aryi anaboka yibindanci ura, talyi noutam asi yibinkirikoka er kubdobmanto ai ati ingkiringkiringnande. Ani, er kubmanto ai ton kum eibdobci ura, ato erande, ‘Ni tubto tamuboka abniryi, takloyase ai wengdorbinkwan,’ erande.

Ato ebci ura, tamuboka takloboka binandinyi bisi yandoka diranci uca, er takloboka binandinyi bira telebto kuboka kuroranci bok, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi wengyangana kum kuanci ba, Er Yesus milinanyi kum kuranci asi asing eirande.

Ato kuboka kuranci asi yandoka eibci ura, anabkaboka iya yu but kobdob isa mer asi tabaryi naboka boyangarande ba, akai umbura yandoka kuraming. Ba, isa mer wengyandoka kuraminginyi bira minob kuranci kamuk ara yuk ba, isa kanya tabaryi er kanya dam wengyangnyi ba, kubkwanci kamuk ara iya yu mitik kumnyi kubkwandur,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus uram tuba sisingmou bok, ninyi ilinto wekmai kankan aryi ner tentok aryi, “Er Yesus bira Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka eteresurur,” tenebmou. Ura, erci Er Yesus Er kwin bisi kisal dakmou ci, uram doboka ato ebmou. “Kanda Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka etereransirim ati Kan mundu boboka deiankou ner ab mum diniankou mum ab ara Er Imtamnyi biryi wibdeiboka kisal dangdur ner kurur,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou, “Er Imtamnyi Uram kekeboka kalingnamingnyi nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangdur nang kuramingiryi,” ebmou.

Ninyi ilinto aryi Er Yesus bisi arubdongobmai talak ara Erci uram doboka ato ebmou, “A talak kundarur nang ara yu kanya akwe bondarur cok, Nisi, ‘Erci ilil tenen dinyi ton kiknibdete asi asing eibtibyi,’ tenenindarur. Bok, sun dam ara ilil tenen dinyi ara Yunus biryi kiklibdeibmou dinyi sirya bingdarur ati, Niryi ilil tenen dinyi tentok ababyi ton kum kiknibdenkwaman.

Yunus biryi Niniwe atei nang dam asi bindoka ato eboka eterebmou. ‘Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobmunci Er Imtamnyi Uram asi diboka kekeboka kunubdarur,’ eboka eterebmou. A kiklibdeibmou to asi Ni Ninyi Dasinyi bibabyi a talak kunmarum nang ati, ‘Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobmun ci, Er Imtamnyi bisi kanya teleb kurdeirin dinyi akwe kunubdarur,’ eboka eterenmasin,” ebmou.

Ura, tonda Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou, “Minob talak uca, me youkwa sien ner biryi mutuk sirya aryi kuboka weik sienyi Salomo bingna dinyi kekeryanmou. Bok, Salomo bingna dinyi outam kibkweteboka eitam kununyi biryi eteresunun dinyi asi sun a talak kunmarum nang ara diboka diba kum tenendarur. A deyok aryi, sirya kobdob wenebkwansir uki tum ara me youkwa tam weik sien ner ab sun a talak kunmarum nang ab tonkwa kam bukokmun cok, a ner aryi sun nirya asi tatabdongobkwansir.

A neiktoto kuboka, Yunus biryi Niniwe nang dam asi Er Imtamnyi Uram bindoka eterebmou ura, sun malyi kun dinyi takloboka Er Imtamnyi bisi diba tenebmai. Bok, Yunus outam kiboka eitam kununyi biryi eteresunun. Asi, sun a talak kunmarum nang ara diba kum tenendarur deyok aryi, sirya kobdob wenebkwande tum ara Niniwe nang ab a talak kunmarum nang ab ara tonkwa kam bukeibkwansir. Bok, Niniwe nang aryi sun a talak kunmarum nang asi tatabdongobkwansing,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ninyi ilinto asi eterenmou ci, ato eboka eterebmou. “Ninyi tentok aryi uk ubna dinibdongobci ura, dobtaleboka ai aumbonga kum inirdeirande. Tonda tower aling bublan tirikna aryi kum siklirdeirande erda dobtaleboka co lamna deici asi deirirande. Ba, akai wengyanganmangnyi ninyi nirya a uk ubna milil asing eiraming. Ato aryi, Niryi sunsi, ‘Er Imtamnyi Uram Ni etereran uram asi diboka bikdobting,’ tenenun ci, laktoto kiboka eteresunun ati diboka bikdobkwandarur.

Sun asing ara berengna milil kanya dam wengyangasin bisik bublan ato bondarur. Ba, asing teleb kuansici ura, bisik teleb eiboka sun nong boboka yibarandum. Bok, sun asing asi kunuk dakansici ura, bisik diboka kum eirandum.

A deyok aryi, sun kanya dam asi bita teneibdandendarur, ‘Er Yesus eterena asi Ni kanya dam sirya wengyandoka berekeibnou do? Kunuk dam eterena malyi asi ni kanya dam tuba bonun do?’ tenen kanya teneibdenkwandarur.

Sun kanya tam nirya berengna milil arabkareansiriryi sun nong ababyi dinatam kalimna kunuk ton kum dakansici ba, kanya teleb akwe boramunyi ura, sun kubde ban tam ababyi teleb dinyi akwe kunubde binkwandarur,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ninyi eterenmou ani, sirya eterebmou ura, Musa kerek sengna dirniliramnyi nang Farisinyi tentok aryi Yesus bisi, “Ni ab tonkwa yina yibkwanim ati, Ni ai yarum!” ebmou. Ba, Er Yesus anyi ai binmou ura, “Yina tonkwa yibkwayeb,” tenen bukoka arubdongobmai.

A arubdongobmai talak aryi, Farisinyi biryi Er Yesus bisi dinmou uca, yina dobde yina kabul talak aryi taruk me ilingdona kum kubmou. Ba, “Nai kobe, Er Yesus bira taruk me kum ilikdobmar cok asi yina dam buryanmar. Nun minob kubde yanganub ara malyi dinyi taruk bol linmabyi ati kanya teneiboka taruk me ilingkarongnub bok, Erda ato kum kubmar,” tenebmou.

Ato tenebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi wenen uram deyok winiryi doboka, Farisi nang ati wenebmou ci, ato ebmou. “Se, sun Musa kerek sengna dirnilindarur nang ara sun me yin moyok ab buna yangana ab ara baitam ati me ilingkarongdarur. Bok, sun kanya tam ara tula kiringna kanya boboka ukula don kanya weksici ura, yu dinyi mitik kum langkaringsurur ababyi kum ilingkarongdarur.

Sun iya kum bingdondarur nang se, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun nong bol kiknibsounyi biryok sun kanya tam ababyi kiknibsou ara sun kum bingdarur do? Sunda nong bol ilingdan dinyi ati bingdandarur. Bok, Erda sun malyi kanya bondarur dinyi ara Er nirya bingsurutnyi kurur.

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sun kanya aryi teleb kuboka Er Imtamnyi biti sun dama deirininto kuboka utoto kum nang ati ton bokeibdarur. Ato kubmunyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi malyi kuna kum nang ato kibdeibkwansir.

Bok, sun Farisi nang ara ato kundarur. Er Imtamnyi biryi, ‘Ato kubdarur,’ ebsou dinyi ara ton dinyi ababyi kunundarur ura, yuk dinyi ababyi kunubkwandarur. Sunda mitik dinyi ababyi teleb to kuboka utotoa dororandum dinyi nirya yuma dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi biti dama deiboka tamukarerandum. Bok, weik dinyi ara sunci ninyi nirya asi teleb kum kimdarur ab Er Imtamnyi bisi boukwe kum kimdarur deyok aryi, aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir,” eboka wenebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, tonda ato eboka wenebmou, “Sun Farisi nang Musa kerek sengna dirnilindarur nang ara Musa Uram eteren ai wengbindoka, ‘Nunsi erebdeibsiting,’ teneboka erebdob sokon burandum ab, ‘Dengna ai dam kunmating nang aryi nunsi erebdeibsiting,’ tenerandum nang ara aminda Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir,” eboka wenebmou.

Ura, tonda Er Yesus biryi neik dinyi atikwe kiklina ton eboka wenebmou. Ara, “Sunda ninyi din nang tukwe dongon dam asi sisa kum deiamingnyi ba, alib tam mangkau yibaraming ato nang kundarur. Ara, sun kanya tam ara yuk-yuk malyi tenen dinyi mitik kum kusurur bok, yuk nang aryi, ‘A nang ara teleb kunung nang,’ teneboka sunsi mangkau miliransing nang kundarur,” eboka wenebmou.

Ato kuboka wenebmou asi, Musa kerek sengna etereramnyi kekebmai ura, ninyi tentok aryi Er Yesus bisi asibdenmou ci, ato ebmou, “Nun eteresurumnyi, ato eboka wenebmarim to ara nunbabyi ina ngilikoka wenebmasirim,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi, Musa kerek sengna etereramnyi nang ababyi wenen uram ebkarebmou ci, deyok winiryi doboka wenebmou. “Sunci yuk nang asi, ‘Ato kubdarur-ato kubdarur,’ eboka ikin takubdeibmunyi ura, ton mitikanun milibkwayeb ton kum tenendarur. Erda, ‘Sun takubdeibmab nang a kunum ikin takubdobkwaming,’ tenebmunyi ura, taruk mungkurungdorandum nang aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir,” eboka wenebmou.

Ura, tonda ato eboka wenebmou, “Er Imtamnyi biryi uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang asi sun aibweyabwe aryi oramnyi nang bok, sunci teleb-teleb kiboka tukwe ungna dam ai dordeirandum deyok aryi, aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir,” eboka wenebmou.

Ato eboka wenebmou cok, “Ato kuboka teleb-teleb kimdarur ci, sun aibweyabwe aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang asi oramnyi ara sunda teleb tenendarur ci, kasuboka tukwe dongon dam asi ai dordeirindarur.

A deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi Iya Bikdobnyi biryi ato ebwe, ‘Sun dam asi Niryi Ni uram ebdeibmanya boban nang ab Ni uram deyok kouboka eterebde ban nang ab bokdonokwan. Ba, a nang ara ton nang ara obingnyi ura, ton nang ara kulab-kulab eboka wenebkwaming.’

Ato kubingnyi deici aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang ining sangnamwe dinyi nirya ara a talak kunmarum nang sunsi kisok dakwansir. Ara, minob im ton tukwe ton kiknibmou talak ara Adam mi Habel bisi deyok kouboka obde yanamnyi ani, sirya kobdob ara Zakharia bisi Bait Allah ai dam aryi oryanamnyi. Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin ara a nang oramnyi ba, ining sangnamwe nirya ara a talak kunmarum nang sunsi kisok dakwansir,” eboka wenebmou.

Ura, tonda ato eboka wenebmou, “Sun Musa kerek sengna eterendarur nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram bikoka eterena ara sun dam kurur. Bok, sunbabyi a bingna dinyi ara kum bingdondarur cok, yuk nang aryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi bokwetebunyi bisi asing eiboka Er Uram kekeboka diboka bikdobtibyi,’ tenen kunmangnyi ura, sunci, ‘Anyi uram kekena mem!’ eboka bublan tiringdongondarur deyok aryi, aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir,” eboka wenebmou.
Ato sirya ebmou ura, Er Yesus adikum aryi anaboka bindobmou. Ba, Musa kerek sengna etereramnyi nang aryi tuba-tuba Ersi dibliliboka yuk-yuk asirdena asirkiringnamnyi.
Ba, sunci, “Una ebte asi kekebtibyi ura, deyok deibdongoboka taleboka obtibyi,” tenen Ersi kalingkiringnamnyi.

A talak aryi Er Yesus biryi eterenmou ba, ninyi yubwa-yubwa ilinto yandoka Ersi arubdongoboka dongmirdanmai bok, Erci Er miliramnyi nang akikwe ebkarebmou ci, ato ebmou. “Sun Farisi nang ara Musa kerek sengna dirniliramnyi nang ara kanya tam ara yu kanya bobmangiryok, baitam asi Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunun nang ato kimdanung dinyi ara ninyi ilinto dakdongobde yibanung. Ati, sunda diboka diblilibdandoka kalikdandobkwandarur.

Ukuryok ara sun ninyi nirya ara yu kanya boraming dinyi yuk nang dam ara lak kum kimdamunyi ababyi aminda ara lak kibkwande. Tonda, ukuryok ara ninyi sun dam nang siklirdongordaramingnyi dinyi ababyi aminda ara lak kibdeibkwande ba, ninyi nirya bikwaming.

Ara, ato deyok ati ebman, unanyi biryi, ‘Malyi, ninyi kum kekenmang ai ara uram yuk to ebmanyi ani, ninyi ilinto kekenmangnyi ai ara yuk to ebkwan,’ teneramingnyi ababyi aminda ara lak kibkwande ba, ninyi nirya bikwanding. Ba tonda, ‘Malyi, ni yuk inibdob ai aryi uram ebmana yuk nang kum bingmaning,’ teneramingnyi ababyi aminda ara lak kibwande,” ebmou.

Ebmou cok tonda ato ebmou, “Se Ni kwityabwe, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin ara yuk ninyi ara nong dem osin nang ati, ‘Nun obsingnyei,’ tenen ilil kusina mem! Erda sunci ilil tenebkwamunyi bira Er Imtamnyi bisi ilil tenebkwandarur! Er Imtamnyi urasin dam asi malyi kubnyei ura, ninyi nong babyi kanya babyi oboka, uk buk weikto angmaci umbura dam dongon mikib bobunyi bisi ilil tenebkwandarur!
Mitik maka ninienyi amubaryi ara mitik keil uang bitinyok dengdandarur dinyi ababyi, Er Imtamnyi biryi a maka mer asi tentok ababyi luba ton kum kimdur.

Ato kuboka, Er Imtamnyi urasin dam ara maka ninienyi outam kibkweteboka sun ninyi ara bikdob dinyi kundarur deyok aryi, sun kisok otong ababyi nirya nungsurur ci, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi iya dibniliboka kalingsur ati sunci ninyi asi ilil tenena mem!” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, ato ton ebmou, “Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, unanyi-unaner aryi Nisi ninyi urasin dam aryi, ‘Anyi bira diba Ninyi Daunyi kurur,’ eboka lak eramingnyi ura, Nibabyi Er Imtamnyi ab Er Uram eryuryangan nang ab tikoka dinmangnyi ai aryi, ‘Anyi bira Ni bingnunyi kurur,’ ebkwan.

Bok, unanyi-unaner aryi Nisi ninyi urasin dam aryi, ‘Anyi bira diba Er Imtamnyi biryi Bokwetebunyi kurur kuma, eboka ni li,’ ebnirinyi bira Nibabyi Er Imtamnyi urasin dam ab Er Uram eryuryangan nang tikmangnyi urasin dam ab aryi, ‘Anyi bira Ni kum bingnunyi kurur,’ ebkwan.” Ato eboka Erci Er miliramnyi nang asi ebkarebmou.

Ura ton, Er Yesus biryi kilibman kum malyi kun dinyi ati ato ebmou, “Unanyi biryi Nisi, ‘Erda Ninyi Daunyi kuma, nun li,’ eboka u dokom erandum malyi kun dinyi ara kilibkwamasitinyi. Bok, unanyi-unaner aryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi, ‘Tola, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus mikib aryi Er Yesus ab Er milinung nang ab wa inung kuma,’ eboka u dokom erongna malyi kun dinyi ara iya kilibman kum dinyi kurur.

Ati, ‘Er Yesus bira nun li,’ tenen nang aryi sunsi taruk taleboka Musa Uram eteren ai kalingna nang urasin dam kum weik nang urasin dam kum mutuk talen nang urasin dam kum bobisingnyi ura, ‘Naie niryi una uram ebtinyi uca, lebdandobkwaman do?’ tenen kum!
A talak ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sunci a nang urasin dam eboka lebdandobkwamamunyi to eterebkarebsici ura, a nang dam asi ebkwandum ati, ‘Se naie,’ tenena mem,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus eterenmou ba, wekmai nang kankan ninyi tentok aryi Er Yesus bisi ato ebmou, “Nun eteresurumnyi, Nai Kanci ni du bisi ebdum! Ba, nun nai taleramwe ani, deibloboka dibwe dinyi ara ni ton bokeibkwanir ati, ‘Bokdobdururum!’ ebdum!” ebmou.
Uca, Er Yesus biryi anyi bisi ato ebmou, “Ni kwit e, Nisi ninyi tentok aryi, ‘Kanda sun bitinyi nang noutam tikoka deyok lilirdeinanyi kurandum,’ ton kum eboka tekeibnei. A wa ara Ni wa kuma,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok sunsi tubto ebmou, “Sunci, ‘Bona weikanun talebtinyi,’ tenen tula kiringna dinyi ara kalikdandobdarur! Ninyi tentok aryi kam kurande dinyi ara bona weikto taleranci dinyi aryi kam kum kurur,” ebmou.
Ura, Erci yuk kemdeirin uram ton kebdeiboka eterebmou. “Bona ilinto borantunyi tentok kurante, anyi bira er wa in dam ara yina lubde yibarante.

Ura, er kanya dam aryi teneinmaturyi, ‘Wa ara sirya ibdobse ba, nong ara ilinto manmar ati, do talak ara dakwaman talak kubmar. Ati, ai ara sirya dobdobse bok, yina ilinto dongobmanto ai ara ton kum dobdobse ati, una kubnyi uca, yina kiboka ai dongodobkwan do?’ tenebte.
Ura, ato kuboka teneibte, ‘Ni gandum du ab ni bona talena ab dongobkwan ai ara gandum du deirin ai dakoka abniryi, weikto ai nun doboka dongobkwan.

A sirya dongobnyi ura, ni kanya asi, “Kanya o, kan dam ara bona talena ara mitik kum deibmakin. Ati, kwalina o kwali-o kwali baramingnyi talak ara taruk louboka buramin ci, kanya kilkil asa aryi yina yiboka me tuba yirmurunkwandim,” ebdankwan,’ tenebte.

Ato teneinmote asi, Er Imtamnyi biryi anyi bisi uram ato ebdeibte, ‘Se, kanda iya walwal kanya bororumnyi. Arub lukunda aryok kan isin nebneb en dinyi dobdobkinyi ura, kan ai dongobumwe yina ab bona ara unanyi dinyi kibkwande do? Kan dibminyi ura, kan boboka ai dongoraminyi dinyi ara dibkwandim ai kum bobinkwandim,’ ebte,” eboka kebdeiboka eterebmou.

Ura, Er Yesus biryi kebdeiboka eterebmou dinyi ati lak ara ato kibmou, “Er Imtamnyi bisi diba kum tenerandiryok bona ilinto talerandiryi yuk nang asi boukwe kiboka ton karena kum uca, bona asi u deici deiboka tula kiringdarandinyi bira a kiklibman atonyi kurandiryi,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang ati yuk eterenmou ci, ato ebmou, “A deyok ati Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sun kam kurandum dinyi ati mambul kanya bona mem! Ara, sunci, ‘Ni arub ara una kubdobnyi uca, yibkwaman do?’ tenen mambul kanya bona mem! Tonda sun nong bol limdana ati, ‘Una kubdobnyi uca, nong bol libdandobtinyi do?’ tenen mambul kanya bona mem!
Er Imtamnyi biryi tenerur ara, ‘Sun isin nebneb en dinyi ab sun nong bol ab asi bikdob dinyi kundarur,’ tenerur. Ba, ‘Yina ab nong bol limdana ab ara malya,’ tenerur,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou ura, yina ab nong bol limdana ati mambul kanya bon deyok ati kiklina bitinyi kikliboka eterebmou. Yuma kiklibmou dinyi ara ato. “Sunci maka teom mer asi dibdendarur! A maka mer aryi ton kum kounung, ton kum kirkiringnung, yina kiboka deirin ai ababyi ton kum kiboka co sangkul umbura dongordeirinung. Bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi a maka mer asi yina yirkarerur. Ati, sun ninyi ara Er Imtamnyi biryi maka mer yina karerur bok, sun ninyi asi ara iya kanya deiboka yina tabakoka karesurur.
Ati, unanyi biryi er isin nebneb en dinyi ati, ‘Una kubdobnyi uca, kam ton kunmaniryok asi dibkwan,’ tenen mambul kanya boboka kam kun uki ton tabangdandarur do? Ato ara iya ton kum kunung.

Ati, sunci mitik deyok isin nebneb en uki ababyi ton tabakdanman kum kuransici ura, sun yina dinyi ab sun nong bol limdaron dinyi ab ara wanok ukubdandobman kum ati, ‘Una kubkwan do?’ tenen kum,” ebmou.

Ba, kiklina bitinyi dinyi ara ato eboka kiklibmou. “Sunci sikil keta asi dibdendarur! A co aryi ongon aling ton kum wiboka ongorur. Bok, Niryi sun dam ebkwinsin ara er weik sienyi Salomo bona ilinto taleramunyi kuramwe talak ababyi sikil keta orande bol ato ongon aling ara ton kum ongoramwe

Ba, wa in dam sungsunga arub ara keta teleb to obmaci asi ambutum ara kwiniboka uk daraming dinyi ababyi Er Imtamnyi biryi bol merengdeirande, sun ninyi ara erebkaboka weiktoto merengdeisurur ati sun ninyi ara mambul kanya bona mem.

A dinyi nirya ara tukwetam kunung nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka kum bingnung nang aryi ingkiringnung. Bok, sun Nai Er Imtam kurutnyi bira sun dam kum kubmasici dinyi nirya ara bingsurur! Ati, sunci, ‘Una kubdobnyi uca, kwaning me yibkwaman do?’ tenen mambul kanya boboka udikum deina mem!

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sunci, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi leboka kalingna Weik Sienyi amwetam asi kubdobtinyi,’ tenen ingkirikdobmunyi ura, sunci, ‘Yibtibyi,’ tenebmamunyi dinyi ab, ‘Ongobdobtibyi,’ tenebmamunyi dinyi ab yuk dinyi ababyi nirya ara sun dam tabakdongoboka karebkwansir.
Sun mitikanun kunmarum nang ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi lebdeiboka Er amwetam bun nang asi kibdeibkwansir ati, sun kanya ilil kusina mem!

Sun bona talena nirya dekmunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biti sun dama kareninto kuboka utotoa kum nang ati karebdarur! Ba, sunda kanya ara, ‘Imtam ai dam ara kum danana kum kubkwande bona ab, ukula don nang ababyi bol lirdena kum kubkwaming dinyi ab, bulbula ababyi kum otokwande dinyi ab asi dobdobkwayeb,’ tenen kiknibdeibdarur.
Ara, ato deyok ati ebmasin, sun kanya ara bona deibmamunyi ai sun kanya ababyi adikum akwe teneindarur ati, a dinyi taklobmunci eikai dam kurur dinyi akwe teneibdarur,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang ati yuk eterenmou ci, ton ato eboka eterebmou, “Sunda sun nai dibde bunkwamunyi ura, nong acu murun ongon aling der arikna deibdobmunyi ura, ‘Wa ibkwayeb,’ tenen sun uk ubna ababyi buk dinibdongobmunyi ba, abci ura, sun nai lukunda yangana ati kiknibdeiboka dibde bunkwandarur!

Ba, sunda wa irmilin nang aryi sun nai bira ner kam dongordan dam binanci ati, ‘Nun nai yandoka bublan congom-congom ebci asi kum bikibyei,’ tenen dibde buraming. Ba, sun nai yandoka bublan congom-congom ebci ura, bublan ola kungdeiraming ato nang kubdarur!

Sun nai biryi yandoka dinmaci uca, er wa irmilin nang ara sun nai yangana ati dibde buramingnyi ura, sun nai biryi yandoka kisal dangnande. Niryi sunsi diboka ebkwinsin ara sun nai biryi yandoka, ‘Wa ibkwan,’ tenen, nong acu murun ongon aling der arikna deibdobci ura, er wa irmilin nang asi, ‘Ni dam ur yandoka yina deirin co lamna bukoka aknabdongobdarur,’ erande. Ba, sunci er dam yangnyi ura, erci sunsi du dongorande.
Sun nai biryi lukunda dukduk en kum berekdoroban kum yandoka diranci uca, sunci dibde buramingnyi asi asing eibci ura, sunsi kisal dangnande,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, ton yuk kiklina aryi Er kwityabwe asi katabum ebdeibmou. “Ninyi tentok ai damnyi biryi, ‘Ukula don nang ara a talak yankwamang,’ tenena kum kubmaci ura, ‘Ukula don nang yandoka ni ai dakoka bona dobdobningnyei,’ tenen kalikoka buraming.

Ato kuboka Ni Ninyi Dasinyi tamuryankwan uki tum ara sunci, ‘A uki tum tamuryankwande,’ kum tenebkwandum. Ati, sun Ni miliranurum nang ara diboka kiknibdeiboka kalikoka dibde buramunyi bok, Ni yankwan,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou ura, Petrus biryi uram doboka ato asibdenmou, “Nun Nai, Kanci a kebdeiboka ebmarim uram ara nun kikwe ati ebmasirim do nun ninyi nirya ati kebdeiboka ebmasirim do?” eboka asibdenmou.

Uca, Er Yesus biryi danguboka Petrus bisi asirdeninto kubmou uca, Er miliramnyi nang asi ato kubdarur ebmou, “Sun kankan dam asi sun nai ai dam aryi busul kuboka wa irantunyi bisi, ‘Ni binkwan talak ara kanci yuk wa irmilin nang sun yina dorkaren talak kubci ura, dorkarenkwandimnyi erebdeibkin,’ eboka tikeibte.
Ura binante, ani, yandoka dirante uca, er wa kareboka binantunyi biryi wa diboka irante ura, anyi bisi kisal dakdobte,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou cok, tonda ato ebmou, “Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sun nai biryi wa diboka irantunyi bisi, ‘Erda wa diboka irur deyok aryi, ni ai dam kurur dinyi nirya kalingkwandanyi erebdeibman,’ ebte.

Bok, a erebdeiantunyi bira yu kasaknyi kurante ura, er kanya dam aryi, ‘Ni nai kum yankwande,’ eboka er nai wa irmilin nang yuk nang ab er nai wa ir milin nerabwe ab asi kulaboka, er nai ai kwaning me doyiboka, walina talen me yiboka kimnante.

Ura, a wa irmilinanyi biryi, ‘Ni nai bira a uki tum yankwande do a talak yankwande do?’ tenerante uki tum kum yankwamote, erda er kum tenerante uki tum yaute. Ura, sun nai biryi yandoka dirante uca, anyi biryi kurante dinyi bikte ura, a wa irmilinanyi bisi oboka ya kalibte. Ura, er nai biryi a wa irmilinanyi bisi busul kanya kum boramingnyi nang iya weiktoto wenebkwande to kuboka wenebte,” ebmou.

Ato kebdeiboka eterebmou cok, tubto Erci lak kiboka eterebmou, “Wa irmilin nang ninyi tentok aryi er nai teneibmote dinyi ara bikanturyok erci kiknibdeiboka wa ina kum kurante ura, er nai biryi kulabkwamote ura, weikto kulabte.

Bok, wa irmilinanyi biryi er nai teneibmote dinyi ara kum bikanturyi er nai biryi ersi kulabmanto dinyi kunubmote ura, er nai biryi kulabkwamote bok, er nai teneibmote dinyi kum bikante deyok aryi, mitikanun kulabte. Ba tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi unanyi bisi, ‘Er Imtamnyi wa irmilina ati Ni wa asi kanya teleb kuboka ibde binkwande,’ tenen kisal dakoka weiktoto kareanci ura, ersi weiktoto molobkwande. Ba, unanyi bisi kalingnandum eboka mitik kum kareanci ura, kalikoka kurandinyi bira weikanun tabakdongoboka molobkwande,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er kwityabwe asi yuk eterenmou ci, ton ato eboka eterebmou, “Ni tukwetam yuryase ara, ‘Uk sirika donokmangnyi uca, uk arande to kubte,’ tenen yuryase. Ba, Er Imtamnyi Uram asi diboka diba tenen nang ab Er Imtamnyi Uram asi diboka diba tenen kum nang ab asi Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi yuk-yuk wibdobkwanung. Ati, ‘Dam talak akiryok ola kunubdeibtinyi,’ tenebman,” eboka eterebmou.
Ura, tonda ato ebmou, “Dina kum kubmanyi talak ara Ni kanya ara mambul mitik kum kubkwanir. Ba, a mambul mitik kum dobniryok dibkwan dinyi aryi Nisi ilil weik mekwan dam ato dongobkwanir.
Sunci Ni yase ati tenendarur ara, ‘Anyi bira antanirdeiryasounyi yau,’ tenendarur bok, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin ara Ni yase ara, ‘Mar ibdandarur,’ tenen yase.

A deyok aryi, a talak akiryok deyok koubdandoka, tentok ai umbura aryi ninyi amubaryi nang mar ibdangiryi ninyi winiryi nang kibdobingnyi ura, ninyi bitinyi nang asi mar ibdeibkwaming. Ba, ninyi bitinyi aryi winiryi nang asi mar ibdeibkwanding.

Sunci mar ibdangnyi ura, Er nai biryi er mi asi mar ibdeibkwande ba, er mi aryi er nai bisi mar ibdeibkwande. Ba, er kwin biryi er nebnyi asi mar ibdeibkwande ba, er nebnyi aryi er kwin bisi mar ibdeibkwande. Ba, er naiyong biryi er kaibwa ner asi mar ibdeibkwande ba, er kaibwa ner aryi er naiyong bisi mar ibdeibkwande,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er kwityabwe yuk eterenmou ani, sirya eterebmou ura, Erci ninyi nirya ati, ato ebmou. “Sunci dinmamunyi uca, mutuk nirya ngoukmaci ura, a talak aryi sunci ato erandum, ‘Mutuk nirya ngoukande ati mo cebkwamar,’ erandum. Ba, sun a ebmamunyi tok kunurande.
Ba, kiting wengbariryi lak kibci ura, ‘Ambutum ara dou kubkwande,’ erandum. Ba, sun a ebmamunyi tok kunurande.

Sunda yu kanya bomamun cok, Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunun nang kimdandarur nang se. Sun kankan dam kunubkwamaci dinyi ara ola bikoka, ‘Ato kubkwamar aryi kubmar,’ tenendarur. Bok, unatoa ati a talak aryi Niryi kikninun dinyi ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi bira Weik Sienyi kurur ara laktoto kibkwamar ati kunmar,’ kum tenendarur do?
Ba, ton sunda, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibsou dinyi asi kunubkwan,’ ebdandoka kunubmanto nang kundarur bok, ato kum erdandarur.

A deyok aryi, sun mar ibdanamunyi nang ab tonkwa weik sienyi dam binkwamamunyi ura, bisik ai aryi antanibdandobmun cok, asi weik sienyi dam binkwandarur. Ato kum kubmun cok, weik sienyi dam banmamunyi asi weik sienyi biryi ninyi wenena uram sengkwetenanyi bisi dobkarebsicei. Ba, anyi biryi kuboka er wa irmilin nang asi dobkarebsicei. Ba, a nang aryi ninyi wenen ai dam dongorbisingnyei.

Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, ara sun bobloamunyi dinyi nirya kum dekamunyi ura, akai dam aryi ola anabkaboka yibarona kum kubkwandarur. Ati, sun malyi kun dinyi ton kuramunyi ura, weik sien nang aryi kum wenebmasingnyi talak aryi uram minob ola sisikabokwandarur!” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ninyi nirya ati eterenmou talak aryi ninyi mikbaryi nang Er Yesus dam yanmai. Yanmai ura, ato eboka Er Yesus bisi nukarebmai, “Galilea mutuk nang aryi Yerusalem atei dam sun dama Er Imtamnyi biti domba kum kambing kum sapi kum oboka uk danmai ci, molonmai. Bok, Pilatus biryi a nang asi obdarur ebmou ba, obmai uca, sun ining ab sun oboka uk danmai bisam ining ab talbalibmou,” eboka nukmai.

Asi, Er Yesus biryi a yandoka nukmai nang ati ato ebmou, “Sun tenebmarum ara, ‘Yuk Galilea mutuk nang nirya aryi sun malyi kunung dinyi ara ikin kum. Erda, a obmai Galilea nang ara sun malyi kunung dinyi ara ikin weik deyok aryi, ato kuboka obmai,’ tenebmarum do?

Ato kuma, sun malyi kun dinyi asi ikin deyok ati kum obmai. Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin ara sunci, ‘Ni malyi kun dinyi taklobniryi, Er Imtamnyi kanya teleb kibdeibkwan dinyi akwe kunubkwan,’ kum teneramunyi ura, sunbabyi a nang dibmai to dibkwandum.

Kum sun tenebmarum ara, ‘Siloam atei dam asi Yerusalem atei keil dukoka don ai aryi dakoka ninyi dinatam takubaryi siklibmou nang ara sun mining malyi kun dinyi ikin weik deyok aryi, siklibmou. Ba, yuk Yerusalem atei nang nirya ara sun malyi kun dinyi ara ikin kum,’ tenebmarum do?

Ato kuma. Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sunci, ‘Ni malyi kun dinyi taklobniryi, Er Imtamnyi kanya teleb kibdeibkwan dinyi akwe kunubkwan,’ kum teneramunyi ura, sunbabyi a nang siklibmou ba, dibyi to kuboka dibkwandum,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi kemdeirina ton dobmou ci ato kuboka eterebmou, “Ninyi tentok aryi er co anggur wa in dam asi co kwarang kouante. Ani, uki tentok tum aryi a co damnyi biryi, ‘A co kwarang du ton mourur do kum do?’ tenen dirbinmote. Uca, du ton kum mourante asi bindoka asing eibte.

Ura, a co damnyi biryi er wa kalingnangnyi bisi ato ebte, ‘Kekerandum. Kwalina winiryi ara a co kwarang dam yandoka, “Du ton mourur do?” tenen diryanganun uca, co du kum mourur ba, ton dakoka yina kum kunun. Ati, a co kwarang ara wa in dam talyi tikwe ati kwebkabokdum!’ ebte.

Uca, a wa kalingnanyi biryi ato ebte, ‘Nai, a kwalina ara kum kwebkabokwaman, erda takmaniryi tukwe deyok dam deibdongoboka kulonga deibdongo kimanyi ba, o kwalina dibdinyi ba, du ton kum moubci uca, kwebkabokwan,’ ebte,” eboka eterebmou.
Er Yesus biryi, sun Yahudi yala nang wa in kum uki si Sabat tum tentok aryi Musa Uram eteren ai wengbindoka ninyi eterenmou.
A eterenmou ai umbura ara amnyok dukamwe ner tentok wengyanmou. A ner ara isa kanya wekamwe uca, amnyok dukmuruamwe ba, tikoka yibindobman kum kuramwe talak ara kwalina dinatam takubaryi kwaliamnyi.

Asi, Er Yesus biryi a ner asing eibmou ura, nabmou ba, Er dam yanmou ura, ato ebmou, “Se Ni kwin, kan u yikurur dinyi ara sirya kwetebkinyi ba, lobdobkwinkir,” ebmou. Ura, Er Yesus biryi ato eboka Er taruk a ner deici deibdongobmou akiryok, a ner amnyok dukamwe ara tubto minob kuramwe ato kibdobmou. Ba, a ner aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi si weik ereboka kibdobmou.

Ba, Er Yesus biryi uki si Sabat tum asi ninyi kwetebmou deyok aryi, Musa Uram eteren ai kalingnamunyi bira yu wekmou. Ura, akai wekmai nang asi ato ebmou, “Sun wa in uki tum ara uki nabaryi berengdur ati, taruk louboka bun tum si Sabat tum aryi ninyi kwetena mem! Erda uki nabaryi berengdur uki asi ninyi kweten uki tum kibdobmun ci, ‘Nun kwetebkwansir,’ tenen bobde yanmunyi ura, kwetebdandobdarur!” ebmou.

Ato ebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi anyi bisi ato ebmou, “Sunda, kanya tam ara yu kanya bobmamun cok, Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunun nang ato kimdarandum nang se. Sun kankan dam ninyi tentok aryi er wa in bisam sapi kum, bisam keledai kum, wa in kum uki si Sabat tum ara er bisam winin ai aryi boboka me kin bobindoka kum kiringdeirbiting do? Kum, sun nirya ato kundarur ci, sun wa in bisam sapi ababyi uki si Sabat tum bok, boboka me kin bobindoka kiringdeirbandarur. Ato kun dinyi ababyi wa in dinyi tenendarur.

Ato deyok aryi, sunbabyi Abraham deibdoba nang kundarur to a ner erbabyi Abraham deibdoba ner kurur. Bok, isa kanya aryi tabwe debninto kubwe talak ara kwalina dinatam takubaryi sirya kwalibyi. Ati, Ni boukwe deyok aryi, uki si Sabat tum bok, Niryi a ner asi isa tabwe debninto kubwe dinyi lobdeibman,” ebmou.

Ato eboka Er Yesus biryi sunci, “Nun du ner,” kum teneramnyi dinyi lak kibmou ba, Er Yesus bisi, “Nun li,” teneboka bisik sengminingnamnyi nang ara alyi kubmou. Bok, Erci kubmou dinyi ara luba kibman kum dinyi kubmou ab Er etereramwe deyok aryi, yuk nang nirya ara sun kanya teleb kubmou.
Er Yesus biryi ninyi asi Er Imtamnyi Uram eterenmou ci ato kebdeiboka eterebmou, “Unatoa aryi kikliboka Er Imtamnyi bira Weik Sienyi kurur amwetam kubkwandum ati eterebsitinyi do?

A talak kubkwandum ati kiklina ara ninyi tentok aryi kwarang du mitika asi wa in dam bindoka kwekmaci uca, abdiryi weik welebci ura, te yangnande. Ba, maka mer aryi a co te asi ai laboka du deiraming to kubkwandum,” eboka kebdei eterebmou.
Ato eterebmou cok tonda ato ebmou, “Unatoa aryi kikliboka Er Imtamnyi bira Weik Sienyi kurur amwetam kubkwandum ati eterebsitinyi do?

A talak kubkwandum ati kiklina ara ner tentok aryi roti kwaning kiknibkwamariryi sici borbosa ato dinyi ilinto kankan asi roti kwaning bung-bung eboka welerande dinyi ara mitik to keica dongobmaci ba, bung-bung eboka welerande ato kubkwansir,” eboka kiklibmou. Ara, ato ati kikliboka eterebmou, “Er Imtamnyi Uram asi akatei dam ara mitikanun etereanyi. Bok, weikto ara a etereanyi eterena aryi im dangna mutuk tukwe dangna mutuk nirya bikwaming,” tenen eterebmou.
Er Yesus biryi atei Yerusalem baramuryi mitik atei bina weik atei bina kiboka Er Imtamnyi Uram eterebde baramwe.
Ato kubde baramwe noutam aryi ninyi tentok Ersi yandoka ato eboka asibdenmou, “Nai ninyi mitikanun asi lemna dinyi dobdobkwaning do?” eboka asibmou.

Uca, Er Yesus biryi Er dam wekmai nang asi ato ebmou, “Imtam ai wengban bisik bublan ara dukubdob ati, ‘Una kuboka wengdorbinkwan do?’ tenen mambul kanya boboka kiknibdobkwandarur! Ara, ato ati ebmasin, aminda ara ninyi ilinto aryi, ‘A bisik bublan wengdorbitinyi,’ tenen ukurdenmangnyi bok, wengbinman kum kubkwande.

Ukuryok ara akai bublan ara Niryi tuba kukeibse tok, aminda Ni ai damnyi biryi yandoka bublan tirikdobnyi ura, ola kum wengdoryamunyi nang ara baitam tiklobmunci bublan congom-congom eboka, ‘Nai nun wengdoryankwayeb ati, bublan kukeibsurum se,’ eboka uram dobkwandum. Bok, Niryi ato ebkwansin, ‘Sunda Ni kum bingsunun ati, dantam aryi yanmarum do?’ ebkwansin.
Ato ebsinyi bok, sunci ato ebkwandum, ‘Nunda Kan urasintam yina yiboka Kan ab tonkwa kuboka kimnamuburyi, Kanci nun atei dam eterebde yibaramumwe uram ara nunbabyi kekeramoubwe,’ ebkwandum.

Ato ebmunyi bok, Niryi ato ebkwansin, ‘Nira sun kum bingsunun ati, sunda dantam aryi yanmarumci ato enmarum. Yu kanya akwe boyibamunyi nange. Ni urasin dam a tingna kuma minola bindobdarur!’ ebkwansin.

Ato eboka yakdonoksinyi ba, ‘Se,’ tenen kanya bobmun ci, si darab-darab en mutuk uk bisik bindoka dinmamunyi ba, Er Imtamnyi bira ninyi leboka kalingna Weik Sienyi kurur mutuk dam imtam asi, Abraham bukmaci asi asing ebkwandum. Tonda, Ishak bukmaci asing eibkwandum. Tonda, Yakub bukmaci asi asing eibkwandum. Ba tonda, Er Imtamnyi Uram minob ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang bukmangnyi asi asing eibkwandum. Ato asing eibmunyi bok, sunda baitam yakdonokwansin ba, engeboka mambul kanya mitik kum dobkwandum.

Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi Bokwetebnounyi tamuryankwan tum ara yaletam atei nang ab, kitingbantam atei nang ab, me utam atei nang ab me youkwa tam atei nang ab aryi Er Imtamnyi bira ninyi leboka kalingna Weik Sienyi kurur mutuk dam imtam asi, sun Yahudi yala nang kum bok, buluryandoka antaniboka yina yibkwaming.

Ba, diba kobdob ati, ukuryok talak aryi sun ninyi ilinto aryi, ‘Iya teleb,’ kum tenerandum dinyi ara aminda Er Imtamnyi biryi nunukdeibkwande. Ba, ukuryok talak aryi ninyi ilinto aryi, ‘Iya teleb,’ tenerandum dinyi ara aminda Er Imtamnyi biryi kum nunukeibkwande,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ninyi eterenmou talak aryi Farisi nang ninyi mikbaryi Er Yesus dam yandoka ato ebmai, “Kansi weik sienyi Herodes biryi, ‘Obkwan,’ tenebmakir ati, Herodes kalingdur mutuk Galilea akiryi bindobdum!” ebmai.

Ato ebmai bok, Er Yesus biryi sunsi uram dekeibmou, “A yu biribdob kam asi bindoka ebdarur, Nira arub ab ambutum ab a kubde binkwaman talak ara isa kanya wengdur nang ab u yirur nang ab kwetenmanyi ani, uki weik kum ibmaniryok Er Imtamnyi biryi teneibnou to kuboka sirya irbinkwaman.

Ato tenebman cok, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaca bobanyi bisi Yerusalem dam ona kum uca, yuk atei dam ona ara malyi to ati dam talak akiryok Yerusalem dam binkwaman cok wa inman. Ati, sunci titik-titik eboka, ‘Birum,’ enmanurum ara mem!” ebmou.

Ato ebmou ura, atei Yerusalem nang ati boukwe eibmou ci, ato ebmou, “Se Yerusalem, Yerusalem, kanda Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang orkarongdum. Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi kan dam bongdongdur nang ara keil aryi donmaminyi uca, dinung. ‘Niryi tuba-tuba kirim aryi er mabwe bulubdeiboka ol amwetam dongobdeiboka irirande to kubkwaman,’ tenen kunmanyi bok, kanda, ‘Ni li,’ tenerum.
A deyok aryi, Niryi sunsi diba ati diboka ebkwinsin, a talak ara Ni asing kum einmanumunyi ani, Ni Yerusalem atei dam bisam keledai deici bukoka wengyanganyi uki tum aryi sunci ato ebkwandum,
‘Er Imtamnyi si deici aryi yanganmar ati, Er si asi weik ebkwayeb!’

Ato ebkwandum tum aryi asing eibkwanurum. Ato ebmun cok, sun kanya dam yu weksici ura, sunci Niti, ‘Nun li,’ tenebkwanurum. A deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kalingsina kum kubsiriryi, taklobsici ura, sun atei olong dem kubkwande,” ebmou.

Uki si Sabat tum yuk tum aryi, Er Yesus biryi Musa kerek sengna dirniliramnyi nang sienyi Farisinyi tentok ab yina tonkwa yibkwamai ati anyi ai binmou. Ba, akai wekmai ninyi nirya aryi, “Er Yesus bira wa in uki tum si Sabat tum bok, Musa kerek sengna umbura dam aryi mem ebsou ba, nun minob kunubde yanganub dinyi asi ton dakbisibkwamar do?” tenen diblilibmai.
Asi, Er Yesus biryi diramwe uca, mundu deiboka er nong nirya bubungnamunyi tentok bukmou asi asing eibmou.

Ura, Er Yesus biryi Musa kerek sengna etereramnyi nang ab Musa kerek sengna dirnilin nang ara Farisi nang ab asi ato eboka asibdenmou. “Musa kerek sengna umbura dam ara wa in uki tum si Sabat tum aryi u yin nang ara ur kwetebkwandarur ebsou do mem ebsou do?” eboka asibdenmou.

Uca, Er Yesus biryi sunsi asibdenmou uram ara Musa kerek sekamwe to kum kuramnyi erda sun cok-sun cok tabakdongoboka eramnyi ati asibdenmou. Ba, sun alyi mitik kum kubmou deyok aryi, uram ton doboka ebman kum kubmou ba, dingdang ebokmai. Ura, Erci anyi taruk talebdongoboka kwetebmou ci, ato ebmou, “Kan ai bindobdum!” ebmou.

Anyi bisi sirya ebmou ura, Musa kerek sengna etereramnyi nang ab Farisi nang ab asi ato ebmou. “Unanyi biryi wa in uki tum si Sabat tum bok, er mi kum, er bisam si sapi kum, asi tukwe ungdona bisik wekmote. Ura, ‘A uki tum ara taruk louboka bun tum ati takmanyi ani, ambutum yuk uki tum berekci uca, dobkwan,’ ton tenebte do? Ato kum kubte, erda er boukwe aryi ola dobkwamote,” ebmou.
Bok, sunci etereramnyi uram ara, “Ur kunubdarur!” eamwe uram asi kum kunuramnyi ba, Er Yesus biryi deyok bita liliboka ebmou. Ba, sunci uram tamuboka dekeibman kum kubmou.

Er Yesus biryi dinmou uca, Farisinyi tentok aryi yina kwalibmou ci, ninyi ilinto nabmou. Ba, a kwalina yiryanmai nang ara erebdob bun sokon akwe wiboka bunmai asi asing eibmou. Ura, Erci kebdeiboka sunsi ato ebmou.

“Sunsi ninyi tentok aryi yina kwaliboka nabmasici ura, ‘Erebdob bun sokon asi burbinkwan,’ tenena mem. Erebdob sokon ara nabmasirinyi biryi sunsi lobdeibkwansurur. Sunsi nabmasirinyi biryi yuknyi erebdob sokon bukmantonyi nabmaci ba, anyi wengyaci ura, sun nabmasirinyi biryi, ‘A sokon ara anyi bukwande ati louboka tukwetam buryurbirum,’ ebsici ba, sun alyi kubsiri bok, tukwetam buryurbimunyei. Ati, sun biramnyi erebdob sokon wimboka burwelebana mem!

Ato kubsicei ati, ninyi tentok aryi yina kwalibdeiboka nabmasici ura, bindoka tukwetam burbinkwandarur! Ba, a nabmasirinyi biryi yandoka diransici uca, tukwetam bukmamunyi eibsici ura, ato ebkwansurur, ‘Ni kwit, kanda eitam erebdob bun sokon burwelebirum!’ ebkwansurur. Ato kubdeibsici ba, sun ab tonkwa buluboka kwalibmaci yina yinmamunyi nang urasin dam aryi erebdeibkwansunung.

Ara, ato deyok ati ebmasin, unanyi biryi dub erebdandoka wingdan kanya boranci ura, aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi luknubdeibkwande. Ba, unanyi biryi luknubdob kanya borandinyi bira aminda ara erebdeibkwande,” eboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Ersi, “Yina kwalibman dinyi tonkwa yibkwayeb, ati ni ai yarum” eboka nabmounyi Farisinyi bisi ato ebmou. “Sunci kitingtam aryi yina kwalibmamunci kum lukunda aryi yina kwalibmamunci kum sun kwityabwe ab sun duweityabwe ab sun yala nang ab sun ai dam ninyi bona ilinto taleramingnyi nang akikwe namna mem! Ato kuamunyi deyok aryi, ‘Sunbabyi yina kwalibmangnyi tum ara nabkwansunung,’ tenen namdarandum. Ato kurdaranmunyi ura, aminda imtam ai dam ara dengna kum dobdobkwandum.

Ati, sunci yina kwalibmamunyi tum ara sun ab tonkwa antaniboka kum kurandum nang asi nabkwandarur. Ara, utotoa kum nang ab, nong malyi kuanci nang ab, yan deneanci nang ab asing kuanci nang ab asi nabkwandarur.

Ato nang ara sunda utotoa kum nang ati, sunci tamuboka kum dekeibkwansunung. Sunci ato nang asi diblilibde namdamunyi ura, utotoa kum nang aryi tamurkaresina kum kuransingnyi bok, teleb kuramingnyi nang kam bukeibkwande tum aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi dengna weik dinyi karebsici ba, dobdobkwandum. A deyok aryi, sunsi Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangdur nang esunung,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ebmou uram kekebmai ura, yina kwalibmai ba, tonkwa bukoka yinmainyi tentok aryi Er Yesus bisi ato ebmou. “Aminda ara Er Imtamnyi bira ninyi leboka kalikwande Weik Sienyi ai imtam kuboka yina tonkwa yiboka kubkwandanyi ab kubkwande ner ab ara ukuryok ababyi Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangdur nang kunung,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou bok, Er Yesus biryi anyi bisi ato ebmou, “Ninyi tentok aryi weik kwalina kwalibkwanturyi ninyi ilinto asi, ‘Niryi yina kwalibkwan tum ara tonkwa yibkwayeb ati, ni ai yandarur,’ eboka nabte.
Ato eboka nabloante ba, kunmating ani, a yina kwalin uki tum kubte ura, er wa irmilin nang bisi ato ebdeibte, ‘ “Ura, yina utotoa nirya sirya kiknibminimasin ati yandarur,” erbirum,’ eboka bokeibte.

Ato eboka bokeibmote bok, a nabmote nang nirya sun yuk-yuk aryi ato ebting, ‘Ni kwit, ni kum yankwaman ati, kansi molobmakin,’ ebting. Yumanyi biryi nabmatunyi bisi ato ebte, ‘Niryi kansi molobmakin ni wa ukuryok dekdobmanci dirbinkwaman ati ni kum yankwan,’ ebte.

Ba, ton yuknyi biryi ato ebte, ‘Ni bisam sapi takubaryi ukuryok dekdobmanci a bisam sapi aryi wa ara, “Una kuboka ibkwan do?” tenen ukurderbinkwaman ati, niryi kansi molobmakin ni kum yankwaman,’ ebte.
Ba, ton yuknyi biryi ato ebte, ‘Ni ner ukuryok dobdobman ati ni kum yankwaman,’ ebte. Ato enmating ani, erci nabmote nang nirya ‘Ni kwit, ni kum yankwaman ati, kansi molobmakin,’ ebting.

Ato ebting ura, nabmatunyi wa irmilinanyi tamubindoka er nai bisi a nang ebmating to ebte. Ura, yina kwalina deyoknyi bira yu kubte ura, er wa irmilinanyi bisi ato ebte, ‘Olong anabdobminyi ura, akatei dam weik bisik nirya yibinkirikoka akatei kunung nang nirya iniboka boyarum! Ara, utotoa kum nang ab, nong malyi kun nang ab, asing kun nang ab, yan denerur nang ab asi iniboyarum!’ eboka bokdonokte.
Ura, a wa irmilinanyi biryi binmote ani, tubto yandoka er nai bisi ato ebte, ‘Nai kan ebmarim to kunubman aryi ninyi sirya naboka dongoryanman bok, ai nirya kum libmar,’ ebte

Ura, yina kwalina deyoknyi biryi er wa irmilirantunyi bisi tubto ebte, ‘Anabdobminyi ura, ninyi yibaramingnyi bisik nirya yibinkirikoka lumun ai doboka kunung nang ababyi nirya tatab-tatab eboka iniboka boyarum ba, ni ai ara nirya libde bok, ni kwalibman yina yibkwamab,’ ebte.

Ato deyok aryi, Niryi sunsi diboka ebkwinsin. Kwalina deyoknyi biryi nabmou bok, ‘Nun kum yankwayeb ati molobmakib,’ ebmai nang ara yina kwalibmou dinyi tonkwa kum yibmai. Ato kuboka Niryi minob, ‘Ni dam yandarur!’ eboka naanse bok, ‘Nun kum yankwayeb,’ tenenung nang ara aminda weik kwalina kwalibkwan ara Ni ab tonkwa kum yibkwayeb,” ebmou.
Uki tentok tum ara bisik ai aryi ninyi ilinto Er Yesus bisi miliryanmai. Ura, Er Yesus biryi dongtam danguboka ato ebmou.

“Unanyi-unaner aryi, ‘Er Yesus bisi milibkwan,’ teneboka Ni dam yanmariryok, er nai er kwin ab er mabwe ab er duweityabwe ab er malnerabwe ab er damnyi ab asi malyi kimdana kum kubdinyi bira Ni milinanyi kum kibkwandur.

Tonda, unanyi-unaner aryi, ‘Er Yesus bisi milibkwan,’ ebmarinyi bira ato tenebkwandur. Ara ato, ‘Tanglona kum uca, ni co lase bobkwan ara Er Yesus deyok aryi, ikin dinyi takubdeibningnyi ababyi, tonda yuk nang aryi nisi obningnyi ababyi, niryi kilkil asa aryi ni Du Yesus milibkwan,’ tenebkwandur!” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, Erci neik eterenmou deyok akikwe kiklina bitinyi ton doboka kiklibmou. Yuma kiklina ara ato ebmou, “Sun kankan dam ninyi tentok aryi dukoka don ai dobkwanci ura, ‘Ai don nang dekwan co bok ab ai don keica dekwan co bok ara kikiman buluboka deibse do kum do?’ tenen bukoka nukoka lilindarur do? Yo, ninyi ara ton talyi bukman-bukman ani, ‘Ai dobkwan,’ ton kum tenenung. Erda, sunci ai dona dengna ara, ‘Ukuboka dekde binanyi ani, ukuboka deknyi uca, akai sirya dobkwan,’ tenen lilibdeibmun cok akai dorkalirandum.
Ba, akai dobkalibmaniryok, sirya dona kum uca taklobnyi ura, ninyi aryi asing eibningiryi ngilikoka ato ebningnyei.
‘ “Anyi bira ai dorkalina ati dobkalibwe bok, sirya dona ara kum bikwe darib,” ebningyei,’ tenen co bok bukoka nukoka lilibdeibingnyi ura, ai dorkalinung,” ebmou.

Ato ebmou cok, kiklina bitinyi dinyi ara ato ebmou, “Dantam mutuk weik sienyi biryi, ‘Yuk mutuk weik atei sienyi ab mar bobdanimnyi ura, ni ab tonkwa mar ibinkwayeb nang ara yubwa-yubwa takubaryok. Ba, yuk atei weik sienyi ab tonkwa mar iyankwansing nang ara yubwa-yubwa dinatam inbaryi ara kikiman obdankwayeb do kum do?’ tenen ton kanya teneibde bunung.

Erda, ‘Naie mar bobdandoka ordana ni ilil, ni tam nang nirya obkiribningnyei,’ tenebci ura, yuk mutuk weik sienyi tam nang bisik noutam tuba iyanganmangnyi talak aryi ninyi tentok bokeiboka uram ato erdeiraming. ‘Mar te murubkwanimnyi ura, una kuboka te murubkwanunum do?’ eboka bongdonongnaming.
Ato kuboka ninyi nirya ara sun kankan aryi, ‘Utotoa nirya takloboka Er Yesus milibkwan,’ kum tenebdinyi bira Ni milinanyi kum kibkwandur.

Ati, sunda uwa to teleb erande ato nang kundarur. Bok, uwa ara to kum dananci ura, tubto tamuboka to kibdeibman kum kurur. Erda baitam deirirlorbaraming. A neiktoto kuboka sunbabyi Ni milin nang kiamun cok takloboka bindamunyi ani, tubto Nisi milibkwan tenen tamuryanman kum. Ati, unanyi biryi ninyi uram keken dinyi amol kuanci ura, a ebman uram asi diboka kekeboka bikdobkwandur!” ebmou.
Er Yesus biryi ninyi etereramwe ura, Roma weik sien nang ati pajak dengna karebdarur en nang ab, yuk malyi kun dinyi kuramnyi nang ab Er Yesus dam yandoka Erci etereramwe uram kekeryangaramnyi.
Ba, Farisi nang ab Musa kerek sengna uram etereramnyi nang ab aryi talak dobmai ci, ato ebmai, “Se, Anyi bira malyi kun dinyi kunung nang ab bukokmar aryi yina tonkwa yinmang,” ebmai.
Ato ebmai ati Er Yesus biryi uram doboka neik deyok ati, kemdeirin aryi liliboka ato eterebde binmou.

“Sun kankan dam aryi ninyi tentok aryi domba seratus baryi winirante asi, tentok wanikmote ura, una kubte do? Erci, ‘Malyi, tentok dinyi ara a kunmarur,’ kum tenebte erda sembilan puluh sembilan baryi dinyi ara winirante mutuk dam takloboka tentok domba ingkiringbite.
Ingkiringbinmote ani, a wanikmote domba sirya asing eibte ura, er kanya kilkil aryi tomoboka takubdobturyi, yaute.

Boyanganmote ani, sirya atei boyate ura, er kwityabwe ab, er ai dam ninyi ab naboka abturyi, ato ebte, ‘Ni kwityabwe, ni domba wanikmonwe bisam ara sirya eibman ci, bobde yanman aryi, ni kanya kilkil mitik kum kubmanir,’ eboka nukarebte ura, er kwityabwe ababyi kanya kilkil kubte.

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, sembilan puluh sembilan baryi tuba kunmai domba ara ninyi sembilan puluh sembilan baryi nang ati kiklibmou. A nang ara ato tenenung, ‘Nunda utotoa malyi kun dinyi ton kum kunub,’ teneraming nang ati, imtam kuraming nang aryi, ‘Teleb,’ tenen dinyi ara mitiktoto teneraming. Bok, tentok domba wanikmou ani, dobmou domba ara ninyi tentok ati kiklibmou. Anyi bira er malyi tenen dinyi takloboka Er Imtamnyi Uram eanci to kununanyi kibci ura, sun kanya teleb aryi kilkil mitik kum kurande,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi neik deyok ati enmou ci, yuk kemdeirina ton ebmou, “Ani, tonda ner tentok aryi dengna weik keil uang takubaryi deibdante uca, tentok wanikmote. Ura, uk ubna una kum-kum nimalyi kwarakdeiboka ai sungsunga kiboka ingkiringmote ura, eibdobte do? Erci, ‘Malyi, tentok dinyi ara a wanikmanyi ababyi weika ara tuba deibdobman,’ kum tenebte. Erda, nimalyi kwarakdeiboka ingkiringdonmote ani, dobdobte.

Sirya dobdobte ura, er ka nerabwe ab er ai dam nerabwe ab naboka ato ebte, ‘Ni kayabwe, ni keil uang wanikmonwe dinyi ara tubto sirya dobdobman ati, ni kanya kilkil kubmanir,’ eboka nukarebte ura, er kayabwe ababyi kanya kilkil kubte.

Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, a neiktoto kuboka ninyi tentok aryi er malyi kuranci dinyi takloboka Er Imtamnyi Uram eanci to kununanyi kibci ura, Er Imtamnyi ab Er Uram eryuryangan nang ababyi kanya kilkil kurande,” ebmou.
Er Yesus biryi eterenmou ci, neik deyok ati ton ato kemdeirina winiryi dinyi kebdeiboka eterebmou. “Bona bonanyi tentok aryi mabwe bitinyi deibdante.

Ura, uki tentok tum aryi kelenyi biryi er nai bisi ato ebte, ‘Nai, kan talerum bona, “Aminda ara er dinyi kibkwande,” teneraniminyi bona talena ara ukuca karebnurum!’ eboka molobdobte. Ba, sun nai biryi er talerante bona talena sun bitinyi mabwe ati bokdeibte.

Ura, kelenyi bira uki bitinyi kum winiryi kum ara erti karebmote bona ara dengdonmote ani, co bok akwe kibdobte ura, ‘Bobde binkwan,’ tenen dinyi akwe dekdobte ura, ninyi atei asi yuk mutuk tingdorbite. Yuk mutuk bindoka kurante ai ara, ‘Aminda ara ato kubde binkwan,’ tenen kanya teneirdena kum kurante. Erda, er bobdante bona talena nirya ara malyi kun dinyi ati kuboka waningsinirante.
Ani, er bobdante bona talena nirya kum dandeibokte bok, er bindoka kurante mutuk dam ara kwaning atana li dobte ba, a mi ara kwaning ab ukutotoa nirya kum danabmurubte.
Ura, er bindoka kurante atei asi ninyi tentoknyi bisi wa irmilirbite. Ba, anyi biryi, ‘Ni bisam kalingkwanirim,’ eboka wa in dam bokdonokte.
Ba, a bindoka kalingnante talak ara kwaning atarante ura, ‘Bisam yina karebmating yina asi ton yibtinyi se,’ tenerante. Bok, ninyi tentok ababyi ersi yina ton kum kareranting.

Ato kuranturyi, er kanya dam aryi ato tenebte, ‘Nai kobe ato kubse to ara malyi to kubse. Ni nai ai dam wa inung nang ara yina bulung ton kum bunung asi nira kwaning atan asa kunun uca, ni talya dibkwan.
Ati, anabdobniryi, ni nai bisi bindobnyi ura, ato ebkwan, “Nai niryi Imtamnyi urasintam ab nai kan urasintam asi manmalibdongobsise.
Ati, nai kanci ni mi enina ara malyi to ati, kanci nira wa irmilinanyi ebkwanurum,” ebkwan,’ tenebte.
Ura, anabdobturyi, er nai bisi tubto tamuboka bindobte.

Banmote ani, atei damtoto baute ura, er nai biryi dinmote uca, er mi kelenyi yuk mutuk do yanganmote asi asing eibte. Ura, er mi boukwe aryi kanya sangkuruk-sangkuruk ebte ba, er mi yanganmote dam cungbindoka iribdobturyi, uw kunkunubdobte.
Uca, a mi aryi ato ebte, ‘Nai niryi kan urasintam ab Er Imtamnyi urasintam ab asi manmalibdongobsise ati, nai kanci nisi ni mi enina ara malyi to ati, kanci nira wa irmilikinanyi ebnurum,’ ebte.

Ato ebte bok, a mi er nai biryi er wa irmilin nang asi ato ebte, ‘ “Ni mi nong,” tenebkwan ati, minola cungbindoka ongon aling teleb asi ongordeiryandarur. Ba, “Erda akai kurur dinyi kalingne mi,” tenebkwan ati taruk du dongona ababyi dongordeiryandarur. Ba tonda, “Erda ni wa irmilinanyi kuma,” tenebkwan ati, yan karuk ababyi ongordeiryandarur.

Sirya ongobdeibmunyi ura, bisam sapi ukuryok kabunyi nebmar ci, tub kablobmar bisam asi oboka yubdarur! Ni mi ara dibninto kubwe ani, tubto kam bukokninto kubmar. Tonda, waningnaming mi ato kubse asi yanmar ba, eibdanmanim deyok aryi, a uki tum ara teleb uki tum kubmar ati, kanya karyi asa aryi tonkwa yibkwayeb,’ ebte. Ura, sun nirya kanya kilkil aryi sun nai ebmote to kunuboka kwalibmatingiryi, mot sebting.
Bok, er mi dunyi bira wa in dam kunmote ani, yanganmote ani, ai dam yandoka kekerante uca, ai umbura ara bu eboka mot lilim ilinto enmating asi kekebte.
Ura, wa irmilinanyi tentok asi naboka asibdete, ‘Akai umbura dam ara una kunmarum ci, ato enmarum do?’ eboka asibdete.

Uca, a wa ir milinanyi biryi ato ebte, ‘Kan weit wanikdau ani, arub aryi sirya yanmar. Ba, kan nai ab teleb kuboka ebdanmaring ci, kan nai biryi ukuryok kabunyi nebmar ci, tub kablobmar bisam sapi asi oboka yubmar ci, kunmab,’ ebte.
Ato ebte ura, a mi dunyi bira er yu aryi akai wengbana kum kubte. Ba, er nai biryi sakweteboka nenem yaute.

Bok, a mi aryi er nai bisi ato ebte, ‘Nai bita kanya teneibderum! Nira kwalina o kwali-o kwali banunga nirya ara kan wa akwe ikunun. Ara, kan uram ebdeibmaminyi to ara niryi mitik ton kum lebesengnun bok, kanci bisam kambing mi ababyi ton kum karenurum. Ba, ni kwityabwe ab kanya kilkil aryi a bisam kambing oboka kwalibmabibiryi, tonkwa ton kum yinub.
Bok, kan mi ara kan bona boboka talyi yortamne nerabwe bobkirikoka kan bona nirya kum danarderbiu ani, arub aryi yaranyi bitikwe ilila bisam sapi oboka yubmarim,’ ebte.
Uca, er nai biryi er mi dunyi bisi ato ebte, ‘Ni mi, kanda ni ab tonkwa iya tuba kununum ci, ni bonun bona ab talenun dinyi ab nirya ara kan dinyi kibkou.

Ati, kan weit ara dibninto kubwe ani, kam bukokninto kubmar. Tonda waningnaming mi ato kubse asi yanmar ba, eibdanmanim ati, ni ab kan ab tonkwa antanibdobnimiryi kanya kilkil kuboka mot semkwanim,’ ebte.” Ato eboka Yesus biryi kebdeiboka eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi yuk kemdeirina aryi Er miliramnyi nang asi ato eboka eterebmou. “Bona bonanyi tentok kuranturyi er co bok talenanyi tentok wiante. Bok, bona bonanyi biryi kekenmote uca, yuk nang aryi yandoka ato ebting, ‘Kan co bok ara co bok talenanyi wibumnyi biryi ton wanikwe,’ ebting.

Ato ebting asi kekebte ura, er co bok talenanyi bisi naboka ato ebte, ‘Kanda ni co bok ara waningdum ba, yuk nang aryi ni dam yandoka ebmang asi sirya kekebmakin. Ati, ukuryok akiryi kanda ni co bok talen wa kum inkwandim deyok aryi, kan wa irum to asi, “Nira, co bok ara ato-ato kubse,” eboka lak ebdum!’ ebte.

Ura, co bok talenanyi kanya tam aryi ato teneibte, ‘Ni nai biryi ni wa co bok talenanyi kunun ara sirya dobkwetebkwamanir. Ati, ni tukwe talena ara mitang kunurur deyok aryi, ni wa ibdobman kum kunurur. Ba, niryi ninyi yuk nang asi bona molorkiringna ara ni alyi kunurur ati, aminda kubdobkwan tam asi una kubdobtinyi uca, teleb kubdobtinyi do?’ tenebte.

Ato tenebte ura, bita kanya teneinmote ani, ato kubkwan tenebte, ‘ “Wa kum inkwandim!” ebnici ura, ni nai bona boblobyi nang asi ninyi bun dakoka abniryi sun kanya teleb kibdeibnyi ura, sun ab tonkwa kubdobkwayeb,’ tenebte.
Ura, Er nai bona bobloanting nang asi yuk-yuk nabte ura, yuma nabmatunyi bisi ato ebte, ‘Kanda ni nai bona ara unabaryi dekmanto asi boblobumwe do?’ eboka asibdete.

Uca anyi biryi, ‘Nira minyak zaitun kwen moyok asi weik moyok seratus baryi boblobse,’ ebte. Ura, co bok talenanyi biryi, ‘Er kanya teleb kibdeibkwan,’ teneboka outamtoto molobturyi ato ebte, ‘Kan bona boblobumwe dinyi ati kerek sengna umbura dam ara keil moyok seratus baryi boblobumwe dinyi ara kilibkaboka, keil moyok lima puluh baryi tuba boblobse eboka sekdongobdum!’ ebte.

Ura, yuknyi bisi ato eboka asibdete, ‘Kanda ni nai bona ara una baryi dekmanto asi boblobumwe do?’ eboka asibdete. Uca, anyi biryi, ‘Nira, gandum du kin aling asi weik aling seratus baryi boblobse,’ ebte. Ura, co bok talenanyi biryi, ‘Er kanya teleb kibdeibkwan,’ teneboka outamtoto molobturyi, ato ebte, ‘Kan bona boblobumwe dinyi ati kerek sengna umbura dam ara gandum du kin aling seratus baryi boblobumwe dinyi kilibkaboka, aling delapan puluh baryi tuba boblobse eboka sekdongobdum!’ ebte ba, sunci, ‘Anyi bira ninyi teleb,’ ebdobting.

Ura, er nai biryi co bok talenanyi kubmote dinyi bikte ura, er bona asi ton wanikante deyok ati kum kisal dakwamote. Bok, erda co bok talenanyi biryi, ‘Aminda tam ara una kubnyi uca, teleb kubdobkwan do?’ tenen aryi yuk nang asi dam-dam kiboka teleb kimnante deyok aryi, er nai biryi, a co bok inina dongnanyi bisi kisal dakwamote,” ebmou. Ura, Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang asi ato ebmou. “A kebdeiboka eterebmasin dinyi ara ato ati ebmasin. Sun tukwetam kuraming nang ara neik kanya boraming nang ati sun mamun dibnilibdandoka aminda kubkwamingnyi tam dinyi ati kiknirminingdonung. Bok, sun berengna dam kurandum nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram neik uram kekerandum nang sun mamun asi ton dibnilibdandoka aminda tam kubkwandum dinyi ati diboka ton kum kiknirminingdondarur!

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, co bok aryi sun kwityabwe mambul kanya bobmangnyi nang asi milibdandarur. Ato kuramunyi ba, co bok aryi sunsi milibdanman kum kubsici ura, aminda imtam ai wengbindoka iya kubdobkwandum,” eboka kebdei eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi ninyi eterenmou ci, ton ato eboka eterebmou, “Unanyi biryi mitik bona ababyi tanglona kum uca busul kuboka kalingdanci ura, weik bona ababyi tanglona kum uca busul kuboka kalikwandur. Ba, unanyi biryi mitik dinyi ababyi diboka kum kuranci ura, weik dinyi ababyi diboka kum kubkwandur.
Ati, sunci co bok deyok ababyi kanya deiboka kum kalingdamunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi, ‘Kam kun dinyi ababyi kanya deiboka kum kalikdobkwaming ca,’ tenen kum karebkwansurur.

Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi tukwetam bona kareansici dinyi asi kanya deiboka kalingna kum kuramunci tangloramunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi, ‘Sun dinyi iya kam kubkwande dinyi ababyi, kanya deiboka kalingdona kum uca taklobkwaning ca,’ tenen kum karebkwansurur.

Ninyi tentok aryi weik nang bitinyi wa asi ton kum inung. Ato kuboka irante ura, tonyi bira malyi kimdante ba, tonyi bira boukwe kimdante. Kum, ato kurante tonyi wa asi tanglona kum uca kanya deiboka irante ura, tonyi wa ara tanglorante. Ati, sunci Er Imtamnyi wa asi kanya deiboka ibkwandarur kum, co bok doron wa asi kanya deiboka ibkwandarur kum. Ninyi tentok aryi wa bitinyi-bitinyi ara kanya deiboka ibman kum ati ebmasin,” ebmou.
Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou ba, sun Farisi nang co bok kanya deiriramnyi nang nirya kekebmai. Ura, sun kanya tam aryi, “Ara malyi to ebmar,” tenebmai ci, akwi tubmai.

Ba, Erci sunsi ato eboka erekdobmou, “Er Imtamnyi bira sun kanya dam teneibmarum dinyi ara bikmasir bok, ninyi urasintam ati, ‘Nunda iya teleb to akwe kunub nang aca,’ tenen wingdanmarum. Ati, ninyi aryi teleb teneraming dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi bira iya malyi to tenerande.

Er Musa kerek sengna sekdeiamwe to ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang kerek sengna sekdeiamnyi to ab kunubde yangarandau tok ani, Yohanes ninyi me dongonanyi kuramwe talak sirya kunurandau. Ba, Yohanes kuramwe talak aryi ara Er Imtamnyi Weik Sienyi kibdiryi, leboka kalikwansir eboka eterena deyok koun talak kubmar. Ati, sun ninyi yuk-yuk aryi tatabkaboka, ‘Nibabyi Er Imtamnyi ab kunanyi kibdeibnute,’ tenen ingkirikdobkwandarur.
Ati, im ab tukwe ab kum dankwande ara malyi bok, Musa kerek sengna uram umbura dam kurur kerek sengna ara iya mitika tentok ababyi dakbisibman kum dinyi kurur.

Ara, kiklin dinyi ara ato dinyi ababyi kum danana kum kubkwande. Ninyi tentok aryi er doanci ner takloboka, yuk ner dobdobci ura, ukula a kunum yobde kurandiryi. Ba, unanyi biryi yuknyi biryi takloanci ner asi dobdobci ura, ukula a kunum yobde kurandiryi,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi eterenmou ci, ton ato eboka eterebmou, “Bona bonanyi tentok kuramuryi er alib ongon aling ara kuruta bol aling asi dengna weik aling akwe ongoramwe. Ba, er nunungna ongon aling ababyi, dengna weik aling akwe ongoramuryi kanya kilkil asa aryi dubnyi nong-nong kibdandoka tuba-tuba kwaliberekde yiramwe.

Ato kuramwe talak ara utotoa kum aryi moloryiramunyi bisi er nong bol ara susa aryi inten irande to kuramunyi si Lazarus ton kuramwe. Ba, anyi bira yuk nang aryi boboka a bona boramunyi ai bublan sangkwetena lika dam deiryangaramnyi ba, marongnamwe.

Ba, kwaning atanmaci ura, ato teneramwe, ‘Bona bonanyi biryi kwaning co lamna deici deibdongoboka yinmaci uca, sungsunga sakmaci asi baitam kibkwetebingnyi asi kum, kam ati kareryangnyi asi kum buboka doyiboktinyi,’ teneramwe. Ato tenen kalikoka buramwe bok, kam aryi er nong bol susa mulakoka korokde yiryangaramnyi ba, u mitik kum yiramwe.

Ato kuramwe ani, uki tentok tum ara utotoa kumnyi bira dibmou. Ura, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang aryi boboka Abraham dam kamdeirirbinmai. Ura, uki kum kunmai cok a bona bonanyi bibabyi dibmou ba, tukwe ukoka dongorbinmai.
Ura, a bona boramunyi bira uk dam bakan bindoka mambul donmou ci, yana mutuk aryi dirwelenmou uca, Lazarus bira Abraham dam bukmou asi asing eibmou.

Ura ato ebmou, ‘Nai Abraham, ni boukwe kibdobnurum se, ni uk buk ilinto angmara kankan kunman uca, u yinmanir. Ati, kanci Lazarus bisi ebminyi ba, er taruk du aryi me toubdongoboka, ni silalum asi lingdongoryanurur!’ ebmou.

Ato ebmou bok, Abraham biryi anyi bisi, ‘Se a mi, kan kanya bita teneibderum! Kanda, kam kuramumwe talak ara teleb to kubde kuramumwe ati, ukuryok ara u mitik kum kunkwankir. Bok, Lazarus bira kam kuramwe talak ara malyi kubde kuroramwe deyok aryi, ukuryok ara erda kanya kilkil kun dinyi dobdobmar.

Tonda a kum ababyi, kan kunmarim ai ab nun bukmanim ai ab noutam ara sangkurukman kum kot aryi seksou. Ati, nun bukmanimtam nang aryi kan kunmarimtam yanman kum. Ba, kan kunmarimtam nang ababyi atam yanman kum kot seksou,’ ebmou.
Ura, anyi biryi ato ebmou, ‘Nai, ato ebmarim ura, niryi kansi molobkwinkin, Lazarus bisi ni nai ai dam bokdonokdum.
Ba, bindoka ni weityabwe amubaryi kam tuba kunmang nang asi erbirur. Ba, aminda sunda ni wengyanman ai kum wengyankwaming ati,’ ebmou.

Uca, Abraham biryi, ‘Kum, sun dam ara Musa kerek sengna ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang kerek sengna ab sirya kubwe. Ati, a kerek sekdeiamnyi to asi diboka kekeboka kunubdobkwanung,’ ebmou.

Uca, anyi biryi, ‘Kum Nai Abraham, a dem ara kikiman kum ati, diandinyi bisi tubto kam bukoka sun dam bici ura, sun malyi tenen dinyi takloboka Er Imtamnyi bisi kanya teleb kurdeirin dinyi akwe kunubkwaming,’ ebmou.

Bok, Abraham biryi anyi bisi ato ebmou, ‘Musa kerek sengna ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang kerek sengna ab umbura dam kerek sekdob dinyi asi diboka kekeboka kum kunuramingnyi ura, diamingnyi nang kam bukoka sun dam bingnyi ababyi diboka diba kum tenebkwaming,’” Ato eboka Yesus biryi eterebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang asi eterenmou ci, ato ebmou, “Aminda ara ton nang aryi ton yuk nang asi, ‘Malyi kun dinyi kubting,’ tenen yan benebdankwaming. Bok, ‘Malyi kun dinyi kubting,’ tenen yan benebkwandanyi bira aminda ara Er Imtamnyi biryi ersi wenebkwande.

Ba, Er Imtamnyi Uram ukuryok kekeboka kunurkalinmarinyi bisi ninyi tentok aryi, ‘Malyi kun dinyi kubte,’ tenen malyi kun dinyi dam bobici. Ura, anyi bisi ikin keil aryi ngang youbdongoboka mekwan umbura dongorbinkwamandate ara malyi ikin kum. Bok, ‘Malyi kun dinyi kubte,’ tenen bobinandinyi bisi Er Imtamnyi biryi wenebkwande dinyi ara iya ikin weik dinyi bobdeibkwande.

Ati, sunci yuk nang asi yan benebmunyei ati kalikdandobdarur! Sun kwityabwe aryi sunsi malyi kubdongobsingnyi ura, lilibdeibkwandarur! Ba, sun kwityabwe aryi, ‘Naie ni malyi kubman,’ tenebci ura, er malyi kun dinyi ara luba kiboka er ab antanibdeibdandarur!

Ba, uki tentok berekmaci tum aryi sun kwit biryi liki tabaryi sunsi manmalirdongonmasiriryi, sun dam liki tabaryi yandoka, ‘Ni malyi kunman dinyi ara malyi to kunman,’ tenebman eboka lak eryanganmaci ura, er malyi kun dinyi luba kiboka er ab antanibdeibdandarur!” ebmou.
Ura, Er miliramnyi ani, yuma deyok kouboka Teleb Uram eterebkalibkwamnyi nang amolbaryi nang aryi sun Nai bisi ato ebmai. “Nai Kanci nun dib tenenub dinyi tabakdongobsurum!” ebmai.

Ato ebmai bok, Er Yesus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Sunci Niryi eteresunun uram asi diba teneramunyi dinyi asi, keibyi du mitika ato sun kanya dam kuansici ura, a co kwarang asi, ‘Tobkaboka weik mekwan deici tingbirum,’ ebdate ababyi sun ebmandate to kunubkwamote,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang asi ato ebmou, “Sun kankan aryi unanyi biryi kwaning wa irmilinanyi kum bisam wininanyi kum dekdante. Ura, a irmilinanyi bira wa in dam binmote ani, yangate asi er nai biryi, ‘Olong kwaning yiroryarum,’ ebte do?

Ato kum ebte, erda erci ato asi ebkwamote, ‘Olong yandoka acu murun ongon aling der arikna arikbiminyi ura, ni yibkwaman yina kiknirdeibniminyi ba, ni yinmanyi ani, sirya yibdobnyi ura, kan yibkwandim,’ ebte.

Ura, er nai yinmote asi sirya yibdobte ura, er wa irmilinanyi biryi er ebmote to kunuboka yina kiknibdeibmote ba, sirya yibmote deyok aryi, er wa irmilinanyi bisi, ‘Ni wa irmilinanyi,’ eboka kibdobte do? Ato kum ebte erda, ‘Anyi er nong dekse ara ato kuboka bita kiknirdeinkwanurur asi yironkwanun,’ tenebte.

Ato aryi sunbabyi ati ebmasin, Niryi ukutoto wa nirya, ‘Ibde bindarur,’ ebmasinyi ura, sunci ato ebkwandarur, ‘Nunda, wa irmilin nang kunub deyok aryi, nun ibmanto wa akwe kunuboka ibde bankwayeb ati, nun kisal dangsina mem,’ ebkwandarur!” ebmou.
Er Yesus bira atei Yerusalem banmou ci, Samaria mutuk wiliba kan Galilea mutuk wiliba kan bisik kuboka banmou.

Banmou ani, atei tentok wengbanmou bok, ninyi takubaryi susa taleamwe nang aryi Er Yesus eibmai ura, “Nun susa talebsou ati, yuk nang dam bibyei,” tenebmai ci, yuk ai tikdobmai cok, uram dobmai, “Se Yesus ninyi eterenanyi, Kanci nunsi boukwe kibdobsurum se!” eboka uram dobmai.

Ura, Erci a takubaryi nang asi dibdenmou ura, ato ebmou, “Sun susa taleanci ani, sirya akabsakdobmaci nang aryi Musa kerek sengna umbura aryi sekdeibwe to kunuboka Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin nang dam amurdarbaraming. Ato kuboka sunbabyi Nisi, ‘Diba Erci kwetebkwamasir,’ tenebmun cok, amurdarbindarur!” ebmou. Ba, a takubaryi nang aryi Er Yesus uram diba teneboka bisik noutam banmai talak uca, sun taleamwe susa ara nirya akabsaksekdobmou.

Ba, ninyi tentok ara er nong dirdarderamwe uca, er nong bol taleamwe susa ara nirya kum dandobmou. Ura, er kanya kilkil aryi tubto tamuboka Er Yesus dam yanganmou ci, uram weikanun iboka Er Imtamnyi bisi si weik ebde yanmou.

Ani, Er Yesus urasin dam luknubdongo ngang dakdongoboka buryanmou ci, Er Yesus bisi kibdobmou. A yandoka ukubmounyi bira sun Yahudi yala nang aryi, “Samaria nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka kum tenenung nang,” teneramnyi ateinyi biryi kubmou.
Ura, Er Yesus biryi ato ebmou, “Se, Ni kweteabne nang ara ninyi takubaryi,” tenebman bok, toubnibaryi nang ara dantam binmang ba, anyi tentok tubto tamuboka yanmar do?

Yahudinyi kuma aryi tamuboka yanmar ci, Er Imtamnyi bisi, “‘Ni Nai, Kanci nisi sirya kwetebmanirim,’ eboka kiryanmar bok, sun Yahudi yala nang yoka ara ninyi tentok ababyi ton tamuryangana kum kubmang ati, sun nirya ara dantam binsekmang da?” ebmou.
Ato ebmou ura, Samarianyi bisi, “Kan biramnyi aryi Nisi, ‘Diba Er Imtamnyi biryi Bokwetebunyi biryi kwetebmanir,’ tenebmarim deyok aryi, sirya lebmakin ati, ur tikoka bindobdum!” ebmou.

Sun Farisi nang aryi Er Yesus bisi ato eboka asibdenmai, “Una talak aryi Er Imtamnyi bira kalingna Weik Sienyi kurur lak kibwande do?” eboka asibdenmai. Uca, Er Yesus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Er Imtamnyi bira Weik Sienyi kuboka ninyi ilinto Er amwetam kun nang kibdeibkwande talak ara ilil tenen dinyi asi asing eibmunyi uca, lak kum kibkwande, erda ninyi kanya umbura aryi lak kibkwande.

Tonda, ninyi aryi, ‘Dibdendarur e. Atam yandoka kunmar, tonda otam yandoka kunmar,’ kum ebkwaming. Erda, Er Imtamnyi bira Weik Sienyi kurur ci, sun kankan dam yandoka ninyi Er amwetam kun nang kibdeibsou,” ebmou.
A sirya ebmou ura, Er miliramnyi nang asi ato ebmou, “Sunci, ‘Ninyi Daunyi tamuryankwande uki tum ara ola berekte ba, asing eibtibyi,’ teneramunyi ababyi sun asing aryi ola kum eibkwandum.

Tonda, aminda ara yuk nang aryi sunsi ato ebkwansing, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi bokwebmounyi bira o yanganmar onun e,’ ebkwansing. Ba, ton nang aryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi bokwebmounyi bira a yanganmar anun e!’ ebsingnyi ati, ‘Diba,’ tenen kunuboka adikum dirbana mem.
Erda, Ni Ninyi Dasinyi tamuboka yuryankunyi tum ara bebe aryi im kubkub dinatam ling ebci ba, dinatam ababyi longanirande to, kubkwande.
Ato kuna kabul talak ara Er Imtamnyi biryi Bokwetebnounyi bira yuma kobdob mambul weik dinyi donmanyi bok, a talak kunmang nang aryi, ‘Nun li,’ eboka dokdonokwaning,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou cok, neik deyok ati kiklina ton ato ebmou, “Ni Ninyi Dasinyi tamuryuryankwan tum ara Nuh kuramwe talak aryi kuamwe to kuboka kunubkwande.
Nuh kuramwe talak ara mangkau aryi kwaning yiboka me yiboka, ner kabdeibdandoka kuramnyi. Ani, Nuh weik co ngun-ngun umbura wengdorbinmou tum ara me oboka ninyi nirya siklibmou ba, isin daksekmai.
Ato kuboka, Lot kuramwe talak ababyi neiktoto mangkau aryi kwaning yiboka me yiboka, dekdandoka, wa iboka ai doboka kibde kuramnyi.

Ani, Lot atei Sodom aryi anaboka atei si Zoar barou tum ara Er Imtamnyi biryi uk mo ab du keil leibmangnyi ba, nger-nger erande ato dinyi asi imtam aryi dobkwetebmou ba, ninyi nirya yaliboka yibkabokmou.
A kubmou to Ni Ninyi Dasinyi tamuryuryankwan tum ababyi ato kubkwande.

Ati, a berekwamaci tum aryi unanyi biryi ai aruma dub weleboka tikmaci asi yanganyi ura, yuryibindoka ai umbura wengbindoka er bona-bona dorbana mem. Ba, wa in dam kunmangnyi nang ababyi tamuboka atei yangana mem.
Lot ner aryi, ‘Nai kobe, nun bona takloyanganmab aryok se,’ tenebmou ci, dirtamurderamwe uca, diamwe asi kanya teneibdenkwandarur!

Unanyi biryi kam kun dinyi ati, ‘Wanikdanyei,’ tenen dungdaroranci ura, aminda ara iya kam kun dinyi kum dobdobkwande. Ba, unanyi biryi Ni deyok ati kunmariryi, kam kun dinyi waningdaranci ura, aminda ara iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwande.
Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, a berekwande tum lukunda ara ninyi bitinyi neik sokon mabmaringnyi bok, tonyi dobdobnyi ura, tonyi bira taklobkwan.
Ba, nerabwe bitinyi gandum du taingmaringnyi bok, ton ner dobdobnyi ura, ton ner ara taklobkwan.
Tonda, ninyi bitinyi wa in dam wa ibde kunmaringnyi bok, tonyi dobdobnyi ura, tonyi bira taklobkwan,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou ura, Er miliramnyi nang aryi Ersi asibdenmai, “Nai dantam aryi ato kubkwande do?” eboka asibdenmai.

Uca, Er Yesus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Er Imtamnyi biryi Bokwetebnounyi tamuryankunyi tum ara ninyi nirya bikwaming. Dei bum bunmaci dikum ara, ‘Ninyi tukwi adikum mabmar,’ tenen bingdaming to a uki berekwamaci ura, ninyi nirya bikwaming,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi Er miliramnyi nang asi kemdeirina ton doboka ato ebmou, “Er Imtamnyi bisi molobkwamamunyi ura, ‘Se kobe, nun molona ara kum kekeransir ati taklobkwayeb,’ tenen kum. Erda, molororamunyi ura, iya moloronkwandarur,” ebmou.

Ura, kemdeirina ara ato kuboka eterebmou, “Atei tentok dam asi ninyi wenenanyi malyi tentok ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi wenebnicob,’ kum teneranturyok, dib kum tenerantunyi kuranturyi, yuk nang ababyi malyi kimnantunyi kurante.

Asi, akatei dam ara sulyi ner tentok kuranturyi, ninyi wenenanyi malyi dam asi tuba-tuba yandoka ato erante, ‘Nai se, ni dinyi asi yuk nang aryi doronung ati kanci, “Er dam ner asi tamubkarebdarur!” ebdeibnurum!’ eryangarante.

Bok, anyi bira liki winiryi kum dumbaryi kum ara a ner eryangarante uram ara kum kekeana ato kurongnante ani, tentok tum aryi er kanya tam aryi ato tenebte, ‘Nira Er Imtamnyi bisi ilil kum tenenun ci, ninyi tentok ababyi boukwe ton kum kimnun cok, erda a sulyi ner aryok tuba-tuba yandoka malyi kimyanganurur deyok aryi, iya ato akwe tuba ukuryanicob,’ tenen ati a ner dinyi boblobyi nang asi niryi, ‘A ner dinyi ara tamubkarebdarur!’ ebkwan. Ba, tuba-tuba neik uram akwe eryangaranir ara taklobkwande,’ tenebte,” ebmou.
Ato kebdeiboka ebmou cok, Er Yesus biryi, “Sunci ninyi wenenanyi malyi akiryi ebkwamote to asi bita kanya teneibdendarur!

Er Imtamnyi bira Erci wianci nang aryi kitingtam lukunda Ersi molobdobingnyi nang ara ton kum bitardeirirur do? Kum. Erci arub ara karena kum kubmanyi ani, yuk tum aryi karebkwan ton tenerur do? Ato ton kum tenerur.

Ati, Niryi sunsi ebkwinsin, Er Imtamnyi biryi wianci nang asi yuk nang aryi tatab-tatab enmangnyi bok, Erci ola lobdeibkwande. Bok, Ni Ninyi Dasinyi tamuryuryankwan tum ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi kum takwamanir, erda Erci lobdeibkwamanir ca,’ tenen molororamingnyi nang ab ara ton ebdankwayeb do?,” ebmou.

Er Yesus biryi eterenmou ci, yuk nang ara malyi kiboka sun biram nang dub erebdandoka wingdaramiryi, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi urasintam ara teleb akwe kunun ba, yuk nang ara malyi dinyi ilinto kunung,” tenen nang ati a kemdeirina kebdeiboka eterebmou.

“Ninyi bitinyi Bait Allah ai ara Er Imtamnyi biti ninyi dama deirin ai dam bindoka Er Imtamnyi bisi molorbitiring. A molorbitiring nang ara tonyi bira Farisinyi, Musa kerek sengna dirnilirantunyi biryi molorbite. Ba, tonyi bira, ‘Roma weik sienyi Kaisar biti pajak dengna karebdarur,’ eboka molormilirantunyi biryi molorbite.

Ura, wingdan kanya boramnyi nang Farisinyi tentok ara tikoka er kanya dam aryi molonmaturyi, ato eboka molobte, ‘Nai Imtam kurumnyi, nira yuk nang nirya aryi malyi kun dinyi kunung atonyi kum kunun, nira yuk nang aryi ukula don nang kunung atonyi kum kunun, nira yuk nang aryi yu kuraming atonyi kum kunun, nira yuk nang nerabwe talyi yona kumnyi kunun ba, tonda nira pajak dengna karebdarur erutnyi a tikmar atonyi kum kunun deyok aryi, niryi Kansi, “Ni Nai,” eboka kibdobmakin.
