Ato eboka asibdenmou ba, a kalingnamunyi biryi sun yin doun nang sienyi bisi bindoka, “Nai o. Nun una kubkwayeb do? Nun talebmabnyi biryi, ‘Nira Kaisar biryi kalingnurutnyi kunun,’ ebmar. Ati, nunci ersi tabwe aryi lituk-lituk ebibyi asi, ukubman kum dinyi dobibyei,” ebmou.

Sun yin doun nang seratus baryi nang asi kalingnamunyi biryi ato ebmou ba, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi er Paulus bisi yandoka aburyi, ato eboka asibmou. “Kanda dib Kaisar biryi kalingkurutnyi kurum do?” eboka asibmou. Asibmou uca, er Paulus biryi, “Diba, nira Kaisar biryi kalingnurutnyi kunun,” ebmou.

Ebmou uca, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi er Paulus bisi ato ebmou. “Nibabyi Kaisar biryi kalingnurutnyi kunun bok, co bok ilinto deksiryi, Kaisar kalingnanyi kibdobmase,” ebmou. Ebmou uca, er Paulus biryi ersi, “Ni nai ab ni kwin ab ara Kaisar kalingna nang bitinyi kurandei ci, nisi deianirei ati, nibabyi Kaisar kalingnurutnyi kunun,” ebmou.

Ebmou ba, sun er Paulus deyok asi lilibkoi nang aryi kekebmai ci, sunci, “Anyi bira Kaisar biryi kalingdurnyi bisi lituk-lituk ebibyei,” tenen akiryok kisibdakoka er Paulus deyok asi lilina kum kubmai. Tonda, sun yin doun nang sienyi bibabyi ilil kubmou. Ara, “Se, niryi arukman ba, Kaisar biryi kalingdurnyi bisi tabwe debmanga,” tenebmou ura, er ilil kubmou.

Mabmai ani, berekwe ura, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi, “Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebmang deyok ati ni biktinyi,” tenebmou. Ato tenebmou ura, erci sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang ab sun Yahudi yala nang asi kalikoka uram sengkwetena nang yuk nang ab asi arukoka, “Bulubdarur,” ebmou. Ebmou ba, sirya bulubmai ura, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi er Paulus bisi sun bulubmai nang urasintam bobinmou. Ara, erci sirya arukmou to, er Paulus bisi tabwe deamnyi asi lobdeibmai ura, erci er Paulus bisi sun Yahudi yala nang kalingna nang dam bobinmou.

Bobinmou ura, er Paulus biryi sun uram sengkwetena nang asi diboka dinmou cok, erci sunsi ato ebmou. “Ni kwityabwe e, minob aryi kuboka arub ababyi nira Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsurur to nirya kununun. Ara, ni kanya dam aryi, ‘Malyi kun dinyi nirya bai donokman,’ tenen bikdandoka kununun ati ebman,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ba, Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin sienyi si Ananias biryi arukmou ba, ninyi tentok ara er Paulus dam tikmunyi biryi er Paulus sibambol asi taruk inin aryi si moubdongobmou.

Si moubdongobmou ba, er Paulus biryi yu asa aryi Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin sienyi Imam Besar bisi ato ebmou. “Er Imtamnyi biryi kanda malinyi bisi wenena teleb se. Kanci niti, ‘Er Musa takubdeiansou uram asi yan yanibmar do?’ tenen ni deyok ati lilibde bukmarim bok, er Musa biryi takubdeiamwe uram asi kanci yan yanibmarim. Ati, kanci anyi bisi, ‘Er Paulus bisi si moubdongobdum,’ ebmarim ci, kanci er Musa Uram asi yan yanibmarim ci,” ebmou.
Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ba, sun er dam tikmai nang aryi, “Se,” ebmai cok, “Kanda Imam Besar bisi ‘Malinyi,’ ebmarim do? Er Imtamnyi biryi tikeibmunyi bisi kanci wenena mem,” ebmai.
Ebmai uca, er Paulus biryi uram lelekoka, “Ni kwityabwe, ni malyi to ebman. Anyi bira Imam Besar kurur ara ni kum bikmonwe aryi ato ebman. Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi ato eboka eteresurur,
‘Sun kalingnansingnyi sien nang asi, “Malinyi,” ebmunyei,’ ebmou.
Ato ebmasou bok, ni malyi to ebman,” ebmou.

Ura, er Paulus biryi sun bulubmai uram sengkwetena nang asi dinmou uca, ton wekmai nang ara Saduki nang ton wekmai. Ura tonda, yuk wekmai nang ara Farisi nang ton wekmai asi eibmou. Eibmou ura, er Paulus biryi, “Sun Farisi nang aryi nisi libniting,” tenen erci sun bulubmai nang asi ato ebmou. “Ni kwityabwe, nira Farisi nang deibdobanyi kunun. Ni nai bira Farisi nang kuramwe to, nibabyi Farisinyi kunun. Farisinyi kunun cok, niryi, ‘Sun din nang ara kam bukokwaming,’ tenen dibde bunun. Niryi kam burdeirina deyok ati dib tenenun ati, sun bulubmarum nang aryi niti, ‘Er malyi deyok lilibkwayeb,’ teneranurum ati ebman,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ba, sun a buluboka wekmai Farisi nang ab sun Saduki nang ab aryi sun mamun lulubdanmai. Lulubdanmai ci, sunci bokoka sisikdanmai. Ara, sun Farisi nang aryi er Paulus bisi libdobmai bok, sun Saduki nang aryi er Paulus deyok ati tuba tatab-tatab ebmai.

Sun Saduki nang ara sun din nang ati, “Kam tubto kum bukokwaming,” teneramnyi. Tonda sunci, “Imtam aryi kuboka Er Imtamnyi Uram yuryangan nang ara ton kum kunung,” teneramnyi. Tonda, “Isa kanya ababyi ton kum kurur,” teneramnyi. Bok, sun Farisi nang ara, “Imtam aryi kuboka uram eryuryangan nang ab isa kanya ababyi diba kurur,” tenen lak eramnyi. Tonda, sun din nang deyok ati sun Farisi nang aryi, “Kam tubto bukokwaming,” tenen lak eramnyi.

Ura, er Paulus biryi, “Nira Farisinyi kunun,” ebmou ba, sun bulubmai nang aryi uram weikanun ngolokoka lulubdanmai. Ura, ton Farisi nang ara er Musa ebdeiamwe uram eteren nang kuramnyi nang aryi tikoka abiryi, “Anyi Paulus bira malyi dinyi utotoa ton dobmar asi kum bikmab. Ati, anyi bira Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangananyi ab ebdanmarei kum? Isa kanya aryi ersi eterebmou kum? Ati, nunci anyi deyok lilina ara, takwayeb,” eboka Farisi nang mikbaryi aryi sun Saduki nang ab tonkwa lulubdanmai.

Ebmai uca, sun a bulubmai nang nirya aryi sun mamun lulurdana uram tabakdongo weik kibmai. Lulurdana uram weik kibmai ba, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi, “Er Paulus bisi libtaleboka obingnyei,” tenen ilil kubmou. Ura, erci sun yin doun nang asi arukoka, “Er Paulus bira a lulurdanmang nang dam tikmaranyi bisi leboka bobindarur,” ebmou. Ato eboka arukmou ba, sun yin doun nang aryi er Paulus bisi lembindoka sun yin doun nang atei tamuboka bobinmai.

Sirya bobinmai ura, lukunda kubmou ura, nun Du Yesus anaboka er Paulus dam tikmou ci, ersi ato ebmou. “Kan kanya katabum ekina teleb. Kanda sun Yerusalem atei nang asi Ni Yesus uram dib en uram eboka lak ebmarim to, aminda aryi sun sien atei si Roma kunung nang ababyi neiktoto lak ebkwandim,” eboka nun Du Yesus biryi er Paulus bisi ebmou.

Mabmai ani, berekwe ura, Yahudi yala nang ninyi mikbaryi aryi, “Er Paulus bisi obtibyi,” tenen marmun yibmai. Ara, sunci, “Er Paulus bisi kum obibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wenesina teleb,” ebdanmai. Ebdanmai cok, sunci, “Er Paulus bisi ona kum ura, kwaning me utotoa kum yibkwayeb,” eboka si tebmai.
Sun ato ebdanmai nang ara ninyi empat puluh baryi nang aryi kubmai asi, yuk nang ababyi tabakoka er Paulus bisi marmun yibmai.

Ura, sunci sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang ab sun Yahudi yala nang kalingna nang ab asi bindoka ato ebmai. “Naiyabwe o, nunci er Paulus bisi obkwamib. Ati, ‘Nunci Paulus bisi kum obibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wenesina teleb,’ ebmabibiryi, ‘Anyi bisi ona kum ura, kwaning me utotoa si tebkwayeb,’ ebdanmoubwe,” ebmai.

Ebmai cok, sun marmun yibmai nang aryi ato ebmai, “Ati, ukuryok sunda uram sengkwetena nang aryi sun yin doun nang sienyi bisi ato eboka molobdarur. ‘Nunda er Paulus deyok ati tubto lilibkwayeb ati, “Kanci er Paulus bisi nun dam tubto boyarum,” tenen molobmakib,’ ebdarur. Ba, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi er Paulus bisi sun uram sengkwetena nang dam boyangaci asi, bisik noutam aryi nunci anaboka abibiryi, lukdandoka er Paulus bisi taleboka obkwayeb ati, sunci yin doun nang sienyi bisi ebdeibdarur.” Sun marmun yibmai nang aryi sun Israel yala nang kalikoka uram sengkweten nang asi ato ebmai.

Ato eboka marmun yinmai asi Paulus er malner mi aryi kekebmou ura, erci akiryok sun yin doun nang atei binmou ura, erci Paulus bisi erbinmou. Ara, “Nai mam o, kanti, ‘Obkwamakib,’ tenen marmun yinmaking,” erbinmou.
Asi, Paulus biryi kekebmou ura, erci yin doun nang seratus baryi kalingnamunyi bisi naboka, “A mi ara uram ton eryanmar ati, sun yin doun nang sienyi bisi ebkwandur,” eboka molobmou.

Molobmou ba, er yin doun nang seratus baryi nang kalingnamunyi biryi a mi asi sun yin doun nang sienyi bisi bobinmou. Bobinmou ura, erci sienyi bisi ato ebmou. “Nai, nun talebmabubunyi si Paulus biryi nisi nabmanir ura, erci nisi ato eboka molobmanir, ‘A mi ara uram kareryanmar ati er sienyi bisi uram ton ebkwandur ati, a mi boboka sienyi dam bobirum,’ ebmar ati boyanman,” ebmou.
Ebmou ba, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi a mi asi taruk talebmou cok, ai lumun tam bobinmou. Talebindoka aburyi, erci a mi asi, “A mi, kanci nisi una ebkarebtinyi tenebmarim do?” eboka asibmou.

Asibmou uca, a mi aryi uram lelekoka, “Nai o, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi, ‘Er Paulus bisi obtibyi,’ tenen marmun yinmang. ‘Obtibyi,’ tenebmang ci, sunci sienyi kansi eboka ato molobkwamaking, ‘Nunda uram sengkwetena nang aryi er Paulus deyok ati tubto lilibtibyi tenebmab. A deyok aryi, sienyi kanci ambutum aryi er Paulus bisi nun dam boyarum,’ eboka molobkingiryi, sunci er Paulus deyok tubto kum lilibkwamang. Erda, sunci er Paulus biti, ‘Obkwayeb,’ tenebmang.

Ati nai o, kanci sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ebkingnyi uram asi diba tenebminyei. Ninyi empat puluh baryi nang kum lima puluh baryi nang kum aryi, ‘Er Paulus bisi obtibyi,’ tenen bisik noutam aryi duknuboka wekmanyi ani, Paulus bisi bisik noutam aryi taleboka obkwamang. A nang nirya ara, ‘Er Paulus bisi kum obibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wenebsicei,’ ebmang. Tonda, sunci, ‘Anyi bisi ona kum ura, kwaning me si tebkwayeb,’ ebmang. Ati, sienyi kanci, ‘Er Paulus bisi boyankwansin,’ en uram asi dibde bukmang ci, sunci, ‘Ato-ato kuboka obkwayeb,’ tenen sun sirya kiknibminikdanmang,” eboka Paulus er malner mi aryi sun yin doun nang sienyi bisi lak ebmou.
Lak ebmou ura, er sienyi biryi ersi, “Kanci nisi lak ebmanirim uram asi ninyi tentok ababyi lak ebminyei,” ebmou ura, a mi asi, “Ur bindobdum,” ebmou.

Ura, sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi yin doun nang kalingna nang bitinyi asi naboka erci sunsi ato eboka arukmou. “Yin doun nang ninyi dua ratus baryi asi, ‘Sundamnyi kiknibminikdandarur,’ eboka arukdurum. Tonda, kuda deici bukoka mar ibaraming yin doun nang ara ninyi tujuh puluh baryi ababyi neiktoto sundamnyi kiknibminikdating. Tonda, co balang doun nang ara dua ratus baryi ababyi sundamnyi kiknibminikdating. A lukunda aryok, a yin doun nang nirya aryi antaniboka kalikdamingiryok, sunci er Paulus bisi Kaisarea atei bobindarur.
Kuda ababyi kiknibminikdeiboka er Paulus bibabyi kuda deici bukeiboka er Paulus bisi lebingiryok, nun nai Feliks bira Kaisar amwetam bunanyi dam bobinkwanung,” ebmou.
Sun yin doun nang sienyi biryi ato eboka arukmou ura, erci er Feliks bisi kerek sengna ton kerek sekeibmou. Ara, erci ato eboka kerek sekmou,
“Nira Klaudius Lisias biryi nun nai Feliks Kaisar amwetam bunanyi kanti, ‘Teleb,’ ebmakin.

Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi, ‘Anyi Paulus bisi taleboka obkwayeb,’ tenen taleboka abiryi, obkoi bok, ni ab ni yin doun nang ab tonkwa yandoka lebmoubwe. ‘Anyi bira Kaisar biryi kalingdurnyi kurur,’ en uram asi kekebmase ati, nunda ersi lembinmoubwe.
Ura, niryi, ‘Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ersi tatab-tatab ena uram biktinyi,’ tenen niryi ersi sun Yahudi yala nang asi uram sengkwetena nang bulun ai dam bobinmase.

Bobinmase ura, anyi dam asi malyi dinyi ton kum eibmase. Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ersi tatab-tatab ebmang deyok ara sun Musa biryi, ‘Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,’ en uram kununa deyok ati tatab-tatab ebmang. Anyi biryi, ‘Wenebkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi ton kum kubmar. Ara, ‘Weneboka obkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi erci ton kum kubmar. Tonda, ‘Ninyi wenen ai asi dongobkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi ababyi erci ton kum kubmar.

Ura, ninyi aryi nisi eterebmanei ci, ‘Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi anyi biti, “Obtibyi,” tenen marmun yibmang,’ ebmai. Ebmanei uca, niryi arukmonwe ba, anyi bisi nun nai kan dam anmalakoka boyanmang. Ura, sun anyi bisi tatab-tatab ebmang nang asi niryi ato ebman, ‘Nun nai Feliks Kaisar amwetam bunanyi dam bimunyi ura, sun tatab-tatab ena uram ur lak ebdarur,’ eboka arukmase.
Yo, ni nai, nira Klaudius Lisias biryi kansi a kunum sirya kerek sekeibmakin,” eboka sekeibmou.
Ura, er sienyi Klaudius Lisias biryi arukmou to, sun yin doun nang aryi kunubmai. Kunubmai ci, sunci a tum lukunda aryok Yerusalem atei aryi Paulus boboka anabmai ci, Antipatris atei bobinmai.

Ura, a bindoka mabmai ani, berekwe ura, sun kuda deici bukoka mar ibaramnyi yin doun nang aryi er Paulus bisi Kaisarea atei bobinmai. Bobinmai bok, sun tukwe bis banmai yin doun nang ab sun co balang doun nang ab tamurbindoka sun Yerusalem atei sun yin doun nang kuramnyi atei tubto bindobmai.

Ura, sun kuda deici bukoka banmai yin doun nang aryi Kaisarea atei binmai ura, sunci sun sienyi biryi kerek sekeibmou kerek sengna asi boboka weik sienyi Kaisar amwetam bunanyi bisi karebmai. A kerek sengna asi karebmai ci, sunci er Paulus bisi Kaisar amwetam bunanyi si Feliks dam bobinmai.

Ura, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi a kerek sengna asi sirya nukmou ura, Paulus bisi, “Kanda dan mutuk nang kurum do?” eboka asibdenmou. Ato eboka asibmou uca, er Paulus biryi, “Nira Kilikia mutuknyi kunun,” ebmou. Ebmou uca, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi er Paulus bisi ato ebmou, “Teleb, sun kansi tatab-tatab ekunung nang atam sirya yanmangnyi ura, niryi kan deyok ati lilibdenkwankin,” eboka Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi ato ebmou. Ura, erci er arungna nang asi ato ebmou, “Anyi Paulus bisi er Herodes biryi doamwe sien ai asi bobindongobmunyi ura, ersi kaliki kubdarur,” eboka er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi si Feliks biryi arukmou.

Ura, uki amubaryi mabmai ani, sun Yahudi yala nang kalikoka uram sengketena nang ton Yerusalem atei aryi anaboka Kaisarea atei yanmai. Ara, Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin sienyi si Ananias ab, ton sun Yahudi yala nang asi kalingna yuk nang ab aryi, “Er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebkwayeb,” tenen sun Kaisar amwetam bunanyi si Feliks bisi yanmai. A yanganmai ura, tatab-tatab ena diboka lilibde bingnamunyi si Tertulus bira sun ab tonkwa yanmai. Sirya yanmai ura, sunci er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebmai.

Ura, er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi, “Er Paulus bisi ai weki boyandarur,” eboka arukmou ura, er Tertulus bira sun Yahudi yala nang uram bobmunyi biryi er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebmou. Ara, erci ato ebmou,

“Nai, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi kanti niryi, ‘Teleb,’ ebmakin. Kanci nun mutuk kalingsurum akiryi nunda tuba-tuba teleb akwe kuramib. Kan bikdobto kuboka kalingnansirim akiryi nun mutuk asi bitabdeibmanto dinyi ilinto nai Kaisar amwetam bunanyi kanci bitardeiriransumwe.
Nun Yahudi yala nang nirya aryi nun nai Feliks kanti, ‘Nun teleb kurdeirisurutnyi,’ tenen kan si weik tuba-tuba ererdeikunub.
Ura, niryi, ‘Nun nai uki bumang kibminiknyei,’ tenen uram cang kum ebkun. Ati, kanda teleb kanya borumnyi biryi kekeniminyi bok, niryi uram mitikanun ebniryi, anyi Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebkun.

Anyi Paulus bira ninyi malyi kiminingdurnyi kurur asi eibmoubwe. Dantam-dantam yibarur atei nirya asi anyi biryi nun Yahudi yala nang asi, ‘Sun kalingnansing nang uram kekebmunyei,’ eboka eteresurur. Anyi bira Nazaret ateinyi si Yesus bisi miliramnyi nang sienyi kurur.

Tonda, anyi biryi mem en dinyi kunuboka Bait Allah ai asi malyi kibdeibmou. A deyok aryi, nunci ersi talebmoubwe. Ura, nunci anyi biti, ‘Er Musa biryi takubdeiansou to wenebkwayeb,’ tenebmoubwe bok, sun yin doun nang sienyi Klaudius Lisias biryi nun tenebmoubwe to sekminikoka anyi Paulus bisi lemyanmou. Lemyanmou ura, erci nunsi, ‘Sunci er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi dam bindoka abmun ci, er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ena teleb,’ ebmou.

Ura, ukuryok Kaisar amwetam bunanyi kanci anyi Paulus deyok lilibminyi ura, anyi bira malinyi kurur ara kanbabyi eibkwamarim. Ara, nunci ersi tatab-tatab enub uram asi kanci, ‘Diba ati ening,’ tenen bikwamarim,” ebmou.
Ura, er Tertulus biryi a kunum sirya ebmou ura, sun er ab tonkwa wekmai Yahudi yala nang ababyi, “Tola kuma,” eboka er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebmai.

Sirya tatab-tatab ebmai ura, er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi, “Er Paulus biryi uram ton ebkwandura,” tenen er taruk mobmob ebdongobmou. Er taruk mobmob ebdongobmou ba, er Paulus biryi erdamnyi libdandoka ato ebmou.

“Nai o, kwalina mitik kum kwaliramoubwe talak nirya asi kanci nun Yahudi yala nang deyok liliboka sengkweterandim. A deyok aryi, niryi teleb kanya boboka abniryi, ‘Nun nai biryi ni deyok ababyi diboka lilibkwamanir,’ tenen nidamnyi libdankun. Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi tatab-tatab enunung bok, niryi malyi dinyi ton kum kubmase ati ebman.

Nira Yerusalem atei asi yanmase ura, uki amolbaryi a kunum kubde binmoubwe ati ebman. Ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molobkwan,’ tenen ni Yerusalem atei asi yanmase. Kanci lilinmaniminyi ababyi, niryi tola uram kum ebman ara bikwamanirim.

Nira Yerusalem atei yanmase ura, ninyi tentok ababyi uram ton kum lulubdanmoubwe. Tonda, niryi sun bulubmai nang asi malyi kiminingna ton kum kubmase. Ara, sun Bait Allah ai dam asi bulubmai nang ab, sun Musa Uram eteren ai wekmai nang ab, sun atei keta bulubmai nang ab ababyi niryi malyi ton kum kibminikmase ati ebman.

A nang aryi niti tatab-tatab enunung bok, ni malyi kun dinyi ton kum kunun ati, talyi uram akwe eboka abingiryi, nisi tatab-tatab ebmaning. Sunci niti, ‘Er malyi kubmou to asing eibmoubwe,’ ena kum enunung.

Niryi malyi dinyi ton kum kubmase deyok aryi, niryi kansi uram ton lak ebkwaman. Nira nun Nai Imtamnyi nun aibweyabwe aryi moloraminyi bisi molonun. Er Imtamnyi bisi molonun, ukuryok eterena uram dib tenenun. Ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus deyok ati eterena uram dib tenen nang nunsi, ‘Malyi uram asi dib tenenung,’ eransing. Ato eransing bok, niryi a uram ati, ‘Dib en uram,’ tenenun ci, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molonun. Er Musa biryi ebdeiansou uram nirya ara nibabyi dib tenenun. Tonda, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang yuk nang aryi kerek sekmai uram nirya asi nibabyi dib tenenun.

Sun yuk Yahudi yala nang aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde bunung to, nibabyi Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde bunun. Ara, sunci, ‘Sun din nang kam bukokwaming,’ tenen dibde buraming to, nibabyi neiktoto teneboka dibde buran. Ara, ‘Teleb kun nang babyi malyi kun nang babyi erci kam bukeibkwansir,’ tenen ni dib tenenun.

Ato tenenun ci, busul kuboka abniryi, niryi, ‘Teleb dinyi akwe kubdeibtinyi,’ tenen tuba-tuba kurdeirirderan. Ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi bisi malyi kubminiknyei,’ tenen, ‘Sun ninyi asi malyi kubminiknyei,’ tenen teleb dinyi akwe kurdeirirderan.

Ura, kwalina mikbaryi kwalibmai talak ara Yerusalem atei ton kum yangaranse ani, Yerusalem atei tamuryanmase. Ara, co bok bobmasiryi, ‘Ni kwityabwe Yahudi yala nang kankan aryi utotoa ataranci nang asi karebkwan,’ teneboka yanmase. Tonda, ‘Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deibkwan,’ tenen yanmase.

Ura, nira ato kubmase bok, Yahudi yala nang ninyi mikbaryi aryi nisi eibmanei. Ara, niryi er Musa biryi ebdeiansou to, nidamnyi me ilikeibdanmase ura, Bait Allah ai dam kunmase bok, a nang aryi nisi asing eibmanei. A eibmanei talak ara ninyi ilinto ni dam ton kum bulubmai ati ebman. Tonda, ni dam tikmai ci, wekmai nang ara uram weikanun ngolokoka lulurdana uram ton kum ebmai.

Niryi ninyi asi malyi kum kibminikmase bok, Asia mutuk kuramnyi Yahudi yala nang ton yanmai ura, sunci ninyi asi malyi kibminikmai. A nang ara nisi tatab-tatab ebmanei cok, kanda Kaisar amwetam bunanyi urasintam kum yanmang. A nang aryi kan urasintam asi yanmating obura, ni malyi kubmase dinyi asi lak eboka tatab-tatab ebniting.

Ura, a yanmang nang aryi nisi, ‘Tatab-tatab ebtibyi,’ tenebmaning ara sun asing eibmanei to lak ebningiryi, ni malyi kubmanyi deyok asi lak kimdeirina teleb. Sun nun Yahudi yala nang asi uram sengkwetena nang aryi ni deyok asi lilibmai uca, niryi nidamnyi libdanmase ura, niryi una malyi dinyi kubmase do? Ni damnyi ton kum bikdanman ati, a nang aryi ni malyi kubmanyi dinyi lak kibkwaning.

Niryi a nang urasintam tikoka absiryi, nidamnyi libdanmasiryok, niryi uram doboka ato ebmase. ‘ “Sun din nang asi kam bukokwaming,” tenena ara dib tenenun deyok aryi, sunci nisi ukuryok tatab-tatab ebmanurum.’ Niryi ato ebmase deyok aryi, a nang aryi nisi tatab-tatab ebmaning do?” ebmou.

Ato eboka er Paulus biryi erdamnyi libdanmou. Sirya libdanmou ura, er sienyi Feliks bira sun Yesus miliramnyi nang dib tenen dinyi ati bita bikmunyi biryi, “A deyok ati a kunum sirya sisikmab,” ebmou. Ebmou cok, erci, “Sun yin doun nang sienyi Klaudius Lisias yanmaci ura, niryi kan deyok ati uram sekwetebkwan,” ebmou.

Ura, er sienyi Feliks biryi sun yin doun nang seratus baryi kalingnamunyi bisi ato arukmou. “Er Paulus bisi diboka kalingdamunyi ababyi, er dongoboka kalingnandum ai umbura ara ur yibarandur. Tonda, er atabmaci dinyi asi er kwityabwe aryi deiboka kareryangaramingnyi ura, sunci bisik seksinibmunyei.” Ato eboka er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi si Feliks biryi er Paulus deyok ati arukmou.

Uki mikbaryi kunmai ani, er sienyi Feliks ab er ner si Drusila ab aryi, “Er Paulus ab ebdatibyi,” tenen yanmarei. Feliks ner Drusila bira Yahudi ner kuramwe. A nang bitinyi yanmarei ura, er Feliks biryi arukmou ba, sun yin doun nang aryi er Paulus bisi boyanmai. Boyanmai ura, Feliks ab er ner ab kekenmarei ura, Paulus biryi Kristus Yesus bisi dib tenena deyok ati lak ebmou.

Eterebmou ura, er Paulus biryi, “Er Imtamnyi teleb tenesurur dinyi ukuna teleb,” ebmou. Tonda, erci, “Nun malyi tenen dinyi darabdongobdandoka teleb ukuna teleb,” ebmou. Tonda, erci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nirya ati sun malyi deyok lilibkwansir,” ebmou. Er Paulus biryi a dinyi nirya ebmou ba, er sienyi Feliks biryi kekebmou ura, er ilil kubmou. Ilil kubmou ba, erci Paulus bisi, “Ukuryok ara uram sirya sisikmanim. Aminda aryi teleb uki tum kubnici ura, niryi nabkiniryi, kan ab tonkwa tubto ebdankwankin,” ebmou.
Ara, erci, “Er Paulus biryi nisi co bok karebnici ura, niryi ersi lobdeibkwan,” tenen erci Paulus bisi liki ilinto nabmou ura, uram sisingnandei.

Kunmai ani, kwalina bitinyi sirya bisibmou ura, er weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi yuk amwetam bunanyi bisi tikeibmou ba, sienyi si Perkius Festus biryi er Feliks bisi unubmou. Ununa kabul bok, er Feliks biryi er Paulus bisi kum lobdeibmou. Ara, erci, “Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi teleb tenebniting,” tenen erci Paulus bisi kum lobdeibmou.
Ura, er ukuryok amwetam bunanyi si Festus bira Yahudi mutuk yanmou ura, er sokon kubkwamwe atei Kaisarea minob binmou. Binmou ura, uki bitinyi mabmou ura, uki winiryi tum ara Yerusalem atei binmou.

Yerusalem atei binmou ura, sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang ab ton sun Yahudi yala nang yuk kalingna nang ab er ab tonkwa ebdanmai. Ebdanmai ci, sunci er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ena asi er Festus bisi lak eterebmai. Sun uram ebdarabmai cok, sunci er Festus bisi ato eboka molobmai.

“Nai, kanci nunti, ‘Ni kwityabwe,’ tenebsiminyi ura, anyi Paulus bisi, ‘Yerusalem atei boyandarur,’ eboka arukdum,” ebmai. Ati, sunci marmun yibmai ura, “Er Paulus bisi bobangnyi ba, nunci bisik noutam aryi sekoka nunci ersi obkwayeb,” tenen ato eboka molobmai.
Molobmai bok, er Festus biryi, “Anyi Paulus bisi Kaisarea atei asi kalingna teleb. Nira uki kuna kum kubkwaman Kaisarea atei tamurbinkwan ati, er Paulus bira Kaisarea atei asi iya kuna teleb.

Anyi Paulus biryi malyi kubmaci ura, sun sien nang ab ni ab tonkwa Kaisarea atei binkwayeb. Sirya binmabyi ura, sunci anyi Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ena teleb.” Ato eboka Kaisar amwetam bunanyi si Festus biryi sun Yahudi yala nang asi ebmou.

Ura, er Festus bira uki inbaryi kum takubaryi kum Yerusalem atei kunmou ani, Kaisarea atei tubto tamurbinmou. Ura, mabmou ani, berekwe ura, erci ninyi malyi kun deyok lilin ai bukmou ura, “Er Paulus boboka a boyandarur,” eboka arukmou.

Er Paulus boboka sirya er dam boyanmai ura, sun Yerusalem atei aryi kuboka yanmai Yahudi yala nang aryi er dam aknabdongoboka abiryi, “Iya malyi kubumwe,” eboka abiryi, er Paulus bisi tatab-tatab ebdongobmai. Tatab-tatab enmai bok, sunci er malyi kun deyok asi lak kimdeirin dinyi ton kum ebmai.

Ura, er Paulus biryi erdamnyi libdanmou ci, erci sunsi ato ebmou. “Er Musa biryi nunda Yahudi yala nang asi ebdeiansou uram asi niryi yan kum yanibmase. Tonda, Bait Allah ai asi niryi malyi ai kum kibdeibmase. Tonda, weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi ebdeiansou to ababyi neiktoto yan ton kum yanibmase,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi erdamnyi libdandoka ato ebmou ura, er sienyi Festus biryi, “Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi niti, ‘Telebnyi,’ tenebniting,” tenen er Paulus bisi ato eboka asibdenmou. “Yerusalem atei bana ara kan teleb kubmakir do? Yerusalem atei asi biminyi ura, niryi kan deyok asi lilibkitinyi ara kan teleb do?” eboka asibdenmou.

Ato eboka asibdenmou uca, er Paulus biryi ersi ato ebmou, “Kaisar biryi kalingdur malyi deyok lilin ai asi boyanmaning ati, Kaisar biryi kalingdur deyok lilin ai akiryi ni deyok lilina teleb. Kanda Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi bikmarim to, niryi sun Yahudi yala nang asi malyi kum kubmase.

Niryi Kaisar biryi takubdeibsou uram asi yan yanibmatinyi ura, ‘Weneboka obkwayeb,’ tenebmaniting ababyi, niryi, ‘Weneboka obmunyei,’ kum ebtinyi. Erda, a nang aryi tatab-tatab ebmaningiryi, ni malyi deyok asi lak kum kibdeibningnyi ura, ninyi tentok ababyi nisi sun taruk dam karebnicei. Ati, nira weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi ni deyok ati lilina teleb,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato eboka molobmou ura, er sienyi Festus biryi er bikdob uram erkaren nang ab tonkwa uram sisikmai. Uram sisikmai ura, er Festus biryi uram dodeibmou ura, erci er Paulus bisi ato ebmou, “Kanci, ‘Kaisar biryi ni deyok lilibkwanurur,’ eboka molobmanirim ati, kanda Kaisar dam birum. Sirya biminyi ura, Kaisar biryi kan deyok asi lilibkwankir,” ebmou.
Uki mikbaryi kunmai ani, weik sienyi si Agripa ab sien ner si Bernike ab aryi, “Er Festus bisi dirbinkwanim,” tenen Kaisarea atei yanmarei.

Ura, uki ilinto Kaisarea atei kubmarei ani, er Festus biryi er Agripa ab tonkwa uram sisingmarei ci, er Paulus deyok ati liliboka nukmou. Ara, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Feliks biryi er weik sienyi Agripa bisi ato ebmou, “Herodes doamwe sien ai asi ninyi tentok taleboka tabwe dongoaminyi bisi tuba kurur. Nun kwit Feliks Kaisar amwetam bunanyi tuba kuramwe uca, erci arukamwe ba, anyi bisi kalingdamnyi. Kalikde kuramnyi talak uca, er Feliks biryi anyi biti, ‘Ur lobdeibdarur,’ kum ebmou.

Ura, nira Yerusalem atei binmase ura, sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang ab sun Yahudi yala nang yuk kalingna nang ab aryi ni dam yanmai ura, anyi bisi tatab-tatab ebmai. Tatab-tatab ebmai ci, sunci nisi, ‘Kanci uram sekwetebmin ci, kanci anyi biti, “Malyi kubmou ati wenebkwan,” ebdum,’ eboka sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ato eboka molobmanei.

Molobmanei bok, niryi sunsi ato ebmase, ‘Nunda Kaisar milin nang ara ato kum kuramib. Erda, nun kuramib to ara sun tatab-tatab enmangnyi nang ara sun tatab-tatab enmanginyi ab ebdanmangiryok, er malyi deyok asi lak kimdeirinung. A sirya ura, er tatab-tatab enmanginyi biryi erdamnyi limdana teleb. Limdana uram kum kekebmabibiryok, nunci er tatab-tatab enmanginyi bisi sun ersi tatab-tatab enmangnyi nang taruk dam asi karena kum kunub,’ ebmase.

Ura, sun Yahudi yala nang sien nang aryi ni dam yanmai ura, niryi uki kum kublobmase. Erda, mabmoubwe ani, berekwe ura, niryi malyi deyok lilin ai asi bukmasiryi, ‘Er Paulus bisi a boyandarur,’ eboka arukmase.

Ba, boyanmai ura, sun tatab-tatab ena ati yanmai nang aryi anyi bisi tatab-tatab ebmai bok, er malyi kun dinyi ton kum eibmai. Ara, niryi, ‘Anyi biryi iya malyi kubmou ati lak kibkwaming,’ teneanse bok, sunci er malyi kun dinyi ton kum lak kibmai.

Erda, sun Yahudi yala nang ab aryi anyi Paulus biti, ‘Nun Yahudi yala nang aryi dib tenen uram ati yan yanibmou,’ eboka lulubdanmai. Lulubdanmai cok, sunci ninyi si Yesus bira sirya dibmounyi biti lulubdanmai. Anyi bira sirya dibmou bok, anyi Paulus biryi erti, ‘Kam bukokwe,’ eboka lak erur.

Ura, ni kanya kankana kubnou aryi niryi, ‘Sun Yahudi yala nang dib tenena ati lulurdana deyok asi ni una kuboka lilibtinyi do?’ tenen er Paulus bisi ato eboka asibdenmase. Ara, ‘Yerusalem atei bana ara kanda teleb kubmakir do?’ eboka asibdenmase. Tonda, ‘Yerusalem atei aryi kan deyok lilibdenkwankib do?’ eboka asibdenmase.

Ato eboka asibdenmase uca, er Paulus biryi, ‘Weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi ni deyok lilibniriryok, uram sekwetebkwanute,’ eboka molobmou. Molobmou uca, niryi, ‘Teleb,’ eboka, ‘Kaisar biryi kan deyok asi lilina teleb,’ ebmase. Ebmasiryok, niryi er Paulus biti ato eboka arukmase, ‘Anyi bisi Kaisar dam bobana kum cok, ersi diboka kalikdarur,’ eboka arukmase,” ebmou.

Ura, er Festus biryi a uram sirya ebmou ura, er weik sienyi Agripa biryi ersi, “Nibabyi anyi Paulus ab tonkwa ebdatinimnyi,” ebmou. Ebmou ba, er Festus biryi ersi, “Ambutum berekci ura, er ab tonkwa ebdankwandurum,” ebmou.

Ura, mabmai ani, berekwe ura, er weik sienyi Agripa ab sien ner si Bernike ab yanmarei bok, ninyi nirya aryi sun si erebdeiboka kibdobmai. Kibdobmai ura, sunci malyi deyok lilin ai yandoka abdeici, sun yin doun nang sien nang ab, ton sun Kaisarea atei sien nang ab tonkwa bukmai. Ura, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Festus bira sun ab tonkwa bukmai ura, erci arukmou ba, er Paulus boyanmai.

Boyanmai ura, er Festus biryi sun bulubmai nang asi ato ebmou, “Weik sienyi Agripa kan ab, sun a wekmarum nang nirya asi niryi, ‘Ni kwityabwe teleb,’ ebmasin. Anyi Paulus bisi dibdendarur. Anyi bisi sun Yahudi yala nang nirya aryi tatab-tatab enung. Ara, sun Yerusalem atei kuraming Yahudi yala nang ababyi, tonda sun akatei Kaisarea atei kurandum Yahudi yala nang ababyi ara uram weikanun ngolokoka, ‘Anyi bisi obdarur. Anyi bira kam tuba kubcei,’ eboka molonunung.

Molonunung bok, niryi anyi deyok lilibdenmase uca, er malyi deyok ton kum eibmase. Ara, ‘Weneboka obkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi erci ton kum kubmou. Ura, anyi biryi, ‘Kaisar biryi ni deyok lilibnute,’ eboka molobmanou. Molobmanou ba, niryi uram dodeibmasiryok, ato ebmase, ‘Anyi bisi Kaisar dam bobinung. Sirya bobinmangnyi ura, Kaisar bira iya weik Erebdobnyi biryi er deyok ati lilibdiryok, uram sengkwetena teleb,’ eboka dobdeibse.

Ato eboka uram dodeibmasiryok, niryi, ‘Kaisar bisi kerek sekniryi, niryi anyi biti una eboka kerek sekwan do?’ tenen ni bita kum bikman. A deyok aryi, niryi anyi bisi weik sienyi Agripa kan urasintam ab sun yuk wekmarum sien nang urasintam ab boyanman. Ara, nun tonkwa er deyok asi lilibibyi ura, niryi, ‘Kaisar bisi ato-ato eboka kerek sekeibkwan,’ tenen bikwan ati, niryi anyi bisi sun urasintam asi a boyanman.

Tabwe debmainyi bisi tatab-tatab ena uram asi kum kerek sekmatinyi ura, niryi anyi bisi unato ati, Kaisar dam bokeibtinyi do? Ato kuna ara kikib kum kubte.” Er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Festus biryi er weik sienyi Agripa ab sun yuk wekmai sien nang ab asi ato ebmou.

Ura, er weik sienyi Agripa biryi er Paulus bisi ato ebmou, “Kanci kandamnyi libdamin ci, uram ur ebdum,” ebmou. Ba, er Paulus biryi, “Ni naiyabwe,” tenen er taruk ninikoka lakmou ura, erdamnyi ato eboka libdanmou.

“Nai weik sienyi Agripa, niryi kan urasintam tikoka abniryi, nidamnyi libdankun ati, ni kanya kilkil kubmanir. Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi tola ati uram eboka tatab-tatab enunung deyok ati, niryi nidamnyi libdankun.

Kanda nun Yahudi yala nang kuramibto ab lulurdana deyok ababyi bita bingsurumnyi kurum ati, niryi kilkil asa aryi kan urasintam tikoka nidamnyi libdankun. Ati, ‘Nai, kanci teleb kanya boboka ni ebkun uram asi kekebnurum,’ tenen molobmakin.
Ni mitik talak kuranse to ara sun Yahudi yala nang nirya aryi bingnunung. Ara, yuma kobdob aryi nisi deianei mutuk Kilikia kuranse ani, Yerusalem atei bina kuranse.

Ni mitik talak ara Farisinyi kuranse ara, sun Yahudi yala nang nirya bingnunung. Nun Yahudi yala nang nirya aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molonub bok, nun Farisi nang ara iya busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi bisi molonub. Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ni kuranse to lak ebnitingnyi ura, sunci niti, ‘Tola kuma. Anyi bira Farisi nang aca,’ ebniting.

Ura, ukuryok sun Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi tatab-tatab enunung. Ara, niryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi nun aibweyabwe asi ebdeibmou uram asi kunubkwansir,’ tenen dibde bunun ati, sunci nisi tatab-tatab enunung.

Nun Israel yala amolbaryi nang nirya aryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi ebdeiansou to kununa teleb,’ tenen dibde bunub. Ara, busul kuboka kitingtam lukunda nirya aryi Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molonub ci, nun Israel yala nang nirya aryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi nun din nang asi kam bukeibsute,’ tenen dibde bunub. Ura ukuryok, weik sienyi kanci nisi kekenurum. Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi ato tenen dibde bunung cok, sunci nisi kam burdeirinin deyok ati tatab-tatab enunung.
Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam kum bukeibsute do? Unato ati, sunci a dinyi ati, ‘Dib tenebman kum dinyi,’ tenebmarum do?
Minob talak ara niryi, ‘Nazaret ateinyi si Yesus bisi mikib kuboka bisik sengna ara kublobman kum dinyi kurur,’ teneranse.

Niryi Yerusalem atei asi ato akwe kuranse. Ara, nun Du Yesus milin nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunuramnyi nang asi niryi taleboka sun ninyi wenen ai asi dongorbaranse. Ara, niryi sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang dam molorbaranse ba, sunci, ‘Ur talebdum,’ eranei ura, niryi taleboka weneranse. Tonda, nun sien nang aryi, ‘A nang asi obkwayeb,’ eboka uram dodeibne ura, nibabyi, ‘Ur obkwayeb,’ teneranse.

Tonda, niryi sun buluboka Musa Uram eteren ai yuk-yuk asi wengbindoka absiryi, niryi sunsi weneranse. Ara, niryi, ‘A nang aryi Er Yesus bisi dib tenena taklobting,’ tenen niryi sunsi weneranse. Ni kanya a nang ati, iya tin weik kuranou akiryi, niryi yuk atei yuk atei yibindoka a nang asi domkiringnanse. Weik mutuk atei ababyi yibinkirikoka niryi sunsi domkiringnanse,” eboka nukmou ci, libdandobmou.

Ebmou cok, Paulus biryi ato ebmou, “Ura, ato kuboka domkiringnansiryi, ni Damsyik atei binmase. Ara, sun Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin deyok nang aryi niti, ‘Sun Yesus milin nang ur talebdur,’ eboka kerek sekmai ura, niryi a kerek sengna boboka Damsyik atei binmase.

Damsyik atei kum binmasiryok, bisik noutam banmase uca, kiting dukduk en aryi, ‘Naie,’ imtam aryi kuboka sinarya milil weik berengna aryi ni ab ni ab tonkwa banmoubwe nang ab asi aknabdongobsou cok, lukdandoka berekeibmasou. Nai Agripa, kiting sinarya berengna ababyi berengdeirisurur bok, a dangebmasou berengna ara bisibkaboka iya milil ilinto berengna asi berekeibmasou.

A berengna aryi dangebdeibmasou uca, nun nirya sakoka tukwe ai maryibinmoubwe. Ura, niryi kekenmase uca, Ibrani uram aryi ebmunyi biryi nisi ato ebmanou, ‘Saulus, Saulus! Kanci unato ati Nisi domkiringnanirim do? Kanci Ni Erebdobnyi biti, “Er ab obdatinimnyi,” tenen ukubdeminyei. Ukubdeminyi ura, kandamnyi dilaka dobdeibdaminyei,’ ebmou.

Ato ebmou ba, niryi nisi uram ebmanounyi bisi, ‘Nai Arungdeirisurumnyi, Kanda unanyi do?’ eboka asibdenmase. Ato eboka asibdenmase uca, Anyi Erebdobnyi biryi imtam aryi kuboka ato ebmanou, ‘Nira Yesus, kanci domkiringnanirimnyi kunun,’ ebmanou.

Ebmou cok, Erci nisi ton ato ebmanou, ‘Kan tikokdum. Niryi kanti, “Ni arungnanyi kubkwande,” tenen kansi Nidamnyi lak kibmakin. Ara, kanci Niti eibmanirim dinyi yuk nang asi lak etereboka, “Dib,” ebkwandim ati, Niryi kansi Nidamnyi lak kibmakin. Tonda, aminda aryi lak kibkwankin dinyi ababyi kanci yuk nang asi, “Dib en uram akwe kurur,” ebkwandim ati, Niryi kansi tikeibkwinkin.

Ura, ninyi aryi Paulus kansi malyi kubdeibdekingyi ababyi, Ni Yesus biryi kansi lebdeibkwankin. Ara, kan mining yala Yahudi yala nang aryi malyi kubdeibdekingnyi ababyi, sun yuk yala nang aryi malyi kubdeibdekingnyi ababyi, Niryi kansi lebkwankin. Ni Yesus biryi Paulus kansi, “Sun yuk yala nang asi birum,” eboka bokdonokwinkin. Ara, sun Nisi kum bingnunung nang aryi Nisi dib tenebkwaning ati, Niryi kansi bokdonokwankin.

Sun dib en uram ati asing kum eirinung nang aryi dib en uram diboka eibkwaming ati, bokdonokwinkin. Ara, a nang aryi sun kuramingnyi kunuk dam asi takloboka Ni berengna dam asi yankwaming ati, bokdonokwinkin. Tonda, isa sienyi si Iblis biryi kalingna dam asi takloboka Er Imtamnyi kalingna dam yankwaming ati, Niryi kansi bokdonokwinkin. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun malyi kun dinyi kilibkwande ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ni mabwe,” tenen iya teleb kubdeibkwande ati, bokdonokwinkin. Sun yuk yala nang ababyi Ni Yesus bisi dib tenebkwaning deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunbabyi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenerur ati ebman.’ Ato eboka nun Du Yesus biryi nisi, ‘Yuk yala nang dam asi birum,’ eboka bokdonoknou,” ebmou.

Ebmou cok, Paulus biryi ton ato ebmou, “Ati, nai o, weik sienyi Agripa, kanci kekenurum! Nun Du biryi nisi lak kibdanmuryok, ‘Sun yuk yala nang dam asi birum,’ eboka aruknou ati, niryi, ‘Ni li,’ kum ebmase.

Erda, ‘Ukubkwan,’ tenen niryi Damsyik atei yuma bindoka absiryi, Yerusalem atei asi aminda binmase ani, ‘Teleb Uram dib tenebdarur,’ eboka lak eterebde baranse. Ura, Yudea mutuk kuboka atei nirya asi bindoka absiryi, sun yuk yala nang dam ababyi binmase ani, niryi ninyi nirya asi Teleb Uram lak etereranse. Etereranse ura, niryi sunsi ato ebmase, ‘Sun malyi kurandau dinyi asi takloboka Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to asi ukubdarur,’ eranse. Tonda, niryi sunsi ato eranse, ‘Er Imtamnyi bisi tamurbindoka teleb akwe ukubdarur. Ato kubmunyi ura, sunda Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur dinyi kunun nang kurandum ati, lak kibkwande,’ eranse.
Niryi ato eboka etereranse deyok aryi, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi, ‘A uram nun li,’ tenen nisi talebmanei. Ara, nira Bait Allah ai dam keta asi kunmase bok, sunci nisi taleboka obdenmanei.

Obdenmanei bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi miliboka kalingnanir. Arub ababyi Erci nisi miliboka kalikmanir ba, ato kuboka niryi sun urasintam tikman aryi, niryi sun nirya asi dib en uram lak ebmasin. Ara, sun erebdob nang nirya ton, sun luknubdob nang nirya ababyi dib en uram lak esunun. Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang aryi, ‘Ato-ato kubkwande,’ eramnyi to nibabyi eterenun. Tonda, er Musa biryi, ‘Ato-ato kubkwande,’ eramwe to nibabyi eterenun. Nira yuk dinyi aryi kum eterenun ati ebman.

Sunci eramnyi to Er Imtamnyi biryi bokwetebmou ninyi Lemsurutnyi sirya yankwamwe ura, ninyi aryi Ersi mambul weik kubdeibkwamnyi ba, dibkwamwe. Sirya dibkwamwe ani, kam tubto bukokwamwe. Anyi bira yuma kobdob aryi kam bukokwamwe ura, sun din nang yuk nang ababyi ara aminda aryi miliboka kam bukokwaming. Anyi yuma kobdob aryi kam bukokwamunyi biryi sun Israel yala nang ab sun yuk yala nang ababyi binkwamuryok, Erci, ‘ “Ni berengna karebkwansin,” eboka sunsi lebkwamwe.’ Ati, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci bobaramnyi nang aryi er yankwamunyi ninyi Lemsurutnyi biti ato eramnyi. Ura, sunci eramnyi to nibabyi eterenun,” ebmou.

Ura, er Paulus biryi erdamnyi tuba limdanmou bok, er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Festus biryi uram sekoka uram weik dobmou cok, er Paulus bisi ebmou. “Paulus, kanda luba talebmakir do? Kanda utotoa nirya lilibde bingdumnyi kurum bok, luba talebmakir. Kanci tanglona kum uca, ‘Utotoa nirya biktinyi,’ tenebde lilirum akiryi luba talebmakir aryi enmarim,” ebmou.
Ebmou uca, er Paulus biryi ersi ato ebmou, “Ni nai Festus, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi. Kekenurum. Ni luba kum talebmanir. Erda, dib en uram ton bikdob uram ton akwe ebmasin.

Kanci nisi, ‘Luba talebmakir,’ ebmanirim bok, nun nai weik sienyi Agripa biryi a ebmasin dinyi ati bita bikmar. A deyok aryi, niryi ilil kum asa aryi a dinyi nirya asi er urasintam lak ena teleb. Niryi sunsi lak ebmasin dinyi nirya ara nun nai Agripa bita bikmar tenebman. Niryi nun Du Yesus deyok ati lak ebmasin dinyi ara duknuboka dinyi kum kurur. Ninyi nirya aryi a bingnung.

Ura, nai, weik sienyi Agripa. Niryi kansi asirdena teleb do? ‘Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang aryi kerek sekmai uram asi kanci dib tenebmarim do?’ Dib tenebmarim ara ni bikman,” ebmou.
Ebmou uca, er Agripa biryi er Paulus bisi ato ebmou, “Kanci niti, ‘Uki kum uca Kristus milinanyi kibdeibkwan,’ tenebmanirim darib?” ebmou.

Ebmou uca, er Paulus biryi Agripa bisi ato ebmou, “Uki kum uca nun Du Yesus bisi milinanyi kimna ara teleb. Tonda, uki weik uca nun Du Yesus bisi milinanyi kimna ababyi teleb. Nai o, niryi kan ab sun yuk wekmang weik nang nirya ab ati molobmilisiniryi, ‘Ni kuranto kubkwanting,’ tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi molonun. Ara, ‘Nisi besi tabwe debmanei to sunbabyi besi tabwe debsiting,’ tenen kum molonun. Erda, ‘Nira Er Kristus bisi milinun to sunbabyi arub aryi kuboka er Kristus bisi milibting,’ tenen niryi sun nirya ati molormilisunun,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi sirya ato ebmou ura, er weik sienyi Agripa ab, er Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Festus ab, tonda sien ner si Bernike ab aryi, “A kunum sirya kekebmab,” tenen tikokmai. Tonda, sun yuk a wekmai weik nang ababyi tikokmai. Tikokmai ura, sun nirya sakwetebmai.

Ura, sakwetebmai cok, sunci sun mamun asi ato ebdanmai, “Anyi Paulus bira malyi dinyi ton kum kubmou. Ati, erci, ‘Weneboka obkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi ton kum kubmou. Tonda, erci, ‘Ninyi wenen ai asi dongobkwayeb,’ tenen dinyi ababyi ton kum kubmou,” ebmai.

Ebmai cok, er weik sienyi Agripa biryi Kaisar amwetam bunanyi Festus bisi ato ebmou. “Anyi Paulus bira malyi dinyi ton kum kubmou ati, lobdeibtibyi. Lobdeibtibyi bok, erci, ‘Er Kaisar biryi ni deyok lilibkwanir,’ eboka molobmou ababyi lobdeibman kum kurur,” ebmou.

Ura, Kaisar amwetam bunanyi biryi er Paulus biti, “Kaisar kurande mutuk si Italea birur,” eboka uram dodeibmou ura, sun yin doun nang sien nang aryi er Paulus bisi ninyi si Yulius taruk dam karebmai. Anyi Yulius bira yin doun nang seratus baryi asi arungnamuryok, er wekamwe yin doun nang buluna si ara, “Kaisar bisi Kalikoka Milina Nang,” kuramwe. Ara, sun yin doun nang sien nang aryi er Yulius ab er milibmai yin doun nang ab asi ato eboka arukmai. “Er Paulus ab yuk tabwe debmai nang ab asi bobindoka Kaisar kurande weik atei Roma asi bobindarur,” eboka arukmai.

Ato eboka arukmou ura, nunda weik co ngun-ngun wengbinmoubwe. A co ngun-ngun ara atei si Adramitium aryi kuboka Asia mutuk co ngun-ngun dararyangan atei yuk-yuk asi binkwamou co ngun-ngun asi wekmoubwe. Sirya wekmoubwe ura, nunda Kaisarea atei aryi anaboka mekwan deici banmoubwe. Banmabwe ura, nun kwit Aristarkhus bira Makedonia mutuk atei si Tesalonika ateinyi nun ab tonkwa banmoubwe.

Banmabuburyi, mabmoubwe ani, berekwe ura, Sidon atei dararbinmoubwe. Dararbinmoubwe ura, sun yin doun nang arungnanyi si Yulius bira er Paulus bisi er kanya namin kuramwe deyok aryi, erci Paulus bisi ato ebmou. “Kanci, kan kwityabwe akatei kuramingnyi nang ati, ‘Ni ataranici tok karebniting,’ tenebminyi ura, kanci sunsi ur dirbirum,” ebmou.

Ura, dirbinmoubwe ani, sirya dibdenmoubwe ura, nunda co ngun-ngun tubto wekoka abuburyi, Sidon atei aryi anaboka ilila mekwan deici tubto banmoubwe. Banmabu bok, kumwe ara nun uw deiboka banmoubwe tam aryi kuboka mikibanun yanmou. Ati, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Kumwe mikib kum donmar tam bindoka yibinkwayeb,” tenen kalukdongobmai uca, nunda me dumdum si Siprus bisiboka kumwe mikib kum tam asi yibinmoubwe.

Sirya bisiryibinmoubwe ura, ilila mekwan noutam asi banmoubwe. Ara, Kilikia mutuk tam kuboka ab, Pamfilia mutuk tam kuboka ab mekwan deici banmoubwe. A ilila mekwan noutam aryi banmoubwe ani, Likia mutuk atei si Mira dararbinmoubwe.

Ura, a weik co ngun-ngun asi takmoubwe ura, er yin doun nang arungnanyi biryi eibmou co ngun-ngun yuk dinyi asi wekmoubwe. A weik co ngun-ngun ara Aleksandria atei aryi kuboka yanganmou ani, Italea mutuk binkwamwe asi nun wekmoubwe.

Ura, kumwe aryi nun baramoubwe tam aryi mikibanun yanmou akiryi, nunda nimalyok-nimalyok banmoubwe. Nimalyok-nimalyok baramoubwe uca, uki ilinto bisibmou. Baramoubwe ani, co ngun-ngun dararyangan atei si Knidus dam binmoubwe. Kumwe mikibanun donmou akiryi, nunci akatei asi dararbinman kum kubmoubwe. Ura, nunci weik me dumdum si Kreta youkwa tam bisiboka kumwe mikib kum donmou tam asi yibinmoubwe. Yibanmaburyok, me akwe dam atei si Salmone kanimbindoka abuburyi Kreta asi youkwa tam yibinmoubwe.
Weik me dumdum Kreta katum dam nimalyok-nimalyok yibanmoubwe ani, co ngun-ngun dararban ai si, “Dararyangan teleb ai,” dararbinmoubwe. A dararyangan ai ara atei si Lasea dam dararbaramnyi.

Nunda akatei aryi uki weik kunmoubwe ani, nun Yahudi yala nang aryi yina kum yiramib uki tum si, “Malyi Kun Dinyi Kilina,” uki tum bisibmou. A uki tum sirya bisibmaci ura, ibalya ara weik dorande akiryi, ilila mekwan deici bana ara, “Obsicei,” teneramnyi. A deyok aryi, er Paulus biryi, “Ilila mekwan deici bibyei,” tenen sun weik co ngun-ngun kalingna nang asi ato ebmou.

“Ni kwityabwe, ibalya ara weikanun dobkwamar ati, nunda anaboka ilila mekwan deici bibyei. Mekwan deici banmabyi ura, ibalya weik dobci uca, co ngun-ngun asi tolobcei. Tolobmaci ura, co ngun-ngun umbura bon dinyi ara me umbura wekoka wanikminiksicei. Tonda, nunda co ngun-ngun bukoka baramib nang ababyi ibalya aryi obsicei. A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, ‘Ilila mekwan deici bibyei,’ ebmasin,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou bok, er co ngun-ngun kalingna sienyi ab er co ngun-ngun damnyi ab aryi, “Anabdobkwayeb,” ebmai. Ura, sun yin doun nang arungnamunyi Yulius biryi er Paulus biryi ebmou uram ara malyi kibminikoka sun a co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi ebmarei to asi kekebmou ci, “Ur anabdobkwayeb,” ebmou.

Ura, nun kunmoubwe dararyangan ai ara ibalya don talak asi kuramwe ba, dararyangana kikib kum kuramwe. A deyok aryi, ton nang aryi, “Anabdobibyei,” ebmoubwe bok, yuk nang ilinto aryi, “Anabkwayeb,” ebmai. Ati, sunci ato tenebmai. “Me dumdum si Kreta aryi kuboka Feniks atei bibyi ura, ibalya don li dibde buktibyi,” tenebmai. A co ngun-ngun dararyangan atei si Feniks ara, me dumdum Kreta asi kitingbantam katum kuboka doramnyi atei.

Ura, kumwe ara mitikanun me youkwa tam aryi doboka yanganmou bok, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Ukuryok loubsir ati, anabkwayeb,” tenebmai. Tenebmai ura, sunci co ngun-ngun darardongon keil asi bowelebmai. Sirya bowelebmai ura, nunci anaboka ilila mekwan deici banmoubwe. Kitingbantam kuboka banmoubwe ani, me dumdum si Kreta bisiboka yibanmoubwe.

Uki mitikanun yibanmoubwe ura, ibalya dobkalibmou. Ara, ibalya si, “Me Utam Kan Yaletam Kan Dorande Kumwe,” aryi weikanun dobmou cok, bubatikde yanmou. Ara, me dumdum Kreta tam aryi yanmou ibalya ara weik dobmou.

Ibalya weikanun dobmou uca, mekwan kwatib-kwatib eboka, nun co ngun-ngun asi obmou. Ura, nunci, “Co ngun-ngun asi tamubdeiboka ibalya yangan tam asi bobinkwayeb,” tenen ukubdenmoubwe. Uca, ibalya yanganmou tam asi tamubdeibman kum kubmasou ura, nunci, “Ibalya mikib aryi co ngun-ngun bobisurur” tenen bisik sekman kum ati, taklobmoubwe.

Ba, banmoubwe ani, mitik me dumdum si Kauda bisiboka ibalya mikib kum tam yibinmoubwe. Yibinmaburyok, nun bukmoubwe weik co ngun-ngun ara lemdaron co ngun-ngun mitik-mitik co ngun-ngun aryi weik co ngun-ngun asi bokilibmou. Bokilibmou bok, kumwe aryi mikibanun donmou uca, nun lemdaron co ngun-ngun asi bobinkou. Bobinkou bok, nunci lemdaron co ngun-ngun mitik dinyi asi erebdeiboka nun bukmoubwe weik co ngun-ngun deici deibdenmoubwe. Bok, me ilinto kwatib-kwatib erongmou aryi, mitik co ngun-ngun ara min dobman kum to kubmasou. Ura, tubto ukuramoubwe uca, lemdaron co ngun-ngun asi dobtaleboka weik co ngun-ngun deici diboka deibmoubwe.

Ura, lemdaron co ngun-ngun dobweleboka diboka deibmoubwe ura, nunci, “Me kwatib-kwatib ena weik aryi weik co ngun-ngun er yuk daksaksicei,” tenen nunci co ngun-ngun asi tabwe biribdongoboka aknaboka libmoubwe. A sirya ura, nunci, “Ibalya aryi Libia mutuk otam boyasici ura, ilila mekwan umbura me wininga erebdob ai kwebtelebibyei,” tenebmoubwe. Tenebmoubwe uca, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi weik aling ara kumwe aryi co ngun-ngun bobana aling asi loboka yuryanmai. Loboka yuryanmai ura, nunci, “Ibalya bisik sekman kum ati, da bobisurur,” tenen taklobokmoubwe ba, co ngun-ngun er yuk ibalyi aryi borkengmasou.

A borkengmasou bok, mabmoubwe ani, berekwe ura, ibalya ara weiktoto tuba donmou ati, co ngun-ngun umbura bona aling ya nirya asi doboka me dongobmoubwe. Ara, “Co ngun-ngun tolobcei,” tenen nunci ikin dinyi nirya asi doboka me dongobmoubwe.

Ura, a uki tum ababyi tubto mabmoubwe ani, berekwe ura, ibalya weik tuba donmou bok, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Co ngun-ngun ikin tuba ati, tolobcei,” tenen sunci co ngun-ngun umbura ingwelen co ara co ngun-ngun bobana aling birina co asi kweboka me dongobmai. Ara, sunci a ikin-ikin co ara sun taruk aryi dobtaleboka me dongobmai.

Ura, ibalya weikanun tuba dormururamwe ba, uki-uki ilinto mabisibmou. A ibalya ilinto doramwe talak ara, nunci kiting ababyi kurya ababyi asing ton kum eiriramoubwe. Ato kuransou deyok aryi, nunci, “Lebdankwamib,” tenen kanya ara ton kum tenebmou, erda nirya taklobmoubwe.

Ura, uki ilinto bisibmou ba, nunda weik co ngun-ngun umbura bukmoubwe nang ara yina ton kum yibmoubwe. Yina ton kum yibmabuburyi, bukamoubwe asi, er Paulus biryi tikoka sun yuk nang asi ato ebmou. “Ni kwityabwe, sunci ni ebmasise to kekeanindaute ura, me dumdum si Kreta aryi kum anabdobmatibyi. Ura, nun boamoubwe dinyi ab co ngun-ngun asi bobana dinyi ab ara waningminingna kum kubmatibyi.

Bok, ukuryok akiryi niryi sunsi ton ebkwinsin ara, sun kanya katabum erdongordana teleb. Nun wekoubwe weik co ngun-ngun ababyi daksakwamar bok, nun kankan aryi ninyi tentok ababyi ton kum dibkwamab ati ebman.
Ambutum mabmoubwe lukunda aryi Er Imtamnyi ni molonunyi biryi Er uram eryuryangananyi ton nisi bokdonokmo. Ba, imtam aryi yuryandoka ni Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunununyi dam yandoka tikmou.

Ni dam yandoka tikmou ura, Er Uram eryuryangananyi biryi nisi ato ebmano. ‘Paulus o, kanda ilil kanya bon mem. Weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi kan deyok asi lilibkwankir ati, kan ukuryok kum dibkwandim. Er Imtamnyi biryi Paulus kansi lebkwankiriryi, Erci sun kan ab tonkwa bandarur nang ababyi bico tenen nisintum lebdeikwansir.’ Imtam aryi kuboka uram eryuryangananyi biryi ato ebmanou.
A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, ‘Sun kanya katabum erdongordana teleb,’ ebmasin. ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi ebmanir to diboka kunubkwamasir,’ tenen niryi sunsi, ‘Ilil kuna mem,’ ebsin.
Ibalya aryi co ngun-ngun asi bobanmasici ani, mitik me dumdum asi bobinkwamasir,” eboka er Paulus biryi sun co ngun-ngun umbura wekamnyi nang kanya asi katabum ebdeibmou.

Ura, ibalya ara co ngun-ngun asi cabdonoknin bobanmasou ani, ilila mekwan si Adria mekwan bordeirirbinmasou. Ura, uki empat belas baryi tum aryi bordeirirbanmasou. Ura, lukunda dukduk en aryi sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Ei, tukwe kib ai sirya boyasir darib?” ebdanmai.

Ura, sunci kiklina tabwe biribmai keil asi doboka me umbura donokoka, “Me umbong weik do? Me wininga damtoto do?” tenen kiklibdenmai. Kiklibdenmai uca, mekwan umbong ara empat puluh meter kubmou asi bikmai. Ura, mitikanun bai ani, tubto kiklibdenmai uca, umbong ara tiga puluh meter kubmou asi bikmai.

Ura, sunci, “Co ngun-ngun ara ola banmariryi, keil ai kwebtelebibyei,” tenen, “Darabdongobkwayeb,” tenen sunci darardeirina keil dumbaryi asi dobkwetebmai. Ara, co ngun-ngun dongtam tikoka sunci tabwe birikmai darardeirina keil dumbaryi asi dobkwetebmai. Dobkwetebmai ura, sunci, “Minola berekdur,” tenen dibde bunmai.

Ura, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Lebdankwayeb,” tenen kebum eboka co ngun-ngun aryi sakwetebdenmai. Ara, sunci co ngun-ngun menekoka ban tam bindoka abiryi, yuk darardeirina keil asi dorkweteninto kubmai cok, sunci aibminikmai. Ara, sunci, “Lebdandobtibyi,” tenen lemdana co ngun-ngun mitika asi dobkwetebmai.

Lemdana co ngun-ngun asi dobkwetebmai bok, er Paulus biryi sun yin doun nang arungnamunyi ab sun yin doun nang ab asi ato ebmou. “Sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang ara nun ab tonkwa kum buktibyi ura, sun nirya ara kum lebdankwandaute,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ba, sun yin doun nang aryi, “Co ngun-ngun kalingna nang bindobingnyei,” tenen lemdaron co ngun-ngun asi birikamwe tabwe asi sekdongobmai uca, lemdaron co ngun-ngun asi ibalya aryi caboka me aryi bobinmou.

Ura, berekwamou ci, im ki likmou ura, er Paulus biryi sun co ngun-ngun umbura wekamnyi nang nirya asi ato ebmou. “Sunci yina doboka yibdarur. Uki empat belas baryi kubde yanamoubwe bok, sun nirya ara ilil kubsou ba, yina utotoa ton kum yirandarur.

A deyok aryi, niryi ebdaraboka ato ebmasin. Sunci, ‘Lebdankwayeb,’ tenen yina mitikanun yibdarur. Nun nirya ara nundamnyi lebdandoka tukwe kib binkwamib ati ato ebman. Lemdaronmamunyi ura, dilaka mitik ababyi ton kum sakwamasir. Sun kisok otong tentok ababyi ton kum leksakwamasir,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ura, erci roti doboka aburyi, Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molobmou. Ara, sun co ngun-ngun wekamnyi nang nirya aryi kekenmai ba, erci molobmou. Sirya molobmou ura, er Paulus biryi roti toboka yibmou.
Er Paulus bira minob yuma yibmou ura, sun yuk wekmai nang nirya aryi asing eibmai ci, sun kanya darabum ebdongobmou uca, sunbabyi yina mitikanun yibmai.
A weik co ngun-ngun wekamoubwe nang ara dua ratus tujuh puluh enam baryi nang wekamoubwe.

Ura, a wekamoubwe nang nirya yibmabu ba, sirya boubmasou ura, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi, “Co ngun-ngun caknam kibkwayeb,” tenen sunci co ngun-ngun umbura bobaramoubwe gandum asi doboka me umbura dongobmai.

Sirya berekwe ura, sun co ngun-ngun kalingna nang aryi dinmai uca, tukwe kib asi asing eibmai. Eibmai ci, sunci, “A eibmab mutuk si ara a mutuk,” tenen ara kum bikmai. A mutuk ara sun kum bikmai cok, sunci mekwan lumun asi asing eibmai. Eibmai ci, sunci, “Co ngun-ngun ara mekwan lumun katum dam asi bobitibyi uca, co ngun-ngun dararbitibyi,” tenen uram dodeibmai.

Ati, sunci darardeirina keil birikmai tabwe asi sekmai uca, co ngun-ngun darardeirina keil asi mekwan umbong wekmou. Ura, sunci, “Co ngun-ngun kalukwayeb,” tenen kalurdongona asi darardongon tabwe birikamnyi asi sekdongobmai. Sirya sekdongobmai ura, sunci, “Kumwe aryi me katum dam bobinkwansurur,” tenen sunci kumwe aryi co ngun-ngun bobana aling mitika biribwelebmai. Akaling ara co ngun-ngun menekoka ban tam tikamwe co ingwelena asi tengeboka biribwelebmai. Biribwelebmai ura, kumwe aryi bobaransou ba, me katum tam banmoubwe.

Kumwe aryi bobaransou ba, co ngun-ngun ara me katum damtoto kuramwe me wininga dam kwebtelebmou. Co ngun-ngun urasintam asi me wininga kwebtelebmou akiryi luluboka bobinman kum kubmou. Ura, co ngun-ngun amwetam ara me lontik-lontik ebmou akiryi tolobdonokoka daksakmou.
Ura, sun yin doun nang aryi sun tabwe debmai nang ati, “Me kekoka bindobingnyei,” tenen, “Obkwayeb,” ebdanmai.

Ebdanmai bok, sun yin doun nang arungnamunyi biryi sun tenen dinyi asi bisik sekoka, “Obmunyei,” eboka arukmou. Ara, “Er Paulus bisi obingnyei,” tenen erci ato eboka arukmou. Arukmou cok, erci sun co ngun-ngun wekamnyi nang asi ato ebmou. “Co ngun-ngun aryi sakwetebibyi ura, sun me kengna bingna nang ara minob me kekeboka abmun ci, me katum dam minob bindarur.

Ura, sunda me kengna walwal nang ara co ngun-ngun abilinga kum dakdob co lase kum talebdobmunyi ura, co deici bukoka me katum dam bindarur,” ebmou. Ura, ato kuboka abuburyi, nun co ngun-ngun wekamoubwe nang nirya ara nundamnyi lebdandoka tukwe kib ai bindobmoubwe.
Ura, nun nirya ara nundamnyi lebdanmabuburyi me katum dam binmoubwe ura, ninyi aryi nunsi, “Me dumdum mutuk si Malta dam yanmarum,” ebmasei asi kekebmoubwe.
Sun me dumdum atei kuramnyi nang aryi nunti, “Nun kwityabwe,” tenen kibdobmasei. Mo cebkalibmou ba, arum kubmasou ura, sun Malta nang aryi uk sekoka nunsi iknibmasei.

Ura, er Paulus biryi co buluboka uk dongonmou uca, uk co kankan aryi kwatima maamwe asi co ab labtaleboka dongobmou uca, uk tin aryi anabmou. Anabmou ci, a kwatima aryi er Paulus taruk asi si tobdongobmou asi lobkabman kum kubmou.

Ura, sun me dumdum atei kuramnyi nang aryi asing eibmai ci, sunci, “Ei, anyi Paulus bira ninyi onanyi kurur darib?” ebdanmai. Ebdanmai cok, sunci er Paulus biti, “Ibalya aryi lebdanmar bok, kwemdina ner si, ‘Malyi Kun Nang Wenen Ner,’ aryi, ‘Wenebkwan,’ tenen arukmou uca, kwatima aryi ersi si tobmar. ‘Malyi Kun Nang Wenen Ner,’ aryi ersi wenebmar ati, dibkwamar,” ebmai.

Ato ebdanmai bok, er Paulus biryi er taruk bolong-bolong ebdongobmou uca, kwatima sakoka uk wekmou. Kwatima aryi er Paulus bisi si tobdongobmou bok, er Paulus bira teleb akwe kubmou ba, mitik u ababyi ton kum yibmou.

Ura, sun Malta nang aryi asing dinmai uca, “Kwatima si tobmou ai ara nebci ura, dibkwamar do?” tenen dibde bukmai bok, er Paulus bira teleb akwe kubmou. Teleb akwe kubmou ati, sun tenen kanya dangubmou ci, sunci er Paulus biti, “Ei, anyi bira ninyi sun du kurur,” tenebmai.

Nun kunmoubwe mutuk dam bukamwe mutuk ara ninyi si Publius mutuk bukamwe. Anyi Publius bira sun Malta nang asi kalingnamwe sienyi kuramwe. Anyi biryi nunsi du dongobmasou ura, nunda er ab tonkwa uki winiryi kubmoubwe.

Nun a kubmoubwe talak ara, Publius er nai bira uk aruma yun taleamwe ba, dororamwe. Tonda, ining dei batukna yaramwe. Ba, man sokon mabmou asi er Paulus biryi dirbinmou. Dirbinmou ci, er Paulus biryi Er Imtamnyi bisi molobmou ura, erci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi kwetebte,” tenen er taruk asi lakoka Publius er nai deici asi deibdongobmou ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi ersi kwetebmou.
Kwetebmou ura, sun a me dumdum atei kuramnyi nang u yiramwe nang nirya aryi, “Nunbabyi kwetebsute,” tenen er Paulus dam yanmai. Yanmai ura, er Paulus biryi sun nirya asi kweteramwe.

Ura, sunci nunti, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen bona ilinto muna karebmasei. Ura, kunmoubwe ani, nunci, “Anabdobkwayeb,” tenebmoubwe ura, yuk co ngun-ngun wekoka anabdobkoubwe. Anabdobkoubwe bok, sunci nunti, “Bisik noutam atari ba, yibkwaming,” tenen dinyi asi yina utotoa nirya boboka bodongoryanmasei.

Ura, nunda me dumdum si Malta asi wala winiryi kuramoubwe ani, co ngun-ngun wekoka anabdobmoubwe. Nun wekmoubwe weik co ngun-ngun ara Aleksandria atei aryi yanamwe co ngun-ngun asi wengbinmoubwe. A co ngun-ngun si ara, “Kwalengna nang Kastor ab Poluks ab,” eboka doamnyi co ngun-ngun. A co ngun-ngun ara ibalya li doamwe ba, me dumdum atei Malta dararyangan ai asi darardeiriyanamnyi ani, ibalya li sirya bisibmou ati, Roma atei tam binkwamwe asi wengbinmoubwe.
Anabmoubwe ura, mekwan deici banmoubwe ani, Sirakusa atei dararbinmoubwe ura, nunda akatei asi uki winiryi mabmoubwe.

Akatei aryi anaboka ilila mekwan deici tubto banmoubwe ani, co ngun-ngun dararyangan atei si Regium binmoubwe. Ura, a bindoka mabmoubwe ani, berekwe ura, kumwe ara dabura mutuk aryi kuboka yanganmou. Kumwe aryi nun co ngun-ngun asi dongtam bokekdongobmasou ba, nunda Putioli atei minola binmoubwe. Ara, uki bitinyok mekwan deici banmoubwe ani, Putioli dararyangan ai binmoubwe.

Binmoubwe ura, nunda akatei kuramnyi dib tenen nang asi eibmoubwe. Ura, sunci nunsi du dongobmasei ba, sun ab tonkwa uki tabaryi kunmoubwe. Kunmoubwe ani, nunda tubto co ngun-ngun wekoka anabdobmoubwe ura, Roma atei tam banmoubwe.

Ura, sun Roma atei kuramnyi dib tenen nang aryi nunti, “Yanganmang,” en uram kekebmai ura, sunci, “Bisik noutam kibdobkwayeb,” tenen yanganmai. Bisik weik yanganmai ani, ton nang ara pasar dengna keta si, “Apius,” yandoka nun ab ebdanmoubwe. Ton, yuk nang ababyi bisik weik yanganmai ani, atei si, “Ur Yangan Nang Man Ai Winiryi,” eramnyi ai asi yandoka nun ab ebdanmoubwe. Sun Roma atei kuramnyi dib tenen nang yanganmai asi er Paulus biryi asing eibmou ura, erci Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ebmou ba, er kanya katabum ebdongobmou.

Iya weik atei Roma asi sirya binmoubwe ura, er Paulus bira wenen ai asi wekoka kum kuramwe. Erda, sun Kaisar arungna uram eblikniramnyi sien nang aryi, “Teleb,” ebmai ura, er Paulus bira yuk ai wekoka kuramwe. Er Paulus bira er yuk kuramwe bok, yin dounanyi tentok aryi ersi tuba-tuba kalingnamwe.

Lukunda winiryi mabmou ani, er Paulus biryi sun Roma atei kuramnyi Yahudi yala nang sien nang asi, “Bulubkwayeb,” eboka nabmou. Ba, sirya bulubmai ura, er Paulus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Ni kwityabwe e, sun Yerusalem atei kuraming Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi tatab-tatab ebmanei bok, niryi nun Yahudi yala nang asi malyi ton kum kubse. Tonda, nun aibweyabwe aryi, ‘Ato-ato kubdarur,’ eboka etereransei dinyi ababyi ni ton kum yan yanibse. Malyi kuna ton kum kubmase asi, nira Yerusalem atei kunmase bok, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi nisi taleboka sun Kaisar milin nang taruk dam karebmanei.

Karebmanei ura, sun Kaisar milin nang aryi ni deyok ati lilibdenmanei uca, sunci ni malyi deyok ton kum eibmai. Nira, ‘Weneboka obmanto,’ tenen dinyi ton kum kubmase ati, sun Kaisar milin nang aryi niti, ‘Lebdobkwayeb,’ tenebmanei.

Ato tenebmanei bok, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi niti, ‘Lebdobmunyei,’ ebmai. Sunci niti, ‘Lebdobmunyei,’ ebmanei ati, niryi, ‘Yuk bisik da ton kum kubkwanir,’ tenen, ‘Weik sienyi si Kaisar biryi ni deyok lilina teleb,’ eboka molobmase. Ura, niryi, ‘Nun Yahudi yala nang asi tatab-tatab ebkwan,’ tenen kum yanmase ara sun biknindarur.
A deyok aryi, niryi, ‘Tonkwa ebdandoka uram sisikwayeb,’ eboka molobmasin. Nun Israel yala nang aryi dibde bunubnyi bisi dibde bunun deyok aryi, a besi tabwe aryi debmanei,” ebmou.

Er Paulus biryi sunsi ato ebmou ba, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi uram doboka ersi ato ebmai. “Nun kwityabwe Yudea mutuk kuraming Yahudi yala nang aryi kan deyok ati kerek sengna ton kum deibmasing. Tonda, Yudea mutuk kuraming ninyi tentok ababyi kan deyok ati uram ton kum eryanmai. Ara, kanti, ‘Malinyi,’ ebde yangananyi ton kum ebde yanganmai.

Erda, nunci kan dib tenena ati, ‘Kekebtibyi,’ tenebmab. Kan kwityabwe neik uram etereraming nang ati sun dantam-dantam kuramingnyi nang aryi, ‘Nun li,’ eraming ati kekebmoubwe. A deyok aryi, nunci kansi, ‘Kan dib tenena lak kibsurum,’ eboka molobmakib,” ebmai.

Molobmai ura, sun Yahudi yala nang ab er Paulus ab aryi, “Yuk uki tum aryi uram tubto sisikwayeb,” ebdanmai. Ura, uram sisikwamai uki tum berekwe ura, Yahudi yala nang ninyi ilinto er Paulus kuramwe ai dam yanmai. Yanmai ura, er Paulus biryi belerukna kobdob aryi kuboka lukunda ababyi nirya sunsi liliboka eterebmou cok, erci Er Imtamnyi biryi Weik Sienyi kurur ci, ninyi kalingsurur deyok ati eboka eterebmou. Ara, erci sun Yahudi yala nang asi, “Nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebdarur,” eboka Er Yesus deyok eterebmou. Eterebmou cok, er Paulus biryi Musa Uram sekamwe to ab, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang kerek sekamnyi uram ab aryi nukmou ci, “Er Yesus bira nun dibde bunubnyi,” eboka lak kibmou.
Eterenmou ba, ton nang aryi er eterena asi dib tenebmai bok, yuk nang aryi dib kum tenebmai.

Ura, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi sun mamun lulubdanmai ci, er Paulus kuramwe ai asi deibloboka bindobmai. Ara, er Paulus biryi sunsi, “Sun yuk yala nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi biryi lebkwande,” ebmou ura, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi lulubdandoka er kuramwe ai asi deiblobmai. Kum deiblobmai bok, er Paulus biryi sunsi ato ebmou, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sun aibweyabwe ati ebmou uram ara diboka kikiman uram asi ebmou. Ara, Erci Er Uram ebdeibmaca bobaramunyi si Yesaya deici aryi sunsi wenebmou uram ati ebman.
Ara, Erci sunsi ato eamwe,
‘Kanci a nang asi bindoka ato ebdum,
“Sunci tuba-tuba kekebdenkwandum bok, sun kekebkwandum uram asi sunci kum bikwandum.
Sunci diboka asing dibdenkwandum bok, sun dibdenkwandum dinyi asi sunci kum eibkwandum,” ebdum.
A nang kanya ara kat kurur akiryi, “Bingdona nun li,” teneraming ati ato ebman.
“Kekena nun li,” tenen sunci sun amol asi kiningdaraming.
“Asing eirina nun li,” tenen sunci sun asing lilirdaraming.
“Dib en uram bikdobibiryi, Er Imtamnyi bisi tamuboka binkwayeb,” tenena ara sun kanya dam aryi kum teneirdenung.
Tonda, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunda malyi nang asi teleb kubdeibsute,” tenena ara sunci kanya kum teneirdenung.’
Ato eboka Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sun aibweyabwe asi wenebmou.

Ati, Yahudi yala nang sun aibweyabwe aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram ati, ‘Kekena nun li,’ teneramnyi deyok aryi, niryi sunsi uram ton lak ebkwinsin. Er Imtamnyi biryi, ‘Sun yuk yala nang ababyi lebkwan,’ tenen erci, ‘Sun yuk yala nang asi lemsina uram lak eterebde bindarur,’ eboka arukmou. Sun yuk yala nang ara a uram asi diboka kekebkwaming ati ebman,” ebmou.
Er Paulus biryi ato ebmou ba, sun Yahudi yala nang ara sun mamun lulubdandoka er Paulus kuramwe ai deibloboka binsekdobmai.

Ura, er Paulus bira er kuramwe ai asi kuramwe bok, kwalina bitinyi bisibmou. Ara, erci er ai damnyi bisi ai dengna kareramuryi, erda akai asi iya kuramwe. A kuramwe ba, ninyi ilinto aryi ersi diryangaramnyi ba, erci sun nirya asi du dongoboka-du dongoboka kimnamwe.

Ato kuramuryok, er Paulus biryi ilil kum asa aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi Weik Sienyi kurur ci, ninyi kalingsurur deyok ati lak eboka, “Dib tenebdarur,” eramwe. Tonda, ninyi tentok ababyi Paulus bisi uram kum kilikdeibmou bok, erci, “Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira iya Weik Sienyi kuboka kalingmurusurur,” eboka etereramwe.

Teleb ni kwityabwe, ni Paulus bira nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilinanyi kunun cok, sunda weik atei Roma kurandum dib tenen nang asi kerek sengna ton sekeibkwinsin. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi naboka tikeibnou uca, niryi nun Nai biryi ebdeibnou uram eterebde banun. Ara, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ninyi lemsina uram eterebkwan ati takubdeibnou ati, niryi deyok kouboka a uram asi eterebmurubde banun.

Nun Du uram Teleb Uram eterenun ara ukuryok uram kuma. Erda, sun minob uca Er Imtamnyi biryi kunubkwamwe uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus deyok ati minob kerek sekansei. Ara, sunci, “Ato-ato kuboka kunubkwansir,” ebdeiboka sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram minob uram umbura aryi nun Du Yesus deyok ati minob kerek sekansei. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi takubdeiamwe to, sunci kerek sekeiboka nunda ukuryok kubde baramib nang asi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram minob lak kiansei.
Nun Du bira Er Imtamnyi Mi kurur cok, Erda ninyi kibdandoka nun aibwe Daud yalanyi kurur.

Tonda, nun Du Yesus bira Er Imtamnyi Mi Kobdob ababyi kurur ara laktoto kubmar. Ara, nun Du Yesus diboka dibmou ani, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus mikib biriman aryi Ersi kam bukeibmou. Kam bukeibmou biriman aryi, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi nun Du Yesus biti, “Erda Er Imtamnyi Mi diboka kurur,” eboka lak kibmou. Nun Du Yesus Kristus nun arungdeirisurur iya weik sienyi kurur ati ato ebman.

Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb teneranou to, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi kisal daknou ci, “Deyok kouboka Teleb Uram eterebde birum,” ebdeiboka tikeibmanou. Tikeibmanou cok, Erci nisi ato eboka ebdeibmanou. “Sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang mutuk yuk-yuk yibinkirikmin cok, kanci sun Yahudi yala kum nang ara lemsina uram ati walwal nang ati ‘Nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebmunyi uca, sunci du mouboka Er Uram kunubde bindarur,’ eboka eterebdum.” Nun Du biryi nisi tikeibnou ati ebman. Tonda, “Ninyi nirya aryi nun Du Yesus si weik erebdeibkwaming,” tenen niryi Teleb Uram eterebde banun.
Ura, sunda Roma nang ababyi lemsina uram ati walwal kurandau asi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni Mi Yesus Kristus amwetam bun nang kibdarur,” eboka sunbabyi nabmasou.

Ura, ni Paulus biryi sunda Roma atei kurandum dib tenen nang asi kerek sekeibmasin. Ati, niryi sunti, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi boukwe kurur nang,” tenen kibdobmasin. Tonda, sunda nun Nai biryi, “Ni dam kun nang kibting,” tenen nabsou nang asi, “Teleb,” ebmasin. Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai ab nun Du Yesus ab aryi antanibdeiboka sun kanya yuk-yuk namin kurdeirisina teleb.

Ura, yuma kobdob ebkun ara ato ebkun. Sunda Roma nang ara ninyi lemsina uram ati walwal kurandau ani, ukuryok ara nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum. A deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai bisi, “Ei ni Nai,” enun. Sun dib tenen dinyi ara laktoto kurur ati, sun im dangna tukwe dangna kuramingnyi nang aryi sunti ato eboka lak eransing. “Sun Roma nang ara walwal kuramnyi ani, ukuryok ara sunbabyi nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenenung.” A deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei ni Nai,” enun ba, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi a uram ermiliboka nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam bobarur.

Ni Paulus bira sunda Roma nang asi tuba-tuba teneibde basunun. Tola kuma. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi niti, “Dib ebmar,” tenen bingnurur. Nira busul kuboka nun Nai takubdeibnou to diboka kununun. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Mi uram Teleb Uram lak eterebde banun cok, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi karebnou wa asi diboka inun.

Ati, niryi sunti tuba-tuba teneirisunun cok, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi ato eboka molonun. “Nai, kanci teleb tenebniminyi uca, bublan kukeibniminyi ba, niryi sun Roma nang asi dirbinkwan.” Ato eboka moloranse ani, ukuryok tubto molonun.

Ni sun ab tonkwa ebdatibyi ati ebman. Sirya ebdandoka eterebsitinyi uca, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sunsi muna karen dinyi ton karebtabaksute uca, sun dib tenena ara katabum ebtabaksute ati tenesunun.

Sirya ebdatibyi ura, niryi sun dib tenena asi katabum ebtabaksitinyi ba, sunci ni dib tenena ababyi katabum ebtabaksutum. Ara, nunci, “Mikib kuboka nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenenub,” tenen nun mamun bingdanub cok, nun dib tenena katabum ebtabakdatibyi.

Ura, ni kwityabwe. Uki-uki ilinto aryi niryi, “Sun Roma nang dirbinkun,” tenen ukurderanse uca, bisik sengna dinyi yuk-yuk aryi nisi tuba-tuba bisik sengminingnanou ati sun diboka bikdarur. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Sun Roma nang dam bindoka Teleb Uram ati eterebtabaknyi uca, sun kankan kuboka yuk nang ilinto ababyi dib tenebkalibting,” tenen ukurderanse uca, ni sun dam kum yanmase. Niryi sun Yahudi yala kum nang bindoka Teleb Uram eterebde banun uca, du mourande ati sun bikmarum. Ura, sunbabyi Yahudi yala kum nang kurandum ati, niryi sunbabyi yandoka Teleb Uram deyok ati eterebtabakde basitinyi uca, sun kankan ababyi du moubtabakwansute ati ebman.

Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi takubdeibnou to, niryi sun Yahudi kum yala yuk-yuk asi bindoka Teleb Uram eterebde banun. Ara, sun Yunani yala nang babyi, sun yuk yala-yuk yala nang ababyi bindoka niryi Teleb Uram eterenun. Niryi sun bikdob dinyi bingna nang bindoka sun bikdob dinyi bingna kum nang ababyi bindoka Teleb Uram eterebde banun.
A deyok aryi, niryi sunda Roma atei nang kum diryanmase ati, “Sunbabyi dam bindoka Teleb Uram eterebtabaktinyi,” tenesunun.

Nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ati niryi ilil kum asa aryi kuboka lak eterebde banun. Nun Du uram Teleb Uram ara Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou mikib uram kurur. A uram mikib biriman aryi sun dib tenebmangnyi nang nirya asi Er Imtamnyi biryi lemsurur. Ara, nun Nai biryi sun Yahudi yala nang asi deyok kouboka lebde baramwe ani, ukuryok tuba lebde barur ci, sun Yahudi yala kum nang asi aminda bindoka sunbabyi lebde barur.

Teleb Uram umbura aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi ato eboka lak kimsurur. “Malyi kun nang asi teleb kibdeiboka Ni mabwe nermabwe dobdobkwan. Sirya dobdobnyi uca, Ni urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubkwaming.” Er Imtamnyi biryi nunda malyi kun nang asi dorosurur ara dib tenena deici akwe dorosurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunda malyi kun nang asi dorosurur uca, nunci tabakoka dib tenenub. A dinyi ati Er Imtamnyi Uram minob uram umbura aryi ato erur.
“Er Imtamnyi biryi dobdobmaci nang ara dib tenena biriman aryi kam kun dinyi dobdobkwaming,” ebmou.

Ba, Er Imtamnyi bira iya teleb kurutnyi biryi malyi dinyi nirya ati, “Ni li,” tenen kurur ati, Erci, “Diboka wenebkwan,” ena uram ababyi imtam aryi kuboka lak kimsurur. Ara, ninyi aryi Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun li,” tenena uca malyi dinyi akwe kunuramingnyi asi Er Imtamnyi biryi diba ati wenebkwande. Tonda, sun yuk nang asi malyi kimdeiriramingnyi nang asi nun Nai biryi wenebkwande. A nang ara Er Imtamnyi dib en uram asi bingnamingiryok, sunci, “Malyi dinyi akwe kunubtibyi,” teneraming uca, “Dib en uram kekena nun li,” tenen malyi dinyi kuraming.

Er Imtamnyi biryi Erdamnyi ninyi nirya asi lak kimdaramwe uca, sun, “Er Imtamnyi biti nun walwal,” en nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi biti walwal diboka kum kuraming. Erda, sunci, “Dib en uram kekena nun li,” tenen malyi dinyi akwe kuraming.

Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi im ton tukwe ton nirya kiknibmou ura, Erci ninyi nirya asi Erdamnyi lak kimdansou ani, ukuryok ababyi tuba lak kimdasurur. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur,” tenen ninyi nirya bingnung. Tonda, “Yuma kobdob talak aryi kuboka Er Imtamnyi bira iya mikibnyi kuramwe ani, ukuryok ababyi iya mikibnyi kurur,” tenen ninyi nirya bingnung. Nunda tukwetam nang aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi asing eibmanto kum kunub bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun nirya asi Erdamnyi lak kimdasurur. Ati, nunci im dangna tukwe dangna dinyi kurande asing eirinub dinyi asi asing eirinub cok, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a dinyi nirya kiknibmou,” tenen bingnub. Ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi Erdamnyi lak kimdasurur ati, ninyi tentok ababyi, “Er Imtamnyi biti walwal kunun ati, Erci nisi wenebnicei,” kum ebmote.

A malyi kun nang ara Er Imtamnyi biti walwal kum kuramiryok, sunci, “Nun molonubnyi,” tenen Er Imtamnyi si weik ena kum kunung. Tonda, sunci, “Nun Nai biryi kisal dakmasir,” tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” kum enung. Erda, sun kanya ara kunuk dakmou uca, sunci bikdob dinyi tenena kum uca, talyi dinyi akwe teneboka malyi dinyi akwe kunubde baraming.
A nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda bikdob dinyi bingna nang kunub,” erdaraming cok, lub nang kanya akwe bonung.

A nang ara Er Imtamnyi biti, “Er Iya Erebdobnyi,” tenen kum molonung. Erda, sunci Er Iya Erebdobnyi bisi unubdeiboka talyi dinyi akwe kikniboka molonung. Ara, co keil doboka sunci, “Nun molon dinyi kiknibkwayeb,” tenen tukwetam nang minola dibmanto kun nang ato dinyi kikliboka kikniraming. Tonda, maka ato dinyi kikniraming. Bisam kwatima ato dinyi kikniraming. Kikniramingiryok, sunci a kiknibmai dinyi yuk-yuk asi naboka, “Nai du o, nong o,” eboka molonung.

Kwemdina dinyi akwe molonung deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Niryi a nang asi deiblobkwan uca, sunci sun kanya aryi kuboka malyi kun dinyi akwe ur kunubting,” tenen wenebmou. Ato tenen wenebmou uca, a nang ara kwemdina dinyi molormururamingiryok, sunci, “Sal ner talyi yobtibyi,” tenen, “Yuk alyi tenen dinyi kunubtibyi,” tenen talyi yordana akwe kuraming.

Ati, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi dib en uram asi bai donokoka tola en dinyi akwe talebdoboka kwemdina moloraming. Moloramingiryok, im dangna tukwe dangna Kikniamunyi bisi tuba kum molonung. Erda, sunci keil co doboka Er Imtamnyi biryi kikniamwe dinyi asi kikliboka kiknibmai ati, “Nai du o, nong o,” eboka molonung. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira tanglona kum uca Er si iya weik ebkwanubnyi kurur ati ebman. Amin.

Dib en uram asi bai donokmai deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Niryi sunsi deiblobkwan uca, sunci sun kanya aryi kuboka malyi kun dinyi akwe kunubkwanung,” eboka wenebmou. Wenebmou uca, sun nerabwe ara sal aryi kum yoraming. Erda, nerabwe ara sun mamun tablangdaraming.

Tonda, sun sal nang ara sun ner asi tuba kum yoraming. Erda, sal ara den atan weik kuboka sun mamun yordaraming. Ato kuboka alyi weik tenen dinyi kunuraming uca, sunci sundamnyi lemdana kum uca malyi kun dinyi tabakoka kunurmururaming. Ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi wenebde barur uca, Erci sunsi, “Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobdarur,” tuba kum erur. Tuba kum erur ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi dokdonokdiryi, kum lebkwande.

Ura, a kwemdina molon nang ara Er Imtamnyi dib en uram asi bingnamiryok, sunci a uram ati, “Talyi uram aca,” tenen kum kunuramnyi. Ato tenen kuramnyi deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi yu kanya boramuryi, sunsi taklobmou. Ati, Erci, “Sun kanya dam kuboka malyi kun dinyi akwe ur kunubkwanung,” eboka sunsi taklobmou. Uca, sunci alyi tenen dinyi ab ukubman kum dinyi akwe kununung.

A nang ara langdeiboka malyi kun dinyi yuk-yuk akwe kunuraming. Tonda, sunci teneiboka yuk nang asi malyi dinyi akwe kununung. Tonda, “Bona bon dinyi ilinto dobdobtibyi,” tenen ingkiringnung. Tonda, “Iya malyi kun dinyi akwe kunubkwayeb,” tenenung. A nang ara yu kanya boboka yuk nang dinyi ati, “Dobdobtibyi,” tenenung. Tonda, “Ninyi obtibyi,” tenenung. Tonda, “Yuk nang uram kekena ati nun li,” tenenung. Tonda, tola uram akwe enung. Yuk nang ati, “Malyi kibdeibtibyi se,” tenenung. A nang ara murmur eboka yuk nang asi talakdonung.

A nang ara yuk nang ati, “Malyi nang,” enung. Tonda, sunci Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun li,” tenenung. Tonda, sunci talyi ati sundamnyi ati, “Nunda sien nang aca,” erdanung. A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka yuk nang asi ina ngilingnaming. Tonda, sunci, “Ato-ato kuboka malyi dinyi kunubtabakwayeb,” tenena akwe kunung. A nang ara sun nai sun kwin uram diboka kum kekenung.

A nang ara bikdob dinyi tenen kanya kum bonung. Sunci yuk nang asi, “Ato-ato kubkwan,” ebdeibtingnyi uca, sunci ebloboka diboka kum kununung. Tonda, yuk nang asi boukwe kum kunung. Tonda, bico tenena kum uca, yuk nang asi malyi kimnaming.

A nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Wenebkwan,” en uram kikib asi bingnung cok, sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram kum kununung. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Sun ato kuboka malyi kun nang asi weneboka obkwanun,” en uram bingnung cok, sunci sun malyi kun dinyi tanglona kum kunung. Erda, sunci iya malyi kun nang kuraming ati, sun malyi kun nang yuk nang aryi malyi kunuramingyi to kisal dangnung.

Ura, sunda yuk nang asi, “Malyi dinyi akwe kuraming,” eboka wenerandum nang se. Er Imtamnyi biryi sunbabyi diba ati wenebkwansir ati ebman. Sunbabyi neiktoto malyi dinyi kunurandum ati, sunci, “Nunbabyi Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kunuramib,” tenen sundamnyi wenerdana teleb. Sunbabyi Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kum kunurandum ati ato ebman.
Er Imtamnyi biryi sun malyi kun dinyi yuk-yuk kunuramingnyi nang asi wenebkwande ara diboka lilibdiryok, wenebkwande ati nun bingnub.

Ura, sunbabyi tukwetam nang kuramun cok, sunbabyi malyi kun dinyi kuramun cok, unato ati sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdamun ci, yuk nang asi, “Malyi dinyi kurandum se!” eboka wenerandum do? Ati, sunci, “Nunda malyi kun dinyi kunubde banub asi Er Imtamnyi biryi diboka kum wenebkwansir,” tenerandum do? Er Imtamnyi biryi sunbabyi diboka lilibsiryok, wenebkwansir ati ebman.

Ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi bico tenen deyok aryi, sunsi minola kum wenesurur ati sunci kum bikmarum do? Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Sun malyi tenen dinyi takloboka Ni uram kunubting,” tenen minola kum wenesurur bok, sunci, “Nun li,” tenen nun Nai langdeiboka teleb kimdeirisurutnyi bisi ina ngilingnandum do? Nun Nai bira nun malyi kun dinyi ati, “Ni li,” tenesurur ci, Erci, “Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobting,” tenen dibde burur cok, sunsi minola kum wenesurur.

Sun kanya ara kat weik kuransir ba, sunbabyi, “Nun malyi tenen dinyi takloboka Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa ara nun li,” tenerandum ati, sunci malyi kun dinyi tabaknin-tabaknin kunurandum ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi weik wenena kareboka wenebkwansir. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi malyi dinyi wenena kikib laktoto karebkwande uki tum berekci ura, Erci sunbabyi wenena kikib kareboka wenebkwansir.
Ninyi yuk-yuk aryi malyi dinyi kum teleb dinyi kum kunuramibyi tok, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wenen dinyi kum kisal dangna dinyi kum karebkwansir.
Sun tanglona kum uca, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi erebdeiboka iya kam kun dinyi karebsute,” tenen ingkiringnamingnyi nang asi nun Nai biryi iya kam kun dinyi karebkwande.
Ba, sundamnyi ererdeirirdaramingnyi nang ton sun dib en uram bai donokoka malyi kun nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi yu weik kuboka weik wenena karebkwansir.

Sun malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang nirya asi Er Imtamnyi biryi weneboka mambul weik dinyi karebkwansir. Ara, sun Yahudi yala nang kankan aryi malyi kun nang asi deyok kouboka wenebkalibsici ura, sun Yahudi yala kum nang kankan aryi malyi kun nang ababyi wenebkwansir.

Ura, sun teleb dinyi kunuramingnyi nang asi nun Nai biryi erebdeiboka antanirdeirin dinyi karebkwansir. Ara, sun Yahudi yala nang kankan aryi teleb dinyi kunun nang asi deyok kouboka kisal dakalibkwande ura, sun Yahudi yala kum nang kankan aryi teleb dinyi kunun nang asi aminda kisal dakwansir.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “A yala nang dobdobkwan, o yala nang donokwan,” tenena kum kurur ati ato ebman.

Sun Yahudi yala kum nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram kum kekeramiryok, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kunung. A nang nirya ara a uram Musa biryi ebmurubmou uram ati walwal kunung cok, weik wenena dobdobkwaming. Ba, sun Yahudi yala nang ara Musa Uram kekeboka bingnung cok, sunbabyi Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kunung. A nang ara Musa Uram yan yaniramnyi deyok aryi, sunbabyi weik wenena dobdobkwaming.

Sun Musa Uram asi amol dem aryi keken nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe dobdobkwan,” kum tenesurur. Erda, sun, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram kekeboka diboka kununung nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe dobdobkwan,” tenesurur.
