Nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi wa irmilin nang ara nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde banub deyok aryi, ninyi aryi, “Lub nang aca,” tenesunung. Ba, sunda sundamnyi erebdandoka, “Nun Du Kristus biti bikdob dinyi bingnub,” tenerdarandum. Nunda mitang nang kunub bok, sunda sundamnyi ati, “Nunda mikib nang kunub,” tenerdarandum. Sunda ninyi aryi kisal dangsunung nang kurandum bok, nunda ninyi aryi ina ngilingsunung nang kunub.

Nunda nun Du Yesus Er wa irmilin nang ara Teleb Uram eterebde baramoubwe ba, kwaning ton me ton ataransou. Ani, ukuryok ababyi kwaning ton me ton ataransir. Nun ongoramib aling ara kwiriblob aling akwe ongoramib. Ninyi aryi, “Teleb Uram nun li,” tenen kulab-kulab eransing. Tonda, man ai sirik ton kum kuransir.

Nunci, “Kwaning atabsicei,” tenen nun taruk aryi ikin wa sirik iramib. Ninyi aryi nunsi sumnansing bok, nunci a nang asi kisal dangnamib. Ninyi aryi, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringsunung bok, nunci namin kanya boramibiryi, tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus biryi takubdeibsou wa kunubde baramib.

Ninyi aryi tola ati tatab-tatab ebsingnyi ababyi, nunci namin uram akwe eboka uram dengdeiriramib. Nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bokdonoksou nang kunub bok, ninyi nirya ara nunti, “Iya malyi kun nang,” tenen, “Yakdonokwayeb nang,” tenesunung.

Ni kwityabwe. Niryi nundamnyi ati, “Outam bun nang kunub,” eboka kerek sekeibmasin ara sunti, “Alyi kibdeibkwan,” tenen kum kerek sekeibmasin. Erda, niryi sunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenesunun ati, niryi sunti, “Sundamnyi erebdeibdabingnyei,” tenen kerek sekeibmasin.

Ninyi ilinto aryi sunti, “Nun Du Kristus deyok ati eterebkwayeb,” eboka kaliksiting ababyi, ni Paulus tentok ara sun nai bitonyi kunun. Niryi sunsi Teleb Uram yuma kobdob etereranse uca, sunda Kristus dam kun nang kibmandau. A deyok aryi, ni tentok ara sun nai bitonyi kunun. Yuk nang ara sun naiyabwe ato kum kunung.
Ati, nira sun ai bitonyi kunun deyok aryi, sunci ni eterebmasin uram asi kekebmun ci, ni kunubde banun to milibde bindarur.

Ati, niryi sunti, “Ni kunubde banun to milibniting,” tenen niryi nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam bokdonokmasise. Ara, “Ni kunubde banun to eterebdum,” eboka nun kwit bisi sun dam bokdonokmase. Timotius bira ni boukwe weik kunun mi atonyi kurur. Erda tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus Er wa irmilinanyi kurur ati ebman. Nun kwit biryi sun dam yaci ura, erci sunsi tubto eterebsici uca, sunci nira sun nai biti, “Ato-ato kuboka nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi milirur,” tenen tamuboka bikwanurum. Ara, niryi dantam-dantam bindoka sun bulubmangnyi dib tenen nang nirya asi eterebde banun to, nun kwit biryi neik uram aca eboka sunsi eterebkwansir.
Ba, sun kankan asi ton nang ara sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming se. Ara, “Anyi Paulus bira nun dam tubto kum yankwansir,” tenen sundamnyi erebdeibdanmang.

Ato teneraming bok, niryi sun dam minola tamuryankwan. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi bublan kukeibnute uca, minola yankwan. Sirya yanmanyi ura, niryi a erebdeibdanmangnyi nang aryi eraming uram kekebnyi uca, niryi, “Ato-ato eboka sundamnyi ererdeiriraming,” tenen bikdobkwan. Tonda, niryi a nang ab ebdabyi uca, niryi sunti, “Sibambol dem deici aryi Er Imtamnyi mikib dobdobmang do diboka dobdobmang do?” tenen bikdobkwan.

Er Imtamnyi bira iya weik sienyi kurur ba, nunda Er amwetam kun nang kunub deyok ara nunukoka bingna dinyi ara sibambol dem deici aryi lak en dinyi kum kurur. Erda, a dinyi nunukoka bingna dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi mikib lak kimdeirin dinyi diboka kurur ati ebman.
Ati, sunci una tenebmanurum do? Niryi una kuboka sun dam yankwan do? “Mikib kuboka kerebkwan,” tenen kanya bobniryi, sun dam yankwan do? Boukwe kiboka namin kanya bobniryi, yankwan do?

Sunda dib tenen nang kankan asi talyi yordana nang ton diboka kuramingiryi, talyi yordaraming. Ninyi aryi sunti ato eboka nungnansing uram asi amol kekebman ati ato ebmasin. Tonda, sun kankan aryi kuboka tonyi biryi iya ukubman kum dinyi kunurande ara er nai ner asi doboka talyi yorande ati kekebman. Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang ara talyi yordaramingiryok, sunci, “Nun nai er ner asi talyi yobibyei,” teneramingiryi, ato dinyi kum kunuraming. Ba, sun dib tenen nang kankan aryi tonyi biryi sun Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang malyi kun dinyi bisibkaboka iya ukubman kum dinyi kunurande se.

Ba, sunda Korintus atei kuboka dib tenen nang kankan asi iya ukubman kum dinyi kunurande bok, sunci alyi kuna kum uca sundamnyi ererdeirirdarandum se. Sunci sundamnyi luknubdongobdandoka a talyi yordan dinyi deyok aryi, mambul kanya bobdate se. Sunci er nai ner talyi yorandanyi bisi, “Nun kankan aryi bindobdum se!” eboka yakdonokdate se.

Ni Paulus bira er nai ner talyi yorandanyi bisi, “Malyi dinyi kubumwe se,” eboka sirya kerebman ati ebman. Ni nong ara sun ab tonkwa kum kunmab ati, silalum sirik deici aryi anmalakoka kum ebman. Erda, ni kanya ara sun ab tonkwa kubmab ci, niryi ni kanya biriman aryi a talyi yorandanyi bisi sirya kerebman ati ebman.

Ati, sunda dib tenen nang aryi, “Nun Du Yesus si nabkwayeb,” tenen neik dam bulubmunyi ura, nira ni kanya deici aryi sun ab tonkwa bulubkwayeb. Ura, nun Du Yesus Er mikib sun kankan asi kubde ba, sunci er nai ner talyi yorandanyi bisi yakdonokdarur. Ato kuboka sunci anyi bisi isa sienyi Iblis taruk dam karebdarur. Ara, “Yakdonokibyi uca, anyi biryi er malyi kun dinyi taklobte,” tenen yakdonokdarur. Tonda, “Er malyi tenen dinyi taklobte uca, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, Erci anyi bisi lebte,” tenen anyi bisi yakdonokdarur.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda iya teleb nang kunub,” lak erdarandum ara malyito kurur se. Malyi kun dinyi mitik dinyi ababyi bisik kum sekdate uca, a malyi kun dinyi ara dakdongo-dakdongo yibici uca, ninyi nirya aryi a malyi kun dinyi dobdobingnyei. Ragi mitik dinyi ababyi roti umbura inirdaraming uca, roti nirya ara bung-bung erande. Malyi kun dinyi ababyi neiktoto kurur ati ebman.

Sunci sun kanya dam kuboka malyi kun dinyi nirya asi taklobdarur. Malyi kun dinyi ara ragi ato dinyi bai donokmun ci, sunci sundamnyi kalikdandoka ragi inirdein kum roti ato kibdandarur. Nun Du Kristus biryi sunsi lebdeibsou deyok aryi, sunci kilibdob kanya boboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur. Nun Du Kristus bira Erdamnyi nunti karebdandoka dibmou ati, nunci malyi kun dinyi nirya asi taklobkwayeb. Sun Israel yala nang minob kuramnyi nang ara kwalina si Paskah kwaliramnyi ba, sunci domba mi asi oboka Er Imtamnyi bisi dama kareramiryok, ragi inirdein kum roti yiramnyi. Ani, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin domba mi atonyi kuramwe asi sirya obmai deyok aryi, nunci, “Weik kwalina si Paskah sirya kunubmar ati, nunci nun malyi kun dinyi minob dinyi nirya taklobkwayeb,” tenebkwayeb. Tonda, nunci nun kanya dam aryi bintinina kum uca, “Ukuryok roti ara ragi inirdein kum roti yibkwayeb,” tenen Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi akwe kunubde binkwayeb.
Ni kwityabwe. Niryi sunsi minob kerek sekeibmasise ara, “Sun talyi yormururdana nang dam kubmunyei,” eboka kerek sekeibmasise.

Ato eboka kerek sekeibmasise ara, “Im dangna tukwe dangna kuramingnyi talyi yordana nang nirya asi dam kum kubting,” tenen nukoka kum kerek sekeibmasise. Tonda, im dangna tukwe dangna kuramingnyi, “Co bok ilinto talebtibyi,” tenen nang nirya ton, ukula don nang nirya ton, kwemdina molon nang nirya ton ati nukoka kum kerek sekeibmasise. Im dangna tukwe dangna kuramingnyi malyi kun nang ara dantam-dantam kuraming ati kisibdobman kum kunung ati ebman. Nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Malyi kun nang nirya kisibdobtibyi,” tenebtibyi uca, nunci im dangna tukwe dangna takloboka dibtibyi.

Ati, niryi sunti kerek sekeibmasin ara, “Sun talyi kuramingnyi malyi kun nang kisibdobdarur,” eboka nukoka kum kerek sekeibmasin. Erda, “Sun dib tenen nang kankan kuboka malyi kun nang asi kisibdobdarur,” eboka nukoka kerek sekeibmasin. Ara, sun, “Nunda nun Du Yesus bisi milin nang kunub,” lak erdaramingiryok, ner talyi yon nang kunung ati ebman. Sunci a nang asi kisibdoboka sun ab tonkwa yina yibmunyei. Tonda, sun dib tenen nang kankan aryi, “Co bok talebtibyi,” tenen nang ton, kwemdina molon nang ton, ninyi talakdongoboka malyi uram en nang ton, anggur du yung ilinto yiramingnyi nang ton ati ato ebman. A nang ara, “Nunda nun Du Yesus bisi milinub,” eramingiryok, malyi dinyi dorormururaming ati, sunci kisibdoboka sun ab tonkwa yina yibmunyei.

Nunda dib tenen nang ara sun dib tenena kum nang aryi malyi deyok yuk-yuk lilibtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sun dib tenen kum nang aryi malyi deyok yuk-yuk lilibkwande. Ba, nunda dib tenen nang ara sun dib tenen nang yuk nang malyi deyok asi liliboka erekwanub ati ebman. Ati, sunci er nai ner talyi yorandanyi deyok lilibmun ci, sun kankan aryi kuboka yakdonokdarur.

Ni kwityabwe. Sunda dib tenen nang kankan asi ninyi ton nang aryi sun mamun lulurdanmai cok, alyi kuna kum uca sun dib tenen kum nang dam bindoka, “Nun lulurdana deyok lilibsindarur,” eboka moloraming se. A nang ara sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi, “Nun lulurdana deyok lilibsindarur,” eboka kum moloraming se. Erda, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang bindoka, “Nun lulurdana deyok lilibsindarur,” eraming.

Sun dib tenen nang aryi ato dinyi ukuna mem. Sun dib tenen nang ara bikdob kanya bonung deyok aryi sun dib tenen nang yuk nang lulurdana deyok lilibkwanung ati ebman. Nun Du yuryangaci ura, nunda dib tenen nang ara sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang aryi kuamingnyi tok nirya lilibkwayeb. Sunci a dinyi kum bikmarum do? Aminda aryi lilibkwayeb deyok nirya ara ikin weik deyok kubkwande bok, nunda dib tenen nang aryi a deyok asi lilibkwayeb. Ba, ukuryok aryi tukwetam kuboka lilirban deyok ara caknam deyok ato kurande ababyi, nunda dib tenen nang aryi ur lilibkwayeb. Ati, nunci, “Nun dib tenen nang ara bikdob kanya bonub deyok aryi, dib tenen nang yuk nang deyok ababyi ur lilibkwayeb,” tenen ur lilibkwayeb.

Nun Du yuryangaci ura, nunda dib tenen nang aryi sun tukwetam nang aryi kunuamnyi dinyi akwe kum lilibkwayeb. Erda, nunci, “Teleb dinyi kubmai do kum do?” tenen Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang kunuamnyi dinyi ababyi lilibkwayeb. Sunci a dinyi kum bikmarum do? Ati, nunda dib tenen nang ara imtam deyok ikin deyok lilirbana ati bingnub deyok aryi, nunci tukwetam deyok ara caknam dinyi lilirbana asi tabakdongoboka bingnub ati ebman.

Ati, sunda dib tenen nang aryi tukwetam dinyi ati sun mamun lulubdate ura, sunci unato ati sun Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang dam bindoka, “Nun lulurdana deyok lilibsindarur,” ebdate do? A nang ara sun dib tenen nang aryi kisal dangna nang kum kuraming ati, sunci ato dinyi molobmunyei.

Niryi sunti, “Alyi kibdeibkwan,” tenen ato ebmasin. Ura, unato ati sunci, “Dib tenen kum nang aryi nun lulurdana deyok lilibsiting,” erandum do? Sunda dib tenen nang kankan asi bikdob kanya bon nang ton kum kuraming darib? Sun kankan aryi sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang lulurdana deyok lilina ati bingna nang ton kum kusunung darib?

Unato ati dib tenen nang ton nang aryi, “Dib tenen nang yuk nang aryi nunsi malyi kibdeibmasing,” eboka tatab-tatab ebting do? Unato ati a nang aryi sun dib tenen kum nang urasintam bindoka, “Nun lulurdana deyok lilibsindarur,” eboka molobting do?

Sunda dib tenen nang ara dib tenen kum nang bindoka, “Nun deyok lilibsindarur,” eboka molorandum ara diboka malyi kun dinyi kurandum ati ebman. Dib tenen nang yuk nang aryi sunti malyi kibdeibsingnyi ara malyito kibdeibsingnyi bok, sunda dib tenen nang aryi dib tenen kum nang urasintam aryi tatab-tatab ebdate ara tabakoka iya malyito kubdate. Ati, dib tenenanyi yuknyi biryi sunti malyi kibdeibsute ababyi, sunci, “‘Deyok lilibdarur,’ eboka kum molobkwan,” tenena teleb. Tonda, dib tenenanyi yuknyi biryi sun dinyi ukula dobdobte ababyi, sunci, “Sun dib tenen kum nang urasintam aryi tatab-tatab ena kum kubkwan,” tenena teleb.

Ba, sunda dib tenen nang kurandum cok, malyi kanya bordarandum se. Ara, sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang yuk nang asi tola uram erandum ci, sun bona bon dinyi dobmarum se. Sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi malyi kimdeirirandum se.

Ura, sun malyi kun nang ara Er Imtamnyi Iya Weik Sienyi amwetam bun nang kum kibingiryok, Er lemsin dinyi kum dobdobkwaming. Sunci a dinyi kum bikmarum do? Ati, sunci sun malyi kimdeirirdan dinyi taklobdarur ati ebman. Tola uram aryi sunsi bowanikminiksicei. Erda, dib en uram akwe dib tenebdarur. Ati, sun talyi yordan nang ara Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kibkwaming. Tonda, sun kwemdina molon nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kubkwaming. Tonda, sun yuk nang ner talyi yordan nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kibkwaming. Tonda, sun, “Co bok karebniminyi uca, yobkwankin,” en nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kibkwaming. Tonda, sal ara sun mamun yordaraming nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kibkwaming. Sun ato kuboka malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang nirya ara Er Iya Weik Sienyi amwetam bun nang kum kibingiryi, Er Imtamnyi lemsin dinyi kum dobdobkwaming.

Tonda, sun ukula don nang ton, sun, “Co bok ilinto talebtibyi,” tenen tula kiringna nang ton, sun anggur du yung ilinto yiramingnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi amwetam bun nang kum kibkwaming. Tonda, sun talakdongoboka malyi uram en nang ton, sun tola uram eboka yuk nang dinyi asi moloboka yirlon nang ababyi neiktoto Er Imtamnyi amwetam kun nang kum kibingiryi, Er lemsin dinyi dorona kum kubkwaming.

Ura, sunda Korintus atei aryi kurandum dib tenen nang kankan aryi ton nang ara minob ura ato malyi kun dinyi yuk-yuk kunubde barandau. Ani, nun Nai biryi sunsi nabdeibsou uca, sunci sun malyi kun dinyi taklobmandau uca, kilibdob kanya bon nang ato kibmandau. Tonda, sunda kilibdob kanya boboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunurandum nang kibmandau, Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe, ni urasintam aryi teleb nang,” tenen dobdobmasou. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi karebmou uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi Er Kanya Roh Kudus mikib biriman aryi sunsi dobdobmasou.

Sunda dib tenen nang kankan asi ton nang ara ato eboka lak erdaraming. “Nunda tabwe lobdeibsou nang kunub deyok aryi, nunci nun kanya dam aryi malyi dinyi tenebtibyi ababyi, ur kunubde bitibyi.” Ato eraming bok, niryi ato eboka ebkateibman. “Nunci nun kanya dam aryi malyi dinyi tenebtibyi dinyi asi kunubtibyi uca, a dinyi nirya ara nunti teleb kum kubdeibsute.” A nang aryi, “Nun kanya dam aryi malyi dinyi ababyi tenebtibyi dinyi asi ur kunubde bitibyi,” eraming bok, niryi ato eboka ebkateibman. “Nunci nundamnyi kalikdandoka, ‘Yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi utotoa aryi nunsi taleboka tabwe tubto debsicei,’ tenebkwayeb.”

Tonda, ton nang ara ato eboka lak erdaraming, “Nun yina yibmabyi dinyi ara mundu dinyi akwe kurur ati, nunci teleb tenebtibyi tok ur yibtibyi.” Ato eraming bok, niryi ato eboka ebkateibman. “Yina yin dinyi ara tiya dinyi akwe kurande. Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi mundu dinyi ababyi yina yin dinyi ababyi kum daneibkwande.” Ba, ninyi nong ara Er Imtamnyi biryi kiknibmasou. Ara, “Talyi yobdating,” tenen Erci nunsi kum kiknibmasou. Erda, nun Du Arungdeirisurutnyi Yesus Kristus Er Uram milibkwayeb ati kiknibmasou. Tonda, nun Du Arungdeirisurutnyi bira nunsi dibniliboka kalingsurutnyi kubkwande ati Erci nunsi kiknibmasou. Ati, nunci nun nong ab nun kanya ab biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur dinyi akwe kubkwayeb.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Er mikib deici aryi nun Du Yesus sirya dibmou asi kam bukeibmou. Tonda, Erci nun nong ab nun kanya ababyi kam bukeibkwansir.

Nunda dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa nong tentok ato nang kunub ati sun kum bikmarum do? Ati, nunda nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa nong ato nang kunub cok, nunci nun nong asi karebdandoka talyi yon ner yobtibyi do? Ato tenen kum.
Talyi yon ner bindoka yobtingnyi nang ara talyi yon ner ab tonkwa tub tentok ato kibdating ati sun kum bikmarum do? Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi a deyok ati ato esurur.
“Sal aryi ner ab yobdiryok, sun nang bitinyi antanibdeibdandoka nong tentok ato kibkwanding.”
Ati, talyi yon ner yobtibyi ababyi, talyi yon ner ab tonkwa nong tentok ato kibdatibyi. A deyok aryi nunci talyi ner yobibyei.
Ba, unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kibingnyi uca, a nang ara nun Du Yesus ab antanibdeibdandoka Er ab tonkwa neik kanya boraming.

Ati, sunci sundamnyi kalikdandoka talyi yon dinyi kisibdobdarur. Unanyi-unaner ara talyi yon dinyi kunubde baraming ara sundamnyi malyi kimdeirirdaraming. Bok, malyi kun dinyi yuk dinyi utotoa nirya asi kunubde baramingiryok, sun mining nong malyi kum kimdeiriraming.

Ninyi nong kanya nirya ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus kurur ai kurur ati sun kum bikmarum do? Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi Kanya dobdobmandau ati ebman. Ati, sunci, “Nun nong kanya ara nun dinyi,” tenebmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Nun nong kanya ara Er Imtamnyi talesurur dinyi,” tenebdarur.

Nun Du biryi Erdamnyi karebdanmou ara dengna weik dinyi ato karebmou cok, sunsi dekmasou deyok aryi, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nun talesurutnyi kurur,” tenebdarur. Ati, sunci sun nong kanya biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun Nai Erebdobnyi,” tenen Erci teleb tenesurur dinyi kunubde bindarur.

Ura, sunci nisi kerek sengna kerek sekeibmanindau ara sal ner dordana deyok ati eboka kerek sengna kerek sekeibmanindau ati niryi a deyok ati uram ton eterebkwinsin. Sun kankan asi ton nang ara ato eraming. “‘Sun ner kum dobkwayeb,’ tenen nang ara teleb dinyi tenen kunuraming.” Tonda, “‘Sal aryi nisi dobnicei,’ tenen nerabwe ara teleb dinyi tenen kunuraming.”

Diboka eraming bok, sal ner dordana ababyi teleb dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ara, “Sal ner dordana kum kubingnyi uca, talyi yon dinyi utotoa kunubde bingnyei,” tenenun deyok aryi, “Sal ner dordana ara teleb dinyi kurur,” ebmasin. Sal ara ner tentok asi dobkwanung. Tonda, nerabwe ara sal tentok asi dobkwanung.
Sal ara sun ner dobingnyi ura, “Ni ner yobkwanun,” tenen kunubde binkwanung. Tonda, sun nerabwe neiktoto ara sun akenyi biti, “Ur yobnute,” tenen kunubde binkwanung.

Sun nerabwe ara, “Ni akenyi yobnicei,” tenen kisibdobingnyei. Sun nerabwe nong ara sun akenyi dinyi kurur deyok aryi, ato ebman. Tonda, sun akenyabwe aryi, “Ni mining ner asi kum yobkwan,” tenen kisibdobingnyei. Sun akenyi nong ara sun mining dinyi kum kurur. Erda, sun ner dinyi kurur ati ato ebman.

Sun sal nang yuk aryi, “Ni ner kum yobkwan,” tenebmunyei. Tonda, sun nerabwe yuk aryi, “Ni akenyi yobnicei,” tenebmunyei. Erda, sun nang bitinyi antaniboka, “Yordana ati tiya taklobkwanim,” tenebdengnyi ura, sunci yordan dinyi tiya akwe ur taklobting. Talyi dinyi kubkwandum ati sunci yordan dinyi asi tiya taklobmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka molobkwanim ati yordan dinyi tiya taklobkwanim,” tenebdandate ura, sunci yordana dinyi ati tiya taklobdate. Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka moloramunyi talak sirya bisibci ura, sun nang bitinyi ara kisirlona kum uca tamuboka yobdankwandum. Ara, “Ni akenyi biryi erdamnyi kum kalikdate asi isa sienyi si Iblis biryi sakeibte uca, ner talyi yobcei,” tenen er ner aryi er akenyi biti, “Ur yobnute,” tenen kubdur. Tonda, “Ni ner aryi erdamnyi kum kalikdate asi Iblis biryi sakeibte uca, talinyi biryi ni ner talyi yobcei,” tenen er akenyi biryi er ner biti, “Ur yobkwan,” tenen kubdur.
Niryi ato ebmasin bok, niryi, “Sal ara ner dobkwanung,” eboka kum arukdeibmasin. Erda, niryi sunsi, “Sal ner dordan dinyi ara mem kuma,” ebmasin. Ati, “Sal ara ner ur dobkwaming,” ebmasin.

Er Imtamnyi biryi ni Paulus bisi mikib karebnou uca, niryi, “Ner doboka yobtinyi,” tenenanyi kum kunun. Nira atonyi kunun ci, “Ninyi nirya ara ni kuran to miliboka, ‘Ner doboka yobtinyi,’ tenen kum nang kibting,” tenenun. Ato ebman bok, ner don dinyi ababyi teleb, ner don kum dinyi ababyi teleb kurur ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi mikib yuk-yuk karebsou uca, ton nang aryi, “Ner dobkwan,” tenen ner doraming ba, yuk nang aryi, “Ner dona kumnyi kubmurubkwan,” tenen ner kum doraming.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, ukuryok ara sun ner don kum nang ton sun sulyi nerabwe ton ati uram ton ebkwinsin. Sun ner don kum nang ara, “Aminda ababyi ner kum dobkwan,” tenebting uca, a nang ara ner ur kum dobting. Tonda, sun sal aryi don kum nerabwe ara, “Aminda ababyi sal aryi dobnicei,” tenebting ara teleb dinyi tenebting. Ni Paulus bira ner don kumnyi kunun to, yuk nang ababyi neiktoto sal ner dordan kum nang ur kubting.

Ba, ner don kum nang ara, “Ner doboka yobtinyi se,” tenen sundamnyi kum kalikdatingnyi uca, ner dobkwanung. Ara, “Ner doboka yobtinyi se,” tenen nang aryi ner kum dobting ara malyito kubte. Sun ato tenen nang aryi ner dobting ara bisibkaboka teleb dinyi kubte. Tonda, sal aryi don kum nerabwe ara neiktoto, “Sal aryi doboka yobnute,” tenebting uca, sal dobkwanung. Ara, a nang aryi, “Nun kanya tin bisici uca, talyi yon dinyi kibibyei,” tenen sal ner dobkwanung.

Ura, sun ner don nang ton sun sal don nerabwe ton asi niryi ato ebmasin. (Ni Paulus yuk aryi ato eboka kum arukdeibmasin. Erda, nun Du Yesus Erebdobnyi biryi ato eboka arukdeibmasir.) Sun nerabwe ara sun akenyi bisi taklobingnyei.

Ba, er ner aryi er akenyi bisi sirya taklobte ura, yuk sal aryi a ner asi dobcei. Er akenyi bisi takloanci ner ara sal don kum ner ato kibte kum, er akenyi minob doantinyi dam tamurbiti ura, antanibdobtiring kum. Tonda, sun akenyabwe ara sun ner asi taklobingnyei.

Ura, sun yuk nang ati niryi ato ebmasin. (Ni Paulus yuk aryi ato ebmasin. Nun Du biryi uram kuma.) Er akenyi bira dib tenenanyi kubte ura, er ner ara dib tenen kum ner kubte ura, er akenyi biryi er ner dib tenen kum ner asi taklobcei. Ara, er ner aryi, “Ni akenyi ab tonkwa kubmurubkwanim,” tenebte uca, er akenyi biryi er ner taklobcei.

Tonda, er ner bira dib tenen ner kubte ura, er akenyi bira dib tenen kumnyi kubte ura, er ner aryi er akenyi dib tenen kumnyi bisi taklobcei. Ara, er akenyi biryi, “Ni ner ab tonkwa kubmurubkwanim,” tenebte uca, er ner aryi er akenyi bisi taklobcei.

Ara, er ner dib tenen ner kurante ura, er akenyi dib tenenanyi kum kurante ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi er ner dib tenena deib aryi, “A nang bitinyi asi kisal dakwan,” tenen kisal dangnante. Tonda, er akenyi dib tenenanyi kurante ura, er ner dib tenen ner kum kurante ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi er akenyi dib tenena deib aryi, “A nang bitinyi asi kisal dakwan,” tenen kisal dangnante. Ato dinyi ara dib kum kubmate ura, sun nang bitinyi aryi deibmangnyi mabwe nermabwe ababyi Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangnung nang kum kubmating ati ebman.

Ba, er akenyi dib tenen kumnyi biryi, “Ni ner dib tenen ner kurur deyok aryi, taklobkwan,” tenebte ura, sunci, “Ur taklobdankwandurum,” ebdarur. Tonda, er ner dib tenen kum ner aryi, “Ni akenyi dib tenenanyi kurur deyok aryi, taklobkwan,” tenebte ura, sunci, “Ur taklobdankwandurum,” ebdarur. Ara, “Kum taklobdatiring ura, sun nang bitinyi aryi dib tenena deyok aryi, lulurdana akwe kubdingnyei,” tenen, “Ur taklobdankwandurum,” ebdarur. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi nabdeibsou ara, “Neik kanya boboka antaniboka kubkwaming,” tenen nabdeibsou deyok aryi, nunci sun ato kuboka lulurdangnyi nang bitinyi asi, “Ur taklobdankwandurum,” ebkwayeb.

Sunda dib tenen nerabwe ara, “Nun akenyi dib tenen kumnyi ab tonkwa tamuboka antanibdeibdanimnyi uca, erbabyi dib tenenanyi kibte,” tenen sun akenyi ab tonkwa tamuboka antanibdeibdandarur. Tonda, sunda dib tenen nang ara, “Ni ner dib tenen kum ner ab antanibdeibdanimnyi uca, erbabyi dib tenenanyi kibte,” tenen sun ner ab tamuboka antanibdeibdandarur. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi nabdeibsou ara antanibdeibdankwayeb ati nabdeibsou,” ebmasin.

Ura, niryi, “Ur taklobdatiring,” ebman bok, sun ner don nang ara tanglordana kum uca sun ner ab tonkwa kurmuruna teleb ati ebman. Tonda, sun sal aryi don nerabwe ara tanglordana kum uca sun akenyi ab tonkwa kurmuruna teleb ati ebman. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun yuk-yuk asi karebmasou to, nunci kunurmuruna teleb. Ara, sun, “Ner kum dobkwan,” tenen nang ara ner dobingnyei. Tonda, sun ner don nang ara sun ner taklobingnyei. Niryi sun dantam-dantam buluramingnyi dib tenen nang ati ato eboka eterenun cok, sunda Korintus atei nang ababyi neiktoto eterebmasin.

Ara, sun den bama sengna nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang kibingnyi ura, sunci, “Den bama sengna kum nang kibkwanub,” tenebingnyei. Tonda, sun den bama sengna kum nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang kibingnyi ura, “Den bama sengna nang kibkwanub,” tenebingnyei.

Den bama sengna dinyi ababyi den bama sengna kum dinyi ababyi ara bikdob dinyi kuma. Den bama sengna dinyi deici aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal kum dangsurur. Tonda, den bama sengna kum dinyi deici aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal kum dangsurur. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni teleb tenesunun to kunubde bindarur,” en uram kunubtibyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenen kisal dangsurur.

Nun yuk wa-yuk wa iramoubwe nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Nisi milibnindarur,” eboka nabdeibsou bok, nunci, “Nun minob iramoubwe yuk wa-yuk wa asi taklobkwayeb,” tenebibyei. Erda, ukuryok ababyi neik wa akwe irmururamiryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur dinyi kunubde binkwayeb.

Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi nabdeibsou ba, sunda yuk nang aryi ikin wa takurdeiriransei nang kurandau ani, ukuryok tuba yuk nang aryi ikin wa takurdeiriransing nang kurandum do? Ato kuramunyi ba, sunci, “Ninyi aryi nunsi ikin wa tuba takurdeiriransing ababyi, mambul kanya kum bobkwayeb,” tenebdarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi lebdeibsou nang sirya kibmandau deyok aryi, sunci mambul kanya bobmunyei. Ba, sun “Ikin wa ibdarur,” eboka arungdeirisinanyi biryi bico tenen, “Tabwe lobdeibsici uca ur kuraming nang kibdarur,” ebsici uca, sunci, “Ei, ni nai,” eboka ur kuraming nang ur kibdarur.

Sun kankan asi ikin wa iramingnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus biryi nabdeibmou uca dib tenen nang kibmai. A deyok aryi, a nang ababyi nun Du Yesus biryi lebdeibmou ba, Er amwetam bun nang kibmai. Ara, yuk nang aryi arukmangnyi tok ikin wa tuba irmururanting ababyi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunbabyi lebdeibmou ati, tabwe lobdeibmou nang ato kibmai. Ba, sun dib tenen nang kankan asi sun tenebdobmangnyi tok wa in nang ara, “Nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi nabdeibsou uca, nunbabyi Er arungdeirisina uram kunubde ban nang kunub,” tenena teleb.

Nun Du Kristus bira Erdamnyi karebdandoka nunda dib tenen nang nirya asi lebdeibmasou. Ara, dengna weik dinyi ato karebmou ci, nun Du Yesus biryi sunbabyi dekeibsou. Sunda nun Du Yesus biryi lebdeibsou nang kibmarum deyok aryi, sunci, “Yuk nang aryi arungdeirin uram kunubde bibyei,” tenebdarur.

Ati, ni kwityabwe, nun yuk wa-yuk wa iramoubwe to, ukuryok ababyi tanglona kum uca neik wa iboka ibmurubkwayeb. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum nabsou bok, yuk wa-yuk wa iramoubwe to, ukuryok ababyi neik wa iboka ibmurubkwayeb. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenebsou wa ibmurubkwayeb,” tenen nunci nun minob iramoubwe wa asi Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi ibmurubkwayeb. Tonda, nun ner doamibyi tok iya dobkwanub. Ba, “Ner kum dobkwayeb,” teneamibyi tok, iya kam kuronkwayeb.

Ura, ukuryok ara sun kam nerabwe ab ati uram ebkwansin. Nun Du biryi a deyok ati, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” en uram kum ebdeibmasou bok, niryi sunsi, “Ato-ato kubkwayeb,” en uram ton ebkwinsin. Nun Du biryi kisal daknou ba, bokdonoknou deyok aryi, sunci ni ebdeibkwinsin uram ati, “Dib en uram ebmasir,” tenenina teleb.

Ukuryok kubde baramib talak ara sun dib tenen kum nang aryi nunda nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang ati, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringnansing deyok aryi, mambul weik kurdeirisin talak kurur. A deyok aryi, niryi sunda ner don kum nang asi, “Ner don kum nang ur kurmuruna teleb,” ebmasin.
Ba, sunda sal ner dordanmarumnyi nang asi niryi, “Taklobdandumunyei,” ebmasin. Ba, ner don kum nang asi, “Ner dobmunyei,” ebmasin.

Ba, sunci, “Ner dobkwan,” tenen kubmunyi ara ur dobdarur. Tonda, kam nerabwe ara, “Sal aryi dobnute,” tenen kubmunyi ara manmalin dinyi kuma. Ba, niryi, “Sal aryi ner dobingnyei,” ebmasin ara “Sal ner dobingnyi ura, sun nang bitinyi ara tabakoka mambul dinyi ilinto dobdobting,” tenen ato ebmasin. Ati, niryi sunti, “Mambul dinyi dobdobingnyei,” tenen, “Sal ner dobmunyei,” ebmasin.

Ni kwityabwe, uki mitikanun kubmabyi ani, mambul weik dinyi dobdobkwayeb ati ebman. Ati, ukuryok aryi kuboka aminda ababyi sun ner don nang ara, “Mambul dinyi dobdobkwayeb ati nunci tukwetam dinyi udikum deiboka ingkirikibyei,” tenebting. Ara, sun ner don kum nang aryi imtam dinyi udikum deiboka ingkiringnaming to, sun ner don nang ababyi neiktoto imtam dinyi udikum deiboka ingkiringna teleb.

Tonda, sun engen kanya bon nang ara sun engen kanya bon kum nang kuramingnyi to kuna teleb. Tonda, sun kilkil kanya bon nang ara sun kilkil kanya bon kum nang kuramingnyi to kuna teleb. Tonda, sun bona bon dinyi dekoka boramingnyi nang ara sun bona bon kum nang teneramingnyi kanya ato bona teleb. Ara, sun nirya aryi, “Mambul weik dinyi dobdobkwayeb talak dam kubmar deyok aryi, nunci nundamnyi kiknibminikdandoka imtam dinyi udikum deiboka ingkirikwayeb,” tenen kunubdarur.

Tonda, sun yina yiboka ai doboka tukwetam aryi kuboka tiya dinyi yuk dinyi ababyi kunubde baramingnyi nang ara tukwetam dinyi ati, “Tiya dinyi aca,” tenebtingiryok, udikum deibingnyei. Tukwe tam dinyi ara ukuryok kubde baramib talak aryi asing eiriramibyi dinyi nirya ara tiya dinyi akwe kurur ati ato ebman.

Ura, niryi sunti, “‘Tukwetam dinyi ingkirikwayeb,’ tenen mambul kanya bobingnyei,” tenesunun cok, “Ner dobingnyei,” tenesunun. Sun ner don kum nang ara, “Nun Du bisi wa irmilibkwayeb,” tenena akwe kunung. Ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun Du Yesus Er kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” tenena akwe kunung.
Ba, sun ner don nang ara yina yin dinyi ton tukwetam dinyi yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ababyi akwe tenenung. Ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun ner kanya asi teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” tenena akwe ingkiringnung.

Sun ner don nang aryi udikum deiboka wa iraming dinyi ara bitinyi kurur. Ton wa iraming dinyi ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun ner kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” tenen wa iraming. Tonda, wa iraming dinyi yuk dinyi ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun Du Yesus kanya teleb kibdeibkwayeb do?” tenen wa iraming. Ura, sun sal don kum nerabwe ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun akenyi kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” tenen wa kum iraming. Erda, sunci “Una kubtibyi uca, nun Du Yesus kanya teleb kibdeibkwayeb do?” tenena akwe kuraming. Ara, sun sal aryi don kum nerabwe ara, “Nun nong kanya nirya karebdandoka nun Du Yesus wa in dinyi akwe wa irmilibkwayeb,” tenen kuraming. Ba, sun sal don nerabwe ara, “Una kuboka yina dinyi ingkirikwayeb do?” tenen tukwetam dinyi akwe udikum deiboka wa iraming. Ara, “Una kubtibyi uca, nun akenyi kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” tenena akwe kuraming.

Niryi sunsi, “Sal ara ner tuba kum dobting,” ebmasin ara, “Aruk-aruk ebdeibkwan,” tenen kum ebdeibmasin. Erda, niryi sunti, “Teleb dinyi dobdobkwaming,” tenen ebdeibmasin. Ara, niryi sunti, “Tukwetam dinyi ati mambul kanya bona kum uca, nun Du Yesus Er wa asi diboka ibmilibting,” ato eboka ebdeibmasin.

Sun kankan asi tonyi biryi, “Ni dobkwan ner ara sirya nebdobwe deyok aryi, niryi ersi, ‘Niryi kansi minola kum dobkwankin,’ kum ebkwan,” tenebmaci ura, anyi biryi ukurlona kum uca er ner asi ur dobkwande. Ati, erci, “Ner dobkwan,” tenebmaci tok, er ner ur dobdur. Ato kun dinyi ara manmalin dinyi kuma.

Ba, yuknyi bira er kanya dam yuk aryi diboka tenebmaci ura, “Ni dobtinyi ner ara kum dobkwan,” tenebmaci ura, erci, “Ner kum yobkwan,” tenen erdamnyi diboka kalikdaci ura, anyi biryi ner kum dobci ababyi manmalin dinyi kum kurur.
Ati, sun kam ner dobmangnyi nang ara teleb dinyi kunuraming. Kunuraming bok, sun kam ner don kum nang ara bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kunuraming ati ebman.

Sun sal don nerabwe ara sun akenyi ab tonkwa iya kubkwanung. Ara, sun akenyi kam tuba kuranci talak er ab tonkwa kubkwanung. Ba, er akenyi dibte ura, er ner ara yuk nang aryi ur dobting. Ara, nun Du Yesus bisi dib teneboka milin nang aryi ersi ur dobting.

Ato ebman cok, niryi, “Sun akenyi sirya dibmangnyi nerabwe ara yuk sal aryi dona kum uca sulyi nerabwe kurmuruna teleb,” tenenun. A dinyi ara, “Bikdob uram kurur,” tenenun. Sulyi nerabwe kubmurubting ura, sunci nun Du Yesus wa irmilina akwe kubting uca, sun kanya ara bisibkaboka kilkil kubte ati tenebman. Nibabyi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus dobdobmasinyi kunun ci, ato eboka ebdeibmasin.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, ukuryok ara, “Kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin yina asi nunda dib tenen nang aryi ur yibkwayeb do kum do?” tenen uram ton ebkwansin. Ba, a deyok ati yuma kobdob ebkwinsin uram ara ato ebkwinsin. Nun nirya ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bingna dinyi lak kibdeibsou,” tenen bingdaramib. Ba, ton nang ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bingna dinyi lak kibdeibsou,” tenerdaramingiryok, sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming. “Nunda bingna dinyi bingnub,” tenen ererdana dinyi deici aryi nunci yuk nang kanya asi katabum ebdeibmatibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, nun dib tenen nang aryi nun mamun boukwe kimdaramib dinyi deici aryi nunci nun mamun katabum erdeirirdaramib.

Sun, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bingna dinyi lak kibdeibsou,” tenerdan nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdamingnyei. Sun ato tenerdan nang ara bikdob dinyi langdeiboka kum bingnung. Erda, a nang ara deyok kouboka bikdob dinyi bingkaliraming nang kunung ati ebman.
Ba, sun Er Imtamnyi bisi boukwe weik kimnaming nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni dam kun nang,” tenen bingsurur.

Ati, ni kwityabwe, kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin yina ati uram ton ebkwinsin. Nunda dib tenen nang aryi ato yina asi ur yibkwayeb do kum do? Nunda dib tenen nang ara kwemdina dinyi ati, “Talyi dinyi aca,” tenen bingnub deyok aryi, nunci kwemdina asi dama deirin yina ur yibkwayeb ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi tentok ara iya mikibnyi kurur ati nun nirya bingnub. Tonda, kwemdina dinyi ara talyi dinyi akwe kurur ati nun bingnub. A deyok aryi, nunda dib tenen nang ara yina utotoa nirya ur yibkwayeb. Ara, kwemdina dinyi asi dama deibmangnyi yina yibtibyi ababyi ara mem kuma.

Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang ara imtam kurande dinyi yuk-yuk ton tukwetam kurande dinyi yuk-yuk ton asi, “Nun naiyabwe, nun molonub nang,” eboka moloraming. Ato dinyi nirya ara kwemdina dinyi yubwa-yubwa kuraming asi sunci, “Nun du, nun kwin,” eboka moloraming. A kwemdina dinyi nirya ara mikib kum kunung. Erda, talyi dinyi akwe kunung bok, ninyi aryi, sunsi, “Nun naiyabwe erebdob nang,” eboka namnaming.

Ato eboka moloraming bok, nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi tentok ara iya mikibnyi kurur,” tenen bingnub. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi imtam dinyi tukwetam dinyi nirya asi minob kiknibmou. Tonda, nun Nai biryi nunsi kiknibmasou ara, “Niryi teleb tenebnyi tok kunubde biting,” tenen kiknibmou. Tonda, nun Du Yesus Kristus bibabyi tentok akwe Er Iya Erebdobnyi kurur ati ebman. Nun Du biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi imtam dinyi tukwetam dinyi nirya kiknibmou. Tonda, nun Du Yesus biriman aryi nunda dib tenen nang ara Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe kibmoubwe.

Nunda dib tenen nang kankan kuboka bikdob dinyi bingna nang ara, “Kwemdina dinyi ara talyi dinyi aca,” tenen bingnub. Tonda, nunci, “Kwemdina asi dama deirin yina ara ur yibkwayeb,” tenen bingnub. Ba, dib tenen nang nirya ara ato dinyi diboka kum bingnung. Dib tenen nang ton nang ara minob ura kwemdina dinyi moloramnyi deyok aryi, sunci ukuryok ababyi ato teneraming. “Kwemdina asi dama deirin yina yibtibiryok, nunda kwemdina molon nang ato tamuboka kibdatibiryi, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kibmatibyi,” teneraming. Ati, a nang ara, “Kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin yina ara ur yinmanuba,” tenen kum kuraming. Erda, sunci kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin yina yibting uca, sunci “Malyi dinyi kunubmab se,” tenerdana akwe kubting. A nang ara sun kanya dam, “Malyi dinyi kunubmab se,” tenerdaramingiryi, sun kanya ara katabum kum erande deyok aryi, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi dam bindoka tuba molobibyei,” teneraming.

Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Ni dam kun nang,” tenen dorosurur ara nunci, “Kwemdina ara talyi dinyi aca,” tenen kwemdina yina asi ur yiramib deici aryi kum dorosurur. Tonda, nunci, “Kwemdina ara mem dinyi,” tenen kwemdina yina asi kum yiramib deici aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum dorosurur. Sun kwemdina yin kum nang asi nunci, “Bikdob dinyi bingna kum nang,” tenebibyei. Tonda, sun kwemdina yiraming nang ati nunci, “Bikdob dinyi bingna nang,” tenebibyei. Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi a nang nirya ara neiktoto akwe kunung.

Ba, sunda, “Yina yin dinyi utotoa ur yibkwayeb,” tenen bikdob dinyi bingna nang ara kalikdarur. Ati, sunci, “Nun kwityabwe katabum kanya bon kum nang aryi yibmilibmasiting ura, sunci, ‘Manmalibmoubwe se,’ tenebingnyei,” tenen kalikdarur. Ara, sun kwemdina yina asi yin kum nang ara sun kanya dam aryi, “Yina nun li,” teneramingiryok, sun kwityabwe kwemdina yina asi yirandum nang asi miliboka yibmating ura, “Manmalibmoubwe se,” tenebingnyei ati ebman.

Sunda dib tenen nang kankan kuboka bikdob dinyi bingnandum nang ara, “Kwemdina dinyi ara talyi dinyi akwe,” tenen bikmarum. Tonda, sunci kwemdina dama deirin ai bindoka kwemdina asi deibmangnyi yina asi yibdate. Ura, sun kwit dib tenenanyi ara bikdob dinyi bingna kumnyi biryi asing eibsute uca, erbabyi yibte. Ara, erci er kanya dam aryi, “Ur do mem do?” tuba tenebtiryok, “Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang ur yibmang ati nibabyi yibkwan,” tenen yibte.

Ura, sirya yibte ura, erci aminda aryi, “Kwemdina molonanyi bitonyi tamuboka kibdanman se,” tenen tuba teneibdate uca, er kanya lukoka obdankwante. Ati, sun bikdob dinyi bingna nang aryi, “Nun kwit biryi kwemdina yina yibingiryi manmalibcei,” tenen diboka kum kalikdate uca, sun kwit yibte uca, er kanya lukoka obdankwante. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus dibmou ara sun kwit bibabyi lebdeibkwamwe ati dibmou bok, sunci sun kwit bisi kwemdina molonanyi bitonyi tamuboka kibdate ati ebman.

Sunda bikdob dinyi bingna nang aryi sundamnyi kalingdana kum uca sun kwityabwe katabum kanya bon kum nang urasintam aryi kwemdina yina asi yibmunyi uca, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kubmun ci. Ara, sun kwityabwe katabum kanya bon kum nang aryi sirya yibingnyi uca, “Kwemdina dinyi yibmab se,” tenebingnyi deyok aryi, sunci nun Du Yesus urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kubmun ci.

A deyok aryi, niryi ato tenen kunubde banun. “Kwemdina asi dama deiriraming yina ara ur yibkwan,” tenen bingnun. Ba, niryi, “Kwemdina asi dama deirin yina asi yibniryok, ni kwit dib tenenanyi bisi bowanikminiknyei,” tenen bingnun uca, niryi kwemdina yina utotoa ton kum yibtinyi ati ebman.

Ni Paulus bira nun Du Yesus biryi lebdeibnou uca, Ersi milinunyi kunun deyok aryi, niryi, “Bisam tub utotoa ur yibmanuna,” tenebtinyi uca, ur yibtinyi. Tonda, “Yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ur kunubkwan,” tenebtinyi uca, ur kunubtinyi. Nun Du biryi nisi bokdonoknou uca, nira Teleb Uram eterebde banunyi kunun. Nun Du biryi nisi bokdonoknou ci, mikib karebnou deyok aryi, niryi sun ni uram keken nang asi, “Yina ton yuk dinyi ton karebnindarur,” eboka ur molorantinyi. Nun Du Kristus bira ni ab ebdandoka Erdamnyi ni urasintam aryi lak kibdandoka nisi bokdonoknou deyok aryi, nira nun Du Yesus bokdonoknounyi diboka kunun ati ebman. Nira nun Du Yesus wa irmilinanyi diboka kunun ara lak kubmar ati ebman. Niryi sun kankan asi yandoka Teleb Uram etereransise ba, nun Du Yesus nun Arungdeirisurutnyi biryi karebmou uca, sunsi du mouriransou. Ni wa in dinyi deici aryi sunti du mouriransou deyok aryi, sunci ni Paulus biti, “Erda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kurur,” tenen biknindate.

Ninyi ton nang ara ni Paulus biti, “Erda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kum kurur se,” tenenunung bok, sunda Korintus atei nang aryi niti, “Erda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kurur,” tenen biknindate. Niryi sunsi Teleb Uram etereransise uca, du mouriransou deyok aryi, yuk nang ababyi asing eibsitingiryok, sunci niti, “Nun Du biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kurur,” tenen bikniting.

Sun Korintus atei dib tenen nang kankan asi ton nang ara ni Paulus biti ato eraning. “Nun Du biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kum kurur.” A nang ara talyi ati ato eraning asi niryi uram ton dekeibkun ati ebman.
Ni ab yuk nang ab ara nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmasou nang kunub ci, mikib dobdobmoubwe deyok aryi, nunci nun eterena uram keken nang asi, “Yina ton me ton karebsindarur,” eboka ur molorantibyi.

Tonda, nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmasou nang yuk-yuk ara, “Ni ner dib tenen ner ni ab tonkwa baranimiryok, Teleb Uram eterebkwan,” tenebtibyi uca, nunci nun ner asi ur bobatibyi. Nun Du biryi bokdonokmou nang yuk nang ababyi sun ner bobaramingiryi, Teleb Uram eterebde banung. Nun Du Yesus Er kwin Maria deibmou mabwe yuk mabwe ara neiktoto sun ner bobaramingiryi, Teleb Uram eterebde banung. Tonda, nun kwit Petrus uruma si Kefas bibabyi neiktoto er ner bobarandiryi, Teleb Uram eterebde barur. Ati, nibabyi neiktoto, “Ato dinyi kunubtinyi,” tenebtinyi uca, ur kunubtinyi.

Ba, sunci nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang yuk nang ati, “Yina yin dinyi karebkwayeb,” tenerandum cok, sunci ni ab ni kwit Barnabas atikwe ati, “Nun Du biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kum kururung,” tenen, “Sun taruk aryi wa ibdingiryi, yina yin dinyi ingkiriktiring,” teneransurum do?

Ura, kiklina uram ton doboka eterebkwinsin. Yin doun nang ara, “Mar ordana nang bisik sekwayeb,” tenen kalingnamingiryi, sun mining yina ingkirikoka dengnung do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, yuk nang aryi dibniliboka sunsi yina kareraming. Tonda, anggur yala koubingnyi nang ara anggur du dam nang kunung bok, anggur du ur yibkwaming do kum do? Ur yiraming ati ebman. Tonda, domba sapi kalingna nang ara domba sapi mum urubdongoboka mum yung ur yiraming do kum do? Ur yiraming ati ebman. Ura, ato kuboka nunda Teleb Uram eterenub nang ababyi neiktoto sunda nun uram kekerandum nang asi, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka ur arukdeibsitibyi uca, yibtibyi.

Niryi tukwetam nang aryi kuraming to kiklin dinyi yuk-yuk doboka kiklibdeibmasin bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram deib aryi nunci, “Sun wa in nang asi dekoka yin dinyi ur karebdarur,” tenen bingnub ati ebman.
Ara, Musa Uram umbura aryi erci ato eboka arungdeirisurur.
“Sun wa in sapi ara gandum kala loksakwande ati yan aryi yanisitabci sapi ara gandum du ur yibkwandur. Ati, sunci, ‘Gandum du yibcei,’ tenen sapi si kankanya asi tabwe debmunyei.”
Musa Uram aryi ato eboka arungdeirisur ati ebman. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi bico tenen, “Sapi akwa ur yibdur,” tenen ato eboka arukdeibmasou do? Ato tenen kum.

Erda, nun Nai biryi wa in sapi ati, “Gandum du ur yibkwande,” ebmou ara Erci nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang ati nukoka, “Yina ur yibkwaming,” tenen ato ebmou. Sun tukwetam wa in nang ababyi, “Du moun dinyi ara aminda yibkwayeb,” tenen wa iraming. Ara, gandum wa tukwe asi dalub-dalub eboka yongon kimdeirin nang wa iramingiryok, sunci, “Nunbabyi gandum du kibkwayeb,” tenen dalub-dalub eboka wa iraming. Tonda, sun gandum kala asi lokaboka kimnansing nang ara, du wimdeirin nang ara, “Nunbabyi gandum du moun dinyi yibkwayeb,” tenen gandum kala asi lokaboka wa iraming.

Ura, nunda Teleb Uram eteren nang ara nun Du Yesus Er wa irmilin nang kunubiryi, sun kankan aryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram asi kouramoubwe. A uram ara ninyi kam burdeirin yala ato dinyi kouramoubwe. Kouriramoubwe ani, sunti du langdeiboka mouriransou. Ura, nunci sunti, “Nun kwityabwe, yina ton dinyi dekoka karebsindarur,” eboka arukdeibtinimnyi ara nun ur arukmanub to bisibkaboka ikin dinyi arukdeibtinimnyi do? Ato tenen kum.

Yuk nang aryi sunti, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka arukdeibmasei uca, sunci a nang asi yina karebmandau. Ba, sunci nunda deyok kouboka sunsi Teleb Uram minob etereransunumwe nang asi yina kum karebsindate do? Sunci ato kuna mem. Erda, sunci nunti, “Ei, nun naiyabwe,” tenen tabakoka karebdendate. Ba, nun Du biryi nunsi mikib karebsou uca, nunci, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka molorantinimiryok, nunci ato eboka kum moloransunumwe. Ara, nunci, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka molorantinimyi uca, ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ati, “‘Kekena nun li,’ tenebingnyei,” teneranumuryi, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka kum moloransunumwe. Erda, nunci, “Yina kum karebsingnyi ababyi yuk mambul dinyi kibdeibsingnyi ababyi nunci kilkil kanya boboka Teleb Uram eterebmurubkwayeb,” tenen kuranumwe.

Ura, sun Bait Allah ai ara Er Imtamnyi bisi ninyi dama deirin ai wa in nang aryi kuraming to sun bikmarum do kum do? A nang ara sun mining yina ingkiringna kum kuraming. Erda, sun Israel yala nang aryi dama deirin dinyi asi sengnamingiryok, dama deirin dinyi sekdoba ton doboka yiraming. Ara, sun dama deirin dam bindoka dama deirin dinyi yangaboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi bobaraming nang ara dama deirin dinyi sekdoba ton yiraming ati ebman.

Ura, nun Du Yesus Erebdobnyi bibabyi neiktoto nunda Er wa irmilin nang ati ato eboka arukdeibmasou. “Sun Teleb Uram lak eterebde ban nang ara sun kankan kuboka ni wa irmiliraming ati, sunci yina karebdarur.”

Nun Du biryi nunda Er wa irmilin nang asi, “Yina ton yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ton ur molobdarur,” eboka mikib karebmasou bok, niryi sun ni eteren uram keken nang asi, “Yina ton, yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ton, karebnindarur,” eboka kum moloransise. Tonda, ukuryok ababyi niryi, “Yina kum, yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi kum, karebniting,” tenen deyok ati kum kerek sekeibmasin. Ati, niryi, “Kwaning atabnicei,” tenen ni taruk yuk aryi wa ibde banun. Ati, niryi, “Ni yuk aryi ni yibkwan yina ingkirikwan ati, niryi tabakoka wa ibde banun,” enun ara teleb kanya boboka lak enun. Niryi yuk nang asi, “Yina karebsindarur,” ebtinyi uca, ni alyi weik kubnute. Niryi ni eteren uram keken nang asi, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka kum molobtinyi. Erda, niryi, “Molobkwan,” tenen dinyi diboka dokdonoktiniryi, ni yuk aryi ni yibkwan yina ingkiringnun.

Ni kwityabwe. Ni yuk aryi ni yibkwan yina ingkiringnun deyok aryi, ni kanya ara iya teleb kunurur. Tonda, niryi Teleb Uram eterebde banun deyok aryi, ni kanya ara iya teleb kunurur. Ato ebmasin bok, Teleb Uram eterebde banun deici aryi niryi nidamnyi asi kum erebdeibdatinyi ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi arukdeibnou uca, niryi Er Uram kunubdeiboka Teleb Uram eteresunun. A deyok aryi, niryi nidamnyi kum erebdeibdatinyi. Niryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram kum eterebtinyi uca, niryi mambul weik dinyi dobdobmatinyi ati ebman.

Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Teleb Uram etererbirum,” eboka kum arukdeibmanute ura, ni yuk aryi ni mining kanya dam aryi, “Teleb Uram eterebde binkwan,” tenebmatinyi uca, niryi sun ni uram keken nang asi, “Niryi sunsi eterebmasin deyok aryi, sunci nisi dengna dinyi karebnindarur,” eboka molobmatinyi. Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi, “Teleb Uram eterebde birum,” eboka arukdeibnou deyok aryi, niryi dengna dinyi dorona kum uca nun Nai biryi ebdeibnou to kunubde bana akwe kunun.

Ati, nira Teleb Uram eterebde banunyi biryi dengna dinyi utotoa kum doronun do? Diba. Ni mikib dobdobnou uca, “Dengna karebsindarur,” eboka molobmasitinyi bok, niryi dengna dinyi utotoa kum doronun ba, Teleb Uram eterebde banun. Niryi ato kuboka Teleb Uram eterebde banun ara ni kanya teleb kuranir ati ebman.

Nira yuk tikokmunyi kunun cok, ninyi amwetam bunanyi kum kunun. Ninyi amwetam bunanyi kum kunun cok, niryi nidamnyi luknukdongobdandoka ninyi nirya asi arungnanyi kibdanmase. Ara, “Nun Du dam kun nang asi ninyi ilinto tabakdongobtinyi uca, yubwa-yubwa ilinto kibting,” tenenun cok, niryi ninyi nirya asi, “Dibnilibkwan,” tenen sun arungnanyi bitonyi kibdanmase.

Ati, niryi, “Sun Yahudi yala nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kibting,” tenenun deyok aryi niryi nidamnyi luknubdongoboka sun Yahudi yala nang kuraming to milinunyi bitonyi kibdanmase. Ati, niryi, “Sun Musa Uram kunubde ban nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kibting,” tenen ni Musa Uram aryi tabwe demsinanyi kum kunun bok, niryi nidamnyi luknubdongoboka sun Musa Uram kunubde ban nang aryi kuraming to milinunyi bitonyi kibdanmase.

Tonda, niryi, “Sun Yahudi yala kum nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto ara nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kibting,” tenen niryi sun Yahudi yala kum nang ara Musa Uram kunubde ban kum nang aryi kuraming to milinunyi bitonyi kibdanmase. Ato ebmasin bok, nira nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram kunubde tuba banun ati ebman. Nira nun Du Yesus Kristus amwetam bunanyi kunun deyok aryi, Er Uram kunubde banun. Ara, “Sun Yahudi yala kum nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kibting,” tenen niryi nun Du Yesus biryi arukdeibnou uram kunubde banun.

Tonda, niryi, “Sun katabum kanya bon kum nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi tanglona kum uca milibting,” tenen nidamnyi katabum kanya bon kumnyi bitonyi kibdanmase. Tonda, niryi, “Ninyi nirya asi nun Du Yesus dam kun nang diboka kibdeibtinyi,” tenen niryi ninyi nirya aryi kuramingnyi to yuk-yuk asi milinunyi kibdanmase.

Ara, “Nun Du uram Teleb Uram diboka dobdobting,” tenen niryi nidamnyi luknubdongoboka ninyi nirya asi dibniliboka sun arungnanyi bitonyi kimdeirirdanun. Ara, “Nibabyi Teleb Uram deici aryi kisal dangsina dinyi dobdobtinyi,” tenen niryi Teleb Uram eterebde banun.

Ura, kiklina uram ton ebkwinsin. Sun cung baraming nang ara nirya cung baramingiryok, ninyi tentok ara iya cung bananyi bikwe muna kibdongobdinyi kisok kaluna dororande. Ati, sunbabyi neiktoto, “Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsici uca, muna kimdongon dinyi dobdobkwayeb,” tenen busul kuboka nun Du Yesus uram kunubde bindarur. Ato kubde biminyi ura, sun nirya aryi muna kimdongon dinyi dobdobkwandum.

Sun, “Cungbana milibkwayeb,” tenen nang nirya ara, “Yuk nang asi muna kibdongobkwayeb,” tenen busul kuboka cungbinkeleraming. Ara, “Muna kimdongon nang kalurdeiriraming kisok kaluna kalubdeibniting,” tenen sunci busul kuboka sundamnyi kiknibminikdamingiryi, cungbinkeleraming. Ara, kisok kaluna tiya dinyi akwe dobdobkwaming ati, busul kuboka cungbinkeleraming. Ba, nunda dib tenen nang dobdobkwayeb muna kimdongon kisok kalun dinyi ara iya dinyi kum daneibman kum dinyi dobdobkwayeb.

Ati, ni Paulus biryi, “Kum daneibman kum dinyi dobdobkwan,” tenen bingnun deyok aryi, talyi ati cungbana kum kunun. Erda, “Diboka dobdobkwan,” tenen cungbanun. Tonda, taruk iniboka ordana nang ara, “Muna kibdongobkwan,” tenen obkirikoka mentena kum uca ordaraming to, ni Paulus bibabyi neiktoto, “Muna kimdongon dinyi dobdobkwan,” tenen mentena kum uca Teleb Uram eterebde banun.

Ati, niryi, “Ni nong ab ni kanya ab biriman aryi nun Du Yesus Uram kunubde binkwan,” tenen nidamnyi diboka kalingdanun. Ati, niryi, “Yuk nang asi Teleb Uram etereranse bok, ni yuk aryi nun Du Yesus Uram asi kum kunubmatinyi uca, Erci nisi kisal dangna dinyi kum karebnicei,” tenenun. Ato tenenun cok, nibabyi busul kuboka nun Du Yesus uram kunubde banun.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, nun aibweyabwe minob kubde baramnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi lemna dinyi dobdobmai ani, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubmurubde kum baramnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebde baramwe. Er Imtamnyi biryi nun aibweyabwe wenebde baramnyi deyok aryi, niryi nidamnyi ati, “Niryi Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kum kunubmurubde barantinyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nibabyi wenebnicei,” ebdanman. Ati, ni kwityabwe, niryi, “Nun aibweyabwe minob kuramnyi to walwal kubsicei,” tenen eterebkwinsin. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun aibweyabwe Israel yala nang mutuk Mesir kuramnyi asi lebdeibmou ura, Erci sunsi taruk taleboka bobaramwe. Ara, nun Nai biryi menengbaramwe duwa biriman aryi nun aibweyabwe nirya asi bobindoka kalingnamwe. Bobindoka kalingnamuryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi ilila mekwan me bokeiboka cebdeibmou uca, nun aibweyabwe ab sun mabwe silib ababyi nirya aryi ilila mekwan bis kourbinmai.

Nun aibweyabwe nirya asi Er Imtamnyi biryi Musa biriman aryi lebdeibmou deyok aryi, a nang nirya ara Musa si deici aryi me dongon nang ato kibmai uca, Musa miliramnyi nang kibmai ati ebman. Ara, Musa biryi sunsi lebdeiboka bobaramwe ba, nun aibweyabwe nirya ara menengbaramwe duwa asi miliramiryi, ilila mekwan me kourbinmai.
Ura, nun aibweyabwe ara ninyi kun kum mutuk kuramiryi, sun nirya ara neik yina akwa yiramiryi, imtam aryi kuboka yina yiramnyi.

Tonda, a nang nirya ara neik me akwe yiramiryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi kareramwe me yiramnyi. A me ara Er Imtamnyi biryi kareramwe keil aryi kuboka anaramwe. A keil ara nun Du Yesus Kristus kuramuryi, nun aibweyabwe asi tuba-tuba miliramwe ati ebman.

Nun aibweyabwe ab sun mabwe silib nirya ab ara Er Imtamnyi biryi kareramwe me ab yin dinyi ab yiramnyi bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto ati, “Ni li,” teneramwe. Ara, nun aibweyabwe ilinto aryi Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi kuramnyi deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Nun li,” teneramuryi, diboka weneramwe. Diboka weneramwe uca, a nang ara dibsekde baramnyi uca, sun nong ara ninyi kun kum mutuk aryi kuboka bisik ai noutam aryi dantam-dantam kuboka saksekmai.

Ura, nun aibweyabwe kuramnyi to ara nunda ukuryok kubde baramib nang aryi diboka teneibibiryok, “Nunbabyi neik dinyi ukuboka malyi kun dinyi kubibyei,” tenebkwayeb. Ati, nun aibweyabwe aryi, “Malyi dinyi yuk-yuk kunubtibyi,” tenen kunubde baramnyi to, nunbabyi neiktoto ukubibyei.

Nun aibweyabwe kankan asi ton nang ara kwemdina molon nang kuramnyi ati, sunci, “Nunbabyi neiktoto kwemdina molon nang kibibyei,” tenen kalikdandarur. Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi nun aibweyabwe malyi kuramnyi deyok ati ato eboka kerek sekeibmou. “Sun Israel yala nang ara, ‘Yina yibkwayeb, me yibkwayeb,’ tenen bukmai. Sirya yibmai ani, sunci tikokmai ura, mot seboka kwemdina molobmai.”

Tonda, nun aibweyabwe kankan asi ton nang ara talyi ati yordaramnyi ati, nunci, “Nunbabyi neiktoto talyi yobdabibyei,” tenena teleb. Uki tentok tum aryi berekmou ura, ninyi yubwa-yubwa yuryibina welebina ilinto aryi talyi yobdanmai ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi weneboka ninyi dua puluh tiga ribu baryi obmou.

Nun aibweyabwe kankan asi ton nang ara, “Malyi kun dinyi kunubde baramibyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi minola kum wenebkwansir,” tenen ukurderamiryi malyi dinyi ukuramnyi. Ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Wenebkwan,” tenen arukdeibmou uca, yu kwatima ilinto aryi yandoka si tobmai uca, ninyi ilinto dibsekmai. Ati, ni kwityabwe, sunci, “Nunbabyi neiktoto nun Du Yesus Kristus urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kubibyi uca, nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi wenebsicei,” tenen sundamnyi kalikdandarur

Tonda, nun aibweyabwe kankan aryi ton nang ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi tikeibmou uca kalingnansing nang uram tuba kum kekebkwayeb,” eramnyi. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Wenebkwan,” tenen arukdeibmou uca, Er Uram eryuryangan nang kankan asi tonyi biryi imtam aryi kuboka yuryanmou ura, a nang nirya asi obsekmou. Ati, ni kwityabwe, sunci, “Nunbabyi neiktoto ato malyi kun dinyi kubibyei,” tenen kalikdandarur.

Nun aibweyabwe aryi wenen dinyi dororamnyi ara nunda ukuryok kubde banub nang aryi diboka teneibkwayeb. Ara, “Nunbabyi neiktoto malyi dinyi kunubtibyi uca, neiktoto wenen dinyi dobdobibyei,” tenebkwayeb. Ati, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi nun aibweyabwe kuramnyi to nirya asi kerek sekeibmai ara nunda sirya kobdob talak aryi kubde baramib nang ati, “Malyi dinyi kum kunubting,” tenen kerek sekeibmai.

Ati, ni kwityabwe, sunci sundamnyi ati, “Malyi tenen dinyi nun kanya dam anabsici ababyi nunci malyi kun dinyi katabum eboka bisik sekwayeb,” tenebdamunyi ababyi, sunci sundamnyi kalikdandarur. “Sun, ‘Katabum eboka Er Imtamnyi bisi milinub,’ tenerdan nang ababyi sundamnyi kalikdandoka malyi dinyi dobdobingnyei,” tenen ato ebman.

Ura, “Kanbabyi malyi dinyi dobdobdum,” tenen dinyi ara sun kanya dam yuk-yuk asi weksici ababyi sunci ilil kanya bobmunyei. Ato tenen dinyi ara yuk nang kanya ababyi wengdur ati ebman. Ati, sunci, “Malyi tenen dinyi ara bisik sekmanto kum dinyi ni kanya wekmanir se,” ebmunyei. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Erci ebdeibmou to diboka kunurutnyi biryi sunsi milibkwansir. Ati, nun Nai biryi, “Ato-ato kubmunyi ura, malyi kun dinyi muna kibdongobkwandum,” eboka sunsi lak eterebkwansir. Ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi lak eterebsici dinyi kunubmunyi uca, sunci katabum kanya boboka malyi kun dinyi bisik sekdarur.
Ni kwityabwe. Er Imtamnyi biryi sun kwemdina molon nang asi wenerur deyok aryi, sunci, “Kwemdina dinyi molobibyei,” tenen kwemdina molon dinyi kisibdobdarur.
Sunda bikdob nang kurandum deyok aryi, sunci ni ebmasin uram ati, “Bikdob en uram ebmasir do kum do?” tenen lilibmun ci, wibdeibdarur.

Nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Nun Du biryi nunti dibmasou,” tenen roti toboka yiramibiryi, co du yung yiramib. Ara, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ebibiryi, moyok doboka co du yung yiramib. Ara, nunci co du yiramib ara, “Nun Du Er ining diksakmou ara nunda Er dam kun nang ati diksakmasou,” tenen yiramib. Tonda, nunci roti toboka yiramib ara, “Nun Du Erdamnyi karebdandoka dibmou ara nunda Er dam kun nang ati dibmasou,” tenen yiramib.

Nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa antanibdeibsou nang kunub deyok aryi, nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa nong tentok ato kunub. Ara, nun nirya ara ninyi ilinto kunub bok, nong tentok ato kunub. A deyok aryi, nunci, “Nunda dib tenen nang yuk-yuk kunub bok, nunda nun Du Yesus biriman aryi nong tentok ato kunub,” tenen roti tentok akwe toboka tonkwa yiramib.

Ni kwityabwe, Sunci, “Sun Israel yala nang ara Musa Uram tuba kunubde baraming nang aryi una kuboka Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deiriraming do?” tenebdarur. Sun Israel yala nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deiriraming ba, sunci dama asi sengnaming ura, dama sekdoba ton dinyi Er Imtamnyi bisi deiriramingiryi, dama sekdoba yuk dinyi asi yiraming ati ebman. Ara, sunci, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kunub,” tenen sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin dinyi sekdoba ton yiraming.

Ura, sun kwemdina molon dinyi asi dama deiboka dama sekdoba yiraming nang ara ato dinyi kuramingiryi, sundamnyi kwemdina molon dinyi dam kun nang kimdaramingiryi. Ati, niryi, “Kwemdina molon dinyi ara mikib dinyi kurur,” tenen ato ebman do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, niryi, “Kwemdina molon dinyi asi dama deirin dinyi ara mikib dinyi,” tenen ato ebman do?

Ato tenen kum. Kwemdina molon dinyi ab kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin dinyi ab ara talyi dinyi akwe kurur ati ebman. Ba, sun kwemdina molon nang aryi dama deiriraming ara Er Imtamnyi bisi dama kum deiriraming. Erda, isa asi dama deiriraming. Ba, sunda Korintus nang ara nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kurandum deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Isa dam kun nang kibdangnyei,” tenen, “Yuk nang aryi kwemdina molon dinyi asi dama deibmangnyi dama sekdoba asi yibingnyei,” tenesunun.

Sunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kurandum deyok aryi, sunci sundamnyi isa dam kun nang kibdamunyei. Sunci nun Du Yesus Er tub ab ining ab yirandum deyok aryi, sunci isa asi yangabde deirirban dinyi aryi yibmunyei.

Ba, nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Nun Du biryi yu weik kibsute ara malyi,” tenebtibiryok, kwemdina molon dinyi asi dama deiboka yibtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, nunci, “Kwemdina dinyi asi dama deiboka yibtibyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum wenebsute,” tenebtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Nunci nundamnyi ati, “Nunda mikib nang kunub ati Er Imtamnyi bisi bisik sektibyi uca, muna kibtibyi,” tenebtibyi do? Ato tenen kum.

Nunda dib tenen nang ara tabwe lobdeibsou nang kunub deyok aryi, nunci nun kanya dam aryi teleb tenebmabyi dinyi du moun dinyi asi ur kunurantibyi. Ato ebman bok, nun tenebmabyi dinyi utotoa nirya ara du moun dinyi kum kurur ati, nunci ato dinyi kunubibyei. Du moun kum dinyi kunubmatibyi uca, nunsi teleb kum kubdeibmasute. Tonda, nun tenebmabyi dinyi utotoa nirya ara nun kwityabwe dib tenen dinyi asi katabum erdeirin dinyi kum kurur.
Nunda dib tenen nang ara tabwe lobdeibsou nang kunub cok, nunci, “Nundamnyi teleb kibdeibdankwayeb,” tenen kubibyei. Erda, “Nun kwityabwe yuk nang asi teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen kunubde binkwanub.

Ati, sunci, “Dengtamurdan dam bindoka bisam tub dekwayeb,” tenebmun ci, sunci bisam tub ur dekdarur. Ara, “A bisam tub ara kwemdina molon dinyi asi dama deibmang do kum do?” tenen kum asibdemun ci, sunci ur dekoka yibdarur.
Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato eboka sekeiamnyi.
“Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi im dangna tukwe dangna nirya kikniamwe deyok aryi, utotoa nirya Er dinyi kurur.”
A deyok aryi, sunci, “Bisam tuba nirya ababyi Er Imtamnyi dinyi kurur,” tenen bisam tub ur dekyibdarur.

Tonda, dib tenen kum nang aryi, “Yina tonkwa yibkwayeb,” eboka sunsi du dongobmasingnyi ura, sunci sun yangabsingnyi yina nirya asi ur yibdarur. Ara, “A yina asi kwemdina asi dama deibmang do kum do?” eboka asirdena mem. Erda, sunci, “Ur do mem do?” tenen asirden dinyi kum asibdemun ci, a yina asi ur yibdarur.

Ba, tonyi biryi, “A yina ara kwemdina asi deibmang yina kubmar,” eboka lak ebsici uca, sunci a yina yibmunyei. Ara, “Nunci yibtibyi uca, nun kwit lak ebmaranyi bibabyi miliboka yibci uca, nunci ersi malyi kibdeibtibyi,” tenen sunci a yina yibmunyei. Ara, sun kwit biryi sirya yibte uca, erci er kanya dam aryi, “Kwemdina dama deirin dinyi yibman ara kwemdina molonanyi bitonyi kibdanman se,” tenebte ati ato ebman.

Ura, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “Kwemdina asi dama deirin dinyi ababyi ur yinmanuba,” tenen bingdamun bok, sun kwit dib tenenanyi biryi sunsi, “A yina ara kwemdina asi deibmang yina kubmar,” eboka lak ebsici ura, sunci a yina asi yibmunyei. Ara, anyi biryi er kanya dam aryi, “Mem,” tenerur deyok aryi sunci a yina yibmunyei. Ba, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “A dinyi ara mem dinyi kuma,” tenen bikmun ba, sun, “A dinyi ara mem dinyi,” tenen nang aryi sunti, “Manmalibmang se,” tenebsingnyei. Sunda tabwe lobdeibsou nang kundarur deyok aryi, yuk nang aryi dibliliboka, “Manmalibmang se,” tenebsingnyei.

Ura, nunci, “Yina yibkub,” tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Kanci a yina asi karebmasirim ati, ei nun Nai,” ebibyi asi yuk nang aryi, “Kwemdina asi dama deirin yina yibmarum ati manmalibmarim se,” eboka tatab-tatab ebsingnyei.

Ati, nunci, “Yina yibkub,” tenebibyi ababyi, “Me yibkub,” tenebtibyi ababyi, “Yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi kubkwayeb,” tenebibyi ababyi, nunci, “Yuk nang aryi, ‘Er Imtamnyi bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur,’ tenen bikwaming ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to kunubde binkwayeb,” tenen kubkwayeb.

Ura, sunci, “Ninyi nirya ara nun Du Yesus bisi milibting,” tenen sunci sundamnyi kalikdamun ci, yuk nang aryi, “Mem,” tenen dinyi kubmunyei. Ara, “Sun Yahudi yala nang ababyi, sun Yahudi yala kum nang ababyi, nun Du bisi milibting,” teneramun ci, sundamnyi kalikdandarur. Tonda, “Sun dib tenen nang ababyi nun Du bisi tanglona kum uca milibting,” teneramun ci, sundamnyi kalikdandarur. Ara, sunci yuk nang aryi, “Mem,” tenen dinyi kurandum asi a nang ababyi miliboka kubingnyi ura, a nang ara, “Malyi dinyi kubmab se,” tenen sundamnyi lukoka obdankwaming. A deyok aryi sunci sundamnyi kalikdamun ci, yuk nang aryi, “Mem,” tenen dinyi kubmunyei ati ebman.

Ni Paulus bira, “Yuk nang aryi Er Imtamnyi lemsin dinyi dobdobting,” tenena akwe kunun cok, niryi tanglona kum uca ninyi nirya asi teleb kibdeibde banun. Ati, niryi, “Nidamnyi asi teleb kibdeibdankwan,” tenen kum kunun. Erda, “Yuk nang asi teleb kibdeibkwan,” tenena akwe kunun. Ara, niryi, “Yuk nang asi teleb kibdeibnyi uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi lemsin dinyi dobdobting,” tenen kubde banun. Ura, niryi ato tenen kunubde banun to, sunbabyi neiktoto sun yuk nang asi teleb kibdeibdarur.

Ni kwityabwe. Nun Du Kristus biryi, “Nidamnyi teleb kubdeibdankwan,” tenen kum kuramwe. Erda, Erci yuk nang ati, “Lebdeibkwan,” tenen Erdamnyi karebdanmou. Ura, ni Paulus bibabyi neiktoto, “Nidamnyi teleb kubdeibdankwan,” tenen kum kunun. Erda, “Yuk nang asi teleb kubdeibkwan,” tenen busul kuboka ingkiringnun. Ati, niryi ato kuboka nun Du Yesus kubde banmou to milibde banun to, sunbabyi neiktoto ni kubde banun to milibdarur.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sunci ni etereransise to tuba-tuba tenerandum ati niryi sunti, “Ni kwityabwe,” tenen kisal dakmasin. Tonda, niryi ebmuruboka sunsi nun Du Yesus deyok ati dib en uram etereransise asi sunci diboka talerandau ani, ukuryok ababyi talerandum ati, niryi sunsi kisal dakmasin.

Ba, ukuryok ara niryi, “Bikting,” tenen dib en uram ton eterebtabakwinsin. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira kisok atonyi kurur ba, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira Er amwetam bunanyi kurur. Ba, nun Du Kristus bira kisok atonyi kurur ba, sun sal nang ara Er amwetam bun nang ato kunung. Ba, sun akenyabwe ara kisok ato nang kunung ba, nerabwe ara sun amwetam bunung.

Sun sal nang ara, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molobkwayeb,” tenebingnyi kum, “Er Imtamnyi Uram ebmurubkwayeb,” tenebingnyi kum, sunci sun kisok kalubmangiryi, molobingnyei. Erda, sun kisok kaluna langakeibmangiryi, molobkwanung. Tonda, sun kisok kaluna langakeibmangiryi, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebmurubkwanung. Sal ara sun kisok kalubtingiryi molobting ura, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus bira sal nang kisok atonyi bisi ina ngilikting.

Ba, nerabwe ara, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molobkwayeb,” tenebingnyi kum, “Er Imtamnyi Uram ebmurubkwayeb,” tenebingnyi kum, sunci sun kisok kalubmangiryi, molobkwanung. Ati, sunci kisok kaluna langakeibmangiryi, molobingnyei. Tonda, sun kisok kaluna langakeibmangiryi, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebmurubingnyei. Nerabwe ara sun kisok kaluna langakeibtingiryi molobting ura, sunci sun akenyabwe ara nerabwe kisok ato nang asi ina ngilikting. Ara, sun kisok otong komdaraming nerabwe ara ina ngilikman dinyi kuboka sundamnyi komdaraming to, sun kisok kaluna langakeibmangiryi, moloramingnyi nerabwe ababyi neiktoto ina ngilikman dinyi kubting.

Sun kisok kaluna kum nerabwe ara ina ngilikman dinyi kuraming ati ebman. Ato kun nerabwe ara, “Sal nang aryi kubde banung to milibtibyi,” teneraming ati, sun kisok otong ababyi kobdating se. Sun otong sekoka kobdangnyi nerabwe ton sun kisok kaluna kum nerabwe ababyi ara ina ngilingna dinyi kuraming ati, sunci sun kisok kalubkwanung ati ebman.

Sal nang ara sun kisok kalubingyei. Sal nang ara Er Imtamnyi kurur to kisok ato nang kuraming deyok aryi, sunci sun kisok kalubingnyei. Tonda, sal nang ara, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi amwetam bunub,” tenen Er Imtamnyi mikib lak kibkwanung deyok aryi, sunci sun kisok kalubingyei. Ba, nerabwe ara, “Nunda nun akenyabwe amwetam bunub,” tenen sun akenyabwe mikib lak kibkwanung deyok aryi, sunci sun kisok kalubkwanung ato ebman.

Er Imtamnyi biryi minob ura ninyi kikniamuryi, Erci ner asi minob kum kikniamwe. Tonda, ner yacok aryi kuboka Erci sal kum kikniamwe. Erda, nun Nai biryi sal asi minob kiknibmou ura, Erci sal yacok aryi kuboka ner kiknibmou. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Nerabwe ara sal nang mikib asi lak kibkwanung,” ebman.
Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi sal ab ner ab kiknibmou ci, Erci, “Sal ara ner amwetam bunanyi kubdur,” tenen kum kiknibmou. Erda, Erci, “Ner ara sal amwetam bukwanung,” tenen sal ab ner ab kiknibmou.

Ati, sun nerabwe ara sal amwetam buraming deyok aryi, sunci sundamnyi luknubdongobdamiryok, sun kisok kalubkwanung. Ara, sun nerabwe aryi, “Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molobkwayeb,” tenebingyi kum, “Er Imtamnyi Uram ebmurubkwayeb,” tenebingnyi kum, sunci sun kisok kalubmangiryok, sun tenebmangnyi tok kunubkwanung. Tonda, sun nerabwe ara, “Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang ina ngilikibyei,” tenen sun kisok kalubmangiryok, Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwanung.

Ba, nun Du Yesus biryi teleb tenesurur to, sun nerabwe ab sun sal nang ab ara yuk-yuk tingna kum kunung. Ara, sal kum kurante uca, ner ababyi kum kurante. Ba, nerabwe kum kuranting uca, sal ababyi kum kuranting ati ebman.

Er Imtamnyi biryi ninyi kiknibmasou ba, Erci sal asi minob kiknibmou ura, sal yacok aryi kuboka ner asi aminda kiknibmou. Ato ebman bok, sun sal nang yuk nang nirya ara sun kwinyabwe aryi deiriraming. Ara, yuma kobdob aryi sal yacok aryi kuboka ner kiknibmou to, aminda ara nerabwe aryi kuboka sal deiriramnyi ani, ukuryok tuba deiriraming. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Sal ner ara yuk-yuk tingna kum kuraming,” ebmasin. Ba, a dinyi nirya kiknisurutnyi bira nun Nai Imtamnyi tentok kurur.

Ati, sunci sun kanya dam diboka tenebmunci wibdeibdarur. Nerabwe ara kisok kaluna kum uca Er Imtamnyi bisi molobting ara teleb dinyi do? Sunci, “Ato dinyi ara teleb do kum do?” tenen diboka lilibdate uca, sunci, “Ato kun dinyi ara teleb dinyi kuma,” eboka wibdeibdate ati ebmasin.

Sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang nirya ara sun kanya dam yuk aryi ato tenen bingnub. “Sal nang ara sun kisok otong kum sekdatingnyi uca, cang otong borantingnyi ura, nerabwe ato kuranting. Ato kun dinyi ara alyi kimdeirin dinyi kurur.” Ninyi nirya ara a dinyi tenen bingnung.

Ba, “Nerabwe ara cang otong boraming ara teleb dinyi kurur,” tenen ababyi ninyi nirya aryi bingnub. Er Imtamnyi biryi karebmou uca, otong cang dinyi ara nerabwe kisok kalun dinyi ato kurur. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Nerabwe ara cang otong boraming ara teleb dinyi kurur,” ebmasin.

Ura, sun Korintus nang kankan asi ton nang aryi, “Ato kubde ban dinyi milina nun li,” eboka lulubdatingnyi ura, niryi sun ato kun nang asi ato ebmasin. “Nunda nun Du Yesus bisi wa irmilin nang nirya ara ato kubde ban dinyi miliramib. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi naboka bulubdeibsou nang ara dantam-dantam nirya buluramingnyi nang nirya ara ato kubde ban dinyi miliraming,” ebmasin.

Ni kwityabwe. Niryi sunsi, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” en uram yuk-yuk ebtabakoka arukdeibkwinsin. Arukdeibkwinsin cok, niryi sunsi kisal dangsina uram ton kum ebtabakwinsin. Sunda dib tenen nang ara tonkwa bulurandum cok, sunci sun mamun asi teleb kum kurdeirirdarandum. Erda, sunci malyi kiminingdan dinyi akwe kimdeirirandum. A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi kisal dangsina uram kum ebtabakwinsin.

Yuma kobdob ebkwinsin uram ara ato. Sunda dib tenen nang ara, “Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molobkwayeb,” tenen neik dam buluryanmarum cok, sunci neik kanya bona kum uca buluryangarandum, se. Erda, sunci lulubdandoka yuk-yuk bongdarandum ati ni kekebmase. Ato eboka nukmasei uram kekebmasiryi, niryi, “Ton dinyi ara diba ati eboka nukmanei,” tenenun. Ba, “Yuk dinyi ara talyi ati eboka nukmanei darib,” tenenun.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ton nang ara dobdobkwan ba, yuk nang asi kum dobdobkwan ati lak kibdeibkwan,” tenesurur uca, sun Teleb Uram keken nang kankan ababyi ninyi yuk-yuk bongdaraming. Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ninyi tenen dinyi ara yukto-yukto kurur ati lak kibdeibkwan,” tenesurur uca, ato kuboka yuk-yuk bongdana dinyi ara bisik sekmanto kum kurur ati ebman.

Ura, sunci, “Nun Du Er tub ab ining ab yibkwayeb,” tenen buluryamunyi ura, sunci, “Nun Du biryi Erdamnyi karebdandoka nunsi lebdeibmasou,” tenen diboka kum teneirirandum. Ati, sunci nun Du Yesus Er tub ab ining ab diboka kum yirandum ati ebman.

Sunci, “Yina yibtibyi se,” tenen talyi ati akwe yirandum ati ebman. Sunci, “Nunda dib tenen nang antaniboka nisintum yibkwayeb,” tenen kum yirandum. Erda, ton nang ara yuk nang asi dibde buna kum uca sun mining yina bobmarum asi minola yirsengnandum. Ba, yuk nang ara yin dinyi bona kum nang aminda aryi yamingnyi bok, yina tuba kum kubde ati, yina kum doyiraming. Ati, sunci nun Du Yesus Er tub ab ining ab diboka kum yirandum. Erda, ton nang aryi anggur du yung ilinto yibingnyi uca, walina taleraming ba, yuk nang ara roti kum yibingnyi ati kwaning atan tuba kurande.

Sunda sun ai yuk-yuk tuba kurandum ci, sun mining yina ur yibdarur. Ba, sun dib tenen nang yuk nang nirya ab tonkwa buluramunyi ba, yina talyi yibmunyei se. Erda, sunci sun dib tenen nang yuk nang ab tonkwa yibmun ci, “Nun Du biryi nunsi lebdeibmasou,” tenebdarur. Talyi yibmunyi ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi naboka bulubdeibsou nang asi ina ngilingnandum se. Ara, sunci talyi yibmunyi ura, sunci sun dib tenen nang kankan kuboka kwaning atan nang asi ina ngilingnandum se. Ati, niryi sunsi una ebkwansin do? Niryi sunsi kisal dakwansin do? Ato tenen kum.

Ura, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi eterebmanou to, niryi ebmuruboka sunbabyi etereransise ani, ukuryok ababyi tamuboka eterebkwinsin. Ara, nun Du Yesus dibkwamwe uki tum berekmou kum bok, nun Du ab Er miliramnyi nang amolbaryi ab ai wekoka bulubmai ci, yina tonkwa yibmai. Ara, lukunda kubmou ba, kikibkwamunyi biryi nun Du Yesus bisi kikibkwamwe bok, nun Du ab Er miliramnyi nang ab tonkwa kubmai ci, yina yibmai. Yina yibkoi cok, nun Du biryi roti dobtalebmou.

Roti dobtalebmou ci, nun Du Yesus biryi Er Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei, Ni Nai,” ebmou. Sirya ebmou ura, Erci a roti asi tobmou ci, Er miliramnyi nang asi ato ebmou. “A roti ara Ni nong a kunum. Niryi Nidamnyi sunti karebdankwansin ati, sunci a roti asi doyibdobdarur,” ebmou. “Ati, aminda kubde binkwandum ababyi sunci Nisi teneibnumun ci, roti asi toboka doyibde binkwandarur,” ebmou.

Ura, roti sirya doyibmai ura, nun Du biryi neiktoto moyok dobtalebmou ci, ato ebmou, “A moyok umbura aryi anggur du yung ara Ni ining a kunum. Niryi Ni ining sunti diksakwansin ati, sunci a anggur du yung asi doyibdarur,” ebmou. “Niryi sunti dibkwamasin biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi mururdeirisin dinyi ukuryok dinyi karebkwansir,” ebmou. Ebmou cok, Erci, “A moyok biriman aryi Niryi antanirdeirin dinyi ukuryok dinyi kiklibdeiboka lak kibdeibmasin,” ebmou. Ati, Erci, “Sunci Nisi teneibnumun ci, a moyok asi dobtaleboka yibde binkwandarur,” ebmou.
Ati, sunci ato kuboka a roti ab anggur du yung ab yibde barandum ci, sunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Nunti dibmasou,” tenen lak kibde binkwandum. Lak ebde baramunyi ani, nun Du Yesus tamuboka yankwande.

Ati, unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus bisi diboka kum teneibingiryok, roti ab anggur du yung ab talyi yiramingnyi ura, a nang ara nun Du Yesus Er nong ab Er ining ab ati, “Talyi dinyi aca,” tenen ina ngilingnamingiryi.
Ati, nunci, “Nun Du bisi teneibkwayeb ati roti ab co du yung ab yibkwayeb,” tenebibiryi, nunci nun kanya asi kiknibdeiboka, “Nun Du bisi diboka teneinub do kum do?” tenebibiryi, yibkwanub.

Unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus bisi diboka kum teneibingiryi, roti ab co du yung talyi yiramingnyi nang ara wenen dinyi dobdobkwaming. A deyok aryi, nunci nun kanya asi kiknibdeibiniryi, yibkwanub ati ebman.

Ni kwityabwe. Sun kankan ninyi ilinto ara yun talerande. Tonda, ninyi ilinto ara mitang kuransir. Tonda, yuk nang ara sirya dibmang. A dinyi nirya ara wenesin dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ara, sunci nun Du Yesus bisi diboka kum teneirirandum ci, roti ab co du yung ab talyi yirandum deyok aryi, wenesin dinyi sun dam yanmar uca, ninyi ilinto yun talerande ba, yuk nang sirya dibmang.
Ba, sunci sun kanya asi kiknibdeiboka, “Nun Du bira nunti dibmasou ara diboka teneinub do kum do?” tenerdaramunyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenen dinyi kum karebkwansir.

Er Imtamnyi bira nunda dib tenen nang asi wenen dinyi karebsici ababyi, Erci, “Sun malyi kurmurun nang asi iya wenen dinyi kareboka wenenun to wenebkwan,” tenen kum wenesurur. Erda, Erci, “Bitabdeibnyi uca, Ni uram kunubde biting,” tenen tiya wenen dinyi akwe karesurur.
Ati, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Sunci, “Nun Du bisi teneibkwayeb ati roti ab co du yung ab yibkwayeb,” tenebmunyi uca, sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang dibde bukmunyi ura, antaniboka yibdarur.

Ura, sun kankan asi ton nang ara kwaning atarante ura, a nang ara sun ai tuba kubingiryi, yibmangnyi ura, sunci sun dib tenen nang yuk nang kankan aryi yandoka nun Du Yesus Er tub ab ining ab tonkwa yibkwanung. Ati, sunci, “Nun Du Er tub ab ining ab talyi yibtibyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunda bulubmab nang wenebsicei,” tenen ato kubdarur.
Ura, ni Paulus sun dam sirya yanmanyi ura, niryi, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka ebtabakwansin.

Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang, ukuryok ebkwinsin uram ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi, “Ni wa irmilibting,” tenen nunda dib tenen nang yuk-yuk asi mikib dinyi yuk-yuk asi karebde basurur ati uram ebkwinsin. Ati, niryi sunti, “Imtam aryi kuboka karebde basurur mikib dinyi yuk-yuk ati diboka bikting,” tenen eterebkwinsin.

Minob ura sunda Er Imtamnyi biti walwal nang kurandau. A talak aryi kunubde barandau to sunci tubto teneibdarur. A kubde barandau talak ara kwemdina molon nang aryi sunsi bowaningminingnansei uca, sunbabyi kwemdina dinyi molorandau. Kwemdina dinyi ara talyi dinyi uram sisikman kum dinyi kurur bok, sunci molobde barandau. A talak ara isa aryi sun kanya bowaningminingnansou.

Sunda kwemdina molon nang kurandau deyok aryi, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karebsute uca, Er wa irmilibkwayeb ati mikib dinyi yuk-yuk dobdobtibyi,” tenen kum bikmandau. A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi a deyok ati eterebkwinsin. Sun dib tenen kum nang ara nun Du Yesus biti, “Erda malinyi kurur ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi Ersi wenebdur,” eraming. Ati, unanyi-unaner aryi ato dinyi ebingnyi uca, a nang ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi ato kum ebting. Erda, isa kanya boboka ato dinyi eraming. Bok, sun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus biti, “Nun Arungdeirisurutnyi,” eraming. Ati, unanyi-unaner aryi ato dinyi ebingnyi uca, a nang ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi ato eraming. Isa kanya bon dinyi deib aryi ato kum ebting ati ebman.

Nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara imtam aryi kuboka Er Imtamnyi wa irmilina ati mikib dinyi yuk-yuk doronub. Mikib dinyi yuk-yuk doronub bok, a mikib dinyi yuk-yuk nirya asi karesurutnyi bira Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus tentok kurur.
Tonda, nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus wa irmiliramibiryi, yuk wa-yuk wa ibde baramib. Yuk wa-yuk wa ibde baramib bok, nun wa takurdeirisurutnyi bira nun Du Yesus tentok kurur.

Tonda, nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara Er Imtamnyi mikib deici aryi ilil tenen dinyi yuk-yuk kikniramib. Ilil tenen dinyi yuk-yuk kikniramib bok, mikib yuk-yuk nirya asi karesurutnyi bira nun Nai Imtamnyi tentok kurur.

Ura, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara nunda dib tenen nang nirya asi mikib dinyi yuk-yuk karesurur ara Roh Kudus wa ina ati lak kimdeirin dinyi yuk-yuk karesurur. Ati, nunci, “Nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenebkwamib ati, Erci nunsi mikib dinyi yuk-yuk karebmasou.

Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi ton nang asi mikib dinyi ton dinyi karebmou uca, a nang ara bikdob dinyi bikoka yuk nang asi lak etereraming. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi yuk dinyi karebmou uca, a nang ara lak kum kuanci dinyi bikoka yuk nang asi lak etereraming. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus tentok biriman aryi a dinyi yuk-yuk karesurur.

Tonda, yuk nang asi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi mikib kuboka dib tenen dinyi mikib karebmou uca, a nang aryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ilil tenen dinyi diboka kiknibkwande,” tenen dibde buraming. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi karebmou uca, a nang aryi sun yun yin nang utotoa asi kweteraming. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus tentok biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi a mikib dinyi yuk-yuk asi karesurur.

Ura, yuk nang asi Er Imtamnyi Kanya aryi mikib karebmou uca, ilil tenen dinyi utotoa kikniraming. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi yuk dinyi asi karebmou uca, a nang aryi Er Imtamnyi ebdeibmaci uram ebmuruboka lak eraming. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi yuk dinyi karebmou uca, a nang aryi, “Ato en uram ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus uram,” tenen bingnung. Tonda, “Ato uram ara isa uram,” tenen bingnung. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi yuk dinyi karebmou uca, a nang ara ilila uram tukwe nang aryi bingna kum uram yuk-yuk deib aryi Er Imtamnyi si weik eraming. Tonda, yuk nang asi mikib dinyi yuk dinyi karebmou uca, a nang ara ilila uram yuk-yuk bikingiryok, nunda tukwetam nang uram deib aryi lak etereraming.

A imtam aryi kuboka karesin dinyi nirya ara yuk-yuk kurur bok, a dinyi nirya asi kareboka wa isurutnyi bira Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus tentok a kurur. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi teleb tenebmaci tok, Erci nunda dib tenen nang yuk-yuk asi mikib dinyi ton mikib dinyi ton yuk-yuk karesurur.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, kiklina uram ton doboka eterebkwinsin. Ninyi kisok ara yuk. Ninyi taruk ara yuk. Ninyi yan ara yuk. Ato dinyi nirya yuk-yuk kurur bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi a dinyi nirya antanibdongoboka kiknibmasou uca, nong tentok akwe kunub. Ura, nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto tentok akwe kunub. Ara, nunda nun Du Yesus bisi milin nang nirya ara yuk-yuk kunub cok, nun nirya ara neik kanya boboka nong tentok ato kunub.

Nun Du biryi nunsi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi karebmasou ara neik kanya kareboka antanibdeibsou uca, nong tentok ato kibmoubwe. Ara, sun Yahudi yala nang ababyi, sun Yunani yala nang ab, yuk yala nang ababyi, yuk-yuk bokdanmoubwe ani, imtam aryi kuboka neik kanya akwe dobdobmoubwe uca, antaniboka kunub. Tonda, sun ninyi aryi arukmangnyi tok ikin wa bon nang ababyi, sun ikin wa bona kum nang ababyi, yuk-yuk bokdanmoubwe ani, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus neik kanya akwe langdeiboka dobdobmoubwe uca, nunda antaniboka nong tentok ato kunub.
