Ura, ninyi nong ara tentok akwe kurur bok, ninyi nong antanirdongon kiknin dinyi ara tentok akwe kum kurur. Erda, ninyi nong antanirdongon kiknibmasou dinyi ara mitik kum kurur. Ninyi kisok ara yuk. Tonda, ninyi taruk ara yuk. Tonda, ninyi yan ara yuk.

Ati, ninyi yan aryi, “Nunda ninyi yan akwe kununum deyok aryi, teleb dinyi ara ninyi nong kobdob dinyi diboka kum kununum,” ebdengnyei. Tonda, “Ninyi taruk ara nunda ninyi yan asi bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kururung cok, ninyi nong kobdob dinyi diboka kururung,” tenebdengnyei. Ninyi yan ababyi teleb dinyi kurur cok, ninyi nong kobdob dinyi diboka kurur ati ebman.

Tonda, ninyi amol ababyi, “Nunda ninyi amol akwe kununum deyok aryi, nunda teleb dinyi ara kisok kobdob dinyi diboka kum kununum,” ebdengnyei. Tonda, “Ninyi asing ara nunda ninyi amol asi bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kururung cok, ninyi kisok kobdob dinyi diboka kururung,” tenebdengnyei. Ninyi amol ababyi teleb dinyi kurur cok, ninyi kisok kobdob dinyi diboka kurur ati ebman.

Ninyi nong antanibdongoboka kiknibmasou dinyi ara asing dem kuransute ura, amol kum kuransute uca, nunda amol kum kekerantibyi. Ba, amol dem kuransute ura, nun uw kum kuransute uca, nunda uw kum kekerantibyi.
Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nong asi minob kiknibmasou ara Erci, “Ato-ato kuboka kiknibkwan,” teneamwe tok, antanirdongon dinyi yuk-yuk asi lilibdeiboka kiknikmasou.
Ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi yuk-yuk kum kurante ura, antanirdongon dinyi tentok akwe kurante ura, ninyi nong ababyi ton kum kurante.
Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kiknibmou uca, ninyi yan, taruk, kisok a nirya asi antanibdongobmou uca, ninyi nong ara tentok a kunum. Tonda, nunda dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto nong tentok ato kunub.
Asing ara taruk asi, “Kanci nisi teleb kum kubdeibnutum ati talyi dinyi akwe kurandim,” ebcei. Tonda, kisok ara yan asi, “Kanci nisi teleb kum kubdeibnutum ati talyi dinyi akwe kurandim,” ebcei.

Erda, nong antanirdongon dinyi ton dinyi ara ninyi aryi, “Mikib kum kurur,” teneramingnyi bok, a dinyi ara bikdob dinyi kurur. “Mikib kum kurur,” tenen dinyi ababyi kum kubsute ura, nun nong ara malyi kubsute. Ara, sun dib tenen nang kankan kuraming tukwetam bun nang ababyi neiktoto kunung. Dib tenen nang yuk nang aryi a nang ati, “Tukwetam bun nang aca,” teneraming bok, a nang ababyi bikdob nang kunung.

Tonda, nong antanirdongon dinyi ara, “Yuk nang urasintam aryi lak kibibyei,” tenen dinyi ara nunci tabakoka dirlilirdaramib. Ara, “Yuk nang urasintam aryi lak kibibyei,” tenen nun ongon aling ongoramib.

Ba, nong antanirdongon dinyi ara ninyi aryi, “Lak kibdankwayeb,” teneramingnyi dinyi ara nunci nunukaboka kum dirlirirdaramib. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun nong dinyi nirya antanibdeibmou cok, Erci ninyi aryi, “Bikdob kuma,” tenen dinyi asi bisibkaboka erebdeibmou.

Ara, nun Nai biryi, “Ninyi nong ara sekdandoka kuna mem,” tenebmou to, Erci nun nong asi antanibdongoboka kiknibmasou. Ara, “Ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi aryi mamun dibnilibdankwaming,” tenen kiknibdeibmasou. Ura, nunda dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto nun mamun dirnilibdankwanub.

Ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi tentok asi u yin dinyi talebci uca, mambul kuranci ura, ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi yuk dinyi nirya ababyi nisin u yirmururande. Ba, ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi tentok aryi ererdeirin dinyi dobdobci uca, ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi yuk dinyi nirya ababyi kilkil kanya boraming. Ura, nun dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto kuboka nun mamun dibnilibdankwayeb.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sunda dib tenen nang neiktoto ara nong tentok ato kurandum. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kurandum cok, neik kanya borandum ci, nong tentok ato kurandum. Nong tentok ato kurandum cok, sun yuk-yuk ara ninyi nong antanirdongon dinyi yuk-yuk ato kurandum.

Ara, sun dib tenen nang kankan aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi wa irmilin dinyi yuk-yuk karesurur. Ara, yuma kobdob tikeibmou ara nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram deyok kouboka eterebde ban nang asi tikeibmou. Ba, yuk nang asi wa irmilin dinyi bitinyi dinyi karebmou ba, nun Nai biryi Er aminda kubkwande dinyi ermurun nang asi tikeibmou. Ba, yuk nang asi wa irmilin dinyi winiryi dinyi karebmou ba, nun Nai biryi dib en uram liliboka eteren nang tikeibmou. Ba, sirya kobdob ara Erci wa irmilin dinyi yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi karebmou ci, yuk nang asi tikeibmou. Ara, ilil tenen dinyi kiknin nang asi tikeiboka karebmasou. Tonda, yun talen nang asi kweten nang asi tikeiboka karebmou. Tonda, sun yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ataranci nang asi bongkaren nang asi tikeiboka karebmasou. Tonda, yuk nang asi kalingna nang asi tikeiboka karebmasou. Tonda ilila uram ara yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram yuk-yuk deib aryi sisingnaming nang ababyi tikeiboka karebmasou.

Ura, nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara Teleb Uram deyok kouboka eterebde ban nang kunub do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, nun nirya ara Er Imtamnyi ebdeibmaci uram boban nang kunub do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, nun nirya ara dib en uram liliboka eteren nang kunub do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, nun nirya ara ilil tenen dinyi kikninub do? Ato tenen kum.

Nun nirya ara yun talen nang kwetenub do? Ato tenen kum. Nun nirya ara ilila uram ara yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi sisingnub do? Ato tenen kum. Nun nirya ara ilila uram deyok bikoka tukwetam nang uram deib aryi danguboka enub do? Ato tenen kum.

A imtam aryi kuboka karesin dinyi yuk-yuk nirya ara teleb dinyi akwe kurur bok, sunci busul kuboka, “Er Imtamnyi wa irmilina ati nunci mikib dinyi bisibkaboka iya bikdob dinyi dobdobtibyi,” tenen ingkirikdarur. Ara, “Sun dib tenen nang yuk nang asi katabum erdeirin dinyi nunukaboka ingkirikting,” tenen ato eboka ebdeibmasin.
Ba, ukuryok ara niryi sunsi yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi nirya asi bisibkaboka iya bikdob dinyi lak kibkwinsin.

Yuk nang asi boukwe kimna ara iya bikdob dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ati, nunci boukwe kimna kum uca, sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang aryi uram yuk-yuk nirya asi bikoka danguboka erantibiryok, nunci talyi uram en nang akwe kurantibyi. Tonda, nunci yuk nang asi boukwe kimna kum uca, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang aryi sisingnaming uram bikoka danguboka erantibyi ababyi, nunda talyi uram en nang akwe kurantibyi. Lonceng kum nyeng-nyeng erande dinyi yuk dinyi kum ara lilim weik lak erande bok, uram diboka kum erande deyok aryi, ninyi aryi, “Una ebmar do?” tenen kankana kuraming. Sun boukwe kimna kum uca sun kwityabwe aryi bingna kum uram sisingnamingnyi nang ababyi, neiktoto talyi dinyi akwe eraming ati ebman.

Tonda, nunci yuk nang asi boukwe kum kimnantibiryok, Er Imtamnyi ebdeibmaci uram nirya bikoka ninyi urasintam aryi bobarantibiryok, nunda talyi uram en nang ato akwe kurantibyi. Tonda, nunci yuk nang asi boukwe kum kimnantibiryok, dib en uram bikdob dinyi nirya liliboka bingnantibyi uca, nunda talyi uram en nang ato akwe kurantibyi. Tonda, nunci boukwe weik kimna kum uca, katabum eboka dib tenerantibyi uca, nunda talyi nang ato akwe kurantibyi. Ara, nunci dib tenena mikib weik biriman aryi mutuk kon asi, “Kisibdoboka yuk mutuk bina bukdobdum,” ebtibyi uca, mutuk kon kisibdoboka yuk mutuk bina bukdobmote ababyi, nunda yuk nang asi boukwe kimna kum nang kurantibyi deyok aryi, talyi nang ato akwe kurantibyi.

Tonda, nunci yuk nang asi boukwe kimna kum uca, nun taleramibyi bona bon dinyi nirya doboka sun bona bon kum nang asi karebtibyi ababyi, nunda talyi nang akwe kurantibyi. Tonda, nunci boukwe kimna kum uca, “Ninyi aryi domkiriksingnyi aryi nisi taleboka uk dam ur donoksiting,” tenerantibyi ababyi, ato tenen kun dinyi ara nunsi teleb kum kubdeibsute.

Ninyi boukwe kimnantibyi ara ninyi aryi nunsi mambul kimdeirisingnyi ababyi namin kanya borantibyi. Tonda, ninyi boukwe kimnantibyi ara yuk nang ati teleb kurdeirirantibyi. Sun boukwe weik kimna nang ara yu kanya boboka yuk nang ati, “Sun bi yuk teleb dinyi dororaming to, nun bi yuk dobdobtibyi se,” tenen kanya kum bonung. Tonda, boukwe kimna nang ara, “Nunda iya teleb nang kunub,” eboka sundamnyi ererdeirirdana kum kuraming. Tonda, a nang ara, “Nunda yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya teleb nang kunub,” tenerdana kum kuraming.

Boukwe kimna nang ara yuk nang asi uram kum yariraming. Tonda, “Ni dinyi akwe ingkirikwan,” tenerdana kum kuraming. Boukwe kimna nang ara yu dinyi minola kum teneraming. Yuk nang aryi malyi kun dinyi asi sunci sun kanya dam aryi tuba-tuba kum teneiriraming.
Boukwe kimna nang ara, “Malyi kun dinyi ara nun kanya teleb kimdeirisurur, tenena kum kuraming,” teneraming. Erda, “Dib dinyi akwe nun kanya teleb kimdeirisurur,” teneraming.

Boukwe kimna nang ara yuk nang ati, “Malyi dinyi kurantingnyi ababyi nunci alyi kibdongobibyei,” teneraming. A nang ara yuk nang ati, “Tola uram kum eraming,” teneramingiryi, sun kanya asi deiriraming. Sun boukwe kimna nang ara yuk nang ati, “Teleb dinyi ukubkwaming,” teneibde tuba-tuba dibde buraming. Mambul dinyi sun dam yangaci ababyi, sun boukwe weik kimnaming nang ara tanglona kum uca boukwe kimnaming.

Boukwe kimna dinyi ara sunglona kum uca iya kubkwande. Ba, “Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi ato-ato kubkwande,” ermuruna ara tiya dinyi akwe kurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi ninyi aryi bikman kum uram yuk-yuk asi lak ena ababyi tiya dinyi akwe kurande. Tonda, dib en uram bikdob dinyi bingna ababyi tiya dinyi akwe kurur. A ebmasin dinyi nirya ara kum dankwande bok, boukwe kimna dinyi ara iya kubkwande.

Nunda tukwetam tuba kuramib nang ara ton dinyi bingnub cok, yuk dinyi bingna kum kuramib. Tonda, nunci Er Imtamnyi ebdeibmaci dinyi ninyi urasintam aryi bobaramiryok, ton dinyi bikoka bobaramibiryok, yuk dinyi asi bingna kum kunub ati ninyi urasintam aryi bobana kum kuramib.
Ura, aminda kubde binkwayeb talak ara Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsici uca, sunglon dinyi nirya asi kum dankwande. Erda, sunglon kum dinyi akwe iya kubkwande.

Niryi kiklina uram ton doboka kiklibdeibkwinsin. Nunda minob ura mitik mabwe kuramaburyok, mitik mabwe uram akwe eboka sisingnamoubwe. Tonda, mitik mabwe tenen dinyi akwe teneramoubwe. Ani, nunda sirya nebdobmoubwe uca, nunci mitik mabwe uram takloboka nebdobingnyi nang uram akwe eboka sisingnamib. Tonda, mitik mabwe kubde baramoubwe to ababyi taklobmoubwe ura, nebdobingnyi nang kubde baramingnyi to akwe kunubde baramib.

Ukuryok kubde baramib ara sunglona kum tuba kum kuramib deyok aryi, dib en uram anmalakoka bingna kum kuramib. Erda, kimil aryi asing diraming nang ara dib dinyi anmalakoka kum diraming to, nunbabyi dib dinyi anmalakoka asing kum eiriramib. Erda, mekwan kukiya ato dinyi akwe asing eiriramib. Ani, aminda aryi sunglon dinyi tuba kum dankwande ati, nunci anmalakoka dib dinyi asing eibkwayeb. Ukuryok kubde baramib ara mitik-mitik akwe bingnamibyi ani, aminda aryi langdeiboka bikdobkwayeb. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi langdeiboka bingsurur to, nunbabyi dib dinyi nirya asi langdeiboka bikdobwayeb.

Ati, imtam aryi kuboka karesin mikib dinyi yuk-yuk ara tiya dinyi akwe kurande ani, aminda aryi kum dankwande. Ba, iya kubkwande dinyi ara winiryi kurur: Dib tenen dinyi ton, dibde bun dinyi ton, boukwe kimna dinyi ton iya kubkwaming. Ba, a dinyi nirya asi bisibkaboka iya bikdob dinyi ara boukwe kimna dinyi kurur.

Ati, ni kwityabwe, sunci, “Boukwe weik kibdankwayeb,” tenen sunci sun mamun boukwe weik kibdandarur. Boukwe weik kibdamun cok, sunci, “Sun dib tenen nang yuk nang asi katabum ebdeibkwayeb ati, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi nunsi Er wa irmilina ati mikib dinyi ton karebsute,” tenen busul kuboka ingkirikdarur. Ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi wa irmilina ati mikib dinyi yuk-yuk asi ur ingkirikdatiryok, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi kubkwande dinyi asi bikoka ermururantibyi,” tenen nunukaboka ingkirikdarur.

Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karebde barur uca, dib tenen nang ton nang ara ilila uram yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi sisingnaming. A nang ara ilila uram deib aryi uram eraming asi Er Imtamnyi bitikwa bingdur. Ara, ato en uram deib aryi uram sisingnaming ara Er Imtamnyi bitikwe ab uram sisingnaming. Yuk nang aryi ato en uram kum bingnung. Sun ilila uram deib aryi sisingnamingnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi minob lak kum kuanci dinyi ilinto bikoka ebtingiryok, yuk nang asi laktoto kum eraming. Yuk nang aryi bikman kum uram deib aryi ilila uram sisingnamingiryok, yuk nang asi katabum kum erdeiriraming. A deyok aryi, niryi sunti ato ebmasin. Ilila uram ara yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi uram sisingna ara teleb dinyi kurur bok, sunci, “Ilila uram deib aryi uram sisiktibyi,” tenen iya nunukaboka ingkirikmunyei.

Ba, sun Er Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibmaci uram bikoka lak eteren nang ara yuk nang aryi bingnaming uram deib aryi eramingiryok, Er Imtamnyi Uram ermururaming. Uca, sun a uram kekeramingnyi nang kanya kankana kum kurur. Erda, a lak ena uram biriman aryi sun dib tenen kanya ara tabakoka katabum ebkwande. Tonda, a lak ena uram biriman aryi sun kanya ara tabakoka teleb kibkwande.

Ba, sun ilila uram deib aryi eramingnyi nang ara yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi eraming deyok aryi, yuk nang kanya asi katabum kum erdeiriraming. Erda, sun mining kanya akwe katabum erdeiriraming. Ba, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ato-ato kubkwande,” ermurun nang ara tukwe nang aryi bingnung uram deib aryi ermururaming deyok aryi sun mining kanya akwe katabum kum erdeiriraming. Erda, sun bulubmangnyi dib tenen nang kanya nirya asi katabum erdeiriraming.

Ni kwityabwe, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karebsute uca, sun nirya ara ilila uram deib aryi uram sisingnandate. Ato ebman cok, niryi iya nunukaboka tenesunun to ebkwinsin. Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karebsute uca, sun nirya ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi ato-ato kubkwande,” eboka ermuruna teleb. Ara, tukwe nang aryi bingnung uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram ermuruna teleb. Ato kun dinyi ara nunukoka ingkiringna dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ilila uram deib aryi erandinyi bira teleb dinyi kurande bok, ninyi bingnaming uram deib aryi lak erandinyi bira bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kunurande. Ba, ilila uram deib aryi erandinyi bira, “Ato-ato ebmasin,” eboka uram danguboka lak ebte uca, erbabyi sun er uram keken nang kanya katabum ebdeibkwante.

Ura, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Niryi sun urasintam aryi yandoka ilila uram deib aryi uram ebtinyi uca, ato en uram ara sunti teleb kubdeibsute do? Ato tenen kum. Sunci ilila uram ati walwal kurandate deyok, ato en uram ara sunti teleb kum kubdeibsute. Ba, niryi lak uram deib aryi, “Dib en uram ton eterebkwinsin,” eboka lak eterebtabaksitinyi uca, a uram ara sunti teleb kubdeibsute. Tonda, niryi lak uram deib aryi, “Aminda aryi ato-ato kuboka kunubkwande,” en uram kum, bikdob uram kum, minob lak kum kuanci uram kum eterebsitinyi uca, a uram ara sunti teleb kubdeibsute.

Niryi tukwetam dinyi kankan asi isin neb-neb en kum dinyi dobniryok, kiklina uram ton ebkwinsin. Ara, tukwetam nang aryi bilul on dinyi doboka kiklibkwansin. Ara, bilul on dinyi si kecapi ara lilim yuk-yuk kum ebte uca, erda lilim tentok akwe ebte uca, nunci, “A mot semar,” tenen, “O mot semar,” tenen biktibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, isin u ebdongon bilul si seruling ababyi neiktoto lilim yuk-yuk kum ebte uca, nunci, “A mot semar,” tenen, “O mot semar,” tenen biktibyi do? Ato tenen kum.

Tonda, buena si sangkakala ara lilim yuk-yuk kum ebte uca, sun yin doun nang aryi, “Unato ati sangkakala dobmang do?” tenen bikting do? Ara, “Mar ordankwayeb ati sangkakala dobmang do kum do?” tenen sun yin doun nang kanya ara kankana kubte.

Ura, nunda dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto kunub. Nunda ilila uram deib aryi uram ebtibyi uca, yuk nang aryi, “Ato-ato eboka eterebmasing,” tenen bikting do? Ato tenen kum. Ninyi tentok ababyi nun uram kum biksiting deyok aryi, nunci talyi ati ebtibyi.
Im dangna tukwe dangna nang yala yuk-yuk ara uram yuk-yuk eboka sisingnamingiryok, sun mining uram kekeramingiryok, “Ato-ato ebmang,” tenen bingdaraming.

Ura, niryi yuk yala nang uram kum bingnantinyi uca, ni walwal uram deib aryi uram sisingnandinyi bira niti, “Yuk mutuk aryi kuboka yangananyi kurur ati walwal uram erur,” tenebnute. Tonda, niryi walwal uram deib aryi sisingmanirinyi biti, “Yuk mutuknyi kurur ati walwal uram erur,” tenebtinyi.

Ati, sunbabyi neiktoto yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi eterebdamunyei. Erda, yuk nang aryi bingnaming uram deib aryi eterebdandarur. Sunci, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus karebsute uca, Er wa irmilina ati mikib dinyi yuk-yuk dobdobtibyi,” tenen busul kuboka ingkiringnandum deyok aryi, sunci, “Dib tenen nang yuk nang kanya asi katabum ebdeibkwayeb ati mikib dinyi dobdobtibyi,” tenen ingkirikdarur.

Ati, sun kankan kuboka tukwe nang bingna kum uram deib aryi uram eramingnyi nang ara, “Lak uram deib aryi eterebtinyi,” eboka Er Imtamnyi bisi molona teleb. Ara, “Nai, Kanci mikib dinyi karebniminyi uca, niryi Kan uram asi danguboka lak eterebtinyi,” eboka molona teleb.

Ura, nunci Roh Kudus aryi karebsici ilila uram deib aryi eboka Er Imtamnyi bisi si weik eboka molobtibyi ara nun mining dib tenen kanya dam dem aryi kuboka molobtibyi. Ba, yuk nang ara nun molobtibyi tok kekebtingiryok, nun molobtibyi deyok bingna kum kuranting deyok aryi, nun molona deib aryi dib tenen nang yuk nang kanya asi katabum kum ebdeibtibyi. Ato kubtibyi uca, nunci bikdob tenen dinyi kum kunubtibyi.

Ati, nunci una kubkwayeb do? Niryi ilila uram yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram ebniryok, ni mining dib tenen kanya biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi molobkwan. Ba, niryi nisintum bikdob kanya bobniryok, lak uram deib aryi molobkwan. Tonda, niryi ilila uram yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram ebniryok, ni mining dib tenen kanya biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka mot sebkwan. Ba, niryi nisintum bikdob kanya bobniryok, lak uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka mot sebkwan.

Ura, sunci sun dib tenen kanya aryi ilila uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ebdate uca, sun uram kekeransingnyi nang ara a uram ati walwal kuranting. Walwal kuranting deyok aryi, a nang ara una kuboka, “Amin, dib sirik,” ebting do?

Ara, sunci ilila uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka, “Ei nun Nai,” ebdate bok, sun dib tenen nang yuk nang ara a uram kum bikting deyok aryi, sun uram ara sun kwityabwe sun kanya asi katabum kum ebdeibte.

Sunda Korintus nang ara ilila uram yuk-yuk deib aryi erandum bok, ni Paulus bira sunsi bisibkaboka ilila uram yuk-yuk ilinto asi bingnun. A ilila uram yuk-yuk asi bingnun deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enun.

Ilila uram yuk-yuk asi bingnun cok, ni ab dib tenen nang yuk nang ab tonkwa bulubmabyi ura, niryi ato uram deib aryi kum eterenun. Ati, niryi, “Yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi seribu kata kum ebkwan,” tenen kunun. Erda, niryi, “Dib tenen nang yuk nang asi lima kata akwe eterebtinyi bok, lak uram deib akwe eterebtinyi,” tenen kunun.
Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Sunci mitik mabwe tenen dinyi taklobmun ci, nebdob nang tenen kanya bobdarur. Tonda, mitik mabwe kanya ato bobmun ci, malyi kun dinyi kisibdobdarur.

Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato eboka minob kerek sekeiamnyi. “Er Imtamnyi biryi, ‘Ni dam kuramnyi nang asi wenebkwan,’ tenen ato ebmou. ‘Niryi arukdeibnyi uca, yuk mutuk nang aryi yandoka sun mining uram ara Ni dam kuramnyi nang aryi bingna kum uram deib aryi ebkwaming. Nira Imtamnyi biryi Ni dam kuramnyi nang asi uram tuba ebkwan bok, sunci Ni uram kum kekebkwaning se.’” Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi kerek sekeiamnyi to, sun Er Imtamnyi dam kuramnyi nang aryi yuk uram ara sun bingna kum uram deib aryi eterena uram kum kekeramnyi. Ato kuboka sun dib tenen nang aryi ilila uram ara tukwe nang aryi bingna kum uram eramunyi ura, sun uram keken nang aryi, “Una ebmang do?” tenen kum bikoka sun uram kum kekebkwaming.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, ilila uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram enub ara, “Sun dib tenen nang eterebkwayeb,” tenen enub. Erda, “Sun dib tenen kum nang eterebkwayeb,” tenen enub. Ara, “Sun dib tenen kum nang aryi ilila uram kekebingiryok, sunci, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi wenebkwansir,’ tenen bikting,” tenen ilila uram enub. Ba, nunci, “Sun dib tenen nang ara, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dakwansir,’ tenen bikting,” tenebibiryi, ilila uram kum enub. Bok, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ato-ato kubkwande,” en uram ara yukto kurur. Ato en uram ara, “Sun dib tenen kum nang eterebkwayeb,” tenen kum enub. Erda, “Sun dib tenen nang eterebkwayeb,” tenen lak ebkwanub. Ara, sun dib tenen nang aryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dakwansir,” tenen bikwaming ati nunci lak en uram deib aryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ato-ato kubkwande,” enub.

Ura, nunda dib tenen nang nirya bulubtibyi ura, nun nirya ara Roh Kudus aryi karebsici to ilila uram yuk-yuk ebtibyi uca, ato dinyi ara teleb dinyi kubte do? Ato tenen kum. Dib tenen nang ton nang ara a ilila uram yuk-yuk ati walwal kuraming deyok aryi, sunci sunti, “Walina talen nang aca,” tenebkwanting. Tonda, dib tenen kum nang aryi yandoka ilila uram kekebting uca, sunci sunti, “Lub kanya bon nang aca,” tenen ebdankwaming.

Ba, nunda dib tenen nang nirya bulubmabyi ura, nun nirya aryi lak ena uram deib aryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ato-ato eboka lak ebdeibmasir,” ena teleb. Ura, dib tenen kumnyi wengyate ura, erci a uram deyok anmalakoka bikdobkwante. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram bingna kumnyi wengyate ura, erbabyi a uram anmalakoka bikdobkwante. Ara, dib tenen kumnyi biryi a lak ena uram kekebte uca, “Nira malinyi kunun,” tenen bikdobkwante. Tonda, erci, “Ni malyi kun dinyi kum taklobnyi ura, sun dib tenen nang nirya aryi ni malyi deyok lilibkwaming,” tenen bikdobkwante.

Tonda, nunci Er Imtamnyi Uram lak en uram deici aryi ebmurubibyi uca, ninyi kanya dam aryi malyi tenen dinyi inirdeirirdaraming ababyi lak kimsurur. Uca, sun dib tenen kum nang ababyi, “Malyi dinyi kuramoubwe se,” tenen sundamnyi luknubdongoboka Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming. Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwamingiryok, a nang ababyi nunda dib tenen nang ati, “Er Imtamnyi sun ab tonkwa diboka kubmarum,” eboka lak ebkwansing.

Ati, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Nun una ebtibyi do? Sun dib tenen nang buluramunyi ura, ton nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi erebdeiboka mot sebkwaming. Yuk nang ara dib en uram eterena uram eterebkwaming. Yuk nang ara Roh Kudus aryi sun kanya dam aryi anmalakoka etererur dinyi asi kekeramingiryi, sunci a dinyi ara minob ura lak kum kuanci dinyi ebmuruboka ninyi urasintam aryi lak eterebkwaming. Yuk nang ara ilila uram yuk nang aryi bingna kum uram deici aryi sisikwaming. Tonda, yuk nang ara ilila uram dangubingiryok, nun mining uram bingnamib uram deici aryi lak eterebkwaming. A dinyi yuk-yuk nirya ara, “Sun dib tenen nang bulubmangnyi nang nirya asi sun kanya asi katabum ebdeibtibyi,” tenen kunubde binkwanub.

Ura, sun kankan ton nang ara, “Ilila uram deici aryi sisiktibyi,” eransingnyi uca, sunci ato ebdarur. “Ninyi bitinyi kum winiryi kum ilila uram deici aryi sisikmangnyi ura, ilila uram sisingna asi taklobkwayeb.” Ebmun cok, sunci ato ebtabakdarur, “Ilila uram deici aryi ebmun cok, neik tum ebmunyei. Erda, tonyi ebde tonyi ebde bindarur.” Tonda, sunci ato ebdarur. “Ilila uram deyok bingnanyi biryi ilila uram danguboka lak kum ebsute ura, sunci nunsi ilila uram ebsumunyei.”

Ilila uram bikoka danguboka ebkwandanyi kum kubte ura, sun ilila uram deib aryi sisingnaming nang ara uram kilikwanung. Ara, a nang aryi sun kanya dam aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi ilila uram deib aryi ur ebting. Bok, a nang ara dib tenen nang urasintam aryi kubingiryok, ilila uram lak ebingnyei.

Ura, sunda dib tenen nang buluramun cok, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaca eteren nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi Uram lak ebkwanung. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram ermurun nang bitinyi kum winiryi kum lak ebkwanung. Lak ebingnyi ba, sun uram keken nang aryi diboka liliboka, “A uram ara dib en uram do kum do?” tenebkwanung.

Ura, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi dib tenenanyi ur bukmarinyi tonyi bisi er kanya dam aryi anmalakoka eterebtiryok, “Kanci ato-ato eboka minob lak kum kuamwe dinyi asi lak kibdum,” ebte ura, anyi biryi tikoka Er Imtamnyi Kanya aryi eterebmaci tok ur eterebkwandur. Ara, uram enanyi yumanyi biryi er uram takoka anyi bisi sokon loubkwandur. Sokon loubte ura, er kwit bira, “Roh Kudus aryi anmalakoka eterebmanir dinyi asi lak kibkwan,” tenen tikokdiryok, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi er kanya dam aryi eterebmaci dinyi asi lak kibkwandur.

Ara, sunda, “Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi ato-ato dinyi kunubkwande,” eboka ermurun nang nirya ara tonyi ebde tonyi ebde baramun cok, Er Imtamnyi Uram ur ermurubdarur. Ato kubmun cok, sunci sun bulubmangnyi dib tenen nang kanya asi katabum ebdeibmun ci, dib en uram eterebkwandum.

Sun “Er Imtamnyi biryi aminda aryi ato-ato dinyi kunubkwande,” eboka ermurun nang ara walina talena deici aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kum ermururaming. Erda, sunci sundamnyi kalikdandoka, “Er Imtamnyi Uram deib aryi ato-ato ebkwayeb,” tenen bikdandoka Er Imtamnyi Uram ermururaming ati ebman.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira walina talen dinyi ton ninyi kanya kankana kurdeirin dinyi yuk dinyi ati, “Ni li,” tenerur. Ba, nun Nai biryi teleb tenesurur dinyi ara, “Antanibdeibdandoka kubting,” tenesurur. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ermurun nang ara sundamnyi kalikdandoka, ‘Ato-ato ebkwayeb,’ teneraming,” ati ebmasin.
Ura, ni kwityabwe, sun dantam-dantam nirya aryi kuboka buluramingnyi dib tenen nang aryi kunubde baraming to lak ebkwinsin.

Sun dib tenen nang tonkwa buluramingnyi ura, sun nerabwe ara uram kilikwanung. Ara, “Sun nerabwe ara sun bulubmangnyi nang urasintam aryi uram ton lak eterebingnyei,” tenen deyok aryi, “Uram kilikting,” ebmasin. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi esurur to, “Sun nerabwe ara sundamnyi luknubdongobdandoka sun akenyi uram kekebkwanung.”

Ura, nerabwe ara Er Imtamnyi Uram ati, “Diboka biktibyi,” tenen kubting ura, sunci sun akenyi asi, “Eterebnurum,” eboka molobting. Ara, sun ai umbura bukting ba, sun akenyi bisi, “Dib en uram eterebnurum,” eboka molobting. Ba, nerabwe ara sun dib tenen nang bulubmangnyi kankan asi uram eterebingnyei. Ato kun dinyi ara ukubman kum dinyi kubte.

Sun dantam-dantam nirya bulubmangnyi dib tenen nang ara ato-ato dinyi kuboka kunubde baraming bok, sunda Korintus atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang atikwe ato kuboka kum kunurandum se. Ati, niryi sunsi asirdena ton asibdenkwinsin. Sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi Uram deyok nang kunub,” tenerdarandum darib? Tonda, sunci, “Nun tikwe Er Imtamnyi Uram dobdobmoubwe,” tenerdarandum darib?

Niryi sunsi, “Ato-ato kunubde bindarur,” eboka kerek sekeibmasin ara ni yuk aryi tenen dinyi deici aryi kum kerek sekeibmasin. Erda, nun Du Yesus bira nun Arungdeirisurutnyi biryi arukdeibsou to akwe lak eboka kerek sekeibmasin. Ati, sun kankan asi, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang kunub,” tenebdating nang ara niryi sunsi arukdeibmasin uram ati, “Nun Du Uram diboka kubmar,” eboka lak ebting. Tonda, sun kankan asi, “Nunda imtam dinyi ati bikdob nang kunub,” tenebdating nang ababyi, “Nun Du biryi arukdeibmasou to diboka ebmurubmar,” eboka lak ebniting.

Niryi sunsi nun Du Yesus biryi arukdeibmasou uram asi ebmuruboka lak ebmasin. Ba, sun kankan asi ton nang ara a uram ati, “Nun Du biryi arungdeirisina uram kuma,” ebting. Sun ato dinyi ebingnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kum bingnung ati, nunci a nang aryi ebingnyi uram kum kekebkwayeb. Ati, sunbabyi a nang ati, “Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kum bingnung,” tenen bikmun ci, a nang uram kekebmunyei.

Ati, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Sunci, “Er Imtamnyi Uram bikoka ebmurubtibyi,” tenen busul kuboka ingkirikdarur. Tonda, sunci sun, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya karebsici uca, ilila uram deib aryi uram sisiktibyi,” tenen nang asi, “Mem,” ebmunyei.

Ato ebman bok, nun Du Yesus biryi arukdeibmasou to, sunbabyi neiktoto tuba-tuba kunubde bindarur. Tonda, sunci ninyi kanya kankana kurdeirin dinyi nirya asi bisik sekmun cok, ton dinyi kunubde ton dinyi kunubde bindarur.

Ura, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Niryi minob ura nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak etereransise ba, sunci a uram dobdobmandau ani, ukuryok ababyi katabum eboka dib tenerandum. Ura, niryi sunsi, “Teleb Uram eterebmasise asi diboka tamuboka teneibdarur,” ebmasin.

Teleb Uram ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou biriman aryi sunsi lebdeibde baransir. Ara, sunci nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram asi diboka talebmurubmunyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi lebdeibde baransir. Ba, sunci Teleb Uram asi tuba kum talebdate uca, sunci minob ura talyi ati dib tenerandaute ani, ukuryok ababyi diboka dib kum tenerandate.

Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi minob etereanou to niryi, “A uram ara nunukaboka deirin uram kurur,” eboka sunbabyi eterermururansise. Ara, “Nun Du Kristus ninyi Lemsinanyi dibmou ara nun malyi kun deyok ati dibmasou,” eboka etereransise. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi minob eamwe to, nun Du Yesus bira nun malyi dinyi kilibkwansou ati dibmasou,” eboka etereransise.

Etereransisiryok, niryi sunsi ato eransise. “Nun Du bira sirya dibmou ura, tukwe dongon dam dongobdeibmai ani, uki winiryi tum berekmou ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Ersi kam bukeibmou. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi minob eamwe to, nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus bisi kam bukeibmou,” eransise.

Ura, nun Du Yesus kam bukokmou ura, Erci Petrus uruma si Kefas ab ebdandoka, “Ni kam bukokman,” eboka erdamnyi lak kibdanmou. Petrus bisi Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou ura, Erci Er miliramnyi nang amolbaryi nang kankan asi yuk nang ab ebdandoka Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou.

A sirya ura, nun Du Yesus bira dib tenen nang lima ratus baryi neik dam bulubmai ab ebdandoka, “Ni kam bukokman,” eboka Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou. Ara, neik liki tum kubmou ba, nun Du Yesus ab a nang nirya ab ebdanmai. A nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus kam bukokmounyi asing eibmai cok, sun kankan asi ninyi ilinto ukuryok ababyi kam tuba kuraming. Ba, a nang kankan aryi ninyi ton nang sirya dibmai.

A nang nirya asi Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou ura, nun Du Yesus bira er weit kobdob Yakobus ab ebdandoka, “Nira kam bukokman,” eboka Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou. A sirya ura, nun Du Yesus biryi sun Erci, “Teleb Uram deyok kouboka eterebde bindarur,” eboka bokdonokwamwe nang nirya ab ebdandoka, “Ni kam bukokman,” eboka Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou.

Ani, sirya kobdob ara nun Du Yesus ab nibabyi ab ebdanmanumuryok, Erdamnyi nisi lak kibdanmou. Nira nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmasou nang kankan asi sirya kobdob tabangdongonanyi bitonyi kunun cok, Er ab ni ab ebdandoka Erci Erdamnyi nibabyi lak kibmanou ci, nibabyi tikeibmanou.

Nira nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmasou nang kankan asi outam bunanyi bitonyi kunun deyok aryi, niryi, “Sirya kobdob tabangdongonanyi kunun,” ebdanman. Minob ura niryi nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang ati, “Obtinyi,” tenen domkiringnanse bok, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi nabdeibnou ura, “Teleb Uram eterebde birum,” eboka bokdonoknou. Bokdonoknou bok, niryi, “Sun dib tenen nang minob domkiringnanse se,” tuba tenerdanun deyok aryi, niryi nidamnyi ati, “Sun nun Du Yesus biryi tikeiboka bokdonoksou nang kankan asi nira outam bunanyi kunun,” tenerdanun.

Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kisal dakoka karebnou uca, nira nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak eterebde banunyi kunun. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi kisal daknou uca, niryi Er wa irmiliransiryi, talyi ati wa kum irmiliranse. Nira outam bunanyi kunun cok, niryi sun bokdonokmou nang yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya busul kuboka wa iranse uca, ninyi ilinto aryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram dobdobmai. Ato ebman cok, ni yuk aryi wa iranse uca, dib kum teneraming. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi miliboka kisal daknou ba, nun Nai biryi du mourdeiriramwe.

Ati, nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmasou nang ara Teleb Uram lak eramib ara uram yuk-yuk kum eramib. Erda, yuk nang babyi nibabyi neik uram akwe eboka lak etereramoubwe ani, ukuryok tuba neik uram akwe eboka lak etereramib. A lak etereramib dib en uram ara sunda Korintus nang ababyi kekerandau ci, dobdobmandau ati ebman.

Ni kwityabwe. Nunda, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus ninyi Lemsinanyi bisi kam bukeibmou,” eboka lak ena uram kekenub. Ato eboka lak ena uram bingnub cok, sun kankan asi ton nang ara, “Sun din nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi kam kum bukeibkwande,” eraming se.

Nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi kam bukeibmou deyok aryi, Erci sun din nang yuk nang ababyi kam bukeibkwande ati ebman. Sun din nang asi kam kum bukeibte uca, Erci nun Du Yesus dibmou ababyi kam kum bukeibmote.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi diboka kam kum kubdeibte ura, nunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Kam bukokmar,” lak en uram ababyi talyi uram akwe kurante. Ato kurante ura, sunci nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum dinyi ababyi talyi dinyi akwe kurante.

Tonda, nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus bisi diboka kam kum bukeibte ura, nunda, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi kam bukeibmar,” eboka lak eramib nang ara tola uram en nang kurantibyi. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang kam kum bukeibte ura, Erci nun Du Yesus bibabyi kam kum bukeibmote.
Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam kum burdeirirante ura, Erci nun Du Yesus Kristus dibmou ababyi kam kum bukeibmote ati ato ebman.

Ura, nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi kam kum bukeibmote ura, sun dib tenerandum dinyi ara talyi dinyi akwe kubsute. Sun dib tenen dinyi ara talyi dinyi akwe kubsute uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun malyi kun dinyi kum kilibdeibmasute. Malyi dinyi kum kilibdeibmasute ura, sunda malyi dinyi kunubmurubde nang tuba kubdate.

Nun Du Kristus bisi kam kum bukeibte ura, sun Er dam kuramnyi nang sirya dibmai nang ababyi lemsin dinyi kum dobdobting. Erda, lemsin dinyi wanikminikting uca, Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang tuba kum kubting.

Nunda dib tenen nang ara lemsina dinyi dibde buramibiryok, nunci, “Tukwe tam tuba kuramib ababyi lemsin dinyi dobdobmabyi ani, sirya dibibyi ura, iya lemsin dinyi dobdobkwayeb,” tenena kuramib. Ba, nunci, “Nun dibibyi ura, iya lemsin dinyi kum dobdobkwayeb,” tenerantibyi uca, nunda yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya mambul kanya bon nang kurantibyi. Uca, ninyi nirya aryi nunti, “Iya bico tenebmanto nang,” teneransiting.

Ba, ton nang aryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam kum bukeibkwande,” eraming cok, tola ati ato eraming. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi diboka kam bukeibmou ati ebman. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus biti, “Deyok kouboka kam bukeibkwan anyi kubkwande,” tenen yuma kobdob aryi kam bukeibmou ani, Erci sun din nang yuk nang asi aminda aryi kam bukeibkwande.

Minob ura nun aibwe Adam biryi malyi kun dinyi kubmou uca, erbabyi yuk nang nirya ababyi wenen dinyi dobdobmaburyi, dimnamoubwe ani, ukuryok tuba dimnub. Ara, ninyi tentok aryi malyi deyok koubmou uca, nun nirya aryi din dinyi doronub. Ura, kam kurdeirin dinyi dorona ababyi neiktoto kurur. Ara, nun Du Yesus tentok kam bukokmou deyok aryi, nunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang nirya ababyi kam bukokwayeb. A deyok aryi, niryi nun Du Yesus biti, “Deyok kouboka kam bukokmou,” ebmasin.

Ara, ninyi nirya ara nun aibwe Adam biryi deibdoba nang kuramib deyok aryi, nun nirya ara nun aibwe malyi deyok aryi, dimnub. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kam bukeibkwande ababyi neiktoto kurur. Ara, nunda dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunub deyok aryi, nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi kam bukeibkwansir.

Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi a ilil tenen dinyi nirya kiknirur ara lilibdeiboka kiknirur. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi yuma kobdob aryi kam bukeibmou ani, sun Ersi milin nang asi aminda aryi kam bukeibkwande. Ara, nun Du Yesus tamuryuryaci uki tum berekci ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunda nun Du amwetam bun nang asi bukeibkwansir ati ebman.

Sirya kam bukeibsici ura, sirya kobdob uki tum ara imtam tukwetam minob dinyi tuba kum dankwande uki tum berekwande. Berekwande ba, nun Du Yesus bira Er mikib nirya asi Er Nai taruk dam tamurkarebkwande. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi sun im dangna tukwe dangna kuramingnyi erebdob nang mikib ab, weik sien nang mikib ab, nirya asi kum daneibdiryi, sun isa sien nang mikib nirya ababyi kum daneibci ura, nun Du Yesus biryi Erdamnyi luknubdongobdiryok, “Ni Nai, Kanda iya Weik Sienyi kurum,” eboka Er mikib nirya asi Er Nai Imtamnyi taruk dam tamurkarebkwande.

Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Iya Weik Sienyi kibdum,” eamwe tok, nun Du Yesus bira iya Weik Sienyi kuboka imtam tukwetam dinyi nirya kalingsurur. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Er mar ordana nang nirya asi muna kimdongobde barur ci, nun Du Er yan deyok tam asi deirirande. Muna sirya kibdongobmaci ani, nun Du Yesus biryi Er mikib asi Er Nai Imtamnyi bisi tamurkarebkwande.

Ninyi dirdein dinyi ababyi mar ordananyi bito kurande dinyi asi nun Du Yesus biryi muna kibdongobkwande. Ara, sirya kobdob talak berekmaci ura, nun Du Yesus biryi Ersi ordan dinyi yuk dinyi nirya asi kum daneibci ura, Erci ninyi dirdein dinyi ababyi muna kibdongobdiryok, kum daneibkwande.
Nun Du biryi muna kibdongoboka ordan dinyi nirya asi Er yan amwetam deibkwande deyok aryi, ninyi dirdein dinyi ababyi muna kibdongobkwande ati ebman. Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato esurur.
“Erci muna kibdongobmou ci, utotoa nirya Er yan deyok tam asi deibdongobmou.”

Ati, ninyi dirdein dinyi ababyi muna kibdongobkwande ati ebman. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi utotoa nirya asi nun Du Yesus yan amwetam deibdongobmou. Ba, nun Nai bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur ati, Erci nun Du Yesus yan amwe tam burbina kum kubkwande. A dinyi ara lak kubmar.

Ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi im dangna tukwe dangna dinyi nirya asi muna kibdongoboka nun Du Yesus Er yan amwetam kibdongobci ura, nun Du biryi Erdamnyi luknubdongobdandoka Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Nai, Kanda iya Weik Sienyi kurum,” ebkwande. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus bisi erebdeiboka iya mikib dinyi kareande ani, nun Du Yesus biryi, “Ni Nai,” tenen Erdamnyi luknubdongobdankwande. Ara, ninyi nirya aryi Er Imtamnyi biti, “Iya Weik Sienyi,” eboka lak ebkwaming ati, nun Du Yesus biryi, “Ni Nai,” eboka Erdamnyi luknubdongobdankwande.

Ati, ni kwityabwe, nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen bingnub. Ati, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang kam kum bukeibkwansir,” tenebmunyei. Dib tenen nang kankan asi ton nang ara, “Nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang ara me kum dongobmai talak aryi dibmai nang ababyi Er Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibkwande,” teneramingiryi, sunci kiklibdeiboka sun din nang ababyi me dongoraming. Ara, kam tuba kuraming nang ara din nang asi kiklibdeibmang nang asi me dongoraming. Ati, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi diboka kam bukeibkwande,” tenen ato kuraming.

Tonda, nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang ara Teleb Uram etereranub asi ninyi aryi nunti, “Obkwayeb,” tenen tuba-tuba domkiringsunung. Ura, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam kum bukeibkwande,” tenebtibyi ura, nunci, “Ninyi aryi nunsi obsingnyi ababyi, Teleb Uram eterebmurubde binkwayeb,” tenen Teleb Uram eterebmurubde barantibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen bingnubiryok, Teleb Uram eterebmurubde banub.

Nikwityabwe, nun Du Kristus Yesus nun Arungdeirisurutnyi biryi sunsi lebdeibsou deyok aryi, ni kanya iya teleb kunurur ba, niryi sunsi kisal dangsunun. Bok, ninyi ton nang ara, “Teleb Uram kekena nun li,” tenen nisi mambul weik kimdeiriraning uca, dibmanto kunanyi kunun. Ara, uki-uki nirya aryi ni dibmanto kunanyi kunun ati dib ebmasin.

Niryi Efesus atei kuranse ba, ton nang aryi, “Teleb Uram kekena nun li,” tenen, “Obtibyi,” tenen nisi yu weik kuboka malyi kimdeiriranei. Ara, yu kam aryi bisam oyiraming to, a nang aryi nisi yu weik kuboka malyi kimdeiriranei. Ati, niryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi din nang kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen dibde bunun ati, niryi, “Ninyi aryi nisi mambul kubdeiboka obniting ababyi niti teleb,” tenenun. Ura, niryi, “Er Imtamnyi bira din nang asi kam bukeibkwande,” tenenun deyok aryi, niryi ato dinyi mambul dinyi ababyi ur bonun. Bok, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang kam kum bukeibkwande,” tenebtibyi uca, nunci aminda dinyi dibde buna kum uca, “Tukwetam dinyi akwe ingkirikwayeb,” tenen kunurantibyi. Ato kurantibyi ura, nunci ato erantibyi,
“Nun kwityabwe, ambutum dibkwamab se. Ati, arub ara yina ab me ab langdeiboka yirmurunkwamab,” eboka kunurantibyi.

Ni kwityabwe, ninyi aryi tola ati, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam kum bukeibkwande,” ebtingiryok, sunsi bowanikminiksingnyei. Sunci tola uram eteren nang ati, “Nun kwityabwe,” tenebdate uca, a nang aryi malyi tenen dinyi dakdongobsute uca, sunbabyi danguboka malyi kun nang kibdate.

Ati, sunci, “Tola uram bai donokwayeb,” tenen bikdob kanya tamuboka bondarur. Tonda, sunci malyi kun dinyi kurandum asi takdarur. Sunda Korintus atei nang kankan aryi ton nang ara Er Imtamnyi biti walwal nang kuraming ati ato ebman. Ati, niryi sunti, “Alyi kibdeibkwan,” tenen ato ebmasin.
Ura, sun kankan aryi ton nang ara ato eboka asibdeniting. “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang asi kam bukeibkwande ara ninyi nong unato dinyi asi kareboka kam bukeibkwande do?” eboka asibdeniting.

Ato eboka asirden dinyi ara lub nang aryi asirdeting dinyi akwe kubmar se. Nunda tukwetam kuramib nang nong ara yuk. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibkwansir nang nong ara yuk. Tukwetam boramib nong ara dibkwandur dinyi kurande bok, aminda aryi dobdobkwamib nong ara dibman kum dinyi dobdobkwamib. Ati, nunda tukwetam nang aryi kum dibtibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bukeiboka ukuryok nong ara dibman kum dinyi kum karebsute. Sun wa in nang ara yala kouramingnyi ura, yala ara tukwe umbura wekmaci ani, betekoka arande. Tukwe umbura kum wekte uca, yala ara betekoka kum abte. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi ukuryok nong lubman kum dinyi karebkwansir ababyi neiktoto kurur. Nun sirya dibibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bukeiboka ukuryok nong ara lubman kum dinyi karebkwansir. Bok, nun kum dibtibyi ura, nunda ukuryok nong ara dibman kum dinyi kum dobdobtibiryi.

Sun wa in nang yala kouraming ba, nong dinyi betekoka anci du dinyi kum kouraming. Erda, yala dinyi akwe kouraming. Ara, gandum yala kum yuk yala kum kouramingnyi ura, betekoka anci ura, du moun dinyi yongoraming.

Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb teneamwe tok, Erci yala yuk-yuk kiknibmou ci, nong yuk-yuk ababyi kiknibmou. Ara, yala yuk-yuk aryi betekoka arande uca, nong yuk-yuk ababyi marande. Ati, aminda ababyi nun Nai biryi sun din nang asi kam bukeibkwande ara ukuryok nong lubman kum dinyi kikniboka karebdiryok, kam bukeibkwande.
Im dangna tukwe dangna kurande dinyi yuk-yuk ara nong yuk-yuk kusurur ati ebman. Ninyi nong ara yuk. Bisam nong ara yuk. Maka nong ara yuk. Mekinaiya nong ara yuk.

Tonda, sun imtam ai aryi kuboka nong ara yuk. Sun tukwetam aryi kuboka nong ara yuk. Tukwetam aryi kuboka nong nirya ara teleb dinyi kurur bok, imtam ai aryi kuboka nong nirya ara bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kurur.
Kiting aryi berengdeirirande milil ara yuk. Wala tilil ara yuk. Kurya tilil ababyi yuk kurur. Tonda, kurya yuk-yuk ara tilil yuk-yuk ababyi kurur.

Ura, nunda Er Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibkwansir nang ababyi neiktoto kubkwayeb. Tukwetam kuransir nong ara teleb dinyi kurande bok, dibmanto dinyi kuransir. Ba, kam bukeiboka kiknibkwansir nong ara bisibkaboka iya teleb dinyi kubdiryi, kum daneibman kum dinyi kubkwande.

Tukwetam kuransir nong ara dibibyi ura, milil tuba kum kubci asi tukwe umbura dongoransing. Ba, nun Nai biryi nunsi kam bukeibkwansir ara milil weik nong kareboka kam bukeibkwansir. Tukwetam kuransir nong ara mitang dinyi tukwe umbura dongoransing bok, nun nong ukuryok kiknibkwansir dinyi ara mikib weik kubkwande.

Tukwe umbura dongoraming nong ara tukwe dam dinyi akwe kurur. Ba, nunci dobdobkwayeb ukuryok nong ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi kiknibkwande nong dobdobkwayeb. Tukwetam nong a kurande deyok aryi, imtam nong ababyi a kurur ati ebman.
Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi minob ura ato eboka kerek sekeibmai.
“Er Imtamnyi biryi kiknibmou uca, ninyi yuma kobdob anyi si Adam bira isin nebneb enanyi kibmou.”
Ani, nun Du Yesus Kristus tentok ara Adam bitonyi kuboka yuma kobdobanyi kuramuryok, Erci Adam bisi bisibkaboka sun tukwetam nang asi kam burdeirisurutnyi kibmou.

Ba, kam burdeirin dinyi ara tukwetam minob kiknibmou dinyi asi bisibkaboka iya erebdob dinyi kurur bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi kam burdeirin dinyi yuma kum karebmou. Erda, tukwetam dinyi asi yuma kobdob aryi kikniboka karebmasou ani, kam burdeirin dinyi ara aminda aryi karebkwansir.

Er Imtamnyi biryi minob kikniamwe ninyi si Adam ara Erci tukwe aryi iniboka kikniamwe deyok aryi, tukwetamnyi kuramwe. Ba, nun Du Yesus bira aminda aryi yanmunyi bira tukwetamnyi kum kurur. Erda, nun Du Yesus bira Adam bisi bisibkaboka imtam aryi kuboka yuryanmunyi kurur.

Nun aibwe kobdob Adam bira tukwetamnyi kuboka dibman anyi kuramwe to, nunda er yala dakansou nang ababyi tukwetam nang kunub cok, dibmana nang akwe kunub. Ba, nun Du Yesus bira imtam aryi kuboka yuryanmunyi kurur cok, kam bukeibmounyi kurur to, nunda Ersi dib tenen nang ababyi kam bukeibkwansir nang kibkwayeb.

Nun tukwetam nong tuba kuransir ba, nunda nun aibwe Adam bito nang kuramibiryi, dibman nang kuramib. Ani, nunda kam burdeirin nong dobdobkwayeb ara nun Du Yesus Kristus bito nang kubibiryok, nunda dibmanto tuba kum kubibiryok, Er Imtamnyi teleb tenesurur to akwe kunubde binkwayeb.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, niryi sunsi dib en uram ton eboka lak ebkwinsin. Nunda tukwetam nong ab ining ab tuba kuransir ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi, “Imtam ai wengyandoka erebdob bunsokon ur buryandarur,” eboka kum erebdeibkwansir. Tukwetam nong ara dibman dinyi tuba kuransir ba, nunda iya kam burdeirisin dinyi asi dorona kum kubtibyi. Ba, sirya dibmabyi ura, iya kam burdeirisin dinyi dobdobkwayeb.

Kekebdarur. Niryi sunsi minob lak kimna kum uram ton lak kibdeibkwinsin. Nunda tukwetam kuboka kam kuramib nang nirya ara kum dibkwayeb ati ebman. Nun Du tamuryaci ura, nunda kam tuba kubkwamib nang ara kum dibkwayeb. Erda, nun Nai biryi nun nong asi anmalakoka unubdeibkwansir uca, nun nong ara iya dibman kum kubkwansir.

Ara, buena si sangkakala lilim weik uram lukdandoka dobci ba, nun Nai biryi karebsici uca, nun nong ara unubdeibkwansir. Ara, bebe lukdandoka ling erande ato, mitik asing kublam ena ato, uki bumang kubkwande ba, nun Nai biryi nun nong asi lukdandoka unubdeibkwansir. Ara, buena lilim weik uram dobci ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun din nang nirya asi kam bukeibdiryok, kum daneibman kum nong asi karebkwansir. Ba, nunda kam tuba kubkwamib nang asi nun Nai biryi nun nong asi unubdeibkwansir uca, nunbabyi ukuryok nong ara kum daneibman kum dinyi dobdobkwayeb.

Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenerur to, kum daneibman dinyi ara iya kum kubkwande. Erda, kum daneibman kum dinyi ara kum daneibman dinyi unubkwande. Tonda, dibman kum dinyi ara dibmanto dinyi unubkwande.

Ura, iya kam burdeirin dinyi aryi tiya kam kun dinyi asi sirya unubkwande ara Er Imtamnyi biryi minob lak eamwe uram kunubkwande. Tonda, iya kam burdeirin dinyi aryi dibman dinyi asi unubdeibkwande ara Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubkwande. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato eboka kerek sekeiamnyi.
“Er Imtamnyi biryi muna kibdongobci uca, ninyi dirdeirin dinyi tuba kum kubkwande.”

“Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi muna kibdongobmar. Muna kibdongobmar uca, ninyi dirdeirisin dinyi aryi nunsi mambul tuba kum kubdeibkwansir. A deyok aryi, nunci dirdeirisin dinyi asi, ‘Muna kibdongobmakir,’ enub.”
Ato eboka Er Imtamnyi Uram minob uram umbura aryi kerek sekeiamnyi.

Ninyi dirdeirisin dinyi ara nunsi lukeiboka mambul kurdeiriransou ara nunci malyi dinyi kuramoubwe deyok aryi, mambul kurdeiriransou. Tonda, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram kum kekebtibyi uca, nunci, “Malyi dinyi kuramib se,” tenen mambul kanya kum borantibyi. Ara, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram biriman aryi malyi kun dinyi ton ninyi dirdeirin dinyi ton mikib weik kurandei.

Ani, nun Nai biryi karebsou uca, nunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biriman aryi muna kimdongon dinyi doronub. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi malyi kun dinyi ton dirdeirin dinyi ton asi muna kibdongobmou uca, iya kam kun dinyi doronub. A deyok aryi, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enub.

Ati, ni kwityabwe boukwe weik kusunun nang. Nunda muna kimdongon dinyi dobdobmab deyok aryi, sunbabyi katabum eboka dib tenebmurubdarur. Ati, sunci, “Tola uram bowanikminiksicei,” tenen katabum eboka tikdarur. Tonda, sunci, “Busul kuboka nun Du Yesus wa irmilibkwayeb,” tenen sundamnyi nun Du Yesus bisi karebdandarur. Ara, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kam bukeibkwansir,” teneramun ci, “Nun wa irmilinub ara talyi ati kum wa irmilinub,” teneramun cok, sunci tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus wa irmilina teleb.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, Korintus atei kurandum dib tenen nang. Sun Yerusalem atei kuraming kuboka dib tenen nang kwaning atarande deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Kwaning atan kum nang kuramingiryok, sun kwityabwe kwaning atan nang asi dibnilibting,” tenen uram ton ebkwinsin. Ara, niryi sun Galatia mutuk kuboka dantam-dantam aryi buluraming dib tenen nang nirya asi yibinkirikoka ato eboka ebdeibmase to, niryi sunbabyi neiktoto ebdeibmasin. Ati, sunbabyi, “Yerusalem atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang kwaning atarande ati dibnilibkwayeb,” tenen co bok bulubdeibdarur.

Ara, Hari Minggu tum berekci ura, neik dam buluramun cok, sunci sun dam kubmaci tok co bok boboka deibde bindarur. Ara, co bok weik dinyi sun dam kubmasute uca, co bok weik dinyi karebdate. Ba, co bok mitik dinyi sun dam kubmasute uca, co bok mitik dinyi karebdate. Ati, Hari Minggu tum nirya tonkwa buluramun cok, sunci co bok buluboka deibde bindarur. Co bok nirya asi sirya kiknibminikmunyi ani, nira sun dam yankwan. Ara, niryi sun dam yanmanyi ura, sunci, “Co bok kum bulurdeiriramoubwe ani, ukuryok aryi kuboka buluboka deibde binkwayeb,” ebmunyei.

Ni sun dam sirya yanmanyi ura, sunci sun kankan aryi ninyi ton nang wibdeibkwandum. Ara, sunci, “Nun bulurdeiriramoubwe co bok bobitingiryok, sun Yerusalem atei kuraming dib tenen nang asi likniboka karebting,” tenen ninyi ton nang asi wibdeibkwandum. Sirya wibdeibkwamunyi ura, niryi sun Yerusalem atei nang asi kerek sengna kerek sekeibkwan. Ara, “A nang ara Korintus atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang aryi bokdonokmasei nang diboka kunung,” eboka “Co bok likniboka karebkwansing ati yanmang,” eboka lak kimdeirin kerek sengna kerek sekeibkwan.
Ura, niryi, “A co bok boban nang ab tonkwa bibiryok, nibabyi Yerusalem atei bina ara teleb,” tenebtinyi uca, nibabyi Yerusalem atei nisintum bitinyi.

Ura, nira Makedonia mutuk likoka yibinmanyi ani, sunda Korintus atei kurandum dib tenen nang diryankwansin. Ara, “Makedonia mutuk likoka yibinmanyi ani, Korintus atei binkwan,” tenen deyok aryi, ato ebmasin.

Ura, ni sun dam yanmanyi ura, uki mikbaryi tonkwa kubmabyi ani, anaboka binkwan kum sun ab tonkwa kubmurubkwayeb kum. Ni sun dam yankwan ara muryi li dobkalibkwande deyok aryi, ni sun ab tonkwa kubmurubtibyi. Ara, muryi li tonkwa kubtibiryok, sunci niti bisik kona kiknibminiknindate. Ara, muryi li bisibci uca, yuk mutuk dirbinkwan ati, sunci niti bisik kona kiknibminiknindate.

Niryi sunsi ukuryok kum diryankwansin ati ebman. Ukuryok sun dam diryasitinyi ura, uki mitik nun akwe tonkwa kubtibyi. Ba, niryi, “Uki mikbaryi tonkwa kubkwayeb,” tenen ukuryok kum diryankwan. Erda, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici uca, ni ab sun ab aminda aryi uki ilinto tonkwa kubmabyi ani, tubto anaboka binkwan.
Ba, ukuryok ara Efesus atei kubman ati tuba kubmurubkwan. Ura, kwalina si Pentakosta sirya kwalibmabyi ani, niryi anaboka Makedonia mutuk yibinyi ani, sun dam diryankwansin.

Nira Efesus atei kubman ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi bublan kukeibnir uca, ninyi ilinto aryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram kekebmang. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Nun Du Er wa irmilibmurubkwan,” tenen Efesus atei tuba kubmurubkwan. Ba, akatei kuraming nang kankan ninyi ilinto aryi, “Teleb Uram nun li ati Paulus bisi bisik sektibyi,” tenen ukurderaming.

Ura, niryi nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam bokdonokmasin ati, erci sun dam yaci ura, sunci ersi diboka kibdobdarur. Ati, er sun ab tonkwa kubmunyi ba, sunci erti, “Ilil kubcei,” tenen namin kanya bobdarur. Ni Paulus bira nun Du Yesus wa irmilinunyi kunun to, nun kwit Timotius bibabyi nun Du Yesus wa irmilirutnyi kurur. Ati, sunci nun kwit biti, “Nun kankan aryi nun Du Yesus wa asi ur ibmilibte,” tenen kalikdarur.

Sun kankan aryi kuboka ninyi tentok ababyi nun kwit Timotius biti, “Dobdobibyei,” tenebcei. Erda, sunci erti, “Nun kwit,” tenen diboka dobdobdarur. Ura, Timotius sun ab tonkwa kubmunyi ani, sunci teleb kanya boboka, “Nun kwit, teleb. Da birum,” eboka bokdonokdarur. Sirya bokdamunyi ani, nun kwit ni dam tamuryankwande. Ara, ni ab sunci ni dam bokdonokmandau nang aryi, “Timotius tamuryaci ura, nunbabyi Korintus atei tamurbinkwayeb,” tenen dibde bukwayeb.

Ura, ukuryok ara nun kwit Apolos deyok ati uram ton ebkwinsin. Niryi uram ebkateibmasiryi, “Kanbabyi nun kwityabwe bokdonokman nang asi miliboka Korintus atei birum,” ebmase bok, erci, “Ukuryok kum binkwan,” ebmanou. Ba, uki teleb kubci ura, erbabyi sun dam diryankwansir.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sunci, “Dib tenebmurubkwayeb,” tenen kalikdandarur. Sunci katabum eboka nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebmurubdarur. Ilil kanya bobmunyei. Erda, ilil kum asa aryi tenen kanya bobmun ci, katabum eboka kubdarur.
Sunci utotoa-utotoa nirya kunubde baramunyi dinyi ara boukwe weik kibmun cok, kunubde bindarur.

Stefanus mabwe silib ara sun nirya bikmarum. Nun minob ura Akhaya mutuk yandoka Teleb Uram lak eterebmoubwe ba, Stefanus ab er mabwe silib ab ara deyok kouboka Teleb Uram minob dobdobmai. Teleb Uram sirya dobdobmai ura, sunci sun dib tenen nang asi du dongoboka yina kareboka dirniliramnyi ani, ukuryok tuba dirnilinung.

Sunci sun Stefanus mabwe silib ato kuboka busul kuboka wa irmiliraming nang uram asi diboka kekebdarur ati ebman. A mabwe silib akwe ati ato kum ebman. Erda, sun ato kuboka dirniliramingnyi nang nirya ati ato ebman.

Ura, sunci bokdonokmanindau uca, Stefanus ab Fortunatus ab Akhaikus ab ara ni dam sirya yanmang ati ni kanya teleb kubmanir. Ara, ni ab sunda Korintus atei aryi dib tenen nang ab tonkwa kum kuramib bok, a nang ara sunci bokdonokmanindau nang ara unubdeiboka ni ab tonkwa kuramib ati ni kanya teleb kuranir.

A nang ara ni kanya asi teleb kubdeibmaning deyok aryi, ato ebmasin. Tonda, a nang aryi sunda Korintus nang kanya ababyi teleb kurdeiriransing ati tenebman. Sun ato kun nang ati sunci, “Nun naiyabwe, sunci nun kanya teleb kubdeibmasurum ara teleb dinyi kunubmarum ci,” eboka lak ena teleb.

Ura, sun Asia mutuk dantam-dantam aryi kuboka bulubmangnyi dib tenen nang ara sunda Korintus atei kurandum dib tenen nang asi, “Nun kwityabwe teleb,” ebdeibmasing. Tonda, nun kwit Akwila ab er ner Priskila ab ara sun nirya asi, “Nun Du si deici aryi nun kwityabwe teleb,” ebdeibmasiring. Tonda, sun nang bitinyi ai buluraming dib tenen nang nirya asi, “Nun kwityabwe teleb,” ebdeibmasing.

Sun akatei ara Efesus atei kuramingnyi dib tenen nang nirya ara sunsi, “Nun kwityabwe teleb,” ebdeibmasing. Ura, nunda dib tenen nang aryi ebdandoka, “Nun kwityabwe nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang,” tenen irirdaramib to, sunci boukwe kiboka mamun iribdandarur.
Tonda, ni Paulus ni taruk aryi kerek sekeibmasin ara, “Ni kwityabwe teleb,” eboka kerek sekeibmasin.
Unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus bisi boukwe kum kibte uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi, “Bindobdarur,” eboka sungdongona teleb. Maranata. “Nai Du o, minola yuryarum,” tenen ato ebman.
Nun Du Erebdobnyi Yesus biryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb.
Ni Paulus biryi sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang nirya ati boukwe weik kusunun ati ebman. Amin.

Ni Paulus ab nun kwit dib tenenanyi Timotius ab aryi sunda Korintus atei kurandum dib tenen nang asi kerek sengna ton kerek sekeibmasinim. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ni Paulus biti teleb tenebnou to, nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi nisi bokdonoknou uca, nira nun Du uram Teleb Uram eterebde banunyi kunun ati ebman.

Ati, nunci sunda Korintus atei kurandum nang ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi naboka bulubdeibsou nang asi kerek sekeibmasinim. Tonda, a kerek sengna deici nunci sunda Akhaya mutuk nirya kurandum dib tenen nang nirya ababyi nisintum kerek sekeibmasinim.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai ab nun Du ab aryi sunsi antanirdeirisina teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun Du Yesus Kristus Er Nai kobdob kurutnyi bira diboka ninyi bico tenesina deyoknyi kurur. A deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai bisi, “Ei, nun Nai,” enun. Tonda, nun Du Er Nai Imtamnyi bira diboka sun mambul dinyi doramingnyi nang kanya asi teleb kurdeirisina deyoknyi kurur. A deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai bisi, “Ei, nun Nai,” enun.

Dib tenen kum nang ara, “Teleb Uram nun li,” tenen nunda dib tenen nang asi malyi kiminingsingnyi ababyi, yuk deyok yuk-yuk deyok aryi mambul kanya boramibyi ababyi, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun kanya teleb kubdeibde basurur. Ara, nun Nai biryi nunda mambul kanya bon nang asi teleb kubdeibde basurur ara, “Yuk nang ababyi mambul kanya boraming asi biting ura, sun kanya neiktoto teleb kubdeibting,” tenen nun kanya teleb kubdeibde basurur.

Ara, nun Du Kristus tukwetam tuba kuramwe asi sun dib tenen kum nang aryi Erti, “Obtibyi,” tenen mambul weik kurdeirin dinyi yuk-yuk ilinto asi kareramnyi. Ani, ukuryok ara ninyi aryi nunda nun Du Er milin nang ababyi neiktoto mambul weik kurdeirin dinyi yuk-yuk ilinto asi kareransing uca, nun kanya ara langdeiboka iya mambul kuransir. Ba, nunci nun Du milinub deyok aryi, nun bisibkaboka iya mambul weik kurdeirisin dinyi dororamib to, nunci neiktoto nun Du biriman aryi nun kanya asi teleb kurdeirisin dinyi langdeiboka dororamib. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun kanya asi teleb kubdeibde basurur ara nun Du biriman aryi teleb kubdeibde basurur ati ebman.

Ura, ninyi aryi nunda Teleb Uram bobaramib nang kanya asi mambul kibdeibsici ababyi, nun kanya teleb kuransir. Ara, nunci sunda nun uram keken nang ati, “Sun kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen nunci, “Ninyi aryi mambul kibdeibsingnyi ababyi, nunda teleb kanya bobmurubkwayeb,” tenenub. Tonda, nunci sunti ato tenesunub. “Sirya kobdob uki tum berekci ura, iya lemdeirisin dinyi dobdobting,” tenen nunci, “Ninyi aryi nunsi malyi kiminingsingnyi ababyi, nun teleb kanya bobmurubkwayeb,” tenunub. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunda mambul kanya bon nang asi teleb kubdeibsici ababyi, nunda teleb kanya bonub. Ara, nunci sunda nun uram keken nang kanya asi teleb kubdeibkwayeb ati, nun Nai biryi nunda Teleb Uram boban nang kanya asi teleb kubdeibde basurur ati ebman. Nunda malyi kiminingsin dinyi boranim cok, namin kanya tuba boranim. Dib tenen kum nang aryi nunda nun Du Er wa irmilin nang asi mambul kimdeirisunung to, sunbabyi mambul kimdeirisunung. Ba, nunci sun kanya yuk-yuk asi teleb kubdeibibyi uca, sunbabyi “Ninyi aryi nunsi mambul kibdeibsingnyi ababyi, nunci namin kanya bormururamibiryi, nun Du bisi tanglona kum uca milibkwayeb,” tenen kunubkwandum.

Nunci ninyi aryi malyi kiminingsin dinyi bormururamib to, sunbabyi malyi kiminingsin dinyi bormururandum. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun kanya mambul kuransir asi teleb kubdeibde basurur to, Erci sun kanya ababyi neiktoto teleb kubdeibde basurur. Nunci a dinyi tenen bingsunub deyok aryi, nunci sunti, “Tanglona kum uca nun Du bisi milibkwaming,” tenen katabum eboka dibde bunub.

Nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Nunda Asia mutuk bina kuramoubwe ba, sun dib tenen kum nang aryi nunsi mambul kurdeirisin dinyi ilinto takurdeiriransei. Nunci sunti, “Nun kuramib to diboka biksiting,” tenen ato ebmasib. Ati, Asia mutuk kuramuryi, nunci bisibkaboka iya mambul kiminingsin dinyi boramuburyi, nunci, “Mambul dinyi tukwetam nang mikib aryi bobman kum dinyi boramib se,” teneramuburyi, “Nunda dibmanto nang kunmab,” tenen kuramoubwe.

Tola uram kuma. Ninyi aryi nunsi mambul weik kimnansei uca, nunci, “Dibmanto nang diboka kunmab,” teneramoubwe. A mambul dinyi nirya boramoubwe ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunti minob teleb teneansou tok boramoubwe. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Iya mambul dinyi ur bobting,” teneansou. Ara, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi mikib tentok aryok nunsi lebdeibkwansute,” tenen bikwamoubwe ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti bisibkaboka mambul dinyi karebsou. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira iya mikibnyi kurur ci, sun din nang ababyi kam bukeibsute. Ati, ninyi aryi nunda dib tenen nang mambul weik kibsingnyi ababyi, nun Nai biryi nunsi diboka lebdeibsute ati ebman.

Ura, nun dibmanto nang ato kuramoubwe asi nun Nai Iya Mikibnyi biryi diboka lebdeibmasou. Tonda, ukuryok ababyi aminda ababyi nun Nai biryi nunsi lebdeibde basurur. Ati, nunci nun Nai tentok ati, “Lebmurubde binkwansir,” tenen dibde bunub.

Ara, sunci nunda Teleb Uram boban nang ati, “Wa irmilibkwayeb,” tenen molormilisumunyi ba, nun Nai biryi nunsi tuba lebdeibde binkwansir. Ura, ninyi ilinto aryi nunti molormiliransing ba, nun Nai biryi kisal dakoka lebdeibde basici uca, ninyi ilinto aryi, “Nun molona sirya kunubmar,” tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ebkwaming.

Nun kwityabwe, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou uca, ni ab, ni ab tonkwa kunub nang ab, ara tola dinyi tenena kum kunub ci, “Nun kanya dam aryi malyi tenen dinyi inibdeibdandoka ninyi urasintam aryi uram ulubyang dakwayeb,” tenena kum kunub ci, nunci ninyi nirya asi teleb kimdeirinub. Tonda, nunci nunukeiboka sunda Korintus atei nang asi teleb kimdeiriransoubwe ani, ukuryok ababyi teleb kimdeirisunub. Nunci nun kanya dam aryi, “Malyi dinyi ton kum kuramoubwe,” tenen bingdanub ci, nunci kilkil kanya boboka, “Ninyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi ton kum kuramoubwe,” eboka lak enub. Ura, nunci tukwetam nang aryi bikdob tenen dinyi deib aryi malyi dinyi kunubde kum banub. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal dakoka dobdobmasou to, nunci nun Nai uram deib aryi teleb dinyi kubde banub.

Nunci sunda Korintus nang asi kerek sekeibmasoubwe kerek sengna yuk-yuk deib aryi nunci lak en uram akwe eboka kerek sekeibmasoubwe. Ara, ikin uram ara sunci nukde binmanto kum uram ton bikmanto kum uram ton eboka kum kerek sekeibmasoubwe. Erda, lak bikmanto dinyi akwe kerek sekeibmasoubwe. A deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Uram ulubyang dangna kum kunub,” ebmasin. Ura, niryi sunti, “Niryi kerek sengnun uram deyok diboka bikniting,” tenesunun.

Ara, nun kerek sekeibmasoubwe uram deyok ati sunci ton dinyi bikdobmarum cok, yuk dinyi diboka kum bikmarum. A deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Niryi kerek sengnun uram diboka bikdobting,” tenesunun. Sunci nun kunubde baramib to asi aminda aryi diboka biksumunyi ura, sunci nunti, “Dib en uram akwe eransoubwe,” eboka kisal dakwansurum. Ura, nunbabyi sunda Korintus nang asi kisal dakwansib. Ara, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, nunci sunti, “Dib en uram diboka dobdobmai,” eboka kisal dakwansib.

Ati, niryi sunti, “Ni kwityabwe nisi dib tenesunung nang,” teneransise deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Liki bitinyi dirbinkwan,” teneransise. Ati, niryi ato tenebmase. “Makedonia mutuk kum binkwan cok, niryi sun Korintus atei kuboka dib tenen nang asi dirbinkwan. Ura, Korintus atei aryi anaboka Makedonia mutuk bindoka kubmanyi ani, Korintus atei tubto binkwan.” Ato tenebmase. Tonda, “Sun Korintus nang aryi niti, ‘Nun kwit, da birum,’ eboka bisik kona dobminikoka karebkwaning ba, niryi Korintus atei aryi anaboka Yudea mutuk binkwan,” tenebmase. Ati, niryi sunda Korintus atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang ati, “Liki bitinyi dirbindoka niryi sun kanya teleb kubdeibkwan,” teneranse. Ato teneransiryok, niryi sunsi liki bitinyi kum diryanmasise. Erda, yuma liki akwe diryanmasise ani, aminda aryi kum diryanmasise.

Ni kwityabwe. Niryi sunti, “Liki bitinyi diryankwansin,” teneransise ara talyi ati teneransise ati tenebmanurum do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, niryi, “Liki bitinyi diryankwan,” tenen ebmasise ara diboka ebmasise. Niryi ni kanya yuk aryi tenen dinyi deici aryi, “ato-ato kubkwan,” tenena kum kunun. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi eterebnici tok deib aryi, “Ato-ato kubkwan,” tenenun. Uca, niryi, “Ato-ato dinyi diboka kunubkwan,” ebmanyi ura, niryi minola, “Ato-ato dinyi diboka kunubkwan en uram kum kunubkwan,” ena kum kurantinyi.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Er Uram diboka kunurutnyi kurur to, nunci sunsi lak eterenub uram ababyi dib en uram akwe kurur. Ati nunci, “Ato-ato dinyi ara dib kurur,” eramibyi ura, “A dinyi ara dib kum kurur,” ena kum kunub.

Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira Er Imtamnyi Mi kurur ci, Erda Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunurutnyi kurur ati ebman. Nun Du bira ni Paulus ab Silas ab Timotius ab aryi sunsi lak etereramabunyi biti ato ebman. Nun Du bira tola enanyi kum kurur deyok aryi, nunbabyi tola uram ton kum etereransoubwe. Nunci, “Ato-ato dinyi ara dib kurur,” eramoubwe ura, nunci, “A dinyi ara dib kum kurur,” kum eramoubwe. Erda, nunci nun Du biriman aryi dib en uram akwe etereransoubwe.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Kisal dakwan,” tenen erdeirisin uram ilinto asi erdeirisurur ara talyi ati kum erdeirisurur. Erda, nun Nai biryi nun Du Kristus biriman aryi a uram yuk-yuk nirya asi kunubde basurur. A deyok aryi, nunci nun Du Kristus biriman aryi, “Amin, Er Imtamnyi biryi Er Uram diboka kunubde basurur,” eramibiryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik enub.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, nunbabyi sunbabyi nun Du dam kun nang kuramibiryi, katabum eboka dib tenenub. Tonda, nun Nai biryi karebsou uca, nunci Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus dobdobmoubwe.

Nun Nai biryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi nun kanya dam karebmasou uca, nunci nundamnyi ati, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi amwetam kun nang diboka kunub,” tenen bingnub. Er Imtamnyi biryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus nun kanya dam karebmasou deib aryi, nunci kankana kanya bona kum uca, “Er Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibsou to diboka kunubkwansir,” tenen bingnub.

Ni kwityabwe. Niryi, “Korintus atei liki bitinyi binkwan,” teneransise ani, “Liki bitinyi kum binkwan,” teneransise ara talyi ati kum teneransise ati ebman. Erda, niryi sunti, “Kerena uram ebkarebnyei,” tenen niryi sun dam liki bitinyi kum diryanmasise. Tola kuma. Tola ati ebsitinyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi niti, “Tola ati ebmarim se,” eboka ur wenebnute.

Niryi, “Kerena uram ebkarebnyei,” ebmasin cok, nunda nun Du wa irmilin nang ara sunda dib tenen nang asi arukdeiboka, “Ato-ato kuboka dib tenebdarur,” eboka mambul kum kimdeirinub. Erda, sunbabyi katabum eboka nun Du bisi dib tenerandum deyok aryi, nunbabyi sunbabyi nun Du Er wa irmilin nang tonkwa kunub. Ati, nunbabyi sunbabyi tonkwa wa irmilinub ara sun kanya kilkil kubdeibkwayeb ati wa irmilinub ati ebman.

Ati, Ni kwityabwe. Niryi sunsi minob diryanmasise ba, sunda dib tenen nang kankan asi tonyi biryi iya malyi kun dinyi kunubde baramwe uca, ni kanya mambul weik kibdeibnou. Ati, niryi, “Mambul kanya tubto bobnyei,” tenen, “Niryi kerena uram tamuboka ebkarebnyei,” tenebmase ura, niryi, “Korintus atei tamuboka kum dirbinkwan,” tenebmase.

Niryi sunsi boukwe weik kusunun deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Mambul kubdeibnyei,” tenesunun. Ati, niryi sunsi wenebsitinyi uca, sunbabyi nibabyi mambul kanya borantibyi. Sunbabyi mambul kanya bobdate deyok aryi, ninyi tentok ababyi ni kanya teleb kum kubdeibnute ati ebman.

Ura, niryi, “Korintus atei minola kum binkwan,” tenebmasiryok, niryi sunsi kerek sengna ton kerek sekeibmasise. Ara, niryi sunti, “Mambul kibdeibkwan,” tenen a kerek sengna kum kerek sekeibmasise. Erda, niryi, “Korintus atei tamuboka binmanyi ura, ni kanya mambul tubto kibdeibningnyei,” tenen kerek sekeibmasise. Sunda ni boukwe weik kusunun nang kurandum deyok aryi, sunci ni kanya asi teleb kubdeibsindate ati ato ebmasin. Ati, niryi, “Ni kanya kilkil kurdeirinin dinyi ara sun kanya ababyi kilkil kurdeirirur,” teneransisiryi, kerek sengna kerek sekeibmasise.

Ati, niryi sunsi kerek sekeibmasise ara ni kanya mambul weik kubnou ba, engen weik kanya bobmasiryok, kerek sekeibmasise. Ara, niryi, “Sun kanya lukeibkwan,” tenen kum kerek sekeibmasise. Erda, sunci ni Paulus biti, “‘Erci nunsi langdeiboka boukwe weik kusurur,’ tenen bikniting,” tenen kerek sekeibmasise.

Ba, sun kankan aryi kurandanyi bira iya malyi kun dinyi dobmou uca, nun nirya asi mambul weik kibdeibmasou ati ebman. Anyi bira nibabyi malyi kibdeibmanou cok, erci sunda Korintus nang ilinto asi bikdob malyi kibdeibmasou. Anyi bira iya malyi dinyi dobmou bok, sun kankan asi kurandum nang ton nang ara, “Malyi dinyi ton kum dobmou,” tenerandum. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Sun nirya asi malyi kibdeibmasou,” tenen kum ebkwan. Ato ebmatinyi ura, niryi bisibkaboka uram aryi ou nebdeibmatinyi.
Sun kankan asi ninyi ilinto aryi anyi biti, “Iya malyi kun dinyi kubmou asi wenebkwayeb,” eboka wenebmandau. A kunum sirya wenebmandau deyok aryi, sunci anyi bisi tabakoka wenebmunyei.

Erda, sunci anyi biryi malyi kubmou dinyi asi tuba kum teneibmun ci, er ab antanibdeibdandarur. Tonda, sunci, “Nun kwit ara bisibkaboka iya mambul kanya bobcei,” tenen er kanya asi teleb kubdeibdarur.
Ati, sunci anyi bisi bindoka, “Nunci kansi boukwe weik tuba kukunub,” ebdarur. “Sunci ato kubdarur,” tenen ebkatabdeiboka ebdeibmasin.

Niryi minob ura, “Malyi kunanyi bisi wenebdarur,” eboka kerek sekeibmasise ara, “Ni ebdeibtinyi uram nirya asi diboka kekebting do kum do tenen biktinyi,” tenen kerek sekeibmasise. Ura, sunci a malyi kunanyi bisi sirya wenebmarum deyok aryi, niryi sunti, “Niryi ebdeibmase uram sirya kunubmai,” tenen bingsunun.

Ura, sunci anyi bisi, “Kan malyi kubmumwe to tuba kum teneibkwayeb,” ebkwandum ati, nibabyi anyi malyi kubmou to tuba kum teneibkwan. Ura, niryi, “A malyi kun dinyi tuba kum teneibkwan,” tenenun ara sunda Korintus atei nang aryi anyi biti tulum kanya tuba kum bobkwandum ati ato tenenun. Tola kuma. “Nun Du Kristus biryi ni tenen kanya diboka bingnurur,” tenen niryi diboka ebmasin.

Niryi anyi biryi malyi dobmou dinyi asi tuba kum teneibkwan ara, “Isa sienyi si Iblis biryi nunsi muna obdongobsicei,” tenenun deyok aryi a malyi kun dinyi tuba kum teneibkwan. Isa sienyi bira, “Sakeibtinyi,” tenen, “Tulum kanya iya bobting,” tenen nunda dib tenen nang asi dirbundoka marmun yisurur. Nunci a dinyi diboka bingnub.

Ura, niryi, “Troas atei bindoka nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram eterebkwan,” tenen binmase ura, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi bublan kukeibnou uca, ninyi ilinto aryi, “Teleb Uram kekebkwayeb,” tenebmai.

Ninyi ilinto dib tenebmai bok, ni kanya ara teleb kum kuranou. Ara, ni kwit Titus bisi Troas dam kum eibmase deyok aryi, ni kanya mambul kuranou. Ati, niryi sun Troas atei kuboka dib tenen nang ab bokdanmoubwe ura, niryi anaboka Makedonia mutuk binmase.

Ura, nira mambul kanya boranse bok, niryi Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei, ni Nai,” enun. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang asi tuba-tuba boboka menekde basurur ci, nunsi muna kimdongon dinyi karebde basurur. Nun Nai biryi karebmasou uca, nunci dantam-dantam bindoka nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak eterebde banub. Ura, nun dantam-dantam baramibiryi, nun Du Yesus biti bingna dinyi lak kimnub. Nun Du biti eterenub dinyi ara tong teleb dinyi ato kurur cok, ninyi kanya teleb kurdeirsurur ati ebman.

Nunda nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang ara nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam aryi tong teleb dinyi ato kunub. Ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi biryi lebdeibde basurur nang dam bindoka sundamnyi waningminingdaramingnyi nang ababyi dam bindoka nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde banub. A deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Er wa irmilin nang ati, “Ni mabwe,” tenesurur.

Nunci nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde banub bok, ton nang ara, “Teleb Uram nun li se,” tenen, “Iya malyi tong tenen dinyi ato,” teneraming uca, iya din dinyi dobdobkwaming. Ba, yuk nang ara Teleb Uram kekebingiryok, “A uram ara iya teleb tong tenen dinyi ato kurur,” tenen dororaming uca, iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwaming. Tukwetam nang kankan bindoka nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterermuruna ara iya ikin wa kurur ati ebman. Ninyi tentok ababyi ara ato wa in dinyi asi sunglona kum uca kunubte.

Er Imtamnyi Uram eteren nang ilinto ara co bok ati tula kiringnamingiryok, Er Imtamnyi Uram etereraming. Ara, “Co bok ilinto karebsiting,” tenen etereraming. Ba, nunda, “Co bok karebsiting,” eboka kum molonub. Nunci uram ulubyang kum dakde banub. Erda, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bokdonoksou,” tenen bingdanub ati, dib en uram akwe enub. Ara, nunci nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kuramibiryi, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi dib en uram akwe lak eterenub.

Ura, sun kankan asi ton nang aryi nunti ato teneransing. “A nang ara nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kum kunung ati, sunci sundamnyi ati, ‘Nunda nun Du biryi bokdonoksou nang kunub,’ erdaranding se. Ati, unato ati a nang aryi, ‘Nunda nun Du biryi bokdonoksou nang kunub,’ eboka tamuboka ebkalibmasing do?” Ninyi ton nang ara ato teneransing bok, nunci nundamnyi erebdeibdandoka talyi uram kum esunub. Nunda nun Du biryi bokdonoksou nang diboka kunub ati sunbabyi sirya bingsindarur deyok aryi, nunci nundamnyi kum ererdeirirdanub. Yuk nang ababyi etererbarkiringnamingiryi, kerek sengna bobaraming. A kerek sengna umbura aryi kerek sengdeirin dinyi ara, “A nang ara nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang kunung ati sunci dobdobdarur,” eboka kerek sengdeiriraming. Ati, nunbabyi, “Ninyi aryi nunsi dib teneboka dobdobsiting,” tenen ato kerek sengna borantibyi uca, sunsi karebkwanub do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, nunci sunti, “Ato kerek sengna sekeibsumunyi uca, yuk nang aryi nunsi dib teneboka dobdobsiting,” eboka molobkwanub do? Ato tenen kum. Nun eterena deib aryi nun Du biryi sun nun uram keken nang asi dib tenen dinyi ab mourdeirin dinyi karebde barur. A deyok aryi nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonoksou nang diboka kunub ati lak kurur ati ebman. A deyok aryi, nunci ato kerek sengna kum bonub.

Sun Korintus nang ara nun eteresina uram deib aryi dib tenen dinyi ton du moun dinyi ton dobdobmarum deyok aryi, sunci nunti kerek sengna kelakuan baik ato dinyi kurandum ati ebman. Nunci sunsi Teleb Uram etereransoubwe uca, du moubsou deyok aryi, sunda nunti kisal dangsina kerek sengna ato kurandum. Ara, ninyi nirya ara sun kankan kuboka du mousin dinyi asi asing eiriransing uca, sunci nunti, “Nun Du biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kunung,” tenen bingsunung. Nunci sunsi boukwe weik kusunub deyok aryi, nunci sunti, “Nun taram tam deiboka bobanub kerek sengna kelakuan baik,” tenesunub.

Sunda Korintus nang ara nun lak etereransoubwe uram deib aryi dib tenerandau ani, ukuryok ababyi dib tenerandum. Ati, sunbaramnyi ara kikliboka nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi kerek sekeibsou kerek sengna ato kurandum. A kerek sengna ara tinta deib aryi kum kerek sekeibsou. Erda, Er Imtamnyi iya Kam kurutnyi Er Kanya Roh Kudus deib aryi sun kanya dam asi kerek sekeibsou. Ba, nun Du Yesus biryi kerek sekeibsou ara keil ila dam aryi kum kerek sekeibmou. Erda, sun kanya dam kerek sekeibsou ara Teleb Uram nun eterenub uram asi sun kanya dam kerek sekeibsou.

Ura, nunci kankana kum uca, “Nun Teleb uram etereramoubwe ba, nun Du biryi sun Korintus nang asi dib tenen dinyi ab du mourdeirin dinyi ab karebde baramwe,” tenen bingsunub. Ato tenen bingnub deyok aryi nunci sun Korintus nang ati kankana kum uca, “Nun kerek sengna kelakuan baik kunung,” tenen bingsunub. Ara, yuk nang aryi sun dib tenen dinyi ab du moun dinyi ab eibmangnyi uca, nunda Teleb uram eteren nang ati, “Nun Du biryi diboka bokdonokmou nang kunung,” tenen bikwansing. Nun Du Yesus Kristus sunsi du mourdeiriransounyi biryi nunsi a dinyi lak kibdeibsou deyok aryi, nun kankana kum uca Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi kuboka ato enub.

Nunda nundamnyi ati, “Mikib nang kunub uca, nun yuk aryi du mourdeirin dinyi wa iboka karebkwayeb,” tenerdana kum kunub. Erda, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi mikib karebde basurur deib aryi nunci mikib kuboka wa irmilinub,” tenen bingdanub.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, nun mikib kuboka wa irmilinub ci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi karesurur mururdeirisin dinyi ukuryok dinyi asi dobdobdarur,” eboka lak kimdeirinub. Minob uram ara, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Sun malyi kun dinyi kurandum deyok aryi wenebmasinto nang kundarur,” eboka lak eransou. Ba, ukuryok mururdeirisin uram deib aryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi nunsi kam kurdeirisin dinyi karebde basurur.

Er Imtamnyi biryi Musa biriman aryi mururdeirisin dinyi yuma kobdob dinyi karebsou ara ninyi kum lebdeibsou. Erda, wenen dinyi ara din dinyi boyansou. A mururdeirisin uram ara, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram asi Er Imtamnyi biryi keil deici aryi kerek sekeibmou. Kerek sekeibmou ci, Erci milil weik dinyi karebmou ci, a uram asi Musa bisi karebmou. Uca, Musa urasin ababyi milil weik tiya abkarabmou ba, sun Israel yala nang asing imum kunmou uca, Musa urasin asi dibdenmana kum kubmou. Musa urasintam aryi kuboka milil ara kum danabdoro banmou bok, sun Israel yala nang aryi, “Musa urasintam ara milil weik,” tenebmai.

Ura, mururdeirin dinyi minob kerek sengdeirin dinyi ara weneboka din dinyi boyansou ara milil weik dinyi kuramwe bok, ukuryok dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi wa iboka karebde basurur dinyi ara bisibkaboka iya milil dinyi kurur ati ebman.

Mururdeirin dinyi minob dinyi ara ninyi wenesin dinyi boyangaramwe bok, milil weik dinyi kuramwe. Ba, mururdeirin dinyi ukuryok dinyi deib aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenen ninyi dorosurur deyok aryi, bisibkaboka iya milil tenen dinyi kurur.
Ukuryok mururdeirisin dinyi ara bisibkaboka iya milil dinyi kurur deyok aryi, nunci kiklibdeibtibyi uca, “Minob mururdeirin dinyi milil ara kum dandobwe,” ebtibyi.
Minob mururdeirin dinyi ara tiya dinyi akwe kuramwe bok, milil kuramwe. Ba, ukuryok mururdeirin dinyi ara tanglona kum uca iya kun dinyi kurur deyok aryi, bisibkaboka iya milil dinyi kurur.
Ati, Ni kwityabwe. Nunci, “Mururdeirin dinyi ukuryok karebsou ara iya kubkwande,” tenen dibde bunub deyok aryi, nunci kankana kum uca a ukuryok mururdeirisin uram lak ebde banub.

Minob ura Musa biryi mururdeirin dinyi minob dinyi dobdobmou ura, erci aling doboka er urasintam asi libdanmou. Ati, erci, “Milil dinyi kum danabdoro banmar ati, sun Israel yala nang asing eiboka bikingnyei,” tenen er urasintam asi libdanmou. Ba, nunda ukuryok mururdeirin dinyi doronub nang ara nun urasintam asi limdana kum kunub. Erda, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi mururdeirin dinyi ukuryok dinyi ara iya kubkwande,” tenen bingnub ci, Er Imtamnyi biryi mururdeirin uram lak enub.

Ba, sun Israel yala nang minob kuramnyi nang ara mururdeirin dinyi minob dinyi milil asi asing eiriramiryok, sun kanya ara kat weik kuramwe deyok aryi, dib kum teneramnyi. Ara, minob aryi kuboka ukuryok ababyi Musa Uram asing eiboka nukde banung cok, sunci dib en uram asi asing kum eirinung. Asing limdeirin aling ara sun asing limdeiriramwe ani, ukuryok ababyi limdeirirande. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kum kuraming deyok aryi, asing kum eibkatabmang ati ebmasin.

Ba, ukuryok ababyi sun Israel yala nang aryi Musa Uram asing eiboka nukeibingiryok, sunci asing eibkatabman kum nang ato kuraming ci, sun kanya dam aryi nun Du Yesus deyok ati dib en uram kum bingnung.
Ba, unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebingnyi nang ara asing eibkatabman ato kiboka dib en uram bikwaming.
Ura, nun Du Yesus bira nun kanya dam wa isurutnyi kurur. Ura, nun Du Yesus ninyi kanya wa isurutnyi nun dam kuransici uca, nunda tabwe lobdeibsou nang ato kimnub.

Ura, nunda dib tenen nang nirya ara urasin limdana kum libdandobmabiryi, nun Du Yesus Iya Telebnyi milil asi asing eiriranub ba, nun urasintam ababyi milil arabde basurur. Ara, nun Du Yesus ninyi kanya wa isurutnyi aryi kuboka iya milil dinyi asi asing dibdongo-dibdongo banub ba, nun Du Yesus biryi karesurur uca, nunci tabakdongo-tabakdongo nun Du Yesus Iya Telebnyi bito nang kiboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde banub.

Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi bico tenen kisal daksou deyok aryi, Erci nunsi wa karebsou uca, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde banub. Teleb Uram ara iya milil uram eterebde banub deyok aryi, nun kanya ilil kum kusurur.

Erda, nun kanya katabum esurur ba, nunci malyi kun dinyi nirya ati, “Nun li,” eboka lak enub. Ara, nunci alyi dinyi kunubde ban dinyi nirya ati, “Nun li,” tenen dongdongonub. Tonda, nunci, “Iniboka malyi dinyi kunubtibyi,” tenen kunubde ban dinyi nirya ati, “Nun li,” tenenub. Tonda, nunci, “Co bok kum yuk dinyi kum karebsiting,” tenen uram ulubyang uram dangna ababyi kum kunub. Tonda, nunda Er Imtamnyi Uram lak eterenub ara tola uram yungdongona kum uca lak eterenub. Erda, nunci dib en uram akwe lak eterenub uca, ninyi nirya ara sun kanya dam aryi, “A uram ara dib en uram,” tenen bikting. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Dib en uram akwe eboka eterenung,” tenen bingsurur ati ato ebmab.
