Nunda Teleb Uram eterenub ara, “Ninyi nirya ara dib en uram bikting,” tenen laktoto eterenub. Ba, ninyi ton nang ara nun eterenub uram deyok diboka kum bingnung. A nang ara asing kun nang ato kuramingiryi, dib en uram dib kum tenenung deyok aryi din nang ato kunung uca, iya din dinyi dobdobkwaming.

Isa sienyi bira, “Sun tukwetam nang nirya asi arukdeiboka tabwe debtinyi,” tenenanyi bira sun dib kum tenen nang asing kubdeibwe uca, sunci Teleb Uram berengna asi asing eibman kum kuraming. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus berengna ara Teleb Uram biriman aryi berengdeirisurur asi asing eibman kum kuraming. Nun Du Yesus bira Er Imtamnyi bitonyi diboka kurur. Ati, nunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Ato-ato kubde barutnyi kurur,” tenen bingnub uca, nunci Er Imtamnyi biti, “Ato-ato kubde barutnyi kurur,” tenen diboka bingnub ci.

Ara, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang ara nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde banub cok, nunci nundamnyi ererdeirirdana kum kunub. Erda, nunci nun Du Yesus Kristus si lak eboka, “Nun Du Yesus bitikwa nun Arungdeirisurutnyi Iya Erebdobnyi kurur,” enub. Tonda, nunci nundamnyi ati ato eboka lak eramib. “Nun Du biryi nunsi wa karebsou uca, nunda tukwetam bun nang ato kuramibiryi, sun nun uram keken nang asi dirnilinub,” eramib.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira, “Kunuk dam aryi kuboka berengna berekeibkwan,” ebmounyi biryi nun kanya dam berekeibsou. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “‘Er Imtamnyi bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur,’ tenen bikniting,” tenen nun kanya dam berekeibsou. Tonda, Erci, “Kristus biryi kunurur dinyi asi asing eibingnyi uca, sunci Ni Imtamnyi biti, ‘Iya Erebdobnyi,’ tenen bikniting,” tenen nun kanya dam berekeibsou. A deyok aryi, nunci nundamnyi ererdeirirdana kum kunub ati ebmab.

Ba, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde banub nang ara mitang nang kuramibiryok, nunda Teleb Uram ara iya bikdob uram lak eramib. Nunda tukwetam bun nang akwe kuramibiryi, tukwe iniboka kiknin moyok ara ou sakoka minola tolorande moyok kunub. Ba, nun lak eramib uram ara iya bikdob dinyi kurur cok, bona bon dinyi iya teleb dinyi ato kurur. Er Imtamnyi bira mikib nang nirya asi bisibkaboka iya Mikibnyi kurur bok, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang ara mitang nang akwe kunub. Ati, ninyi nirya aryi, “Er Imtamnyi bira Teleb Uram eterena deib aryi bisibkaboka iya mikib dinyi wa irur,” tenen bikwamnyi ati, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang ara mitang nang akwe kunub. Nun yuk aryi mikib dinyi wa ibmana kum kuramib ati ebmasin.

Nunda Teleb Uram eterebde banub nang ati ninyi aryi, “Obtibyi,” tenen malyi dinyi kiminingsunung bok, iya kum oransing. Tonda, nunci mambul dinyi ilinto amuma-amuma boramibiryok, nunci iya mambul kanya kum bonub. Ati, nunci mambul dinyi ilinto doramibiryok, nunci, “Nun Du biryi nunsi lebdeibkwansir,” tenenub ci, iya mambul kanya kum bonub.

Ninyi aryi nunti, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringsunung. Domkiringsunung bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum tangloransir. Ninyi aryi nunsi kulab-kulab eransing. Kulab-kulab eransing bok, nun kam tuba buramib ci, tanglona kum uca Teleb Uram eterenub.

Sun dib tenen kum nang aryi nun Du Yesus bisi mambul weik kibdeiboka obmai to, nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang ababyi neiktoto mambul weik kibdeiboka on dinyi tuba-tuba doronub. Ara, nunci, “Nun Du dibmounyi bisi kam tubto bukeibmou mikib ara nunbabyi lak kibsute uca, nun nong ab nun kanya ab neiktoto kam kurdeirin dinyi dobdobtibyi,” tenenub. Ato tenenub ci, nunbabyi nun Du Yesus biryi doramwe mambul weik dinyi dorormilinub.

Ara, nunda nun Du Yesus bisi milinub nang ara kam tuba kunub bok, ninyi aryi nunti, “Obkwayeb,” tenen tuba-tuba talesunung ati ebman. Ara, nun Du Yesus si deyok aryi, nunci osina ato dinyi tuba-tuba doronub. Ara, nunci, “Nun Du Yesus kam kurdeirisin mikib ara nunda dibmanto nang dam lak kibkwansir,” tenen nunci osina ato dinyi tuba-tuba doronub.

Ati, Ni kwityabwe. Nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang ara mambul kibdeiboka osin to dinyi doronub bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kam kurdeirisin dinyi karesurur. Tonda, sunda nun uram kekeransurum nang ababyi Teleb Uram deib aryi kam kurdeirisin dinyi dororandum ati ebman.

Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato eboka kerek sekeiamnyi. “Niryi Er Imtamnyi biti, ‘Lebdeibkwanir,’ tenen dib teneranse ba, Erci nisi lebdeibmanou deyok aryi, niryi Er si erebdeiboka lak enun.” Ura, nunbabyi neiktoto Er Imtamnyi biti, “Lebdeibkwansir,” tenen dib tenenub deyok aryi, Er si erebdeiboka lak enub.

Ati, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun Du Yesus dibmounyi bisi kam bukeibmounyi biryi nunbabyi kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen bingnub ci, Er Imtamnyi si erebdeiboka lak enub. Ara, nunbabyi sunbabyi nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunub asi nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus biriman aryi kam bukeibkwansir. Bukeibsici ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunbabyi sunbabyi erebdeiboka Er urasintam aryi tikeibkwansir.

Ati, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde banub nang ara iya mambul dinyi ton obmasinto dinyi ton doronub ara talyi ati kum doronub. Erda, sunci sun kanya dam aryi kam kurdeirisin dinyi dobdobkwandum ati, nunci obmasin to dinyi doronub. Ara, nun Nai biryi kisal dakoka lebdeibde barur ara ninyi ilinto tabakde banung ci, dib tenenung. Uca, ninyi ilinto aryi tabakde banung ci, nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebtingiryi, Er Imtamnyi si weik ebting.

Ati, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen bingnub deyok aryi, nun mambul kanya kum bonub. Nun nong ara mitang kuboka tabakdongo-tabakdongo dibmanto dinyi ato kimnansir bok, nunci uki-uki nirya kubde banub ci, nun kanya dam aryi ukuryok dinyi kam kurdeirisin dinyi doronub.

Ara, ninyi aryi nunsi mambul weik kiminingnansing bok, nunci a mambul kurdeirisin dinyi ati, “Caknam dinyi aca,” tenen, “Tiya dinyi aca,” tenen bingnub. Nunci a mambul dinyi boramib deib aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi utotoa bisibkaboka iya ererdeirisin dinyi karebkwansir. A karebkwansir dinyi ara iya milil dinyi kurur ati, nunci kiklibdeiboka a mambul kimdeirisin dinyi nirya ati, “Tiya dinyi aca, ur bobkwayeb,” tenenub.

Ati nunci, “Asing eibmanto dinyi ara tiya dinyi aca,” tenen asing eibmanto dinyi nunukeiboka kum teneinub. Erda, nunci, “Asing eibman kum dinyi ara iya kurur dinyi,” tenen asing eibman kum dinyi asi nunukeiboka teneinub.

Nunda ukuryok tukwetam aryi kuboka kam tuba kuramibiryi, nun nong ara diramib dinyi tuba kuransir. Nun nong diramib dinyi ara tiya don ai ato dinyi kuransir. Ura, nun sirya dibmabyi ura, nun nong ara tiya don ai ato dinyi kum dandobkwansir bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeiboka nun yuk-yuk asi ukuryok nong karebkwansir. Nunci a dinyi tenen diboka bingnub. Ukuryok nong karebkwansir ara imtam ai don dinyi ato kikniboka karebkwansir uca, nunda eikai umbura aryi iya kubkwayeb. Ukuryok nong karebkwansir dinyi ara ninyi taruk aryi kiknin dinyi kuma. Erda, nun iya kubkwayeb ai asi nun Nai Imtamnyi taruk aryok kiknibkwansir.

Ba, ukuryok ara tukwetam tuba kuramibiryok, nunda tukwetam nong ara tiya don ai ato dinyi umbura aryi tuba kuramib. Kuramibiryok, nunci, “Iya kubkwayeb nong bol dobdobtibyi uca, nunci akai iya ai umbura aryi kurantibyi se,” tenen engen kanya bonub. Nun dobdobkwayeb imtam nong ara iya teleb ongon aling kurur ati, nunci, “Ongobtibyi se,” tenen kuramib.

Ati ukuryok ababyi nunci, “Ongon aling ongon kum nang ato kibibyei,” tenen, “Iya teleb ongon aling ongobtibyi,” tenen kuramib. Ongon aling sirik ati ato kum ebman. Erda, imtam nong ara nun Nai biryi nunsi karebkwansir nong ati ebman.

Ukuryok ara tukwetam ai umbura aryi tuba kuramib. Ara, tiya don ai ara keis ol ai doraming ato dinyi umbura aryi kuramib deyok aryi, nunci engen kanya bonub. Tonda, mambul weik kanya bonub. Ati, nunci, “Nun nong iya kum dandobsicei,” tenen nunci, “Imtam nong dobdobtibyi ara iya teleb ongon aling ato ongobtibyi se,” tenenub. Ati, nunci, “Nun diramib to dinyi deibloboka iya kam burdeirisin dinyi unuboka dobdobtibyi,” tenen dibde bunub.

Ura, “Iya kam bukeibtinyi uca, ukuryok nong ara dina kum dinyi dobdobkwaming,” tenen a dinyi nirya kiknibminikmasounyi bira nun Nai tentok a kurur. Tonda, nun Nai biryi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi nun kanya dam karebmasou. Ara, nunci, “Nun Nai biryi ebdeibsou tok kunubkwansir,” tenen diboka bikwamoubwe ati, Erci Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus asi nun kanya dam karebmasou.

Nun Nai biryi Er Kanya asi nun kanya dam karebmasou deyok aryi, nunci kankana kum kunub ci, katabum kanya boboka ato dib tenenub. Ara, “Tukwetam nong ara tiya don ai ato dinyi umbura aryi tuba kuramibiryok, nun Du Yesus iya kurur sokon damtoto kum kuramib,” tenen diba ati bingnub.
Ara, nunda kam kuramib ara nun Nai bisi dib tenena deib aryi kam kuramib. Ara, asing eirin dinyi deib aryi kam kum kuramib. Erda, asing eirin kum dinyi deib aryi kam kuramib.

Ati, nunci kankana kum uca dib teneramibiryi, “Tukwetam nong deiblobtibyi uca, nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa Er ai dam iya kurantibyi,” tenen lak enub. Nun Du ab tonkwa kuna ara, nunci, “Iya nunukeiboka wimdeirinub uca, diboka dobdobtibyi,” tenen dinyi kusurur ati ebman.

Ati, nunci, “Nun Du ab tonkwa kubtibyi,” tenenub deyok aryi, nunci, “Nun Du kanya teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen kunub. Ara, nunda tukwetam tuba kuramib ababyi, imtam kubkwamib ababyi, nunci nun Du Yesus teleb tenerur to kunubde binkwayeb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb teneansou tok, nun Du Yesus bira nunda dib tenen nang yuk-yuk aryi kunubde banub to diboka lilibkwansir ati ebman. Ara, nun Du Yesus iya erebdob bun sokon bukci ura, Erci nunda dib tenen nang ababyi Er urasintam aryi naboka bulubdeibkwansir. Ura, nun Du Yesus biryi nun yuk-yuk aryi kunubde baramibyi tok dekeibkwansir. Ara, tukwetam nong tuba kuramibiryok, teleb dinyi kunubde baramibyi uca, Erci nunsi dekeiboka kisal dakwansir. Ba, malyi dinyi kunubde barantibyi uca, Erci nunsi dekeiboka wenebsute.

Ati, nunci, “Nun Du bira nun kunubde baramibyi tok diboka lilibkwansir,” tenen bingnub ci, nunci ilil kanya boboka, “Nun Nai Arungdeirisurutnyi teleb tenesurur dinyi kunubkwayeb,” tenenub. Ato tenen ilil kanya bonub deyok aryi, nunci ninyi nirya asi, “Nun Du uram Teleb Uram dobdobdarur,” eboka lak eterebde banub. Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Niryi bokdonokse nang diboka kunung,” tenen bingsurur. Ba, sunbabyi sun kanya dam aryi neiktoto, “A nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kunung,” tenen biksindate.

“Nunda Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonoksou nang kunub,” tenen bingdanub ati, nunci sunti, “Dib tenebsindate,” eboka tubto kum molobkwayeb. Erda, nun du mourisurur ba, teleb dinyi ukuramib to sunci asing eiboka diboka bingnansurum. Ati, sunci nun du mourisurur dinyi asing eirirandum deib aryi nunti kisal dakoka, “Er Imtamnyi bokdonokmou nang,” eboka lak ebkwansindate ati ato ebman. Ato kubdate uca, sunci sun nunsi dib tenesin kum nang asi uram dekeibdate ba, sekwetebdate. A nang ara asing eirin dinyi ara alib lang-lang en dinyi deib aryi ninyi kisal dangnaming. Ba, asing eirin kum dinyi ara nun kanya dam aryi tenen dinyi deib aryi kisal kum dangnaming.

Ninyi aryi nunti, “Luba talebdob nang aca,” teneransing bok, nunda, “Er Imtamnyi wa irmilibkwayeb,” tenen, “‘Luba talebdob nang kunung,’ tenebsitingnyi ababyi nunti teleb,” tenen kunub. Ba, nunda dikum kanya bon nang diboka kunub ci, nunci sunda dib tenen nang ati, “Teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen ato kanya bonub ati ebman.

Nun Du Kristus nunsi boukwe weik kusurur deyok aryi, nunci, “Nunci ukurlona kum uca nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde binkwanub,” tenen kunub. Ati, nunci ato tenen bingnub. “Nun Du tentok dibmou ara nunda dib tenen nang nirya lebdeibkwamasou ati dibmasou. Nun Du bira nunti dibmasou ati, nun nirya ara nun kanya dam malyi tenen dinyi sirya dibdeibdanmoubwe nang ato kibmoubwe,” tenen bingnub.

Nun Du bira nun nirya ati dibmasou ara nunci, “Nun kanya teleb tenebtibyi tok kunubkwayeb,” tenebkwamoubwe ati kum dibmasou. Erda, nunci, “Nun Du nunti dibmasounyi Er kanya teleb kurur tok kunubtibyi,” tenebkwamoubwe ati, Erci nunti dibmasou. Nun Du bira nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibmounyi biti ato ebman.

Ati, ukuryok aryi kuboka nunci tukwetam nang aryi tenen dinyi deib aryi ninyi tentok ababyi, “Anyi bira telebnyi do kum do?” tenen kum kunub. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi tenen dinyi deib aryi nunci yuk nang ati, “A nang ara teleb nang do kum do?” tenen kunub. Tonda, minob ura nunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti teneramoubwe ara tukwetam nang aryi tenen dinyi deib aryi teneramaburyok, nunci Erti, “Tukwetamnyi bica,” teneramoubwe. Ba, ukuryok ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus tenena deib aryi tenenub ci, nunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Ninyi Lemdeirisurutnyi,” tenenub.

Nun Du bira nunti dibmasou deyok aryi, unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kibingnyi ara nun Nai biryi tamuboka kiknibdeibmou nang kunung. Minob malyi kunubde baramoubwe dinyi ara tuba kum kubwe. Asing diboka dibdendarur. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi ukuryok kanya kiknibdeiboka karebsou deyok aryi, nunci Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur dinyi kunubde banub.

Ura, a ukuryok dinyi nirya asi nun kanya dam aryi wa iboka kiknisurutnyi bira nun Nai Imtamnyi kurur. Nun Nai bira nun Du Yesus biriman aryi Er ab nunda ordana nang ato kuramoubwe ab antanibdeibsou. Sirya antanibdeibsou ura, Erci nunda Er wa irmilin nang asi, “Antanirdeirina uram lak ebdarur,” eboka takubdeibsou.

Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus biriman aryi Er ab sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang ara sun Erti, “Nun li,” tenen nang ab antanibdeibmasou. Ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi malyi dinyi kuramoubwe bok, nun Nai biryi a malyi kun dinyi asi tuba kum teneirisurur. Tonda, Erci nunsi, “Antanirdeirin uram lak ebdarur,” eboka takubdeibsou.

Ati, nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram ermurun nang kunub cok, nunci ninyi nirya asi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou antanirdeirisin dinyi dobdobdarur,” eboka erkatardeiriramib. Nun yuk aryi ato eboka erkatardeirina kum kunub. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun biriman aryi, “Ni ab antanibdeibdandarur,” eboka ebkatabdeibde basurur. Ati, nunci nun Du Yesus si deici aryi erkatana uram enub ara, “Er Imtamnyi ab antanibdeibdandarur,” enub.

Nun Du bira malyi dinyi ton kum kuamwe bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Erda yuk nang aryi malyi kun dinyi bobmunyi bisi wenebdeibmou. Ara, nunda malyi kuramoubwe nang asi nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kiboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kibkwamoubwe ati nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus bisi wenebmou.

Nunda Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang kunub ci, nunci sunsi ato eboka ebkatabdeibkwinsib. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, ‘Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenen dobdobmasou ati, sunci, ‘Talyi ati kum dobdobsou,’ tenen Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang diboka kubdarur.”
Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Er Uram umbura aryi ato esurur.
“Ni kanya teleb tenebmase tum berekmou ura, Niryi sun molonin uram kekebmasise.
Tonda, Niryi, ‘Lebkwan,’ tenebmase tum berekmou ura, Niryi sunda, ‘Lebdeibsurum,’ eboka molon nang dam tingyandoka lebdeibmasise,” ebmou.

Ura, nunci sunsi ato ebmasib. Dindarur. Ukuryok ara nun Nai Imtamnyi teleb teneamwe tum sirya berekmar. Tonda, nun Nai biryi, “Lebkwan,” teneansou uki tum sirya yanmar. A deyok aryi niryi sunsi, “Busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang diboka kubdarur,” ebmasin.

Nun kwityabwe. Nunci Teleb Uram eterebde banub cok, nunci, “Yuk nang asi mitik malyi dinyi tentok ababyi kibtibyi uca, sunci Teleb Uram dokdonokingyei,” tenen teleb dinyi akwe kunubde banub. Ati nunci, “Ninyi nirya aryi nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebting,” tenen, “Teleb Uram eterena deyok ati talyi ati ina ngilikingnyei,” tenen nunci nundamnyi diboka kalingdamibiryi, Teleb Uram eterena ati bisik sekte dinyi tentok ababyi kum kunub.

Erda, nunda Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang kunub ci, nunci, “Ninyi nirya ara nunti, ‘Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kunung,’ tenen biksiting,” tenen teleb dinyi akwe kunubde banub. Ati, ninyi aryi nunsi iya mambul kimdeirisin dinyi amuma-amuma asi kimdeirisunung bok, nunci mikib weik kuboka tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi wa irmilinub.

Ton tum ara ninyi aryi nunsi kulab-kulab eransing. Yuk tum ara ninyi wenen ai dongoransing. Yuk tum ara ninyi ilinto aryi, “Teleb Uram nun li,” tenen, “Obdankwamab kum,” tenen buluboka lilim weik eransing. Nunda bisibkaboka iya busul kuboka Teleb Uram eterebde banub uca, mambul weik doramib. Tonda, lukunda ababyi mana kum kuramib. Tonda, yuk tum ara kwaning ataransir.

Tonda, Teleb Uram eterebde banub ci, nunci lek kanya bonub. Tonda, bikdob dinyi bingna kanya bonub. Tonda, nunci yuk nang ati minola yu wengna kanya kum bonub. Tonda, namin kanya bonub. Tonda, nunda Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus dam kun nang kunub. Tonda, nunci yuk nang asi boukwe weik kunub ara sibambol ena dem deib aryi boukwe kum kimnub. Erda, nun kanya dam aryi boukwe weik diboka kunub.

Ato kunubde banub ci, nunci tola uram bai donokoka dib en uram akwe enub. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi mikib deib aryi Teleb Uram lak eterebde banub. Tonda, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi dobdobmasou,” tenen bingnub cok, nunda, “Isa ab er milin nang aryi Teleb Uram bisik sekingnyei,” tenen kalingnub. Ara, yin doun nang aryi, “Nun ordana nang aryi nunsi bisik seksingnyei,” tenen yin ab mar ab diboka douboka kalingnaming to, nunda Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang ababyi neiktoto kalingnub.

Ton tum ara ninyi aryi nunsi kisal dangnansing. Yuk tum ara ninyi aryi nunsi ina nglilingnansing. Ton tum ara ninyi aryi nunti, “Teleb dinyi akwe kunubde banung,” eboka nungdeiriransing. Yuk tum ara tola ati, “Malyi dinyi kunubde banung,” eboka nungdeiriransing. Nunda nundamnyi ati, “Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmasou nang diboka kunub,” tenen bingnub. Ba, ninyi ton nang aryi nunti, “A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang kibdeibdanmang,” teneransing.

Ton nang aryi nunti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmou nang,” tenen bingsunung. Ba, yuk nang aryi nunti, “Unato nang kunung do?” tenen kum bingnansing. Nunda mambul dinyi mitik kum boramib ati dibmanto nang ato kuramib. Dibmanto nang kuramibiryok, kam tuba buramib. Ninyi aryi nunsi kulab-kulab eransing. Kulab-kulab eransing bok, diboka kum oransing.

Nunda mambul kimdeirisin dinyi ilinto donub. Mambul dinyi ilinto donub cok, kilkil kanya tuba bonub. Nunda bona bon kum nang kunub. Bona bon kum nang kunub cok, nunci Teleb Uram eterenub deib aryi ninyi ilinto asi iya teleb dinyi langdeiboka bongkarenub. Tukwetam bona bon dinyi kum boramibiryok, nunci nun Du Yesus biriman aryi, “Imtam dinyi tukwetam dinyi nirya aryi nun dinyi kusurur,” tenen bingnub.

Nun kwityabwe Korintus atei nang. Nunci nun kanya yokloboka sunsi iya boukwe weik kusunub. Boukwe weik kusunub ci, nunci sunsi dib en uram ebmasib. Ara, kemdeirin uram deib aryi kum ebmasib. Erda, nun tenen kanya lak ebmasib cok, dib en uram ebmasib.

Nunda sunsi boukwe weik kusunub ci, nunci sunti, “Boukwe weik tuba kum kubkwayeb,” tenesina kum kunub. Ba, sunci nunsi boukwe weik kuransindau ani, ukuryok ara boukwe weik tuba kum kuransurum ati ebman.

Nunda sunsi boukwe weik kusunub ato, sunbabyi neiktoto nunsi boukwe weik kimsina teleb ati ebman. Nira sun nai bitonyi kunun deyok aryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenen ato ebmasin. Ati, nunci nun mamun boukwe kimdana teleb ati ebman.

Ni kwityabwe. Sun dib tenen kum nang ab dam kun nang kibdeibdamunyei. Sunda dib tenen nang ara Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde ban nang kurandum ati, sunci, “Malyi dinyi miliboka kunubibyei,” tenen malyi kun nang ab tonkwa kubmunyei. Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde ban dinyi ara yuk, malyi dinyi kunubde ban dinyi ara yuk. Tonda, berengna dinyi ara yuk, kunuk dinyi ara yuk kurur. A deyok aryi, sunda dib tenen nang ab dib tenen kum nang ab ara ururdeirirdana kum uca yuk-yuk bokdandarur.

Nun Du Kristus ab isa sienyi si Belial ab asi antanibdeibtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Tonda, dib tenenanyi ab dib tenen kumnyi ab murubdeibtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Sun tenen dinyi ton kunubde ban dinyi ton ara yuk-yuk kurur deyok aryi, antanirdeirirdana kum kurantibyi.

Tonda, Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin ai ara yuk, kwemdina dinyi asi dama deirin ai ara yuk kurur. Nunci kwemdina dinyi asi doboka Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin ai deibtibyi do? Ato tenen kum. Nunda dib tenen nang kanya umbura aryi Er Imtamnyi kusurur deyok aryi, nunda Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin ai ato kunub ati ato ebman. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Er Uram umbura aryi ato esurur.
“Nira Imtamnyi bira Ni dam kun nang ab tonkwa kubibiryi, sun kankan aryi yibarkiringkwan.
Tonda, a nang ara Niti, ‘Er Iya Erebdobnyi,’ tenen
Ni uram kunubde baramingiryi,
Ni dam kun nang kubkwaming,” ebmou.
Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Malyi kun dinyi Ni mabwe nermabwe asi dakdongobcei,” tenen yuk tam asi ato eboka esurur.
“Er Imtamnyi biryi ato esurur.
Sunda Ni dam kun nang ara sun malyi kun nang kankan aryi takloboka yuk dam bina kubdarur.
Taklobmun ci, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi, ‘Mem,’ tenen dinyi tentok ababyi kunubde bimunyei.
Ato kubdate ura, Nira Imtamnyi biryi sunsi dobdobkwansin.”
“Ara, Nira sun Nai kusunun ba,
sunda Ni mabwe nermabwe kibkwandum ati ebman.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi Iya Mikibnyi biryi ato ebmou.”

Ura, Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang ni boukwe weik kusunun nang. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi, “‘Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenen sun kankan dam iya kubkwansin,” eboka erdeiriransou deyok aryi, nunci, “Lek kanya akwe bobkwayeb,” tenebibiryi, nun kanya ab nun nong ababyi diboka kalikdabiryi, nun nong kanya malyi dakdongobsute dinyi nirya bai donokwayeb. Ati, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi biti, “Nun Nai Erebdobnyi Er Uram kunubde binkwayeb,” tenenub ci, nunci “Sunglona kum uca lek kanya borantibyi,” tenen busul kubtabakoka Er Uram kunubde binkwayeb.

Ni kwityabwe, nunci ninyi tentok ababyi malyi kum kibdongobmasoubwe. Tonda, nunci ninyi tentok ababyi kum bowanikminikmasoubwe. Tonda, nunci sun talerandum bona ton co bok ati, “Dobdobtibyi,” tenen olorkwetesina uram kum eransoubwe. Ati, sunci sun kanya yoklobsumun ci, nunsi boukwe weik kibsindarur.

Niryi sunti, “Tatab-tatab ebkwan,” tenen ato kum ebmasin. Erda, niryi sunti, “Ni boukwe kunun nang,” tenen ato ebmasin. Nunci sunsi boukwe weik kusunub ati nun sirya ebmasib. Ati, nunci sunti boukwe kusunub deyok aryi, sun ab tonkwa kurantibyi ati tenesunub. Ara, kam kurantibyi ababyi, dibtibyi ababyi, nun sun ab tonkwa kurantibyi ati ebman.

Niryi sunti, “Nun Du dam kun nang,” tenen dib tenesunun. Niryi sunti erebdeiboka kisal dangsunun ati ebman. Tonda, yuk nang aryi nisi mambul kimdeirin dinyi ilinto kareraning bok, niryi sun kurandum to deyok aryi kilkil kanya langdeiboka bonun.

Ura, nunda Makedonia mutuk binmoubwe ura, nun mambul dinyi boramoubwe ati ebman. Ninyi aryi nunsi dubdendoka mambul weik dinyi ilinto amuma-amuma kimnansei deyok aryi, nun nong ab nun kanya ab ara mambul weik kuransou. Ninyi aryi nunti, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringnansei. Tonda, nunci sunda Korintus nang ati, “Teleb kuraming do kum do?” teneramoubwe deyok aryi tabakoka mambul kanya boramoubwe.

Ato kuramoubwe bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira mambul nang teleb kurdeirisurutnyi biryi nun kanya teleb kurdeiriransou. Ara, nun kwit Titus nun dam yanmou biriman aryi nun Nai biryi nun kanya teleb kubdeibmasou.

Ara, nun kwit Titus yanmou deyok atikwe nun kanya teleb kum kibdeibmasou. Erda, sunda Korintus nang aryi nun kwit bisi teleb kurdeirirandau ati kekebmoubwe deyok ababyi erci nun kanya asi teleb kibdeibmasou. Nun kwit bira sun kankan kuamwe ani, ni dam yanmou ura, erci sun kurandau to nukeibmasou. Ati, erci, “Sun Korintus atei nang aryi, ‘Kan ab tonkwa kurantibyi se,’ eranking,” ebmanou. Tonda, erci, “Sun Korintus nang aryi, ‘Nun nai Paulus bisi mambul kibdeibmoubwe se,’ tenen mambul weik kanya boraming,” ebmanou. Tonda, erci niti, “Sun Korintus nang ara kanti boukwe weik boranking,” eboka nukeibmanou. Ato eboka nukeibmanou deyok aryi, ni kanya ara kilkil weik kuranse. Minob ura ni kanya kilkil weik kuranou ani, ni kanya ara bisibkaboka iya kilkil kuranse ati ebman.

Niryi sunsi kerek sengna kerek sekeibmasise asi sunci nukde binmandau uca, sun kanya lukeibmasou. Sun kanya asi lukeibmasou bok, niryi, “A kerek sengna kerek sekeibmase ara manmaliboka sekeibmase,” tenen mambul kanya kum bonun. Ato tenena kum kunun cok, niryi boukwe deib aryi, “Ni kwityabwe kanya lukeibman se,” tenen mambul kanya tiya bobmase. Ba, a kerek sengna deib aryi sun kanya lukeibmasou ara tiya akwe lukeibmasou ati ni kekebmase uca, mambul kanya iya kum bormururanse.

Ura, ukuryok ara ni kanya kilkil kuranir. Ara, niryi sunsi, “Unato ati a malyi kunanyi kum wenebmarum do?” eboka wenebmasisiryok, sun kanya asi lukeibmasise deyok aryi, ni kanya kilkil kum kuranir. Erda, sunci ni kerek sengna deib aryi mambul kanya borandau uca, sunci, “Nun malyi kun dinyi taklobkwayeb,” tenebmandau ci, Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang tubto kibmandau. A deyok aryi, ni kanya kilkil weik kuranir ati ebman. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi Er kanya teleb kurur to, sunci, “Malyi dinyi kuramoubwe se,” tenen mambul kanya borandau. Ati, niryi sunsi kerek sengna kerek sekeibmasou uca, sun kanya lukeibmasou bok, niryi sunsi malyi kum kibminikmasise.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb teneboka karesurur mambul kanya bon dinyi ara talyi dinyi kuma. Erda, ato mambul kanya bon dinyi biriman aryi ninyi aryi sun malyi kun dinyi tangloramingiryok, lemsin dinyi dororaming. Sun ato kuboka mambul kanya bon nang ara, “Malyi dinyi tubto kunurantibyi,” tenen kanya kum bonung. Ba, tukwetam kanya bon nang boramingnyi mambul dinyi ara lemsin dinyi kum boyangarande. Erda, din dinyi boyangarande.

Ni kwityabwe, sundamnyi diblilibdandarur. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi mambul bobdeibsou ara talyi ati kum bobdeibsou. Erda, a mambul kanya borandum biriman aryi sun kanya dam du moubdeibsou. Du moubdeibsou uca, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to kunubde binkwayeb,” tenen kanya borandum. Tonda, sunci, “Yuk nang aryi kuraming malyi kun dinyi kum miliramoubwe ati lak kibkwayeb,” tenen busul kanya borandum. Tonda, sunci, “Sun malyi kun nang asi bitabdeiboka wenebkwayeb se,” tenen busul kanya borandum. Tonda, sunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun malyi kuramoubwe dinyi wenebsicei,” tenen ilil kanya borandum. Tonda, sunci ni Paulus biti boukwe weik kuboka, “Er ab tonkwa kurantibyi,” teneranurum. Tonda, sunci busul kanya borandum ci, “Malyi kun nang deyok lilibkwayeb,” tenerandum. Ati, nun Nai biryi mambul bobdongobmasou uca, sun kanya dam aryi du diboka moubdeibsou. Ati, sunci sundamnyi ati, “Malyi deyok kum kuransou,” tenen lak kibdanmarum ati ebman.

Ati, niryi sunsi kerek sengna kerek sekeibmasise ara, “Malyi kiminingnanyi bira er kwin nong asi talyi yordananyi bisi tatab-tatab ebkwan,” tenen dinyi udikum deiboka kum sekeibmasise. Tonda, “Talyi yon ner er akenyi bisi milibkwan,” tenena ababyi kum kerek sekeibmasise. Erda, sunda Korintus nang aryi “Nunda Paulus bisi boukwe weik kunub,” tenen Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi lak bikdankwandau ati, niryi sunsi kerek sekeibmasise.
Nunci a dinyi nirya asi kunubde barandum asi asing eirirankib uca, nun kanya katabum ebmasir.

Ura, nun kanya atikwe katabum kum kuransou. Erda, sunda Korintus nang aryi nun kwit Titus bisi teleb kurdeirirandau deyok aryi, nun kwit Titus er kanya ababyi katabum eramwe. A deyok ababyi nun kanya teleb kuransir.

Niryi nun kwit bisi sun dam bokdonokmasisiryi, niryi erti, “Sun Korintus nang ara teleb kun nang,” eboka kisal weik dakdobmasise. Ura, niryi sunti kisal weik dakoka, “Teleb dinyi kun nang kunung,” ebmase to, kunubde barandau deyok aryi, sunci nisi alyi kum bobdongobmanindau. Nunci sunsi esunub uram ara tuba-tuba dib en uram akwe esunub to, nunci sunsi kisal dangnub uram ababyi dib en uram akwe kurur. Ati, niryi sunsi kisal dakmasise to, diboka kunurandau deyok aryi ni kanya kilkil weik kuranir.
Nun kwit Titus bira sun nirya ati boukwe weik kusurur. Tonda, erci sunti, “Ilil kanya boboka Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kekeramnyi,” tenen tubto teneiriransir uca, erci tabakoka boukwe weik kusurur.
Ni kwityabwe. Niryi sunti, “Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunubde banung,” tenen diboka bingsunun deyok aryi, ni kanya kilkil weik kunurur.

Ura, Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang buluna yuk-yuk asi kisal dakmou uca, du mourande. Ara, sun Yerusalem atei kuboka kwaning atan nang ati co bok bulubdeiboka deibmai ati ato ebman. Niryi sunti, “A dinyi bikting,” tenen lak ebmasin.

Ara, sun Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ara mambul weik kimna dinyi ilinto boramingiryi, langdeiboka kilkil kanya boraming. Tonda, bona bon dinyi ton, co bok ababyi mitik akwe boramingiryi, sunci sun taruk kuramwe dinyi asi doboka sun atan nang asi langdeiboka bokoka kareraming.

Ara, sunci sun taruk dam kuramwe dinyi akwe kum kareramnyi. Erda, bisibkaboka kareramnyi. Yuk nang aryi sunti, “Co bok ilinto karebdarur,” eboka kum arukdeibmai. Erda, sunci sun kanya yuk aryi, “Sun atan nang asi miliboka karebkwayeb,” teneramnyi tok, kareramnyi.

Sun Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ara uram ebkatabdeibmasei ci, “Nunbabyi sun Yerusalem atei aryi kuboka atarande dib tenen nang asi miliboka karebtibyi,” eboka molobmasei ura, co bok langdeiboka bulubdeibmai.

Ara, nunci a nang ati, “Bona bon kum nang kunung ati co bok mitik akwe karebkwaming,” tenebmoubwe bok, sunci co bok mitik kum bulubdeiboka karebmai. Ati, yuma ara sunci sun kanya asi nun Du Yesus bisi deibmai ura, aminda ara sun kanya nunsi deibmasei. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti teleb tenesurur to, sunci sun kanya asi nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang ababyi deibmasei.

Uca, nunci nun kwit Titus bisi sun dam bokdonokmaburyi, nunci ersi ato eboka ebkatabdeibmoubwe. “Kanci sun Korintus atei nang dam biminyi ura, ato ebdeibdum, ‘Niryi minob uca ebdeibmasise uca, sunci deyok kouboka co bok bulubkalibmandau ani, ukuryok aryi kum bulubdeiamunci dinyi nirya bulubdeibdarur. Ati, sunci deyok kouboka yuk nang asi teleb kubdeibmandau ani, sunglona kum uca kunubsekdarur.’” Ati, nunci Titus bisi takubdeiboka, “Ato ebdeibdum,” ebmoubwe.

Sunda Korintus nang ara dib tenen nang yuk nang ilinto asi bisibkaboka iya teleb nang kurandum. Ara, sunci yuk nang asi bisibkaboka katabum eboka dib tenerandum. Tonda, sunci langdeiboka dib en uram lak erandum. Tonda, sunci langdeiboka bikdob dinyi bingnandum. Tonda, sunci busul kanya langdeiboka borandum. Tonda, nunci sunsi langdeiboka boukwe weik kusunub to, sunbabyi neiktoto yuk nang asi boukwe weik kundarur. Ati, sunci yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi nirya asi langdeiboka kunubde barandum to, sunci, “Sun kwaning atan nang asi co bok karebkwayeb,” tenebmunyi ababyi, langdeiboka karebdarur.

Niryi sunsi, “Kwaning atan nang asi co bok karebdarur,” eboka kum arukdeibkwinsin. Erda, niryi, “Sun kwaning atan nang diboka boukwe weik kunung do kum do?” tenen ukubdenmasin deyok aryi, ato ebmasin. Yuk nang ara busul kuboka kareraming deyok aryi, niryi kikliboka, “Sun Korintus nang ababyi busul kuboka karebting,” tenen kusunun.

Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira imtam tukwetam dinyi nirya talerutnyi kurur cok, Erda boukwe deyok aryi, ninyi kiboka bona bon kumnyi bitonyi kibdanmou. Ati, nun Du Yesus biryi sunda bona bon kum nang ati lebdeiboka imtam dinyi langdeiboka karebkwansou ati, Erda bona bon kumnyi bitonyi kibmou. A deyok aryi, sunbabyi neiktoto boukwe tenen deyok aryi, yuk nang asi langdeiboka karena teleb.

Ati niryi sunsi a deyok ati, “Ato-ato kuna teleb,” en uram ebkwinsin. Min kwalina ara sunci deyok kouboka, “Sun kwaning atan nang ati co bok bulubdeibkwayeb,” ebmandau ani, bulubkalibmandau. Ani, ukuryok ara sunci sun, “Ato-ato kubkwayeb,” en uram kunubde bana teleb. Ati, sunci busul kuboka, “Co bok bulubdeibkwayeb,” ebmandau tok, sunci busul kubmun ci, kunubde bana teleb ati ebman. Ara, sun taruk kubmaci tok karebmun ci, sun kwaning atan nang ati co bok bulubdeibdarur.

Sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “Sun kwaning atan nang asi co bok bulubdeibkwayeb,” tenerandum ara telebto tenerandum. Sun taruk kubmasici dinyi ara mitikanun kubsici ura, co bok mitikanun karena teleb. Ba, sun taruk kubmasici dinyi ara mitik kum kubsici ura, co bok ilinto karena ababyi teleb. Co bok ilinto kum, mitikanun kum karena ara bikdob dinyi kuma. Erda, “Karebkwayeb,” tenen kanya bona ara bikdob dinyi kurur ati ebman. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Sun taruk kubmasici tok karebdarur,” ebmasin.

Ati, nunci sunti, “Co bok ilinto karebting uca, yuk nang aryi kum karebkwaming,” tenen kum kusunub. Tonda, nunci sunti, “Co bok bulurdeina deyok aryi, mambul weik kubting,” tenen kum kusunub. Erda, nunci, “Sun dantam-dantam kuramingnyi dib tenen nang ara sun taruk kubmaci tok kikiman bulubdeibkwanung,” tenen kunub.

Sunda Korintus nang ara ukuryok aryi co bok langdeiboka talerandum ati, sun kwaning ataranci nang asi langdeiboka karebdate. Ura, aminda aryi sunbabyi kwaning atabsute ura, sun Yerusalem atei aryi dib tenen nang aryi sunti tamuboka karebsiting. Ato kubdate ura, sun ab yuk dib tenen nang ab aryi sun mamun dirnilirdandate.
Ato kubdate ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi kerek sekeiamnyi to kunubdate. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram ara ato esurur.
“Sun Israel yala nang ara ninyi kun kum mutuk kuramiryi, imtam roti si Mana buluramiryi, ninyi nirya ara kikiman yiramnyi uca, bouramwe.
Ara, sun Mana du ilinto bulubdeibmai nang ara yina kikiman bulubdeiboka yiramnyi.
Ba, sun Mana du mitikanun bulubdeibmai nang ababyi yina kikiman bulubdeiboka yiramnyi,” ebmou.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi sunti boukwe weik kuboka, “Busul kuboka dibnilibtinyi,” tenesunun to, nun kwit Titus bibabyi neiktoto sunti boukwe weik kuboka, “Busul kuboka dibnilibtinyi,” tenesurur. A deyok aryi, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei, ni Nai,” enun.

Nun kwit bira er kanya dam yuk aryi, “Korintus atei bitinyi se,” tenesurur ati erda kilkil kanya boboka sun dam yankwande. Ura, niryi ersi, “Korintus atei birum,” ebmase ba, erci kilkil kanya boboka, “Ni binkwan,” ebmanou.

Ura, nun kwit Titus bitikwe kum bokdonokmasin. Erda, dib tenenanyi yuknyi bibabyi bokdonokmasin ara Titus ab tonkwa sun dam yankwanding. Anyi bira Teleb Uram busul kuboka eteresurur deyok aryi, sun dantam-dantam kuboka dib tenen nang aryi ersi kisal dangnaming.

Anyi bisi sun dantam-dantam kuboka dib tenen nang aryi sirya wibdeibmai. Ara, sunci, “Sun Yerusalem atei kuboka atan nang asi co bok bulubdeiboka bobinkwande,” tenen wibdeibmai. Anyi bisi wibdeibmainyi bira nisi miliboka co bok bulubdeiboka Yerusalem atei bobinkwanim. A co bok bulurdeiboka bobinkwanim ara, “Ninyi aryi asing eibtingiryi, nun Du Yesus si weik ebting,” tenen bobinkwanim. Tonda, nunci, “Busul kuboka sun dib tenen nang dibnilibtinimnyi,” tenen bobinkwanim.

Nunci a co bok ara langdeiboka deiriraming dinyi bobinkwanim ara, “Manmalina kum uca bulubdeiboka Yerusalem atei bobitinimnyi,” tenen bobinkwanim. Ati, nunci, “Ninyi aryi tatab-tatab ebsingnyei,” tenen a co bok asi manmalina kum uca bobinkwanim.
Ati, nunci busul kuboka, “Nun Du urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kubkwanim,” tenen, “Ninyi urasintam ababyi manmalin dinyi kum kubtinimnyi,” tenen a co bok bulubdeiboka bobinkwanim.

Tonda, nun kwit Titus ab nun kwit yuknyi ab nun wa irmilisununyi yuknyi bibabyi bokdonokmasin. Anyi bira busul weik kuboka nunsi wa irmiliransou deyok aryi, nunci erti, “Nun kwit,” tenenub. Anyi bira sunti er kanya deibmasir deyok aryi, erci tabakoka, “Dibnilibtinyi,” tenesurur.

Nun kwit Titus bira ni wa irmilininanyi kurur ci, sun kankan kuboka wa isurutnyi kurur. Ba, nun kwityabwe yuk nang bitinyi ara sun dib tenen nang buluna yuk-yuk aryi wibdeiboka bokdonokmarei nang kururung. A nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus Kristus si weik en nang kunung ati ebman.

A nang ara sun dam yankwaming deyok aryi, sunci a nang urasintam aryi co bok asi bulubdeibdarur. Ato kubmun ci, sunci, “Nunbabyi kwaning atarande nang asi boukwe weik kunub,” tenen lak kibdankwandum. Tonda, niryi sunti kisal dangsunun ara talyi ati eboka kisal kum dangsunun ati bikting ati, sunci sun kwaning atan nang ati co bok deibdarur. Ara, sun dantam-dantam kuboka dib tenen nang ababyi, “Teleb kun nang,” tenen biksiting ati, sunci a nang asi kibdobmun ci, co bok bulubdeibdarur.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi sunsi kerek sekeibmasin ara, “Sun Yerusalem atei kuboka dib tenen nang ati co bok bulubdeibdarur,” eboka kerek sekeibmasin bok, sunci, “Sun Yerusalem nang ati co bok bulubdeibkwayeb,” sirya tenerandum ati bikmasin.

Sunda Korintus nang ara busul kuboka, “Nun kwityabwe kwaning atan nang ati co bok bulubdeiboka karebkwayeb,” tenerandum ati bingsunun deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, “Karebdarur,” kum ebkwinsin. Tonda, niryi sun Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ab tonkwa kuramaburyi, niryi sunsi kisal dakmasise. Ara, niryi sunti kisal dakoka sun Makedonia nang asi ato ebmase. “Sun Akhaya mutuk Korintus atei kuraming dib tenen nang ara o kwalina aryi kuboka ukuryok ababyi busul kuramingiryi, ‘Co bok bulubdeiboka karebkwayeb,’ tenen kunung.” Ato eboka nukeibmase uca, sun Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ilinto aryi, “Nunbabyi bulubdeiboka karebkwayeb,” eboka co bok bulubdeibmai.

Ura, niryi nun kwityabwe sun dam bokdonokmasin ara, “Co bok nirya asi sirya bulubdeibmang do kum do?” tenen bikwanking ati bokdonokmasin. Ara, niryi sunti kisal dangnansise ara, “Talyi ati kisal kum dangnanse,” tenen a nang asi sun dam bokdonokmasin. Ati, sunci a co bok nirya asi kiknibminikoka bulubdeibdarur. Sunci, “Bulubdeiboka karebkwayeb,” ebdeibmanindau ani, kum kunubdate ura, niryi sunsi talyi ati kisal dakmasitinyi.

Ara, Makedonia mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ton nang nun ab tonkwa sun dam yatibyi ura, sunci co bok kum bulubdeibdate uca, nira sun Makedonia mutuk nang urasintam aryi alyi weik kibnute. Niryi kankana asa kum uca sunsi kisal dakmasise bok, kisal dangna dinyi kum kunubdate uca, ni alyi weik kubnute. Ba, sunda Korintus atei nang ara bisibkaboka iya alyi weik kubsute. Ara, sunci, “Bulubdeiboka karebkwayeb,” ebdeibmandau ani, diboka kum bulubdate ura, sunsi bisibkaboka alyi weik kubsute.

Ati, niryi, “Alyi kubsicei,” tenebmase deyok aryi, niryi ni bokdonokmasin nang winiryi asi ato eboka ebkatabdeibmase. “Ni ab yuk nang ab Korintus atei dirbana kum bok, sunci minob bindoka sun Korintus nang asi, ‘Co bok kiknibminikoka bulubdeibdarur,’ ebdarur,” ebmase. Ura, sunda Korintus nang aryi sun ebdeibmandau to sirya bulubdeibmunyi ura, ni sun dam yankwansin. Ati, sunci kilkil kanya boboka co bok kiknibminikoka langdeiboka karebdarur. “‘Karena nun li,’ tenen kanya boboka karebingnyei,” tenen ato ebmasin.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci a ebkwinsin uram asi kisok dam bobdarur. “Sun yala kwengnaming nang ara yala mitik akwe kwekting uca, du moun dinyi mitik akwe dakwanting. Ba, yala ilinto asi kwekingnyi uca, du moun dinyi ilinto dakwaming.” Ati, sunci yuk nang asi langdeiboka karebmunyi uca, kisal dangsina dinyi langdeiboka dobdobkwandum ati ebman.

Ura, unanyi-unaner ara, “Sun atan nang asi co bok karebkwan,” tenebingnyi ura, sunci sun kanya teleb kubmaci tok karena teleb. Ara, “Karena ni li,” tenebdatiryok, karebdate ara manmaliboka karebdate. Tonda, yuk nang aryi, “Karebdarur,” eboka arukdeibsiting uca, karebdate ara manmaliboka karebdate. Ba, sun kanya yuk aryi, “Ur karebkwayeb,” tenen karerandum ara manmalina kum uca karerandum ci. Sun ato kun nang asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi boukwe weik kurur.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira utotoa nirya talerutnyi kurur ci, kisal dangna dinyi karebsutiryi, sun ataransici dinyi nirya asi langdeiboka karebdeibsute. Karebdeibsici ura, sunda uki-uki nirya kubde baramun ba, atan dinyi utotoa nirya asi kum atabkwansir. Ato kuramunyi ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi akwe langdeiboka kunubkwandum.
Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi a deyok ati ato eboka kerek sekeiamnyi.
“Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira kisal dakoka sun bona bon kum nang asi langdeiboka karerur.
Tonda, nun Nai urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde ban dinyi ara nun Nai biryi iya teneibkwande.”

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sun yala kwengna nang asi yala karerur. Tonda, sun yina yibkwamingnyi nang asi roti karesurur. Tonda, nun Nai bira sunda yuk nang asi dirnilirandum nang ababyi yala kwengna dinyi ton du mousin dinyi ton karebkwansir. Kebdeiboka ati ato ebmasin. Ara, sunci yuk nang asi langdeiboka kareramunyi to, nun Nai biryi langdeiboka kisal daksici uca, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi du langdeiboka moubtabakwansir.

Nun Nai biryi kisal dakoka yina ab yuk karesin dinyi ilinto amuma-amuma ab langdeiboka karebkwansir uca, sunci yuk nang asi tuba-tuba langdeiboka karebkwandum. Sunci langdeiboka karebmunyi ura, nunci sun bulubdeibmandau dinyi asi bobibyi uca, sun a dinyi dobdobkwaming nang ara Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming.

Sunci sun kwaning atan nang asi co bok karerandum deib aryi Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang ataranci dinyi akwe kum kunurandum. Erda, sunci karerandum deib aryi ninyi ilinto aryi Er Imtamnyi si langdeiboka weik ebkwaming.

Sunci sun kwaning atan nang asi co bok karebkwandum ara iya teleb dinyi kubkwande. Ato kuramunyi biriman aryi sunci sun boukwe weik tenen dinyi lak kibkwandum. Ura, yuk nang aryi asing eibingnyi ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming. Ara, ato eboka Er Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming. “Sun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram lak ena akwe kum kuraming. Erda, sunci nun Du Yesus Uram kunubde baramingiryok, sun atan nang ababyi dirniliraming.” Ato ebingiryok, sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei, nun Nai,” ebkwaming. Tonda, a nang ara sunda Korintus nang ati ato eboka kisal dakwansing. “Nunbabyi yuk nang ababyi langdeiboka karebmasing,” eboka kisal dakwansing.

Tonda, sunci langdeiboka karebmunyi ura, sun dinyi dobdobmangnyi nang ara sunti boukwe weik kibingiryi Er Imtamnyi bisi molobmilibingiryok, langdeiboka molormilibkwansing. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun biriman aryi langdeiboka kisal dakmasir deyok aryi, a nang aryi sunti langdeiboka molormilibkwansing.
Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du biriman aryi lemsin dinyi karebmasou ara utotoa nirya asi bisibkaboka kisal dangsin dinyi karebmasou deyok aryi, nunci Er si weik ena teleb ati ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, nun Du Kristus bira Erdamnyi luknubdongobdandoka namin kanya borutnyi kurur to, ni Paulus bibabyi neiktoto luknub dongon kanya ton namin kanya ton bonun. Ato tenen kanya bonun deib aryi, niryi uram ebkatabdeiboka sunti molon dinyi ton molobkwinsin. Ara, “Ni uram kekebdarur,” eboka molobmasin. Sun kankan aryi ton nang ara niti ato eranei. “Paulus bira nun urasintam aryi uram erandiryok, ilil kanya bonanyi bitonyi kuboka mitang uram sisingnande se. Ba, kerek sengna deib aryi kerek sekeibsici ba, ilil kuna kum uca ilil kuna kum kanya bonanyi bitonyi kuboka mikib uram eboka kerek sengdeiriransir se.”

Ni kwityabwe, niryi ato eboka molobkwinsin. “Niryi sun dam diryanyi ura, nira ilil kanya bona kum uca sun kankan kuboka niti, ‘Malinyi,’ eraning nang asi mikib uram eboka kerebsinyei,” eboka molobmasin. Sun kankan ton nang aryi ni Paulus biti ato eraning. “Erda Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi eteresurur to kum kunubde barur cok, Er mining kanya aryi tenen dinyi akwe kunubde barur se.” A nang ara talyi ati ato eraning ati, niryi sun dam yandoka mikib uram kerebtinyi ati ebman.

Ara, nunda nun Du Yesus bisi wa irmilin nang ababyi tukwetam nang akwe kunub cok, nunci sun tukwetam kanya bon nang aryi kunubde baraming to dinyi kunubde kum banub. Sun tukwetam kanya bon nang aryi mar ordaraming to ara yuk. Tonda, nunda nun Du Yesus bisi wa irmilin nang aryi mar ordaramib to ara yuk.

Ara, sun tukwetam kanya bon nang aryi mar ordaramingnyi ara ya sirik ab yin mar sirik ab taleboka ordaraming. Ba, nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Malyi kun dinyi muna kibdongobtibyi,” tenen mar ordaramibiryok, ya sirik ab yin mar ab kum taleramib. Erda, Er Imtamnyi mikib deib aryi nunci isa talerande dinyi yuk-yuk asi muna kimdongonub. Tonda, ninyi aryi talyi eraming uram nirya asi bisik sekoka muna kimdongonub.

Nunda Er Imtamnyi biryi dib en uram bikoka erebdeibibiryok, nunda tola uram nirya asi bisik sengnamib. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram bisik sengna dinyi nirya asi kum daneiramib. Tonda, ninyi kanya aryi tenen dinyi nirya asi nunci bisik sekoka kum daneiramib. Ninyi kanya aryi tenen dinyi nirya asi muna kibdongoboka tabwe debibyi uca, nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram amwetam dinyi kimnub.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, unanyi-unaner ara nun Du Yesus Uram ati, “Nun li,” tenen kununa kum kuramingnyi ura, nunci a nang nirya asi diba ati wenebkwayeb. Ba, sunda Korintus nang sunglona kum uca nun Du Yesus Uram asi kunubkalibmunyi ura, nunci sun kankan aryi kuboka nun Du Yesus Uram ati, “Nun li,” tenen nang asi diba ati wenebkwayeb.

Ni Paulus ab ni kwityabwe ab ara nun Du biryi bokdonoksou nang diba ati kunub. A dinyi ara ninyi nirya urasintam aryi lak kurur ati sunbabyi neiktoto nunti, “Nun Du biryi bokdonokmou nang kunung,” tenen bikdarur. Sun kankan ton nang ara ilil kanya bona kum uca, “Nunda Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub,” tenerdarandum to, nunbabyi neiktoto ilil kanya bona kum uca, “Nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang kunub,” tenen bingnub. Ati, sundamnyi ati, “Nunda Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub,” tenerdaraming nang ara nunti, “A nang ababyi nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilin nang diboka kunung,” tenen dobdobsiting ati ebman.

Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi mikib karebsou ara, “Ninyi diba ati wenebmin cok, sun kanya mambul kibdarur,” eboka mikib kum karebsou. Erda, “Dib tenen nang kanya katabum ebdeibdarur,” eboka mikib karebsou. Niryi ilil kanya bona kum uca a dinyi ati bisibkaboka nunukeibsitinyi ababyi, nun Du Yesus bira nisi mikib karebmanounyi biryi niti, “Ni bokdonokmasinyi kum kurur se,” kum tenebkwaniriryi, nisi alyi kum bobdongobkwanir.
Ati, sunci niti, “Kerek sengna kerek sengdeirisurur biriman aryi nun kanya ilil kimdongoransir,” tenebsumunyei.

Ara, sun kankan aryi ton nang ara niti ato eraning. “Paulus bira kerek sengna kerek sengdeiriransici uca, kat uram ton mikib uram ton eboka kerek sengdeirisurur. Ba, ninyi urasintam yaci ura, erci mitang uram ton ina ngilikmanto uram ton eransir,” eraning.

Sun talyi ati ato dinyi eraning nang ara ato dinyi tenena teleb. Nira kerek sengna deib aryi eboka kerek sengnun to ababyi, sun urasintam yandoka uram sisingnun ababyi neik dinyi akwe enun. Ni kerek sengna deib aryi kat uram ebsitinyi tok, niryi sun dam yanyi ura, neik dinyi akwe ebniryok, diboka kunubkwansin ati ebmasin.

Sun kankan aryi ton nang ara sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming. A nang ara sundamnyi biti, “Nunda iya teleb kun nang kunub,” tenen sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming. Nunda ilil kanya bonub deyok aryi, nunci ato kuboka nundamnyi kum erebdeibdatibyi. A nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda kiklina nang aryi kunubde banub to yuk nang ababyi kunubting,” teneramingiryok, sundamnyi kisal dangdaraming. Ato dinyi kunubde banung nang ara bikdob dinyi kun nang kum kunung ati ebman.

A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka sundamnyi kisal dangdaraming. Ba, nunbabyi nundamnyi kisal dakdatibiryok, nunci nundamnyi ati bisibkaboka kisal kum dakdankwayeb. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi Er wa irmilin dinyi karebsou to, nunci kikiman dinyi akwe eboka kisal dakdankwayeb. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wa takubdeibsou tok, nunci akatei okatei bindoka wa iramibyi ani, sunda Korintus atei nang kankan ababyi yandoka wa iramib ati ebman.

Nun Du biryi nunsi takubdeibsou tok, nunda sun Korintus atei nang ababyi yanmoubwe ura, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram etereransoubwe. Ati, nunci, “Sun Korintus atei nang asi Teleb Uram etereramoubwe,” enub ara uram aryi ou nebdeiboka kum enub. Erda, kikib ati ato enub.

Yuk nang aryi sunsi Teleb Uram etereransiting deib aryi nunci nundamnyi kisal kum dangdanub. Erda, nunci sunsi Teleb Uram etereransib deib aryi nunci nundamnyi kisal dangdanub. Ati, nunci sunti ato tenen dibde bunub. “Nunci sun dam yandoka Teleb Uram tubto eterebsibyi uca, sun dib tenen dinyi ara tabakdongo-tabakdongo katabum ebsici ba, sun kankan aryi nun uram kekebkwaming nang ababyi tabakdongo-tabakdongo weik kubting,” tenen dibde bunub.

Ato kubibyi ura, nunci sun atei Korintus atei aryi anaboka otam bukmaci mutuk yuk-yuk ababyi bindoka Teleb Uram eterebtibyi. Ati, nunci, “Yuk nang ara deyok kouboka Teleb Uram sirya etereramingnyi nang aryi wa ina deib aryi nunci nundamnyi ati kisal dakdabibyei,” tenenub. Tonda, nunci, “Yuk nang aryi wa iramingnyi wa wekibiryi, Teleb Uram eterebibyei,” tenenub. Erda, nunci, “Teleb Uram kum kekebmangnyi atei yuk-yuk bindoka nun Du Yesus uram eterebkwayeb,” tenen kunub

Ba, nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilinub nang ara nundamnyi kisal dakdabyei. Unanyi-unaner ara, “Kisal dakwan,” tenebingnyi ura, ninyi si erebdeiboka kisal dakingnyei. Erda, nun Arungdeirisurutnyi Iya Erebdobnyi bisi si erebdeiboka kisal dakwanung.

Nun Du Yesus bira nun Arungdeirisurutnyi biryi kisal dangsici nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni kwityabwe, ni kanya teleb kimdeirinunung nang,” tenen kisal dangsurur. Ba, sundamnyi kisal dangdangnyi nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni kwityabwe, ni kanya teleb kimdeirinunung nang,” tenen kisal kum dangdur. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Nun Du bira nun Arungdeirisurutnyi bisi kisal dakwayeb,” ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci niti, “Erdamnyi erebdeibdandoka lub nang uram ato ebmar, se,” tenebnindate ababyi, niryi sunti, “Ni uram kekebmurubde biting,” tenen dibde bunun. Ato ebmasin bok, sunci ni uram asi diboka kekermururanurum ati ebmasin.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe kunung,” tenen busul kuboka kalingsurur to, nibabyi neiktoto sunsi busul weik kuboka kalingsunun. A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, “Ni uram kekebmurubde bindarur,” ebmasin. Sunda dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus biryi dobkwansir ner ato kurandum. Ati, niryi sunti, “Yuk nang aryi bowanikminikoka dobingnyei,” tenen, “Nun Du bikwe dobkwandur,” tenen matan kanya bonun cok, sunsi kalingsunun. Ati, niryi sunti, “Sal aryi er dam bardena ton kum kuramingnyi ner asi nun Du Yesus urasintam bobinkwan,” tenen kalingsunun.

Ba, niryi sunti, “Nun Du Kristus bisi boukwe kuramnyi ani, ninyi aryi bowanikminikmai uca, boukwe tuba kum kuraming darib,” tenen ilil kanya bonun. Minob ura isa sienyi Iblis biryi kwatima biriman aryi uram ulubyang dakoka tola uram ebmou asi nun tat Hawa biryi dib tenebmou. Ura, sunbabyi neiktoto sun kanya dam aryi tola uram dib tenebkalibmandate ati tenesunun. Tola uram dib tenebkalibmandate uca, sunci nun Du Yesus tentok asi diboka kum milibmurubdate ati tenesunun.

Ton nang ara sun dam yandoka nun Du Yesus deyok ati tola uram etereransing bok, sunci a nang uram dororandum ci, nunci nun Du Yesus uram dib en uram etereransoubwe asi taklobmarum se. Tonda, yuk nang aryi yandoka, “Isa eteren dinyi dobdobdarur,” eraming bok, sunci isa eteren dinyi dororandum ci, sunci Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus dobdobmandau asi taklobdandum se. Tonda, yuk nang aryi yandoka Teleb Uram yuk uram asi etereransing bok, sunci a uram asi bisik sengna kum uca dororandum ci, nunci sunsi etereransoubwe Teleb Uram taklobmarum se. A deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, “Ni uram kekebmurubde bindarur,” ebmasin.

Ni Paulus bibabyi nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonoknounyi kunun deyok aryi, sunci ni eteresina uram dib tenenina teleb. Yuk nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang kankan aryi iya erebdob kunub,” erdaramingiryok, nisi outam kimdongobmanto kum kunung ati ebman. Nira nun Du biryi bokdonoknounyi diboka kunun ati ato ebman.

Nira ninyi kanya teleb kurdeirin uram doboka caknam asa enanyi kum kunun cok, niryi dib en uram diboka bingnunyi kunun ati ebman. Niryi sunglona kum uca sun nirya asi Teleb Uram tuba-tuba lak etereransise ati sunci niti, “Dib en uram bingdurnyi,” tenen diboka bikdate.

Ati, niryi sunti, “Teleb Uram eterebnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi erebdeibte,” tenen nidamnyi luknubdandoka Teleb Uram etereransise. Ara, “Co bok kareboka dekeibnumun ba, niryi Teleb Uram eterebkwinsin,” eboka Teleb Uram kum etereransise. Erda, niryi nidamnyi luknubdongobdandoka Teleb Uram ur etererasise. Niryi ato kuboka Teleb Uram etereranse ara sunsi manmalirdeiriransise do?

Niryi sunti, “Dibnilibkwan,” tenen, “Co bok kareboka dekeibnindarur,” eboka kum arukdeibmasise. Erda, niryi sunda Korintus nang asi dirniliransisiryok, sun yuk atei-yuk atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang asi, “Co bok karebsindarur,” eboka moloranse. Sunda Korintus nang aryi nunsi co bok ton kum karerandau bok, yuk atei yuk atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang ara nunsi co bok langdeiboka kareransei ati ebman.

Tonda, ni ab sun ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ba, kwaning ataranou ababyi niryi sunda Korintus nang asi, “Yina karebnindarur,” eboka kum moloransise. Erda, sun ni ab tonkwa yanmoubwe nang ara Makedonia mutuk aryi kuboka yanganmai nang aryi nisi yina kareranei. A deyok aryi, niryi sunda Korintus nang asi, “Yina kum co bok kum karebnindarur,” eboka kum takurdeiriransise. Ura, aminda ababyi niryi, “Ikin dinyi utotoa takubdeibnyei,” tenen ato eboka kum arukdeibkwansin.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi nidamnyi kisal dangdanun cok, “Nira sun yina moloryisinanyi kuma,” esunun. Nira ato eboka ebmurubde binkwan deyok aryi, sun Akhaya mutuk aryi kurandum nang aryi, “Yina karebtibyi biriman aryi a kisal dangdan dinyi bisik sektibyi,” tenebnumunyei. Nun Du Kristus bira nisi dib en uram diboka lak kibdeibmasunyi si deib aryi niryi katabum eboka, “A kisal dangdan uram bisik sekingnyei,” ebniryok, “Co bok kum yina kum karebnindarur,” eboka kum molobkwansin.

Niryi sunsi, “Nira sun yina moloryisinanyi kuma,” esunun ara unato ati esunun do? Niryi sunsi boukwe kum kimsunun deyok aryi, ato kuboka esunun do? Ato tenen kum. Niryi sunsi boukwe weik kimsunun ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi bingnanir.

Niryi sunti, “Co bok karebnindarur,” eboka kum arungdeiriranse to, aminda ababyi neiktoto, “Co bok karebnindarur,” eboka kum arukdeibkwansin. Ara, sun kankan aryi sundamnyi ererdeirirdan nang asi bisik sekwan ati ato kubmurubkwan. A nang ara, “Nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang ab neik kikib nang kunub,” teneramingiryok, “Co bok karebsindarur,” eboka moloransing. A nang ara sundamnyi kisal dakdandoka ererdeirirdaraming nang asi niryi alyi kibdongobkwan ati niryi nidamnyi ati, “Nira yuk nang yina moloryinanyi kum kunun,” eboka erdanun.

Sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda nun Du biryi bokdonoksou nang kunub,” eraming nang ara yina moloryin nang kuramingiryi, tola uram eteren nang akwe kunung ati ebman. A nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang kunub,” erdaramingiryok, Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang diboka kum kunung. A nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonoksou nang kunub,” erdaramingiryok, nun Du biryi bokdonokmou nang diboka kum kunung.

Sunci a ebmasin uram ati, “Naie, a ebmasirim uram ara ilil uram,” tenebnumunyei. Isa sienyi Iblis bira, “Ninyi kanya bowanikminiktinyi,” tenen erci, “Bikningnyei,” tenen erdamnyi Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangananyi bitonyi kimdarande.

Ura, sun tola uram eteren nang ara isa sienyi milin nang kuraming deyok aryi, sunbabyi neiktoto, “Ninyi kanya bowanikminibtibyi asi biksingnyei,” tenen sunci, “Ato-ato kuboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubdarur,” eboka eteren nang ato kimdaramingiryok, malyi dinyi akwe kunuraming. Ati, nunci, “Isa biryi kunubde barur to, er milin nang ababyi neiktoto kunubde baraming,” tenen bingnamibiryok, “Naie,” tenen kanya bobibyei. A nang ara iya wenebmanto nang kunub to, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi iya wenen dinyi karebkwande.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi sunsi sirya ebmasin to, tamuboka ebkwinsin. Sunci niti, “Lub nang uram enanyi bica,” tenebnumunyei. Ba, sunci niti, “Lub nang uram enanyi bica,” tenebdate ababyi, sunci ni uram kekebnindarur. Yuk nang aryi lub nang uram eransing asi dobdobmarum to, sunci nira lub nang uram mitik anun eboka nidamnyi kisal dakdankun ababyi dobdobdarur ati molobmasin.

Nun Du biryi nisi, “Ilil kanya bona kum uca kandamnyi kisal dakdarum,” eboka kum arukdeibmanou bok, niryi, “Sundamnyi talyi ati kisal dangdaraming nang alyi kibdeibkwan,” tenen ilil kanya bona kum uca nidamnyi kisal dakdankun ati ebman. Ati niryi lub nang kanya atonyi kibdandoka nidamnyi kisal dakdankwan.

Sun kankan kurandum nang ilinto ara sundamnyi talyi ati erebdeibdandoka kisal dangdaraming. Ara, sun tukwetam kanya bon nang sundamnyi kisal dangdaraming to, sun kankan aryi kurandum nang ababyi neiktoto sundamnyi talyi ati kisal dangdaraming. Ura, nira nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonoknounyi diboka kunun deyok aryi, nibabyi neiktoto nidamnyi kisal ur dakdatinyi ati ebman.

Sunda Korintus nang ara sundamnyi biti, “Nunda bikdob nang kunub,” tenerdarandum. Ati, sunci sun lub nang ati bico tenerandum cok, lub nang uram ababyi bisik sengna kum uca kekerandum. Ati, sunci niti, “Lub nang en uram erutnyi,” tenebnindate ababyi niryi ebkwinsin uram kekebdarur.

Ura, ton nang ara yandoka tola uram etereransingiryok, ikin dinyi yuk-yuk takurdeiriransing uca, sunda tabwe demna nang ato kurandum. Ato kurandum cok, sunci, “Nun li,” ena kum kurandum. Tonda, ninyi aryi, “Co bok ilinto karebsiting,” tenen uram ulubyang eransing bok, sunci, “Nun li,” kum erandum. Tonda, ninyi aryi sundamnyi ati talyi ati ererdeirirdaraming bok, sunci, “Nun li,” ena kum kurandum. Tonda, ninyi aryi u molong-molong eransing ababyi sunci, “Nun li,” ena kum kurandum.

Yuk nang aryi sunti ato kuboka malyi kurdeirisunung bok, nunda namin kanya bon nang kunub cok, sunsi malyi kum kurdeirisunub. Ura, nunci sunsi malyi kum kurdeirisunub deyok aryi, nunci, “Yuk nang ara mikib nang kunung bok, nunda mitang nang kunub se,” tenen alyi kanya borantibyi do? Ato tenen kum.

Sun kankan aryi kuraming tola uram eteren nang ara sundamnyi ati talyi erebdeibdandoka kisal dangdaraming to, nibabyi neik dinyi akwe eboka kisal ur dakdatinyi. Lub kanya bon nang eraming to uram ato ebniryok, niryi dib en uram akwe ebkwinsin.

A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda Ibrani yala nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi nunukeiboka wibdeibsou nang kunub,” erdaraming. Ato erdaraming bok, nibabyi Ibrani yala nang kunun ati ebman. Tonda, a nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda Israel yala nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi nunukeiboka wibdeibsou nang kunub,” erdaraming. Erdaraming bok, nibabyi Israel yala nang kunun ati ebman. Tonda, a nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda Abraham er mabwe kunub,” erdaraming. Erdaraming bok, nibabyi nun aibwe Abraham yalanyi kunun ati ebman.

A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Nunda Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub,” erdaraming. Erdaraming bok, nibabyi Kristus wa irmilinanyi kunun ati ebman. Niryi a nang asi bisibkaboka nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilinanyi kunun ati ebman. Niryi lub nang en uram ato ebmasin cok, talyi uram kum ebmasin. A nang ara wa irmiliraming bok, niryi sunsi bisibkaboka iya busul kuboka wa irmiliranse ani, ukuryok tuba wa irmilinun. A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Ton tum ara ninyi aryi nunsi wenen ai dongobmasei,” eraming bok, niryi, “Ninyi aryi nisi wenen ai dongoranei ara uki mitik kum dongoranei,” ebtiniryok, sunsi bisibkaboka erebdeibdatinyi. A nang aryi, “Ninyi aryi tabwe taleboka nunsi kulab-kulab ebmasei,” eraming bok, niryi, “Ninyi aryi tabwe taleboka nisi kulab-kulab eranei ara uki mitik kum kulab-kulab eranei,” ebtiniryok, sunsi bisibkaboka erebdeibdatinyi. A nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Ton tum ara dibmanto kuramoubwe,” eraming bok, niryi, “Uki-uki nirya asi ninyi aryi obmaninto kunun,” ebtinyi.
Sun Yahudi yala nang aryi niti, “Wenebtibyi,” tenen nisi tabwe aryi litukmanei. Ara, uki amubaryi yuk-yuk aryi liki tiga puluh sembilan baryi litukmanei.

Tonda, uki winiryi yuk-yuk ara sun Roma nang aryi, “Wenebtibyi,” tenen co bala doboka nisi yongobmanei. Tonda, uki tentok tum aryi ninyi aryi keil doboka nisi yongobmanei. Tonda, weik co ngun-ngun deici aryi baranse ba, ibalya aryi weik dobmou uca, co ngun-ngun dakmou uca, ilil mekwan me wekmase. Ni baranse co ngun-ngun yuk-yuk ara uki tentok akwe kum dakmou. Erda, uki winiryi yuk-yuk ara co ngun-ngun dakmou. Liki tentok ara lukunda tentok ababyi kitingtam tentok ababyi ilil mekwan noutam aryi me wekoka kubmase ati ebman.

Niryi tanglona kum uca atam bina otam bina yibarkiringnanse. Me onmou me ababyi kouranse ba, me wekoka dibmanto kuranse. Bisik noutam ara ukula don nang mer ab ebdanmoubwe uca, obmaninto kuranse. Sun Yahudi yala nang ara ni mining yala nang kunung cok, marmun yiramnyi uca, ni obmanin to kuranse. Sun Yahudi kum yala nang ababyi niti, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringnansei. Sien atei bina kuranse ba, obmaninto kuranse. Tonda, atei yuk-yuk bina kuranse ababyi obmaninto kuranse. Tonda, ilil mekwan deici yibaranse ba, dibmanto kuranse. Sun dib tenen nang ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ba, sun kankan aryi dib tenen kum nang aryi marmun yiranei uca, obmaninto kuranse.

Tonda, niryi, “Teleb Uram eterebde binkwan,” teneransiryok, busul weik kuboka wa irmiliranse. Lukunda tum ababyi wi mana kum kuranse ba, kwaning atan ababyi me atan ababyi kuranse ba, niryi tanglona kum uca wa irmiliranse. Arum weik kunmanina ababyi tin ongon aling kum ongonmanina ababyi wa irmiliranse.

Tonda, niryi ato mambul kurdeirin dinyi nirya bonun cok, niryi sun dantam-dantam aryi kuboka buluraming dib tenen nang ati mambul kanya bonun. Ara, “Katabum eboka dib tenenung do kum do?” tenen iya mambul kanya tuba-tuba bonun.
Ninyi ton nang ara sakoka malyi dinyi kuraming deyok aryi, niryi mambul kanya bonun. Tonda, ninyi ton nang ara yuk nang asi sangdeiriraming deyok aryi, ni kanya lungdaranir ati ebman.

Ura, niryi, “Nidamnyi kisal dakdankwanun,” tenebman cok, niryi, “Nira yuk nang bisibkaboka iya mikibnyi kunun,” kum ebkwan. Erda, “Nira yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya mitangnyi kunun,” eboka lak kibdeibkwan.

Tola uram kuma. Nira iya mitangnyi kunun. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun Du Yesus Er Nai kobdob aryi niti, “Diboka ebmar,” tenen bingnurur ati ebman. Nun Du Er si ara tuba-tuba iya erebdeibmana kurur ati ebman.

Nira sien atei Damsyik bina kuranse ba, weik sienyi Aretas amwetam buramunyi biryi niti, “Talebkwan,” tenebmou. Ato tenebmou uca, erci er miliramnyi yin doun nang aryi ato ebmou. “Damsyik atei aknardongon lika bublan nirya asi kalikmun ci, Paulus bisi talebdarur.”

Ato eboka arukdeibmou bok, ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang ara nisi inibdeiboka atei aknardongon lika dam bobinmanei. Lika aryi kuboka baitam dirkweten bis bobinmanei ura, sunci nisi win aling umbura dongobmanei asi takdongo-takdongo kiboka dobkwetebmanei ura, tukwe ai yurbinmase. Ato kuboka niryi Damsyik atei aryi anaboka lebdandobmase.

Ni kwityabwe, nunda tukwetam nang ara nundamnyi kisal dakdatibyi ara talyi dinyi akwe kunubtibyi. Ato ebman bok, niryi nidamnyi kisal dakmurubdandoka binkwan ati ebman. Sun kankan nang ton aryi sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka talyi ati kisal dangdaraming deyok aryi, niryi, “Bisik sekwan,” tenebman cok, nibabyi nidamnyi ati kisal dangdana uram ato ebmurubkwan. Kisal dangdana uram ato ebmurubkwansin cok, niryi nun Du Yesus biryi karebnou uca ni tek deib aryi minob lak kum kuamwe dinyi asi asing eibmase dinyi yuk-yuk ati nukde binkwansin. Tonda, nun Du Yesus biryi lak kibdeibmanou dib dinyi yuk-yuk asi nukde binkwansin.

Nun Du Kristus biryi nitonyi Er dam kunanyi bisi tek deib dinyi karebnou ati ni bikdanman. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi karebnou uca, niryi tek deib aryi imtam kurur dinyi iya erebdob dinyi asi asing eianse ati ebman. A tek deib kunumna eianse ara kwalina empat belas kwaleboubwe. Tek deib aryi asing eibmase ba, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi bowelebindoka imtam ai iya erebdob ai bowengbinmase. “Ni kanya ara ni nong umbura tuba kubnou do anaboka yuk welebinmou do?” tenen ni kum bikdanun. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a dinyi bingnurur.

Tonda, nun Du Yesus biryi nito anyi bisi bowelebinmanou ara iya teleb mutuk ara Firdaus ato mutuk bowengbinmanou ati ni bikdanman. “Ni kanya ara ni nong umbura tuba kubnou do anaboka yuk welebinmou do?” tenen ni kum bikdanman. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a dinyi bingnurur. Firdaus mutuk ato bowengbinmanou ura, nira bikdob uram iya ilila uram yuk-yuk asi kekebmase. A ilila uram kekebmase ara tukwetam nang aryi bingna kum uca nukmanto kum uram kekebmase. Tonda, ato en uram kekebmase ati nun Du Yesus biryi, “Tukwetam nang urasintam aryi lak ena mem,” ebmanou.

Niryi, “Nidamnyi kum erebdeibdankwan,” tenerdanun cok, niryi nito anyi tek deib aryi asing eibmase uca imtam ai iya erebdob wengbinmasinyi biti kisal dakdankwan. “Nira yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya mikibnyi kunun,” eboka kisal kum dakdankwan. Erda, niryi, “Yuk nang asi bisibkaboka iya mitangnyi kunun,” eboka kisal dakdankwan.

Ura, niryi nidamnyi ati, “Nidamnyi kisal dakdankwan,” tenen kunubtinyi ababyi, talyi ati kisal kum dakdatinyi. “Nidamnyi kisal dakdankwan,” tenebtinyi ababyi nira lub kanya bonanyi kum kurantinyi. Ara, niryi nidamnyi kisal dakdatiniryok, dib dinyi akwe lak ebtiniryi ati ato ebman. Er Imtamnyi biryi karebnou uca, tek deib aryi imtam dinyi diboka eibmase deyok aryi, niryi nidamnyi ati talyi ati kisal kum dakdatinyi. Dib dinyi deib aryi nidamnyi kisal dakdatiniryok, niryi nidamnyi kalikdandoka, “Tek deib aryi nun Du Yesus biryi nisi imtam ai bowengbinmanou,” eboka lak kum ebde banun. Ara, “Ninyi aryi nisi talyi ati erebdeibningnyei,” tenen lak kum enun. Erda, niryi, “Ni kunubde banun to ton ni lak ebde banun to asing eibting uca, ninyi aryi niti, ‘Nun Du biryi bokdonokmounyi kurur,’ tenen bikting,” tenen kunun.

Nun Du biryi karebnou uca, niryi tek deib aryi asing eibmase uca, niryi iya ilil tenen dinyi ara yuk nang asi lak kibmanto kum dinyi asing eibmase. Ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi niti, “A tek deib aryi bisibkaboka erebdob dinyi asing eiboka kekebmou deyok aryi, erci erdamnyi bisibkaboka erebdeibdacei,” tenen mambul weik kimdeirinin dinyi ababyi tabakoka karebnou. A mambul kimdeirin dinyi karebnou ara co tiling ninyi tub dakdongobmaci ura, kwinibman kum dinyi ato kunurur. A dinyi ara tanglona kum uca nisi mambul weik kurdeirinurur. Ara, isa ton aryi nisi tuba-tuba dumdenurur ati ebman.

Ura, niryi, “Isa aryi tubto dubdenicei,” tenen nun Du Yesus bisi molobmase. “Mambul kurdeirin dinyi aryi tubto dubdenicei,” eboka molobmase. Liki bitinyi ara ato molobmase ura, liki winiryi dinyi ababyi molobmase.

Liki winiryi molobmase bok, nun Du Yesus biryi a molona kum kunubmanou. Erda, Erci niti ato ebmanou. “Niryi kansi kisal dakde bakunun ara kikiman kukurur. Niryi sunglona kum uca Ni mikib lak kimnun ara mitang nang biriman aryi lak kimnun.” Nun Du biryi nisi ato ebmanou deyok aryi, niryi ererdeirirdana uram kum ebdankwan. Erda, niryi kankana kanya bona kum uca, “Nira mitangnyi bica,” eboka lak ebdankwan. Ara, “Nun Du Kristus Er mikib nisi karebmurubde banute,” tenen niryi, “Nira mitangnyi bica,” eboka lak ebmurubde binkwan.

Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi mikib karebde banurur deyok aryi, niryi kilkil kanya bonun. Ara, ni yuk ara mitang kunun ababyi ni kilkil kanya bonun. Tonda, mambul dinyi bonun ababyi ni kilkil kanya bonun. Tonda, ninyi aryi nisi ina ngilingnunung ababyi ni teleb kanya bonun. Ninyi aryi niti, “Obtibyi,” tenen domkiringnunung ababyi ni kilkil kanya bonun. Tonda, mambul kimdeirin dinyi yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ababyi bonun cok, ni kanya teleb kunurur. Ara, ni yuk ara mitang kunun cok, nun Du Yesus Kristus biriman aryi mikib kunun ati ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi nidamnyi bisi kisal dangdana ato uram ebmasin ara lub nang en uram ato ebmasin. Ni yuk aryi, “Nidamnyi kisal dakdankwan,” kum tenebmase. Erda, sunci niti, “Erda nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmounyi kurur,” eboka kisal daknindatiryok, kisal kum dakmanindau. A deyok aryi, niryi nidamnyi kisal dakdanman. Ura, sun kankan aryi kuraming nang ton ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka, “Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmou nang kankan aryi nunda iya erebdob kunub,” erdaraming. Ato eboka erdaramingiryok, a nang ara nisi outam kibdongobmanto kum kunung ati ebman. Nira tukwetam bunanyi bitonyi kunun cok, nibabyi nun Du Yesus biryi bokdonokmou nang kankan aryi Iya Erebdobnyi kunun ati ebman.

Nibabyi sun kankan aryi kuransiryok, niryi tanglona kum uca ilil tenen dinyi utotoa nirya kikniranse. Ilil tenen dinyi utotoa nirya kikniranse deyok aryi, sunci niti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi bokdonokmounyi diboka kurur,” tenen biknindate.

Niryi sunda Korintus nang asi Teleb Uram etereransisiryok, niryi sunsi, “Yina karebnindarur,” eboka, “Co bok deksindarur,” eboka kum arungdeiriransise. Yuk atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang asi nisi dibniliboka yina kareraning bok, niryi sunsi, “Yina karebsindarur, co bok karebsindarur,” eboka kum arungdeiriransise. Ati, sunci niti, “Nun yina kum moloryirur se,” tenen tatab-tatab ebnindate ura, niryi sunti, “Ni kwityabwe, niryi manmalibmasise se,” eboka, “Ni manmalibmasise dinyi luba kibdeibdarur,” eboka molobsitinyi. Ba, yuk dinyi nirya ati niryi sunti malyi dinyi ton kum kurdongoransise. Ara, “Yuk atei aryi kuboka dib tenen nang ara iya erebdob nang kunung bok, sun Korintus nang ara tukwetam bun nang ato kunung,” tenen malyi kum kurdongoransise.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, ni sun dam diryankwan ara liki winiryi tum diryankwansin. Ati, ni sun dam tamuboka diryankwan ababyi, niryi sunsi, “Yina kum co bok kum karebnindarur,” kum ebkwansin. Niryi sunti ikin dinyi takubdeiboka kum arukdeibkwansin. Niryi sun bona bon dinyi ati, “Dobdobtinyi,” tenen kum diryankwansin. Erda, niryi sun kanya ati, “Katabum ebdeibtinyi,” tenen diryankwansin. Nira sun nai bitonyi kusunun cok, niryi sunda ni mabwe nermabwe ato kurandum nang ati, “Yina kareboka dibnilibnindarur,” ebsitinyi do? Ato tenen kum. Sun mitik mabwe nermabwe ara sun nai ab sun kwin ab asi dirnilina kum kuraming. Erda, sun nai ab sun kwin ab ara sun mabwe nermabwe asi dirniliraming.

Ati, nira boukwe weik kuboka sun nai bitonyi kunun cok, kilkil kanya bonun ci, niryi sunti, “Dibnilibkwan,” tenen ni dinyi nirya sunsi karebkwansin. Ni dinyi akwe kum karebkwansin. Erda, ni kanya ababyi sunti deirirdanun cok, sunti ur karebdankwan. Niryi sunsi boukwe kusunun ara tabaknin boukwe weik kusunun ati ebman. Ura, sunci niti, “Minob talak ara boukwe weik kimnamoubwe ani, ukuryok ara boukwe mitik to kimnub,” teneranurum darib?

Ura, sunbabyi ara niti, “Ikin dinyi kum arukdeibkwansir,” tenen bingnanurum. Ba, sunci niti, “‘Co bok karebsiting,’ tenen uram ulubyangan ebmou uca, co bok karebmoubwe,” teneranurum darib? Niryi sunsi uram ulubyang kum eransise ati ebman.

Tonda, niryi ni bokdonokmasou nang asi “Uram ulubyang ebmunyi uca, sun Korintus nang aryi co bok karebsiting,” eboka arukdeibmase ati teneranurum darib? Ni bokdonokmasou nang ara, “Co bok karebting,” tenen uram ulubyang ebmasei ati tenerandum darib? Ato tenesina mem.

Niryi nun kwit Titus bisi ebkataboka, “Korintus atei dirbirum,” eboka bokdonokmasiryok, dib tenenanyi yuknyi bibabyi bokdonokmase uca, sun tonkwa sun dam diryanmasiring. Ura, nun kwit Titus biryi uram ulubyangan eboka sunsi manmalibdeibsou do? Ato tenen kum. Niryi, “Co bok karebsindarur,” eboka molosina kum kuranse to, Titus bibabyi neik kanya boboka, “Co bok karebsindarur,” eboka molosina kum kuramwe. Ati, nibabyi erbabyi neik kanya boboka teleb dinyi akwe kunubde baranim.

Niryi ato ebmasin ara, “Nundamnyi libdandobkwayeb,” tenen ato ebmasin ati teneranurum do? Ato tenen kum. Nunda Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub cok, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi dib en uram akwe ebmasib. Nunci sunda Korintus nang kanya ati, “Katabum ebdeibkwayeb,” tenen ato ebmasib. Ni kwityabwe, ni boukwe weik kusunun nang. Nun wa iboka kuramibyi tok nirya ara, “Sun kanya katabum ebdeibkwayeb,” tenen kusunub.

Ni sun dam diryasitinyi ara, “Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde baranting,” tenen diryasitinyi. Ba, niryi sunti mambul kanya bosunun ati ebmasin. Ara, niryi, “Malyi dinyi tuba kunubmurubting deyok aryi, niryi sunsi wenebnyei se,” tenen mambul kanya bosunun. Tonda, sunci niti, “Wenena uram ebsicei se,” tenebnindate bok, niryi sunsi wenebsitinyi. Ati, niryi ilil kanya bosunun cok, sunda Korintus nang ati ato tenesunun. “Sun mamun lulurdaraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Tulum kanya bordaraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Kererdaraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Yuk-yuk bongdaraming do?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Malyi uram erdaraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Yuk nang asi talakdoraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming darib?” tenesunun. Tonda, “Ninyi ilinto buluboka uram lilim enung darib?” tenesunun.

Niryi sunda Korintus nang ati, “Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunuraming,” eboka kisal dangnansise. Ani, sunci malyi kun dinyi kubdate ura, nira sunti alyi kanya borantinyi. Ara, nira sunsi kisal dangdansinyi bisi Er Imtamnyi biryi luknubdeibnute uca, alyi kanya borantinyi. “Er Imtamnyi biryi ni alyi kibdongobnute,” tenen ilil kanya bonun. Ara, sun kankan ninyi ilinto aryi minob ura malyi kun dinyi kurandau ani, ukuryok tuba kurmururandate deyok aryi, ni kanya ara mambul weik kubnute. Sun kankan ninyi ilinto ara kam ato kuramingiryok, “Talyi yobdatibyi,” tenen dinyi yuk-yuk tenen kubde baraming. Ato dinyi kubmurubde baramingiryok, sun malyi kun dinyi tanglona kum kuraming ati ato ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi sunsi minob ura diryanmasise ara liki bitinyi diryanmasise. Ani, niryi sun dam aminda aryi tubto tamuryankwan ara liki winiryi tum diryankwansin. Niryi sun dam yanmanyi ura, niryi sun kankan aryi kuboka malyi kurmurun nang asi wenebkwan. Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato eboka kerek sekeiamnyi.
“Sun deyok lilin nang ara ninyi aryi tatab-tatab ebmangnyi nang asi, ‘Malyi dinyi kubmumwe ati wenebkwayeb, se,’ eranting ara talyi keken uram deib aryi uram minola sekwebingnyei.

Erda, ninyi bitinyi kum winiryi kum aryi, ‘Anyi bira ato-ato kuboka malyi kubmou asi nun asing eibmoubwe,’ lak ebting ura, sun deyok lilin nang aryi deyok diboka lilibting ura, ‘Malyi kubmar ati wenebkwayeb,’ eboka uram dobdeibting kum, ‘Er deyok kum kubmar ati nunci wenen dinyi kum karebkwayeb,’ eboka uram dobdeibting kum.”

Ura, nibabyi neiktoto kunun. Niryi wenen dinyi karenun ara talyi keken uram deib aryi minola kum karenun. Ati, niryi sun kankan ton nang aryi malyi kun dinyi lak kimsunun ara liki tentok akwe lak kum kibmasise. Erda, ni ab sun ab tonkwa kuramoubwe liki bitinyi tum aryi niryi tamuboka ato ebmasise. “Sun kankan ton nang aryi malyi dinyi kuramnyi deyok aryi, niryi wenebkwan. Ara, ni tamuryanyi ura, a nang asi wenebkwan,” ebmasise. Tonda, “Yuk malyi kun nang ababyi wenebkwan,” ebmasise. Ni sun ab tonkwa kuramaburyok, liki bitinyi ato ebmasise. Ani, ukuryok sun ab tonkwa kum kuramibiryok, niryi kerek sengna deib aryi tamuboka ebmasin. “Ni sun dam tamuryanyi ura, sun kankan aryi malyi kurmurun nang asi mikib kuboka wenebkwansin.”

Sun kankan ton nang aryi nisi dib kum teneranurum cok, sunci niti, “Nun Du Kristus Uram ermururandanyi diboka kurur do?” eranurum cok, “Una kuboka biktibyi do?” tenen, “Lak kibdeibsurum,” eboka moloranurum. Ura, niryi, “Nira nun Du Yesus Uram ermurunanyi diboka kunun,” tenen bingnun cok, sunbabyi lak kibdeibkwinsin. Nun Du biryi ni biriman aryi sun kankan dam wa iransou ara mitang kuboka sun kankan dam wa iransou do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, nun Du Yesus biryi ni biriman aryi sun kankan dam wa iransou ara mikib kuboka wa iransou cok, du mourdeiriransou. Ati, sunci, “Nun Du biryi Paulus biriman aryi wa iransou ara mikib kuboka wa iransou,” tenen bikdate deib aryi sunci niti, “Nun Du uram ermururandanyi diboka kurur,” tenen biknindate.

Nun Du bira iya mikibnyi kurur bok, ninyi aryi Erda mitangnyi kibdanmounyi bisi doboka co lase deib aryi deibmai. Co lase deib aryi deibmai uca, dibmou. Sirya dibmou ani, Erda kam bukokmounyi bira Er Imtamnyi mikib deib aryi iya kam burur. Ura, nunda nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang ara nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunub cok, nunbabyi neiktoto mitang nang ato kunub. Ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi Er mikib deib aryi nunsi kam kurdeirisurur. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kam kurdeirisurur uca, nunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kubmurubde binkwamibiryok, sunda dib tenen nang kankan aryi wa ibkwayeb.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci sun kanya asi diboka lilibdandarur. Ara, “Nunda nun Du Yesus bisi diboka dib tenenub do kum do?” tenen sundamnyi lilibdandarur. Nun Du bira sun kanya dam kusurur ati sunci kum bikdanmarum do? Ba, sunda nun Du Yesus bisi diboka dib kum tenebdate uca, nun Du Yesus bira sun kanya dam kum kuransute.
Ura, ni kwityabwe, nun Du bira nun kanya dam ababyi kusurur ati ebman. Ati, sunbabyi nunti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangdur nang kunung,” tenen biksindate.

Ni kwityabwe, nunci sunti, “Malyi dinyi kunubde bingnyei,” tenen Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi Ersi molormilibde basunub. Molormilibde basunub cok, nunci, “Ninyi aryi nunti, ‘Nun Du wa irmilin nang diboka kunung,’ tenen biksiting,” tenen kum molonub. Erda, nunci sunti, “Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde bating,” tenen molormilibde basunub. Ati, sun kankan ton nang aryi nunti, “Nun Du wa irmilin nang diboka kum kunung,” tenebsiting ababyi, sunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde bindarur ati ebmasib.

Dib en uram ara iya mikib kurur deyok aryi, ninyi aryi bisik sekmanto kum kurur. A deyok aryi, nunci nundamnyi kum ererdeirirdanub cok, Teleb Uram akwe ererdeirinub ati ebman. Ati, nunci, “Dib en uram bisik sektibyi,” tenen kum kunub. Erda, nunci, “Dib en uram erebdeiboka lak ebkwayeb,” tenen kunubde banub.

Nunda mitang nang ato kuramib bok, sunda mikib nang ato kurandum deyok aryi, nun kanya kilkil weik kuransir ati ebmasin. Tonda, nunci sunsi Er Imtamnyi bisi molormilisunub ara, “Sunglona dinyi deibloboka sunglona kum uca teleb dinyi kunubting,” tenen molormilisunub.

Ni sun ab tonkwa kum kuramibiryok, mikib uram eboka kerek sengdeirisunun. Ara, niryi sunti, “Sun dam yanmanyi ura, niryi mikib uram eboka wenebnyei,” tenen kerek sengna deib aryi mikib uram eboka kerek sengdeirisunun. Nun Du bira nisi mikib karebnou uca, niryi sunsi wenebsitinyi ati ebman. Ato ebman bok, nun Du Yesus bira nisi mikib karebnou ara, “Sun dib tenen nang kanya kum daneibkwande,” tenen mikib kum karebdeibnou. Erda, “Sun dib tenen nang kanya katabum ebdeibkwande,” tenen Erci nisi mikib karebnou.

Ura, sirya kobdob kerek sekeibkwinsin uram ara, “Ni kwityabwe teleb,” eboka kerek sekeibkwinsin. Sunci, “Sunglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde binkwayeb,” tenen ingkirikdarur. Tonda, niryi sunti ebkatabdeiboka, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” ebmasin uram asi sunci diboka kekebdarur. Tonda, sunci neik kanya boramun ci, antaniboka kubdarur. Ato kubmunyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi boukwe weik kusurutnyi ton ninyi kanya teleb kurdeirisurutnyi ton sun ab tonkwa kubkwandum.

Nunda dib tenen nang aryi nun mamun irirdanub to, sunci sun mamun iribdandoka, “Nun kwityabwe teleb,” eboka kibdobdandarur. Sun Makedonia mutuk aryi kuboka dib tenen nang nirya ara sunti, “Nun kwityabwe teleb,” ebdeibmasing.

Nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi kisal dakoka sun ab tonkwa kuna teleb. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi boukwe kiboka sun ab tonkwa kuna teleb. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi antanibdeiboka sun nirya ab tonkwa kuna teleb.

Teleb ni kwityabwe, ni Paulus ab ni ab tonkwa kuramib dib tenen nang ab aryi sun Galatia mutuk atei yuk-yuk bulurandum dib tenen nang asi, “Teleb,” ebmasib. Ni Paulus bira ninyi ilinto babyi ninyi tentok babyi aryi nisi kum bokdonoknei. Erda, nun Du Yesus Kristus ab nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun Du Yesus bisi kam bukeibmounyi ab aryi, “Teleb Uram eterebde binkwandum,” eboka nisi bokdonokmanirei ati ebman.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai ab nun Du Yesus ab aryi antanibdeiboka sun kanya namin kurdeirisina teleb.

Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira Erdamnyi karebdanmou ci, dibmou ara Erci nun malyi kun dinyi kilibkwansou ati, Erdamnyi karebdanmou. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nunti, “Malyi kun dinyi ara ninyi aryi ukuryok kuraming asi taklobkwaming ati, lebdeibkwan,” tenen Erci Erdamnyi karebdanmou. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi “Teleb,” teneramwe to kunuboka nun Du Yesus biryi Erdamnyi nunti karebdanmou.
Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb. Ara, ukuryok aryi kuboka nun aminda kubde bankwayeb talak nirya asi nunci tanglona kum uca Er si weik ena teleb. Amin.

Ni kwityabwe, sunda yuma ara Teleb Uram diboka dobdobmandau asi, ukuryok ara taklobmarum do? Ato tenen ni kanya kankana kuranir. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira, “Ni Mi Kristus biriman aryi kisal dakwan,” tenen sunsi nabdobmasou bok, sunda unato ati Teleb Uram asi dokdonokoka yuk uram asi ola talebdobmarum do?

Teleb Uram ara Er Imtamnyi Uram tentok a kurur ati ebman. Teleb Uram ara yuk uram ton kum kurur. Asi, ninyi ton nang ara, “Kristus uram Teleb Uram asi dangubminikoka eterebkwayeb,” tenen sun Galatia nang asi tola uram eteresunung. Tola uram eteresunung uca, a nang aryi sun dib tenen nang kanya yuk-yuk asi kankana kurdeiriransing.
