Ati, nun Du Yesus biryi nunti, “Lebkwan,” tenen Erdamnyi karebdandoka co lase deici dibmou. Nun Du biryi, “Ni dibkwan ara Ni Nai Imtamnyi bisi Nidamnyi dama ato deibdankwan,” tenen Erci Erdamnyi karebdanmou. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun Du Yesus biryi karebdanmou dama asi asing eiboka Er kanya teleb kubkwamwe ati, nun Du Yesus biryi Erdamnyi karebdandoka co lase deici dibmou.

Ni kwityabwe, sunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kundarur ati, sunci malyi kun dinyi ara kisibdobdarur. Ara, “Ner talyi yobtinyi,” tenen ab, “Nerabwe ara talyi yobniting,” tenen dinyi nirya sunci bai donokdarur. Tonda, “Bona asi weikanun talebtinyi,” tenena dinyi ababyi sunci kisibdobkwandarur. Nunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kunub ati, ato dinyi kununa ara kikib kuma.

Tonda, sunci malyi uram ebdamunyei. Ara, talyi yordana uram ton, alyi tenen dinyi ton, sunci ebdamunyei. Tonda, talyi uram yuk-yuk asi ebdamunyei. Tonda, alyi tenen dinyi ebmunyei. Ato dinyi ara kikib kuma. Erda, sunci sun malyi kun dinyi bai donokmunyi ura, sunci, “Ei, nun Nai,” eboka nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb.

Ura, sun ner talyi yon nang ton, “Talyi yobkwan,” tenen nang ton, “Bona-bona talebtinyi,” tenen nang ton ati niryi uram ton ebdeibkwinsin. Nun Du Kristus ab nun Nai Imtamnyi ab tonkwa iya weik sien nang kuboka kalikwansing ba, sun ato kuboka malyi kun nang ara nun Du Yesus amwetam kun nang kum kubkwaming. Erda, nun Du Yesus biryi a malyi kun nang asi yakdonokwande. “Bona-bona talebtinyi,” tenen nang ababyi malyito kuraming ati ebman. Sun ato tenen nang ara nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi diboka kum teneinung ati, kwemdina molon nang ato kunung.

Ninyi tentok ababyi talyi uram eterebsingnyi ba, sunsi bowanikminiksicei. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira talyi eterena uram ara, “Ni li,” tenen yu weik kurur ci, Er Uram dib en uram asi kununa kum nang asi diboka wenerur.
Ati, ni kwityabwe! Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun malyi kuramingnyi nang asi wenebkwande ati, sunci sun malyi kun nang aryi malyi kuraming to miliboka kunubmunyei.

Minob talak ara sunbabyi kunuk dam aryi kun nang ato kurandau ci, malyi dinyi kurandau ati, ato ebman. Ato kurandau bok, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsou uca, sunda ukuryok berengna dam kuraming nang ato kuboka nun Du Yesus bisi milindarur. A deyok aryi, sunci, “Kunuk dam dinyi malyi kun dinyi nirya bai donokmoubwe,” tenen sunci berengna dam kun nang ato kubmun cok, teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur.

Sun berengna dam kun nang ara du mouboka teleb dinyi yuk-yuk kunuraming ati ato ebman. Ara, yuk nang asi teleb kurdeiriraming dinyi ton, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi kikib dinyi kununung dinyi ton, ara dib en uram asi lak eraming dinyi ton kunuraming.
Tonda, a nang ara, “Nun Nai kanya asi una kuboka teleb kubdeibtibyi,” tenen dibliliboka nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenerur to kununung. Ati, nunci du mouboka ato kununa teleb.

Ura, sun malyi kun nang aryi malyi kuramingnyi to sunci miliboka kubmunyei. A nang aryi malyi kuramingnyi to ara kunuk dam dinyi akwe kuraming. Ato dinyi ara talyi dinyi akwe kurur. Sunci a malyi kun dinyi kunubmunyei. Erda, sunci, “A dinyi ara malyi to,” eboka malyi kun nang asi wenebdarur.
Sun malyi kun nang aryi iniboka malyi kuraming dinyi ara iya alyi tenen dinyi kurur ati, a nang aryi malyi kuraming dinyi asi lak ena ababyi ara kikib kum kubsute.
Ba, Er Imtamnyi Uram ara berengna ato kurur ati, utotoa nirya asi lak kimdeirirur.
Berengna aryi utotoa nirya ara lak kimsurur ati ato ebman. A deyok aryi, nunda dib tenen nang aryi ato eramib,
“Ni kwit wi marandimnyi, bukokdum se!
Din nang ato kurandimnyi, kam bukokdum se!
Bukokminyi ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi kansi berekeibkwankir.”

Ura, ni kwityabwe! Sunci sundamnyi diboka kalikdamun ci, “Una kuboka teleb dinyi kunubtibyi do?” tenen lilibmun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kununa teleb. Ati, sunci ninyi kanya bon kum nang ato kubmunyei. Erda, bikdob uram bingna nang ato kibdamun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur.

Ukuryok talak ara ninyi ilinto malyi kun dinyi kuraming ati, sunci tanglona kum uca, “Nun Nai biryi nunsi Teleb Uram lak ena kikib tum karebmasir do?” tenen tenebmun ci, sunci Teleb Uram asi tuba-tuba lak ebdarur.
Ati, sunci ninyi kanya bon kum nang ato kubmunyei. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to asi sunci bikoka teneiboka kunubdarur.

Tonda, sunci anggur me yibmun ba, walina talebsicei. Anggur me ilinto yibmunyi uca, sunci, “Ner talyi yobtinyi,” tenen kanya bobmunyei ati, sunci anggur me yibmunyei. Erda, sunci walina talen dinyi nirya asi takloboka Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sun kanya dam asi langdeirisina teleb.
Sunda dib tenen nang mamun ebdamunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biti si weik en mot asi semna teleb. Ara, sun kanya kilkil kubsir bok, Er Imtamnyi si ererdeirin mot amuma-amuma semna teleb.

Sunci tuba-tuba, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb. Ara, nun Nai biryi nunti karebmasici dinyi nirya ara Nun Du Yesus Kristus si deici aryi nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik eboka, “Ei nun Nai,” ena teleb.

Tonda, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Nun iya weik sienyi kurur,” tenen ilil kusina teleb. Nun Du bisi ilil kubsiri bok, sunci Er Uram asi kunuboka sun kanya luknubmun ci, sun mamun ati, “Ni naiyabwe,” tenen sun wenena uram asi kekebdandarur.
Sun ninyi doansingnyi nerabwe ara nun Du Kristus Yesus Uram kekeboka kunubninto kuboka sun akenyabwe uram kekeboka kununa teleb.

Nun Du Kristus bira nun weik sienyi kurur ci, nun dib tenen nang asi leboka dibniliboka kalingsurur. Ato kuboka, sun ner don nang ababyi neiktoto sun doamingnyi nerabwe asi dibniliboka kalingna nang kunung ati, sun nerabwe aryi sun akenyabwe uram asi diboka kekena teleb.
Ati, nun dib tenen nang aryi nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram asi kekeboka diboka kunuramib to, sun ninyi don nerabwe ara sun akenyabwe uram asi diboka kekeboka kununa teleb.

Ba, sun ner don nang ara sun nerabwe asi boukwe kimna teleb. Nun Du Kristus biryi nun dib tenen nang asi boukwe weik tenen Erdamnyi nunti karebdanmou to kuboka sun sal nang ara sun nerabwe yuk-yuk asi boukwe kiboka sundamnyi karerdana teleb.

Nun Du Kristus bira Erdamnyi karebdandoka co lase deici dibmou ba, Erci nun dib tenen nang ati, “Sun malyi kun dinyi kiliboka Ni dam kun nang kibdeibkwan,” tenen Erdamnyi karebdanmou. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nun malyi kun dinyi kilibsou ara Er dib en uram deib ab me dongon deib ab aryi Erci nunsi kilibsou.

Ati, nun Du Yesus biryi nunda malyi dinyi kilibsou nang ati ato teneransou. “Sun malyi kun dinyi kilibnyi ura, Ni urasintam aryi tikeibkwan ba, nining mitik ababyi kuna kum nang ato kibdeibkwan,” teneransou. Ara, malyi kun dinyi mitik ababyi nun dam tuba kum kubkwansou ati, nun Du Yesus bira Erdamnyi biryi nunti karebdanmou ci, co lase deici dibmou.

Ato kuboka neiktoto, sun sal nang ara sun nerabwe asi boukwe kiboka kalingna teleb. Ninyi aryi sun nong asi dirnilirdaraming to, ner er akenyabwe ababyi neiktoto sun ner ati, “Ni mining tub ato,” tenen dirnilina teleb. Unanyi biryi er ner asi boukwe kimdanci ura, er mining tub asi boukwe kimdarandiryi ati ebman.

Ninyi tentok ababyi sun mining nong asi bimsa ton kum yarirdanung. Erda, ninyi nirya aryi sun mining nong asi dirnilirdaraming. Ato kuboka nun Du Kristus bibabyi neiktoto nun dib tenen nang asi, “Ni nong ato nang kunung,” tenen diboka dirnilisurur.
Nun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus ab antanibdeibsou nang ara Er ab tonkwa nong tentok ato kunub ati, ato ebman.
“A deyok aryi, sal aryi er nai ab er kwin asi takloboka er ner dobdiryi, sun bitinyi ara antaniboka tub tentok ato kuna teleb.”
Ato eboka Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi nunsi eteresurur.
A dinyi ara minola bikdobman dinyi kum kurur. Ara, er akenyi ab er ner ab antanirdana ati, ato kum ebman. Erda, uram kikliboka nun Du Yesus Kristus ab nunda dib tenen nang ab antanirdana ati ebman.

Ba, sun ner doamingnyi nang ara sundamnyi boukwe kimdarandum to, sun nerabwe asi boukwe weik kimna teleb. Tonda, sun nerabwe ara, “Ni akenyi,” tenen sun akenyabwe uram yuk-yuk asi kekeboka kununa teleb.
Ura, mabwe nermabwe, sunci sun naiyabwe sun kwinyabwe uram asi diboka kekebdarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus bisi milibmun ci, sun naiyabwe sun kwinyabwe uram asi kunubdarur. Ato kuna ara kikib.

Sunci sun naiyabwe ab sun kwinyabwe ab asi, “Nun naiyabwe nun kwinyabwe,” tenen sun uram kunubkwandarur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a uram eboka takubdeibsou to ara bikdob uram kurur. Bikdob uram kurur ati, nun Nai biryi uram ebtabakoka, “Kisal dakwan,” erdeirisin uram ton ebtabakmou.

Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun naiyabwe sun kwinyabwe uram keken nang ati ato ebdeibsou. “Niryi kisal dakwansin ati, sun tukwetam kubkwandum ara uki weik kubde baramunyi ani, wau loboka dibkwandarur.”

Ura, sunda naiyabwe ara wise nang kikniboka sun mabwe asi bimsa yarina mem. Sun uram wise deyok aryi sun mabwe nermabwe aryi sunsi yu kibdeibmunyei. Erda, sunci namibdeiboka sun mabwe nermabwe asi nun Du Yesus biryi bikdob en uram asi eterebmurubdarur.

Ura, sunda ikin wa borandum nang ara sun wa takurdeiriransing nang uram asi, “Sulbalyi nang ara wenebkwaming,” tenen ilil kanya boboka sunci sun wa takurdeiriransing nang, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen sun uram asi diboka kunubdarur. Ati, sunci sun wa takurdeirisina nang ati, “Nun Naiyabwe,” tenebmun ci, “Sulbalyi nang ara wenebkwaming,” tenen ilil kanya bobmun ci, sunci sun wa tukurdeiriransing nang uram asi diboka kunubdarur. Ara, sundamnyi karebdandoka busul weik kuboka sun wa ibdarur. Ati, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilin nang kurandum ci, nun Du Yesus Uram asi diboka kunurandum to, sunsi sun tukwetam aryi kuboka wa takurdeirisin nang uram ababyi diboka kunubdarur.

Sunsi wa takurdeiriransing nang aryi asing dinmasingnyi babyi, asing kum dinmasingnyi babyi, sunci sun ebmasingnyi uram asi busul kuboka kunubkwandarur. Ati, sunci, “Nun wa takurdeiriransing nang kanya asi teleb kibdeibkwayeb,” teneboka sun dinmasingnyi talak akwe er uram kununa teleb. Tonda, asing kum dinmasingnyi talak ababyi sunci sun wa takurdeiriransing nang aryi uram ebmangnyi to asi kunubkwandarur. Ati, sunci, “Nunda Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub,” tenen Er Imtamnyi teleb tenebmaci to kunubmun ci, busul kubmun ci, sun wa takurdeiriransing nang uram ebmangnyi to asi kununa teleb.

Ba, sunci kilkil kanya bobmun ci, wa ibdarur. Sunci sundamnyi karebdandoka wa diboka iramun ci, “Nun Du biryi arukmasou ati, nunci nun wa takurdeiriransing nang aryi arukansingnyi to diboka kunubkwayeb,” tenena teleb. Ato kuramunyi ura, sunsi ninyi aryi arukansingnyi dinyi akwe kununa kum kunuramunci. Erda, nun Du Yesus biryi arukansici dinyi kunuramunci.

Ninyi yuk-yuk aryi teleb kuramingnyi ura, nun Du Yesus biryi sunsi teleb dinyi yuk-yuk tamubkarebkwande. Ara, sun wa takurdeirin nang ton sun wa irmilin nang ton aryi teleb kuramingnyi to, nun Du Yesus biryi sunsi teleb dinyi karebkwande. Ati, sunci, “Nun Du biryi nunda wa irmilin nang ab sun wa takurdeirisin nang ab asi antaniboka teleb dinyi tamubkarebkwansir,” tenen bikmarum ati, niryi sunsi, “Busul kuboka wa ibdarur,” ebmasin.

Ba, sun wa takurdeirin nang ababyi neiktoto kuna teleb. Ara, sunci sun wa irmilin nang asi teleb kurdeirina teleb. Ati, sunci, “Diboka kulabkwansin,” eboka wenena mem. Erda, sunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nunbabyi sunbabyi asi arungnansiranyi kurur ati, Erci nunsi wenebsicei,” tenena teleb. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi urasin kum wimsurur ati, Erci sunda wa takurdeirin nang teleb kuna nang asi teleb kubdeibkwansir. Ba, sun wa takurdeirin nang malyi kun nang asi nun Nai biryi wenebkwande.

Ura, sirya kobdob ebkwinsin uram ara ato. Sunci nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebmun ci, katabum ebtabakoka mikib kubdarur. Nun Du bira iya mikibnyi kurur ati, sunci Er mikib deici katabum eboka dib tenebdarur.

Isa sienyi Iblis biryi, “Bowanikminiktinyi,” tenen nun dib tenen nang asi ukurderansir. Isa aryi ukurderansir ati, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi mikib deici aryi bisik sekwayeb,” tenen kiknibminikdobdarur. Ati, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou ting asi kinikoka yin mar douboka kiknibminikwayeb.

Ati, nunsi mar isunung ara ninyi sirik aryi nunsi mar isununga kuma. Erda, isa aryi arungnande nang sien nang aryi nun dib tenen nang asi mar isunung. Tonda, isa aryi arungnande mikib nang mar isunung. Tonda, malyi kuna deyok nang aryi nunsi mar isunung. Tonda, yuk isa-yuk isa nang aryi mikib kuboka mar isunung. Ara, “Sakeibtibyi, obminiktibyi,” tenen mar isunung. Ati, nunci yin mar kikniraming to kubkwayeb.

A deyok aryi, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou ting kinikoka yin mar kiknibdobdarur. Ba, isa mer iyangasingnyi ababyi sunci katabum eboka tikoka, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi mikib deici aryi nunci Iblis ab er milin nang ab asi bisik sekwayeb,” tenen kiknibminikdobdarur.

Ati, sunci katabum eboka tikdarur. Ara, ting kinikoka ting tankalya moubmun ci, mar ngang kwatina ababyi kwatibdobdarur. Ting sirik ati, kum ebman. Tonda, ngang kwatina sirik ati kum ebman. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou mikib aryi Iblis bisik sengna dinyi ati ebman. Dib en uram lak eterena ara ngang kwatina ato dinyi kurur ati ebman. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam kikib dinyi kununa ara ting ato dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ati, nunci dib en uram asi ebibiryok, nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam aryi kikib dinyi kunubibyi ura, isa mer aryi nunsi orminingsina kum kubkwansunung.

Tonda, yin doun nang ara, “Cung binkwayeb,” tenen yan karuk ongoraming to, sunbabyi neiktoto ukuna teleb. Ati, sunci, “Cung bindoka Teleb Uram eterebde binkwayeb,” tenen Teleb Uram eterebde bindarur. Ara, kilkil kanya bobmun cok, Teleb Uram ara ninyi antanirdeirisin uram asi eterebde binkwandum ati ato ebman.

Tonda, mar uw lilina doubdarur. Mar uw lilina sirik ati kum ebman. Erda, nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenena ati ebman. Ati, sunci nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebmunyi ura, a dib tenena aryi lilibkwansir ati, isa mar urub ara sunsi kum bisik ebkwansir.

Tonda, yin doun nang kisok kaluna si helm kalubdobdarur. Tonda, ninyi on ya doubdarur. Helm sirik ton ninyi on ya sirik ati kum ebman. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou mikib aryi Iblis bisik sengna dinyi ati ebman. “Nun Du biryi nunsi lebsou,” tenena ara helm kaluna ato dinyi kurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Uram ara mikib kurur ati, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi dourur ninyi on ya ato kurur ati ebman.

Ura, sunci ato kuboka kiknibminikmun ci, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Milibsurum,” eboka tuba-tuba molona teleb. Ati, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus milibsir ba, sunci nun Nai bisi molobmurubdarur. Tanglona kum uca kalikdamun ci, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi dam kun nang nirya ati, tuba-tuba molobmilibdandarur.

Molobmilibdamun ci, sunci ni Paulus bibabyi molobmilibnindarur. Ara, niryi Teleb Uram eterenmanyi ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi milibnici uca, kikib uram akwe ebkwan ati, sunci molobmilibnindarur. Ara, niryi ilil kuna kum uca Teleb Uram ara, “Naie,” tenen dinyi, ninyi aryi minob kum bikamoubwe uram asi lak eterebkwan ati, sunci niti molormilibnindarur.

Ni Paulus bira ninyi urasintam aryi a Teleb Uram lak eterenanyi kunun deyok aryi, ninyi aryi nisi besi tabwe aryi deboka kalingnunung. Ati, sunci niti molormilinmanumunyi ura, “Erci ilil kum asa aryi lak eterebdur,” tenen molobmilibnindarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi takubdeibnou to, niryi ilil kum asa aryi Teleb Uram eterebkwan ati, molobmilibnindarur. Ato eboka molobmasin.

Ba, nun kwit Tikhikus bira sun dam yaci ura, ni kunun to ab ni wa inun to ab nirya ara sun dam nukwande ba, sunci kekeboka bikwandum. Tikhikus bira dib tenenanyi kurur ati nun boukwe kunubnyi kurur. Erda nun Du Yesus bisi milirur ci, busul kuboka Teleb Uram eterermilisurur.
A deyok aryi, niryi ersi, “Nun kwityabwe dam birum,” eboka bokdonokman. Ati, “Nun kuramib to nukdiryok, nun kwityabwe kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum ebdeibkwande,” tenen niryi ersi bokdonokman.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sun nirya asi antanirdeirisina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai ab nun Du Yesus ab aryi sunsi boukwe weik kibdeiboka tanglona kum uca dib tenen dinyi karesina teleb.
Sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi tanglona kum uca boukwe kun nang nirya asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb.
Ni Paulus biryi a kunum sirya kerek sekeibmasin.

Ni Paulus ab Timotius ab ara nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilin nang kununum ci, sun Filipi atei kundarur dib tenen nang ati, “Teleb,” ebmasinim. Ara, sun nun Nai Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe kurandum cok, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kurandum nang nirya ati kibdobmasinim. Tonda, sun dib tenen nang asi kalingnandum nang babyi, ton sun utotoa kum nang asi bongkaren nang babyi ati kibdobmasinim.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi kisal dakoka antanibdeibsiringnyi uca, sun kanya teleb akwe kuna teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou uca, sun Filipi nang aryi minob uca nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram dobdobmandau ura, nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang asi milibmandau. Ani, ukuryok ababyi sunci nunsi tuba milibde baransurum. Ati, niryi a dinyi ati kanya teneibde basunun ci, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi tuba-tuba, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kinun.
Ara, nirya kilkil kanya boboka abniryi, sun nirya ati darab-darab eboka tuba-tuba molormilisunun.

Ati, niryi sunti ato tenesunun. “Teleb Uram yuma dobkalibmai uki tum aryi kuboka nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang asi miliransei ani, ukuryok ababyi tuba miliransing.” Ato tenesunun cok, ni kanya kilkil kunurur.

Ura, katabum eboka niryi sunti ato tenesunun, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi deyok kouboka sun kanya dam yuk-yuk aryi teleb wa ibkalibmasou. Wa ibkalibmasou ani, Erci a wa asi ibmurubde baransici ani, tanglona kum uca kunubkwande. Sirya kunubmaci ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus tamuryankwande.”

Nira sun Filipi nang ati boukwe weik kusunun deyok aryi, niryi sun nirya ati ato kuboka kilkil kanya bosunun ara kikib. Sun nirya ara nira Teleb Uram eterebde banunyi bisi miliranurum nang kurandum. Ara, nira tabwe deaneinyi kunun cok, Teleb Uram ati, “Dib en uram kurur,” eboka libde banun asi, sunci nisi milibde baranurum. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kisal dakoka teleb wa takubdeibnou uca, a wa asi inun asi sunci milibde baranurum ati ebman.

Niryi sun nirya ati, “Sun ab tonkwa ebdatibyi se,” tenen boukwe weik bosunun. Nun Du Kristus Yesus bira sunsi boukwe weik kusurur to, nibabyi neiktoto sunsi boukwe weik kusunun. Tola kuma. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ni tenen kanya bingnurur ati diboka ebmasin.

Ura, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molormiliransin ci, sun Filipi nang ati ato eboka molormilisunun. “Nai Imtamnyi, Kanci bikdob dinyi karebminyi uca, sun boukwe kimdana ara tabakdongo-tabakdongo boukwe weik kimdana teleb. Tonda, dib en uram deyok diboka bikdobingiryi, sun boukwe kimdana ara langdeiboka kuna teleb,” eboka molormilisunun.

Ba, sunci, “A dinyi ara bikdob dinyi kurur,” tenen ba, “O dinyi ara malyi dinyi kurur,” tenen bikwandum ati molormilisunun. Tonda, sunda kanya bintinin kum dinyi boboka tatab-tatab ebmanto kum kuramunyi ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus tamuryangaci uki tum berekwande ati molormilisunun.

Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi karebsici uca, sun langdeiboka du mouransir nang kuramun ci, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kununa teleb. Ninyi nirya aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik erebkwaming ati, ato eboka molormilisunun.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sunci a dinyi ara bingna teleb. Nira tabwe deaneinyi kunun cok, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak eterena kum taklobmase ati ebman. Ninyi aryi nisi tabwe deanei uca, Teleb Uram eterena ara bisik kum sekminikanei. Erda, bublan kungdeirininto kuanei ba, Teleb Uram etereranse.

Ninyi aryi nisi tabwe deanei uca, sun weik sienyi si Kaisar atei kalingna nang nirya aryi niti, “Kristus uram Teleb Uram lak eteresurur deyok aryi, tabwe deaminyi,” tenen bingnunung. Tonda, yuk nang nirya akatei kuraming nang ababyi neiktoto ato teneboka bingnunung.

Ni Paulus bira tabwe deaneinyi kunun cok, ilil kum uca Teleb Uram ilil asa kum uca eterebmurubde banun. Tanglona kum uca eterebde banun deyok aryi, nun kwityabwe nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang yuk nang sun kanya ara katabum ebdeibmou. Katabum ebdeibmou uca, sunda ilil kanya tuba kum boraming. Erda, katabum kanya kibtabakoka Er Imtamnyi Uram lak etereraming.

Ninyi ton nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram lak eterenung cok, sunci niti kitukna kanya boboka bisik sengminingnunung. Ba, yuk nang ara niti boukwe weik kiboka abningiryi, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak etereraming.

A nang ara boukwe weik kimdana deyok aryi, ato kunuraming. Ati, sunci niti ato teneraning. “Nun kwit Paulus bira tabwe deaminyi bira nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram asi liboka abdiryi, ‘Dib en uram,’ ebkwande ati ato kurande,” tenenung.

Ba, sun wingdana kanya bobingnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram lak etereramingiryok, sunci, “Nidamnyi erebdeibdandobkwan,” tenen etereraming. A nang ara wingdana kanya boramingiryok, ni tabwe deaneinyi biti talyi tam ati, “Dib tenen nang ilinto ara Paulus bisi taklobmai ura, nunsi milisunung. A deyok aryi, er kanya tabakoka mambul weik kurur,” tenenung. Ato teneboka kunung uca, ni tabwe deboka dongobneinyi bisi tabakoka mambul borminingnunung.

Ni kanya ara a deyok ati kankana kubmanir tenebmarum do? Ato tenen kum. Ton nang ara kitukna kanya boboka nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi lak etereraming. Ba, yuk nang ara kitukna kanya bona kum uca nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram lak eraming. A nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus bisi lak eraming ati, ni kanya kilkil kuranir ani, aminda ababyi ni kanya kilkil kubkwanir.

“Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi lebnici uca, tabwe lobdeibkwaning,” tenen deyok aryi, ni kanya kilkil kuranir ati ebman. Sun Filipi nang aryi niti nun Nai bisi molormiliranurum uca, nun Du Kristus biryi nisi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus karebnou ba, nisi milinurur.
A deyok aryi, ni, “Ur kubkwan,” tenen bingnun.

Ni kanya katabum eranir ba, dibde bunun dinyi ara, “Teleb Uram lak eterena ati alyi kum kubkwanir,” tenen ni diboka dibde bunun. Ati, niryi alyi kuna kum uca nun Du Yesus Kristus si weik erebdeibkwan. Ara, kam tuba kuranyi ababyi, dibmanyi ababyi, niryi kubmanyi tok biriman nirya ara nun Du Yesus si weik erebdeibkwan ati tenenun.
Tukwetam kam tuba kuranyi ba, niryi nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kunanyi kuboka Er si weik ebkwan. Ba, sirya dibmanyi ura, iya teleb dinyi dobdobkwan ati tenenun.

Tukwetam tuba kam kuranyi ababyi niti teleb kuranir. Ara, niryi busul kuboka nun Du Yesus wa tuba irmiliraniryi, Teleb Uram eterebmurubnyi uca, du ilinto moubkwande. Ura, niryi, “Kam tuba kurantinyi do? Diboktinyi do?” tenenun ci, niryi, “Dan dinyi asi udikum deibtinyi do?” teneboka kanya kankana kuranir.
Ni kanya ara kankana kuranir ara ton tenenun dinyi ara ato tenenun. Sirya dibmanyi uca, nun Du Yesus Kristus ab tonkwa iya kubkwanim. A dinyi ara niti iya teleb kubkwanir.
Ba, kam tuba kuboka tukwetam kubnyi ura, sun Filipi nang asi kanya teleb kubkwansir.

Niryi sun Filipi nang asi tuba eterebmurubkwan ati, ni kum dibkwan. Erda, kam tuba kubkwan. Ni kanya ara lulungna kum uca a dinyi tenen bikdanman ati ebman. Ara, sun Filipi nang aryi tabakdongo-tabakdongo nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebkwandum uca, sun kanya ababyi tabakdongoboka kilkil kubkwansir ati, ni sun ab tonkwa tanglona kum uca kurmuruna teleb tenenun.
Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi karebsici uca, ni sun ab tonkwa tubto kubkwayeb. A deyok aryi, sun kanya langdeiboka kilkil kubkwansir ati ebman.

Ura, sunci bikdob dinyi dobdobmun ci, nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram aryi eteresurur to teleb dinyi akwe kunubde bindarur. Ara, ni sun dam yandoka ebdanmabyi ababyi, ni sun dam kum yanmanyi ababyi, niryi kekenmasinyi uca, ninyi aryi sunsi kisal dangsina teleb. Ara, ninyi aryi kisal dakoka sunti ato ena teleb, “Sun Filipi nang ara neik kanya boboka, katabum eboka tingnaming ci, sunci ‘Teleb Uram ati nun li,’ tenen nang urasintam aryi Teleb Uram limdoraming ci, ‘A uram ara dib en uram enung.’”

Tonda, sun dib tenen nang ati “Bisik sekminiktibyi,” tenesin nang ati sunci ilil kuna kum uca katabum eboka tingnamunyi ba, sun bisik sengminingnansing nang aryi asing eibsingiryi, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum daneibkwansir,” tenen bikwaming. Ba, sun dib tenen nang aryi ilil kum kuboka tingnandum nang ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi lebkwansir,” tenen bikdankwandum.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kisal dakoka karebmasou uca, sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenerandum. Tonda, nun Nai biryi kisal dakoka karebmasou uca, sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus milin nang kuboka Er si lak erandum deyok aryi, ninyi aryi, “Nun li,” tenen sunsi mambul weik kurdeiriransing. A mambul kurdeirisina ababyi nun Nai biryi kisal dakoka sunsi karebde baransir ati ebman.

Ati, sunci minob uca asing eiranindau ani, ukuryok ababyi ni kunun dinyi asi kekeranurum ara, ninyi aryi ni Paulus bisi mambul weik dinyi kurdeiriraning bok, nira katabum eboka nun Du Yesus bisi milinun. Ati, sunbabyi neiktoto mambul weik dinyi kareransing bok, kanya katabum eboka nun Du Yesus bisi milirandum ati ato ebman.

Ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira nun dam kuboka nun kanya katabum ebdeibde baransir deyok aryi, sun nirya aryi a dinyi diboka teneibmun cok, neik kanya boboka kubdarur. Tonda, nun Du Yesus biryi boukwe kiboka nun kanya yuk-yuk teleb kurdeiriransir deyok aryi, sunci a dinyi diboka teneibmun cok, antanibdandoka kubdarur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara nun dam kunanyi kurur deyok aryi, sunci a dinyi teneibmun cok, sunci antanibdandoka kubdarur. Tonda, sunci sun mamun asi bico tenebdamun ci, namin kanya boboka teleb kimdarandum deyok aryi, sunci neik kanya boboka kubdarur.
Ati, sunci neik kanya boboka boukwe weik kibdamun cok, antanibdandoka neik dinyi akwe tenebdarur. Sunci ato kuboka neik kanya boramunyi uca, ni kanya ara langdeiboka sunti kilkil weik kubkwanir.
Ba, sunci, “Nidamnyi erebdandobkwan,” tenen dinyi kunubmunyei. Erda, sunci sundamnyi luknubdongoboka yuk nang ati, “Ni naiyabwe ni kwinyabwe,” tenebdarur.
Sun nirya ara, “Nibi yuk dibnilibdankwan,” tenena mem. Erda, yuk nang ababyi dibnilibdandarur.
Sunbabyi nun Du Kristus Yesus teneiboka kunuramwe to neik dinyi akwe teneiboka kununa teleb.
Nun Du bira Er Imtamnyi bito Iya Erebdobnyi kuramuryok, Erci, “Nira Iya Erebdobnyi kunun ati, Er Imtamnyi bitonyi iya kubdobkwan,” kum tenebmou.
Erda, Erci Erdamnyi luknubdongobdanmou cok, Erci Er Imtamnyi wa irmilinanyi kibdanmou. Ara, ninyi diba tukwetam nang atonyi kibdandoka Er Imtamnyi wa irmilinanyi kibdanmou.
Ura, ninyi diba kuramuryok, Erci Erdamnyi luknubdongobdanmou. Erci Er Nai Imtamnyi uram asi diboka kunubde baramwe. Ani, “Co lase deici aryi dibkwan ababyi,” tenen Erci Erdamnyi luknubdongobdanmou.
Nun Du biryi Erdamnyi luknubdanmou ci, dibmou deyok aryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Ersi iya erebdeibmou. Ara, iya erebdob sokon karebmou ci, Erci nun Du Yesus bisi iya erebdob si dobmou.
Ara, “Sun imtam tukwetam nang nirya aryi sun kutam ikdongoboka nun Du Yesus si weik ebkwaming,” tenen, Er Imtamnyi biryi Ersi erebdeibmou.

Ba, “Ninyi nirya aryi, ‘Nun Du Kristus bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur,’ eboka lak ebkwaming,” tenen nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus bisi erebdeibmou. A deyok aryi, ninyi nirya aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming.

Ura, ni kwityabwe boukwe weik kusunun nang, nun Du Yesus biryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramwe to, sunbabyi Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubde bindarur. Ara, sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram asi yuma aryi ni sun dam yanmase ba, tonkwa kunmoubwe talak aryi kunurandau to, ukuryok ababyi iya kunubde bindarur. Ni sun ab tonkwa kunmabyi talak akwe kunubkwandarura kuma, erda ni sun ab tonkwa kuna kum talak ababyi sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram tanglona kum uca busul kubtabakoka kunubde binkwandarur. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi lemdeirisina asi wanikminiksicei,” tenen ilil kanya bobmun ci, sunci busul weik kuboka Er Imtamnyi biryi lebdeibsou nang aryi kunuraming to kunubde bindarur.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun kanya dam wa iransir uca, nunci nun kanya dam aryi, “Nun Nai biryi arungdeiriransir dinyi kunubkwayeb,” tenenub. Tonda, nun Nai biryi nunti teleb teneransou to, Erci karebsici uca, nunci Er arungdeiriransir uram asi kununub.

Sunci utotoa-utotoa kubde baramun ci, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi uram kunuramun ci, sun kalingdansing nang uram kekeboka kunuramun cok, “Sun uram kununa nun li se,” ebmunyei. Tonda, sun mamun lulurdana mem. Erda, ur dem teleb akwe antaniboka kuronkwandarur.

Ato kuramunyi uca, ninyi aryi sunsi tatab-tatab ebman kum kubsingnyi ba, sunci, “Malyi kun dinyi nun li,” tenen kanya bobkwandum ati ebman. Sunda Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe ara iya malyi kun nang kankan kuramun ci, lulurdana kum uca teleb dinyi akwe kunubde binkwandarur. Ba, a malyi kun nang ara iya malyi dinyi kunuraming deyok aryi, lukunda kunuk ato kuraming. Ba, sun Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe ara ninyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde barandum deyok aryi, im dangna tukwe dangna nang urasintam aryi lukunda kurya nalirande milil ato kurandum.

Sun Filipi nang aryi ato kuramun ci, sunci ninyi urasintam aryi iya kam kurdeirin uram asi lak kimdeirirandum. Ati, sunci berengdeirin nang ato kuramun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunuramunyi ura, ni Paulus kanya kilkil weik kubkwanir ba, niryi sunsi kisal dakwansin. Nun Du Kristus tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, niryi sun du mousurur nang ati kisal dakwansin. Ati, niryi, “Sun Filipi nang kankan dam wa iranse ara talyi ati kum iranse,” tenen kisal dakwansin ati ebman.

Sun Filipi nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum nang ara nun Nai Imtamnyi ai wa in nang ato kuboka Er Uram asi kunurandum ci, sunci sun kanya asi Er Imtamnyi bisi dama ato deirirandum. A deyok aryi, sun kanya kilkil weik kuransir. Ba, ni kanya ababyi sun ab tonkwa kilkil weik kuranir. Ura, ninyi aryi nira nun Du Yesus wa irmilinanyi bisi wenebningnyi uca, dibmanyi ababyi, ni kanya ara teleb kubkwanir. Niryi sunsi dirnilisunun ba, ni ining diksaknici ababyi niryi Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei ni Nai,” eboka abniryi, ni ining karebdandoka Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin dinyi ato karebkwan.

Ati, sunci sun dam nang ati, “Nun kanya ara nun Nai Imtamnyi taruk dam karebdanmab,” teneboka kilkil kanya bona teleb. Tonda, sunci ni Paulus biti, “Paulus bira er kanya ara nun Nai Imtamnyi taruk dam karebdanmar,” teneboka kilkil kanya bona teleb.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici uca, niryi nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam ola bokdonokwaman. Ba, nun kwit biryi sun Filipi nang kurandum to bikmaci ura, ni dam tamuryandoka, “Teleb akwe kunung,” en uram boyankwande ati bokdonokwaman. “Teleb akwe kunung,” en uram boyaci ura, ni kanya katabum ebkwanir ati ebman.
Yuk nang ni ab tonkwa kunub nang ara nun kwit Timotius bito nang ton kum kunub. Nun kwit bira sun kurandum to ati, “Ur kunung do kum do?” teneboka dirnilisinanyi kurur.
Sun dam asi yuk nang bokdonokmatinyi ura, nun Du Kristus wa ati dirnilina kum kubting, erda sun dam nang ati dibnilibdating.

Ba, nun kwit Timotius bira busul kuboka nun Du Yesus ab yuk nang ab asi dirnilirande ara sun bikmarum. Ara, ni Paulus biti, “Ni Nai bitonyi,” teneboka ni mi bitonyi kuramuryok, erda ni wa irmilinanyi kuramuryok, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram etereramwe.
Ati, niryi ersi sun dam olong bokdonokwaman tenebman. Ara, nisi tabwe lobdeibkwamaningnyi to asi bikmanyi ura, niryi nun kwit bisi sun dam bokdonokwan.
Ba, nira ni kanya katabum eranir bok, niryi ato tenenun, “Nun Du biryi karebsici uca, tabwe lobdeibningnyi ura, nibabyi sun dam ola yatinyi,” tenenun.

Ura, nun kwit Epafroditus deyok ati uram ton ebkwan. Sun Filipi nang ara nun kwit bisi ni dam bokdonokmandau ci, sunci, “Nun nai Paulus dam bindoka nun kuramibto nukwandum,” eboka bokdonokmandau. Tonda, sunci, “Nun nai bisi dibnilibkwandum,” eboka ni dam bokdonokmandau. Ba, nun kwit bira ni wa irmilinanyi kurur ci, katabum en kanya boboka nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak eterermiliramwe. Ati, erci nisi sirya dibnilibde banurur ba, niryi ersi sun dam tamuboka bokdonokwan.

Nun kwit bira sun Filipi atei kurandum nang ati, “Filipi nang ab ebdatibyi se,” tenena akwe kurur. Tonda, nun kwit bira nakina taleramwe dinyi ara sunci sirya kekebmandau. Ura, erci, “Ni kwityabwe Filipi nang aryi ni nakina yiranou dinyi ara sirya kekebnei,” tenen bikmar ci, er mambul kanya borande.

Nun kwit bisi nakina weik yiramwe uca, er dibmanto kubmou bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi bico tenen ersi kwetebmou. Tonda, nun Nai biryi ni Paulus bira Epafroditus er nai bitonyi bibabyi bico tenebnou. Ara, niryi nun kwit nakina deyok aryi, mambul weik tuba kum bobkwanse ati, nun Nai biryi nibabyi bico tenen nun kwit bisi kwetebmou.

A deyok aryi, niryi nun kwit Epafroditus biti, “Ukurlona kum uca, ola Filipi nang dam tamuboka bokdonokwan,” tenenun. Ara, “Sun Filipi nang ab nun kwit ab tonkwa ebdanmangnyi uca, sun kanya kilkil weik kubkwande,” tenen niryi ersi tamuboka bokdonokwan. Tonda, niryi, “Nun kwit bira ur kubkwande do kum do?” tenen mambul kanya tuba kum bobmurubkwan ati, niryi ersi tamuboka bokdonokwan.

Ati, sunci Epafroditus bisi, “Nun kwit,” eboka kibdobkwandarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus dib tenen nang mamun kimdaramib to kuboka sunci kilkil kanya boboka nun kwit bisi kibdobkwandarur. Tonda, sun ato kuboka yuk nang dirniliraming nang yuk nang ababyi sunci, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen kibdobkwandarur ati ebman.

Nun kwit bira nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmiliramwe bok, nakina talebmou uca, dibmanto kuramwe. Ara, sun Filipi nang aryi ni dam kum kurandau ci, nisi kum dibnilirandau bok, nun kwit biryi unuboka nisi dirniliranou. Erda iya busul kuboka dirniliranou bok, dibmanto kuramwe. A deyok aryi, sunci nun kwit biti, “Nun nai,” tenen ersi kibdobkwandarur.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, nun Du Yesus bira nun dam kunanyi kurur deyok aryi, sun kanya kilkil kuna teleb. Niryi sunsi sirya kerek sekeibmasin cok, neik dinyi ati tubto kerek sekeibkwansin ara nisi mambul kum kubdeibkwanir, erda sunti teleb kubkwansir. Ati, niryi, “Wanikminikingnyei,” tenen neik dinyi tubto eterebkwansin.

Ati, sunda, “Sun malyi kanya bon nang aryi eterena uram ara milibibyei,” tenen kalikdandobkwandarur. A nang ara malyi kun dinyi akwe teneibmangiryok, kunuraming dinyi ara, “Den bama sekdandarur,” eboka eterebde baraming. Ati, sunci tola ati ton ato eboka eterenung. “Den bama kum seksingnyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunti, ‘Ni mabwe,’ kum tenebkwansir,” eboka eterebde baraming nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka kum milinung. Erda, sunci den bama sengna bikdob dinyi ati dongtam kiminingnung ci, sunci ninyi bowanikminikoka abingiryi, “Den bama sekdandarur,” eboka eterebde baraming.

A nang ara ato erdaraming, “Nunda den bama sekmasei uca, Er Imtamnyi mabwe kunub,” erdaraming cok, Er Imtamnyi mabwe diboka kum kunung. Erda, nun dib tenen nang asi dib ati Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe kunub. Ati, nunda kebdeiboka den bama sengsina nang ato kunub. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus milibde baransir uca, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi uram diboka kununub ati, nunda den bama sengsina nang ato kunub ati ebman. Tonda, nunci, “Musa Uram kununub uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi dororansir,” kum tenenub. Erda, nunci ato tenenub. “Nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi nunsi lebdeibsou uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunti, ‘Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenesurur.” A deyok aryi, nunci nun dam nang ati kisal kum dangdanub. Erda, nun Du Yesus bikwe kisal dangnub.

A nang ara katabum kanya boboka, “Nunci Musa Uram kunubde banub ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi dobdobmasou,” eboka sundamnyi kisal dangdaraming. Ba, niryi iya katabum kanya boboka sun erdaraming to eboka nidamnyi kisal dakdandobtinyi ura, ato ebdatinyi, “Yuk nang aryi sunbabyi busul kuboka Musa Uram kunuraming bok, nira tabakoka busul weik kuransiryi, Musa Uram kunubde baranse.” A deyok aryi, niryi tabakoka erebdeibdandoka nidamnyi kisal dakdanmatinyi.

Nira Israel kobdobanyi, Benyamin yalanyi kunun. Ni kwin biryi ni deibmanou ura, uki inbaryi tum ara den bama sekmanei. Ati, nira Ibraninyi kobdobanyi kunun ati ebman. Tonda, nira Farisi nang milinanyi kuransiryi, iya busul kuboka Musa biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” arungdeirisurur uram kunubde baranse.

Nira busul weik kuboka Musa Uram kunubde baranse ura, sun Kristus bisi dib tenen nang ara, “Obkaboktinyi,” tenen domkiringnanse. Ara, “Musa Uram kum kunuraming nang ara ni li,” tenen deyok aryi, niryi sunsi domkiringnanse. Ato kuboka Musa arungdeirin uram kunubde baranse ati, nira Musa Uram deici aryi tatab-tatab ebmanin kumnyi kuranse.

Ba, nira minob talak kuranse ura, “Musa Uram kununa ara iya bikdob dinyi,” tenenanyi kuranse ani, ukuryok ara niryi Musa Uram kununa ara, “Talyi dinyi aca,” tenenun. Minob kuranse ura, “Musa Uram kunubtinyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi dobdobkwanir,” teneranse ani, ukuryok ara ato tenen dinyi bai donokoka absiryi, “Nun Du Kristus dam kunanyi kubnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi dobdobkwanir,” tenenun.

Ni Du Kristus Yesus dam kunanyi kiboka Ersi diboka bingdona ara iya bikdob dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ba, imtam tukwetam kurande dinyi nirya ara niryi, “Iya bikdob dinyi ton kum kurur. Erda, bai donongna dinyi ato kurur,” tenen aryi, “Ni Du dam kunanyi kibdobkwan,” tenen a dinyi nirya asi bai donokmase. Yuk dinyi nirya ara ninyi kum lemdeirisurur ati, niryi, “Dei ato kurur,” tenenun.

Ba, niryi, “Nun Du dam kunanyi kibtinyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi dobdobkwanir,” tenena akwe kunun. Ura, “Musa arungdeirisurur uram kunubmanyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nisi dobdobkwanir,” tenena tuba kum kunun. Erda, niryi ato tenenun. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsici uca, nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenenub deyok aryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi dororansir,” tenenun.

Ati, niryi, “Nun Du Kristus dam kunanyi cok, niryi Ersi tabakoka bikdobtinyi,” tenenun. Tonda, “Nun Du Kristus kam bukokmounyi mikib weik aryi ni kanya dam aryi wa ibnici uca, nira kam bukeibmounyi bitonyi kuboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde binkwan,” tenenun. Tonda, “Ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi mambul weik takubdeibmai to, nira er milinanyi bibabyi neiktoto mambul dinyi ur takubdeibnunung,” tenenun. Tonda, “Ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus bisi obmai to, nira Er milinanyi bibabyi neiktoto ur da obnunung,” tenenun.
Niryi ton ato tenenun, “Ninyi aryi nisi sirya obningnyi ba, dibmanyi asi nun Du Yesus biryi ni Er milinanyi bisi kam bukeiboka iya kam kun dinyi karenina teleb,” tenenun ati ato ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, nira, “Er Imtamnyi Uram asi manmalina kum-kum teleb kuboka kunubde banun ci, sirya Nun Du Kristus bitonyi kibdanman,” kum ebdanman. Tonda, “Nira sirya langdeiboka nun Du Kristus bitonyi kibdanman,” kum ebman. Erda, nirya ni kanya asi darabdongobdandoka abniryi, Nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi niti, “Nitonyi kibkwande,” tenen wibdeibmanou to, “Nun Du bitonyi langdeiboka kibtinyi,” tenen ingkiringnun. Ato kubkwande tenen Erci nisi leboka abnou ci, Er dinyi kibdeibnou ati, niryi, “Nun Du bitonyi kibdandobtinyi,” tenen ingkirikde banun.

Ni kwityabwe, niryi, “Nun Du bitonyi langdeiboka kibtinyi,” tenen busul weik kuboka ingkirikde banun bok, niryi langdeiboka nun Du Yesus bitonyi kubkwan ara kabul. Cungnanyi bira, “Yuk nang asi muna kibdongoboka piala dengna weiktonun ara ni dobdobtinyi,” teneboka dongtam kurande dinyi dirtamurdena kum uca, urasintam kurande dinyi akwe dibliliboka cung barande. Ato kuboka nibabyi neiktoto ato kunubde banun. Ati, niryi dongtam kurande dinyi dirnilina kum uca, “Nun Du Kristus milibde baranse,” tenena ababyi kum kunun. Erda, ni urasintam kurande dinyi akwe diblilibde banun cok, “Nun Du bitonyi langdeiboka kibtinyi,” tenen ingkirikde banun.

Nira cungnanyi kurande to kuboka kunubde banun ati ebman. Cungnanyi bira “Piala ni kum dobnyei yuk nang dobdobingnyei,” tenen er kanya kinibdakde cung barande to, nibabyi neiktoto ato kunubde banun. Ara, Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi niti “Ni Mi Kristus Yesus dam kunanyi kibkwande,” tenen nabmanou to, niryi ni kanya kinibdakde, “Nun Nai biryi ebdeibnou to iya kam kun dinyi diboka dobdobkwan,” tenen ingkirikde banun.

Ura, nunda nundamnyi ati, “Bikdob dinyi milibde banub,” tenen bingdanub nang nirya ara ato tenena teleb, “Nun kanya kinibdakoka abibiryi, langdeiboka nun Du Yesus bito nang kibdandobkwayeb.” Ba, niryi eterebmasin uram asi ton sunci, “Nun tenen kanya yukto kurur,” teneramunyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi a deyok ati bitabdeiboka anmalakoka lak eterebkwansir.
Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi sirya lak kibdeibsou ba, bingdonub to ara nunci a dinyi akwe ingkirikoka kunubde binkwayeb.

Ni kwityabwe, sunbabyi ni kuranto asi miliboka abnumun ci, kunubde bindarur. Tonda, ni kunubde baran to miliraningnyi nang kunubde baraming to dibliliboka abmun ci, sunbabyi miliboka kunubde bindarur.

Ninyi ilinto aryi, “Nunda Kristus milin nang kunub,” erdanung cok, nun Du Yesus kunubde baramwe to kum kunung. A nang ara nun Du Yesus co lase bing dakmainyi biti, “Erci nun malyi kun dinyi kilibmasou ara nun li,” tenenung. Ato tenenung ci, sunci malyi kun dinyi kubde baraming. A nang ara nun Du Yesus ab ordana nang ato kunung ati ebman. Ati, niryi sunsi minob uca eterebde baransise to, ukuryok ababyi engen kanya boboka abniryi, tamuboka sunsi, “A nang ara nun Du Yesus ab ordana nang kunung,” tamuboka ebmasin.

A nang ara malyi dinyi akwe kuraming ati nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kum daneibkwande. A nang ara “Yina ilinto yibtibyi,” tenen kuraming. Tonda, “Ner talyi yobtibyi,” tenena kuraming ci, Er Imtamnyi biryi arungdeirisurur uram ara bai donongnung. A nang ara alyi dinyi ara iya kum bingnung ci, sunci sun dam nang ati kisal dakdandoka sun malyi kunung to ninyi urasintam asi lak eraming. Tonda, a nang ara tukwetam nang dib tenena kum nang aryi tenebde baraming to akwe tenebde baraming.

Ba, nun dib tenen nang sokon ara tukwetam kum kurur. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi lobdeibmasir sokon ara imtam ai kurur ati ebman. Ati, sunci, “Imtam ai asi sokon lobdeibsou,” tenen, “Nun Du Kristus bito nang kibdobkwayeb,” tenen ingkiringna teleb. Ura, nunda dib tenen nang ara, “Nun Lemsinanyi bira imtam aryi kuboka minola yuryate se,” tenen nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dibde bunub.

Nun Du bira iya mikibnyi kurur deyok aryi, imtam tukwetam dinyi utotoa nirya kalingdur. Nun Er milin nang ababyi kalingsurur ci, Erci Er mikib weik aryi nun nong asi milil dinyi kareboka dangubdeibkwansir. Ati, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici ura, nun nong milil kum kuransir dinyi ara nun Du Yesus nong milil dinyi ato kubkwansir.

A deyok aryi, ni kwityabwe ni boukwe weik kusunun nang ton, “Sun ab tonkwa ebdatibyi se,” tenesunun nang ton, sun ni kanya kilkil kurdeiriranurum nang ton, ni kisal dangsunun nang ton, sunci nisi kekenindarur. Sunci ni eterebmasin uram asi teneibmunyi ura, katabum eboka nun Du Yesus bisi dib teneramun ci, Ersi milibmurubdarur.

Ura, Euodia ab Sintikhe ab ara uram talermururdana mem. Erda, sunci, “Nun Du bisi milin nerabwe kununum ati, neik kanya bobkwanim,” tenen antaniboka kubdobkwandururum. Ara, niryi uram ebdarab eboka ato molobmasin.

Ura, ni kwit Sunsugos kanda ni ab tonkwa tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi wa irmiliranimnyi se. Niryi kansi ato eboka molobmakin. Kanci a nerabwe asi milibminyi ba, sun antanibdobdingiryi, neik kanya bona teleb. Ara, ninyi aryi nunsi, “Teleb Uram kekena nun li,” tenen bisik sengnansei bok, a nerabwe aryi, “Teleb Uram libkwayeb,” tenen tanglona kum uca nisi wa irmiliranirei. Tonda, nun kwit Klemens ab ni wa irmilin nang yuk nang ababyi nisi miliboka nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram lak etereramoubwe. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun si yuk-yuk kerek sekeiboka iya kam kubdeibkwansir nang kerek sengna umbura aryi dongoamwe nang ati ato ebman.
Sunci, “Nun Du dam kun nang kunub,” teneboka abmun ci, sun kanya ara tuba-tuba kilkil kuna teleb. Niryi tubto ebtabakwinsin, “Sun kanya kilkil kuna teleb.”
Yuk nang dam urasintam asi namin kanya boboka abmun ci, tuba-tuba teleb kubdarur. Nun Du Kristus bira nun dam kurur ati ato ebman.

Sunci yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi ati teneiramun ci, mambul kiringna kanya bobmunyei. Erda, sunci sun ataransici tok nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi lak ena teleb. Ati, sunci sun ataransici dinyi nun Nai urasintam asi lak eboka abmun ci, “Nai, Kanci nun milibsurum,” eboka molona teleb. Tonda, sunci moloramun ci, nun Nai bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kina teleb.

Sunci ato kuramunyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun kanya teleb akwe weik kubdeibkwansir. Ba, sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kurandum ati, nun Nai biryi sunsi teleb kanya kareboka kalikwansir. Ninyi aryi mambul dinyi kurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, nun kanya ara teleb akwe weik kuransir. Nun Nai biryi nun kanya teleb akwe kurdeiriransir ara iya teleb dinyi ton, ninyi aryi kanya teneibdenman kum dinyi kurur ati ebman.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sirya kobdob uram ebsiniryok, ato ebdeibkwinsin. Sunci, dib en uram asi teneibde bindarur. Tonda, bikdob dinyi asi teneibde bindarur. Tonda, udikum tenen dinyi asi teneibde bindarur. Tonda, iya teleb dinyi kunubde ban dinyi asi teneibde bindarur. Tonda, ninyi kanya kilkil kimna dinyi asi teneibde bindarur. Tonda, ninyi aryi kisal dangna dinyi asi teneibde bindarur.

Ba, sunsi niryi etereransise uram ab, kekerandum uram ab, dororandum uram ab, niryi kunuran ba, asing eirirandum dinyi ab asi kunubde bindarur. Ba, ato kubmunyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nirya teleb akwe kurdeiriransiranyi bira sun ab tonkwa kuna teleb.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci minob uca niti bico teneboka yina deibmanindau to, ukuryok tubto bico teneboka yina deibmanindau. A deyok aryi, ni kanya kilkil weik kuranir ba, niryi nun Du Yesus bisi, “Ei nun Du Yesus,” enun. Sunci niti tuba-tuba bico teneranindau cok, uki weik nun kum dirniliranindau. Ara, uki teleb ton kum kuransou uca, uki weikanun yina kum deibmanindau. Ani, ukuryok ara uki teleb tum kubmasir ba, sunci nisi yina tubto deibmanindau.

Niryi, “Utotoa-utotoa dinyi nisi atanmanir,” tenen mambul kiringna kanya kum bonun ati ebman. Atan kurana ababyi, atan kum kurana ababyi, ni kanya teleb kuranir ati ebman. Ni kubde baranse uca, atan kurana talak ababyi kilkil kanya boranse ati bingdoranse.

Ton tum ara kwaning atanmanici ani, yuk tum ara kwaning langdeiboka kuranir. Uki-uki nirya kuraniryok, kilkil kanya bonun ati bingdoran. Ara, kwaning boubmanici talak ababyi, kwaning atabnici talak ababyi, ni kanya tuba-tuba kilkil kuranir.
Nun Du biryi nisi mikib kubdeiboka milinurur deyok aryi, niryi katabum kanya boboka kwaning atana ab, mambul kurdeirin dinyi yuk dinyi ababyi bonun ati ebman.
Ato ebman bok, sun Filipi nang aryi bico tenen ni mambul dinyi bobmilibmanindau ci, yina deibmanindau deyok aryi, niryi sunsi, “Ei ni kwityabwe,” eboka kibdobmasin.

Tonda, sun Filipi nang ababyi bikmarum ara, sunci minob ura nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram dobdobmandau ura, niryi, “Makedonia mutuk aryi anaboka yuk atei nang asi Teleb Uram eterebde binkwan,” tenen kuranse. Ura, sun yuk atei kunung dib tenen nang aryi nisi yina kum kareranei bok, sun Filipi atei nang akwe nisi yina deibmanindau. Ara, sunci, “Yuk nang asi Teleb Uram eterebde bananyi bisi milibkwayeb,” tenen yina deibmanindau.
Tonda, Tesalonika atei kuranse ababyi, sun Filipi atei nang aryi liki bitinyi nisi yina deibmanindau.

Ato kunindarur bok, niryi sunsi, “Utotoa karen dinyi asi karebniting,” tenena kum kunun. Erda, niryi, “Nun kwityabwe aryi nisi dibnilibningnyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi tabakoka sunsi kisal dangkwansir,” tenenun.

Sunci nisi dibniliboka muna karen dinyi langdeiboka ilinto karebmanindau uca, utotoa kum ataranir. Ara, Epafroditus biriman aryi niti deibmanindau uca, ni taruk dam ara langdeibmanir. Ura, sunci nisi karebmanindau dinyi ara nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dama tong teleb en dinyi ato deibmanindau deyok aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi asing eibmou ura, Er kanya kilkil kurur.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi ni milinunyi bira sun Filipi nang ataransici tok nirya langdeiboka kunubdeibkwansir. Nun Nai bira langdeiboka kisal dangsurutnyi kurur to, Erci nun Du Yesus Kristus biriman aryi langdeiboka kisal dangsina teleb.
Ati, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb. Ukuryok ababyi, aminda kubde binkwayeb talak ababyi, nirya nunci nun Nai si erebkwayeb. Amin.

Ura, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenen nang nirya asi ato ebdarur. “Nun nai Paulus biryi sun nirya asi, ‘Ni kwityabwe teleb,’ ebmasir.” Tonda, sun ni ab tonkwa kunub dib tenen nang ababyi sun nirya asi “Teleb,” ebmasing.
Sun akatei kuraming dib tenen nang nirya aryi sunsi “Teleb,” ebmasing. Sun weik sienyi Kaisar milin nang kankan aryi dib tenenung nang nirya aryi nunukoka sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasing.
Nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi sun kanya asi kisal dangmurusina teleb.

Teleb nun kwityabwe, ni Paulus ab nun kwit Timotius ab aryi sunsi, “Teleb,” eboka kibmasinim. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ni Paulus biti teleb teneanou to wibdeibnou uca, nira nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi bokdonoknounyi kunun ci, Teleb Uram eterebde banun.

Ura, ni ab Timotius ab aryi sun Kolose atei kurandum dib tenen nang asi kibdobmasinim. Ara, sun nun kwityabwe Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang ab, nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi tanglona kum uca milin nang ab asi, “Teleb,” eboka kibdobmasinim. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kisal dakoka, antanibdeibsici uca, kilkil kanya karesina teleb.
Nunci sunti molormiliransinim ci, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab asi tuba-tuba, “Ei nun Nai,” enunum.

Ara, sun Kolose nang aryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenerandum en uram asi kekebmanumwe ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kinunum. Tonda, sunci Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang nirya asi boukwe weik kimnandum en uram asi kekebmasunumwe deyok aryi, nunci, “Ei nun Nai,” enunum.

Sunci nun Nai biryi aminda iya kam kun dinyi karebkwansir dinyi asi dibde burandum deyok aryi, sunci katabum eboka nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum ci, sun dib tenen nang asi boukwe kurandum ati ebman. A dibde burandum iya kam kun dinyi ara sunci minob kekerandau. Ara, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ara dib en uram sirya kekenmandau ci, sunci a kam kun dinyi ara sirya kekebmandau. A dibde burandum iya kam kun dinyi ara nun Nai biryi kiknibminikamwe uca, imtam aryi kuboka tuba kalingdur ba, Erci sunsi aminda karebkwansir.

Nun Du uram Teleb Uram ara sun dam sirya yanmou ati ebman. A uram ara im dangna tukwe dangna kuraming nang nirya ati yanmou to, sun Kolose atei kurandum nang ababyi yanmasou. Teleb Uram ara dantam-dantam mutuk nirya yandoka du mourande to, sun kankan dam ababyi du mouransir. Tonda, a uram asi dantam-dantam nang nirya aryi tabakdongo-tabakdongo dororaming to, sun kankan dam ababyi tabakdongo-tabakdongo dororandum. Ara, minob uca Teleb Uram kekebkalibmandau ci, sunci “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal dangsurur,” tenen diboka bikalibmandau uki tum aryi kuboka Teleb Uram sun kankan du mouransou ani, ukuryok ababyi du mouransir.

A uram ara nun kwit Epafras biryi minob uca etereransou ba, sunci Teleb Uram dobdobmandau. Nun kwit boukwe weik kunubnyi bira nun ab tonkwa wa inub ci, tanglona kum uca busul kuboka nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilinanyi kurur aryi erci sunsi Teleb Uram etereransou.
Ura, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sun Kolose nang asi karebmasou uca, boukwe weik kimdarandum dinyi asi nun dam nukmou ba, kekebmasunumwe.

A dinyi nirya kekebmasunumwe deyok aryi, nunci nun Nai bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka sunti molormiliransinim. Ara, nunci sun kun deyok kekenmasunumwe uca, minob sunti molormiliransunumwe ani, uku talak ababyi tanglona kum uca iya molormiliransinim. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi langdeiboka karebsici uca, sunci Erci erdeirisurur dinyi nirya asi bikwandum ati nunci sunti molormiliransinim. Tonda, nun Nai biryi langdeiboka karebsici uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biriman aryi bikdob dinyi bingdona teleb.

Ato molormiliransinim cok, nunci sunti ato tenesununum. “Nun kwityabwe ara bikdob dinyi bikdobingiryi, nun Du Yesus bisi milibingiryok, Erci kikib teneransir to kununa akwe kuna teleb,” tenen ton molormiliransinim. Tonda, “Nun Du uram nirya kunubingnyi uca, nun Du Yesus kanya ara sunti kilkil weik kuna teleb,” tenen molormiliransinim. Tonda, “Du moubmurubsiri bok, teleb dinyi akwe kunubingiryi, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi dam kun nang kuboka Ersi tabakdongo-tabakdongo bikdobkwaming,” tenesunum ci, sunti molormiliransinim.

Tonda, nunci ato eboka molormiliransinim. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Iya Erebdobnyi ton iya mikibnyi ton kurur to, Erci Er mikib nirya asi karebci uca, nun kwityabwe kanya katabum erdeirina teleb. Ba, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul dinyi kurdeiriramingnyi ababyi, sunci kilkil kanya boboka tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus bisi iya milirmurunkwaming,” tenen molormiliransinim. Tonda, “Sunci katabum kanya boboka nun Nai biryi karebkwansir dinyi dibde burmuruna teleb.” Ato tenenimiryi, sunti molormiliransinim.

Ato tenesununum ci, nun kanya kilkil asa aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enunum. Ara, nun Nai biryi sunti karebmasou uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kibmandau ati, sunbabyi nun Nai biryi Er dam kun nang asi kiknibminikansou iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwandum. Nun Nai biryi erebdeiboka iya berengna dinyi karebsiri ba, sunci iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwandum ati ato enunum.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kunuk kurande ai aryi borbindoka lebdeiboka absou ci, Erci nunsi berengna dam boyasou. Ati, Erci nunsi lebdeiboka Er boukwe kurur Mi amwetam bun nang kibdeibsou uca, nunci nun Du Yesus Iya Weik Sienyi biryi erdeirisin uram kunubde banub.
Nunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunub deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi lebdeiboka nun malyi kun dinyi kilisurur.

Nun Du Yesus bira diboka nun Nai Imtamnyi bitonyi kurur. Nun Du bira asing eibmantonyi kurur bok, Erda Er Imtamnyi asing eibmanto kumnyi bitonyi kurur ati ebman. Tonda, nun Du Yesus bira Iya Erebdobnyi kuboka imtam tukwetam dinyi nirya kalingsurur.

Ara, nun Du biriman aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi utotoa nirya kiknibmou. Ara, imtam kurande dinyi nirya ab, tukwetam kurande dinyi nirya ab ara nun Du Yesus biriman aryi kiknibmou. Tonda, asing eirinub dinyi ab, asing eibman kum dinyi ab, nirya ara nun Du Yesus biriman aryi kiknibmou. Tonda, sun imtam nang tukwetam nang kalingnaming weik sien nang ab, mikib nang ab, ninyi kalingna nang ab, sun erebdob nang yuk-yuk ab ababyi, Erci nun Du Yesus biriman aryi kiknibmou. Imtam tukwetam kurande dinyi nirya ara nun Nai biryi nun Du Yesus biriman aryi kiknibmou ci, nun Du Yesus biti karebmou.

Imtam tukwetam kurande dinyi nirya asi kiknina kabul talak aryi nun Du Yesus bira sirya minob kuramwe. Tonda, imtam tukwetam dinyi nirya ara antanibdeiboka nun Du Yesus taruk aryi talerur uca, imtam tukwetam nirya ara lulungdena kum uca katabum akwe erur.

Tonda, nun Du Yesus bira sun dib tenen nang asi kalikoka antanirdeirisurutnyi kurur ci, Erci sun dib tenen nang kisok atonyi kurur. Ba, nun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus Er amwetam kun nang ato kunub. Nun Du bira nun dib tenen nang lemsina deyoknyi kurur. Tonda, Erda yuma deyok kouboka kam bukokmounyi kurur. Ati, utotoa dinyi nirya ati Erda deyok kourutnyi kurur ati, nun Du Yesus bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurur.
Ara, nun Nai biryi teleb teneamwe to karebmou uca, Er Imtamnyi bito kuna mikib nirya asi langdeiboka nun Du Yesus dam iya kurur.

Tonda, nun Nai biryi teleb teneamwe to, Erci nun Du Yesus biriman aryi utotoa nirya Er ab tonkwa antanibdeibmou. Ara, nun Du Yesus co lase deici aryi Er ining diksakmou biriman aryi, nun Nai biryi imtam kurande dinyi ab tukwetam kurande dinyi ab nirya Er ab tonkwa antanibdeibmou.
Minob ura, sun nirya ababyi Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kum kurandau. Erda, sun kanya dam ara malyi kun dinyi akwe teneiboka Er Imtamnyi ab ordana nang ato kurandau ci, malyi kun dinyi akwe kurandau.

Bok, ukuryok ara nun Nai biryi sun ab Er ab tonkwa antanibdeibsou. Ara, nun Du Yesus ninyi kibdanmou ura, Erdamnyi karebdandoka dibmou biriman aryi nun Nai biryi sunda malyi kurandau nang ab Er ab tonkwa antanibdeibsou. Ba, nun Nai biryi sunti, “Ni dam kun nang kibdeibnyi uca, teleb dinyi akwe kunubde binkwaming,” tenen antanibdeibsou. Tonda, “Malyi kun dinyi mitik ababyi tubto kum kubkwaming,” tenen antanibdeibsou. Tonda, “Tatab-tatab ebmanto nang tuba kum kubkwaming,” tenen Nun Nai biryi sunsi Er ab tonkwa antanibdeibsou.

Ura, sunci tanglona kum uca katabum eboka dib teneramunyi uca, sunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kubkwandum ati ebman. Ai don nang ara, “Ai dobkwayeb,” tenen abyokomna ab kwakwa ab diboka ikamingnyi uca, ai ara lulungdena kum uca katabum erande to sunda dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto kuna teleb. Ara, ai abyokomna ab kwakwa ab ara lulungdena kum kurande ato, sun dibde buna ababyi neiktoto lulungdena kum uca katabum ermuruna teleb. A dibde bun dinyi ara nun Du Yesus Kristus uram Teleb Uram aryi eteresurur asi sun Kolose nang ara sirya kekebmandau. Tonda, a uram ara im dangna tukwetam nang nirya asi lak kubmar. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibnou uca, ni Paulus biryi a uram Teleb Uram eterebde banun.

Ura, ni Paulus bira nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram eterebde banun asi ninyi aryi mambul dinyi kurdeiriraning. Ni nong ab ni kanya ab mambul kurdeiriraning bok, ni kanya ara kilkil kuranir. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi, “Sun dib tenen nang asi teleb kubdeibkwan,” tenen Er nong ab kanya ab asi mambul weik dinyi boramwe to, nibabyi neik dinyi tenen mambul dinyi bormilinun. Ati, niryi sun dib tenen nang ati, “Nun Du dam kun nang kunung ati, sun dib tenena asi katabum ebdeibkwan,” tenen niryi nun Du Yesus bisi milinun cok, Ersi tabakoka takubdeibmating mambul dinyi langdeiboka bormilinun.
Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nisi takubdeibnou to, niryi sun dantam-dantam kurandum nang nirya asi Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus biryi eteresurur uram langdeiboka lak kimdeirisunun.

A lak kimdeirisunun uram ara ato, “Sun minob talak ara Er Imtamnyi Uram kum bingdamnyi nang ara Teleb Uram kekeroraming uca, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kimdaronung.” A dinyi ara nun aibweyabwe minob uca kubde baramnyi nang nirya aryi kum bingnamnyi ani, nun Nai biryi nun Er dam kun nang asi ukuryok lak kibdeibmasou.

Ati, nun Nai biryi wibdeibsou uca, Erci nun Du Yesus biriman aryi a ilil weik tenen dinyi langdeiboka kiknibmou ci, nun Er dam kun nang asi lak kibdeibmasou. Ara, “Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram kum bingdamnyi nang ara Teleb Uram dororaming uca, Kristus dam kun nang kimnung,” eboka lak kibdeibmasou. Ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira sun dam kunanyi kurur ati, sunci Erti, “Iya kam kubdeiboka erebdeibkwansir,” tenen katabum eboka dibde bunkwandarur.

Nun Du bisi nunci ninyi urasintam nirya aryi lak eterebde banub. Tonda, nunci ninyi nirya asi, “Malyi dinyi taklobdarur,” eboka wenebibiryok, bikdob uram eboka nirya eterebde banub. Ati, nunci, “Ninyi nirya ara nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kiboka teleb dinyi kununa akwe kubkwaming,” tenen nun Du Yesus Uram lak eterebde banub.

A dinyi ati niryi, “Nun Du dam kun nang kibting,” tenen mambul kanya bobdobmaniryi, busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi wa inun. Tonda, Er Iya Mikibnyi biryi ni kanya dam mikib kuboka wa inurur to, niryi mikib kuboka Er Imtamnyi wa irmilinun.

Ni kwityabwe, ni Paulus bira busul weik kuboka sun Kolose atei nang ati molormiliransin ara sunci diboka bikdarur. Tonda, sun Laodikia atei nang ab sun ni ab ebdana kum kuramoubwe nang yuk nang ababyi ati busul weik kuboka molormiliran.

Ara, “Sunci dib teneramingiryi, sun kanya yuk-yuk aryi katabum ena teleb,” tenen ton, “Boukwe weik kibdandoka neik kanya bona teleb,” tenen ton, niryi sun nirya ati molormiliransin. Tonda, “Dib en uram bikdob dinyi nirya asi katabum eboka bingna teleb,” tenenun. Tonda, “Nun Du Kristus dam kun nang kiboka Ersi diboka biknung,” tenen molormiliransin. “‘Nun Du Kristus biti minob uca kum bingdamnyi ani, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Ersi ukuryok lak kibdeibsou,’ tenen bikting,” tenen ato molormiliransin.

Nun Du bira bikdob dinyi nirya ati taleboka bingna deyoknyi kurur. Erda dib en uram bikdob dinyi utotoa taleboka bingna deyoknyi kurur. A dinyi nirya ara yuk nang aryi bingna kum bok, nukmana kum uca nun Du Yesus taruk dam aryi langdeiboka kurur ati ebman.

Ato eboka eterebmasin ara, “Yuk nang aryi tola uram etereboka bowanikminikingnyei,” tenen niryi sunsi ato ebmasin. “Tola uram eteren nang aryi tola uram asi mikib kuboka eterebingnyi ba, dib tenebingnyei,” tenen ato ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, ni nong ara sun ab tonkwa kum kunub bok, ni tenen kanya ara sun ab tonkwa tuba-tuba kunub ati, niryi sunsi tuba-tuba molormiliransin. Sunda katabum eboka nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenerandum dinyi ara sun kanya darabdongoboka teleb dinyi kunubmurubde barandum ati, ni kanya kilkil weik kuranir ati ebman.
Sunci minob uca nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Nun Arungdeirisurutnyi,” tenen dib tenebkalibmandau to, sunci Er dam kun nang kuramun ci, Er Uram tuba-tuba kunubmurubde bindarur.

Tonda, sunci katabum eboka nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kubmurubde bindarur. Tonda, nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kuboka kanya katabum ebtabakde baramun ci, nun Du Yesus bisi milibmurubdarur. Ara, minob uca dib en uram asi katabum eboka dobdobmandau to, katabum eboka talebmurubde bindarur. Ato kuboka sunci sun kanya dam aryi langdeiboka nun Nai bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” tenena teleb.

Ninyi tentok ababyi sunsi bowanikminiksicei. Ara, tola uram asi etereboka absingiryi, “A uram ara iya bikdob en uram kurur,” ebsingnyi ba, sunci a uram asi dib tenebmunyei. A uram ara iya talyi tam uram kurur ati ebman. Tonda, tukwetam nang aryi bikdob tenen dinyi ara ninyi tenen kanya deici aryok eteren dinyi akwe kurur. A uram ara tukwetam nang aryi tenen dinyi nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi eteresurur bikdob dinyi ato kum kurur.
Er Imtamnyi mikib nirya ara nun Du Yesus Kristus ninyi kibdanmunyi dam langdeiboka kurur ati ebman.

Ura, sun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kurandum ati, sunci nun Du Yesus dam kurur mikib iya mikib dinyi ara langdeiboka dobdobmandau. Nun Du bira iya weik sien nang nirya ab, mikib nang nirya ab kalingsurutnyi biryi sunsi Er mikib ara langdeiboka karebmasou ati ebman.

Nun Du boukwe dam nang kurandum ba, Erci sun malyi tenen dinyi nirya asi kilibkaboka bai donokmou. Den bama sengna nang ara den bama sekoka bai donongnaming to, nun Du Yesus biryi nun malyi tenen dinyi kiliboka bai donokmou. Nun Du biryi den bama sengsina ati kebdeiboka ebmasin. A dinyi ara ninyi taruk aryi den bama sengna dinyi kum kurur ati ebman.

Sun nun Du Yesus dam kun nang ara nun Du Yesus si deib aryi me dongobmasei. Ati, sunda kebdeiboka nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa dibmandau ba, Er ab tonkwa tukwe umbura dongobmasei. Asi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunda nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa kam bukeibmasou. Ati, sunci Er Imtamnyi mikib asi dib tenebmandau ati, Erda nun Du Yesus bisi kam bukeibmounyi biryi sunbabyi kam bukeibmasou uca, nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kurandum.

Ni kwityabwe, minob ura sunda malyi tenen dinyi akwe kunurandau deyok aryi, dian nang ato kurandau. Tonda, malyi kun dinyi akwe kurandau deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi dam kuna kum nang kuboka den bama sengsina kum nang ato kurandau ati ebman. Ba, dian nang ato kurandau bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun malyi kun dinyi nirya kilibmasou ura, sunbabyi nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa kam bukeibmasou.

Nun Du Yesus biryi nun malyi kun dinyi kilibmasou ura, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” eboka kerek sengna asi kum dandeibmou. A kerek sengna deici kuramwe uram ara nunsi tatab-tatab eransou asi nun Du Yesus biryi doboka kum dandeibmou. Ara, nun Du Yesus bisi co lase deici bing dakmai ba, Erci nunsi tatab-tatab eransou uram nirya asi kum dandeibmou.

Nun Du bira co lase deici aryi dibmou uca, Erci Er ordana nang ara isa weik sien nang ab, mikib nang ab muna kibdongobmou. Ninyi nirya aryi asing dinmai bok, nun Du Yesus biryi, “Nira ninyi muna kirdongonanyi kunun,” eboka Erdamnyi lak kibdeibdanmou.

Nun Du biryi muna kibdongobmou deyok aryi, ninyi tentok ababyi sunda Er milin nang asi tatab-tatab ebdongobsingnyei. Ara, sun yirandum yina ati, “Yina mem,” eboka wenebsingnyei. Tonda, sun yirandum me ati, “Yina mem,” eboka wenebsingnyei. Tonda, yuk nang aryi, “Musa Uram kunuboka kwalina kwalibde bindarur,” eboka aruksingnyei. Tonda, “Musa Uram kunuboka ukuryok wala kwalibdarur,” ebsingnyei. Tonda, “Ato-ato kuboka wa in kum uki tum si Sabat louboka tenebdarur,” eboka aruksingnyei.

A “Ato-ato kubde bindarur,” en uram yuk-yuk ara bikdob dinyi kum kurur. Erda, minob uca kiklin dinyi kuramwe uca, nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi lebdeibkwansou ati lak kimdeiriramwe. Ura, ukuryok ara nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi a uram yuk-yuk asi sirya kunubmou ba, nunci a uram ara tuba kum kununub.

Ura, ninyi ton nang ara, “Nundamnyi diboka luknubdongobdankwayeb,” tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi anmalakoka tuba kum moloraming. Erda, sunci, “Molormilibsiting,” tenen Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang akwe namnaming. A nang ara, “Luknubdongon kanya bonub,” erdaramingiryok, wingdan nang kunung. Sunci sundamnyi erebdandoka, “Kunumna deici aryi ato-ato asing eibmoubwe,” eboka uram cang enung. Sunda tukwetam nang kanya akwe bonung cok, sundamnyi ererdaraming ci, talyi dinyi akwe etereraming. Ati, a nang aryi sun dib tenen nang asi, “Sunda Er Imtamnyi bisi anmalakoka molobmunyei,” eboka wenebsingnyei. Tonda, “Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang asi kum moloramunyi ura, iya kam kun dinyi wanikminiksicei,” eboka wenebsingnyei. A nang aryi ato eboka wenebsingnyi ababyi, sunci sun uram kekebmunyei.

Sun ato kunuramingnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus Kisok atonyi dam kun nang tuba kum kunung. Nun Du bira Co Deyoknyi kurur ati, Erci mikib kareboka sun dib tenen nang ara er te ato kun nang asi katabum eboka mururdeirisurur ati ebman. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebci uca, sun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus biriman aryi katabum ebtabaknin dib en uram asi talebnurubde baraming.

Ba, sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus ab tonkwa dibmandau uca, tukwetam nang aryi tenen dinyi tuba kum kunurandum ati, sunda unato ati, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” en uram ara tuba kekerandum do? Sunci minob uca tukwetam nang aryi tenen dinyi kunurandau ara taklobmandau cok, ukuryok ara tuba kunubde barandum darib?
Ara, “A dinyi talena mem.” Tonda, “O dinyi yina mem.” Tonda, “A dinyi bol libdena mem.” Sunci ato uram yuk-yuk asi tuba kunurandum darib?
Ato en uram nirya ara ninyi aryok eteren uram aca kurur. Tonda, ninyi aryok arungna uram aca kurur. Ato en uram ara talyi kurur ati, nirya kum dandobkwande ati ebman.

Ato en uram ati ninyi aryi, “Bikdob en uram,” minola tenenung bok, bikdob en uram diboka kum kurur. A etereraming uram ara Er Imtamnyi biryi kum arungdeirisurur. Erda, ninyi kanya aryok tenen dinyi kurur. A eteren nang ara sun kanya ara diboka kum luknurdongoramingiryok, sibambol dem aryi sundamnyi luknurdongoraming. A nang ara Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka kum milinung cok, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal daksute,” tenen sun nong asi mambul dinyi bordeirirdaraming. A nang ara sun kanya asi darab-darab ena kum kuramingiryok, sun kanya dam aryi kuboka malyi tenen dinyi akwe kubde baraming ati, sun eterena uram ara talyi tam uram asi eterenung.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi kam bukeibmou to, Erci sun Kristus dam kun nang ababyi nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa kam bukeiboka lebdeibmasou. A deyok aryi, sunci imtam dinyi akwe teneiboka ingkirikwandarur. Ara, sunci, “Nun Du Kristus imtam welebinmou ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi siriktam burur,” tenen imtam dinyi akwe ingkiringdarur.
Sunci sun kanya dam ara tukwetam dinyi ati kanya teneina mem. Erda, imtam dinyi akwe kanya teneibkwandarur.

Nun Du Kristus biryi sunsi lebdeibmasou uca, sunda tukwetam dinyi ati dian nang ato kurandum. A deyok aryi, sunci tukwetam dinyi ingkiringna mem. Sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kibmandau uca, ukuryok kam kun nang ato kurandum. Sun iya kam kurandum dinyi ara laktoto kum kibmar. Erda, nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa Er Imtamnyi bukwe dam tuba kubmar.

Ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus aminda aryi yuryangariryi, Erdamnyi biti, “Nira Iya Weik Sienyi kunun,” eboka lak kibdankwande tum aryi Erci nunsi iya kam kimdeirisina deyoknyi biryi karebsici uca, sunbabyi Er ab tonkwa weik sien nang ato kubkwandum.

A deyok aryi, sunci, “Tukwetam tenen dinyi ara taklobmoubwe ati dian nang ato kibdobmoubwe,” tenen tukwetam dinyi nirya asi taklobdarur. Ara, “Ner talyi yobtinyi,” tenen dinyi ara taklobdarur. Tonda, “Talyi yobniting,” tenen dinyi ara taklobdarur. Tonda, “Den kwat atan ati malyi kun dinyi utotoa kubtinyi,” tenen dinyi taklobdarur. Tonda, “Bona utotoa-utotoa labtalebtinyi,” tenen dinyi ara taklobdarur. “Bona utotoa-utotoa labtalebtinyi,” tenen dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi bisi dongtam kimna dinyi ato kurur ati, iya malyi kun dinyi, kwemdina molon dinyi ato kurur ati, “Taklobdarur,” ebman.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a dinyi nirya ati, “Ni li,” tenerur ati, Erci sun a malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang asi diba ati wenebkwande. A nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram ati, “Nun li,” teneraming ati ato ebman.
Sun Kolose atei nang ara minob kurandau ci, sunbabyi neiktoto a malyi kun dinyi nirya kubde barandau. A talak kurandau ara sunbabyi a malyi kun dinyi ingkirikde barandau.

Bok, ukuryok ara sunci a malyi kun dinyi nirya asi taklobdarur. Ara, yu tenen kanya taklobdarur. Tonda, bimsa tenen kanya taklobdarur. Tonda, “Yuk nang asi malyi kibtinyi,” tenen dinyi taklobdarur. Tonda, tola ati tatab-tatab en dinyi taklobdarur. Tonda, yuk nang asi si talyi ablanglon dinyi nirya ara sunci ebmunyei.
Tonda, sunci tola uram erdana mem. Sunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kurandum ci, sunci malyi tenen kanya ab malyi dinyi kuna ara sirya taklobmarum ati ato ebman.

Minob tenerandau dinyi malyi dinyi ara sirya takloboka ukuryok tenen dinyi sirya dobdobmarum ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubde barandum. A ukuryok kanya ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun kanya tam asi ukuryok kiknibde uca, nunda Er Imtamnyi bito nang kimnub ci, tabakoka Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka bikde banub.

Nunda ukuryok kanya bon nang ara yuk-yuk tuba kum kunub. Ara, Yunani yala nang yuk, Yahudi yala nang yuk, tuba kum kunub. Tonda, den bama sengsina nang yuk, den bama sengsina kum nang yuk, tuba kum kunub. Tonda, Yunani yala nang yuk, Yunani yala kum nang yuk, tuba kum kunub. Tonda, bai nang si Skit yala nang yuk tuba kum kunub. Tonda, sun ikin wa bona nang ab, sun ikin wa bona kum nang ababyi, yuk-yuk kum kunub. Erda, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi nun nirya asi antanibdeibsou ura, Erda Iya Weik Sienyi kurur ci, nun nirya kunub nang dam kunanyi kurur.

A deyok aryi, sun Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang ton, Er Imtamnyi biryi boukwe kusurur nang aryi sun mamun boukwe kibdandarur. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wibdeibsou,” tenen teleb dinyi akwe kunubde bindarur. Ati, sunci yuk nang boukwe kiboka namin kanya bobdarur. Tonda, luknubdob kanya boboka yuk nang asi namin kibdarur. Tonda, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul kubdeibsingnyi ababyi, sunda yu minola wengna kanya bona mem.

Yuk nang aryi sunsi malyi kibsingnyi ababyi, sun kanya yu kubsicei. Erda, sunci a dinyi ara luba kiboka malyi kibdongobmasingnyi nang ab tonkwa antanirdana teleb. Nun Du biryi nun malyi kun dinyi kilibmasou to, nunbabyi neiktoto yuk nang aryi malyi kibmasingnyi dinyi luba kimna teleb.

Ura, a teleb dinyi yuk-yuk asi kunuramun ci, sunci sun mamun boukwe kibdandarur. Boukwe kimdan dinyi aryi yuk-yuk teleb dinyi asi tonkwa mururdeirirur ati, boukwe kimdan dinyi ara iya bikdob dinyi kurur ati ebman.

Tonda, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi antanibdeibsou dinyi aryi sun kanya yuk-yuk teleb akwe kuna teleb. Nun Nai biryi sunsi nabmasou ara, “Neik kanya boboka antanibdandoka kubkwaming,” tenen nabmasou. Tonda, sunci nun Nai nabmasounyi bisi, “Ei, nun Nai,” eboka kina teleb.

Ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram ara sun kanya dam langdeiboka kubsiri bok, sunci a uram asi tuba-tuba teneiboka kununa teleb. Ato kuramun ci, sunci bikdob uram eboka sun mamun etererdana teleb. Tonda, nun Du Yesus Uram teneramun ci, sun mamun wenerdana teleb. Tonda, nun Du Yesus Uram sun kanya dam langdeiboka kuransiri bok, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “Ei nun Nai,” teneboka abmun ci, nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik en mot yuk-yuk semna teleb. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi eteresurur mot asi semna teleb.

Tonda, utotoa-utotoa uram ebkwamamunyi ura, sunci, “Nun Du Yesus si weik ebkwan,” tenen dinyi asi ebkwandarur. Tonda, utotoa-utotoa dinyi kunubkwamamunyi ura, sunci, “Nun Du Yesus si weik ebkwan,” tenen dinyi akwe kunubkwandarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici uca, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei, nun Nai,” eramun cok, ato kunubkwandarur.
Sun ninyi don nerabwe ara sun akenyabwe uram kunubde bindarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi kikib tenesurur dinyi takubdeibsingnyi ura, sunci ato dinyi kunubdarur.
Ba, nerabwe sun akenyabwe ara sun nerabwe asi boukwe kibdarur. Yu kanya boboka kerebmunyei.
Ba, sun mabwe nermabwe ara sun naiyabwe sun kwinyabwe erdeirin uram nirya asi kunubde bindarur. Ato kunuramunyi uca, nun Du Yesus kanya ara sunti teleb kubkwansir.
Ura, sun naiyabwe ara sun mabwe nermabwe asi weneramun cok, erekoka wenebmunyei. Erekoka wenebmunyi ura, sun mabwe nermabwe ara mambul kuboka sunti tulum kanya bobsingnyei.

Ura, sun yuk nang aryi ikin wa takurdeiriransingnyi nang ara sun arungdansingnyi nang uram nirya asi diboka kunubde bindarur. Tukwetam kuraming arungdeirisin nang ati ato ebman. Ara, sun wa takurdeirisin nang aryi kalikoka asing diransingnyi ababyi, asing diransina kum ababyi, sunci busul kuboka wa ibde bindarur. Tonda, sunci, “Wa diboka ibibyi uca, nun arungdeirisin nang aryi nunsi kisal daksiting,” tenena mem. Erda, busul kanya diboka boramun cok, sunci ato tenena teleb. “Nun Du biryi arungdeirisurur to, nunci tukwetam aryi kuboka wa takurdeirisin nang uram kunubde binkwayeb.” tenena teleb. Ati, sunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Nun Du bira imtam aryi kuboka arungdeirisurutnyi,” teneramun ci, sunci nun Du Yesus biryi arungdeirisurur to, sun tukwetam aryi kuboka arungdeirisin nang uram kunubde bindarur.

Tukwetam wa utotoa wa asi sunci busul kuboka iboka kunubde bindarur. Tonda sunci, “Tukwetam nang aryi takubdeibmasei deyok aryi, tukwetam wa ibde binkwayeb,” tenen kuma. Erda, sunci ato tenena teleb. “Nun Du biryi takubdeibmasou deyok aryi, tukwetam wa ababyi ibde binkwayeb,” tenebkwandarur.

Ati, sunci, “Nun Du biryi nunsi dekoka iya kam kun dinyi karebkwansir,” tenen bingnamun cok, tukwetam wa kunubde bindarur. Sunda yuk nang aryi ikin wa takurdeirisin nang ara nun Du Yesus wa irmilin nang kurandum ati ato ebman.

Ba, sun malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang ara wenen dinyi dobdobkwaming ati ebman. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi urasintam kum wimdeirisurur. Ati, Erci, “Anyi dobdobkwan, onyi yakdonokwan,” kum tenesurur. Erda, sun malyi kuramingnyi nang asi wenebdiryok, Erci sun Er Uram kunubde baramingnyi nang asi dobdobkwande.

Ura, sun yuk nang asi ikin wa takurdeirirandum nang ara sun ikin wa takurdeirirandum nang asi mambul kibdeibmunyei. Erda, sunci teleb kiboka kikib tenen dinyi akwe kunubdarur. Ati, sunci, “Nun Du bira imtam kurutnyi nunbabyi arungdeirisurur ati, nunbabyi nun Du biryi ebdeibmasou to kunubde binkwayeb,” tenebmun cok, sun tukwetam aryi kuboka ikin wa bon nang asi teleb akwe kubdeibdarur.
Ura, ni kwityabwe, sun nirya ara tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi bisi molobdarur. A molonmamunyi talak aryok, sunci kalikdandoka moloboka Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kibkwandarur.

Tonda, sunci nun Nai bisi molonmamunyi ura, nunbabyi molormilibsindarur. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi bublan kukeibsici uca, nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram lak eterebkwayeb ati molobmilibsindarur. Nun Du Uram inibdeiamwe uram asi lak eterebde banub deyok ati, ninyi aryi nisi tabwe deanei ati ebman.
Ba, niryi nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram kikibto kuboka lak eterebkwan ati, sunci nisi molormilinina teleb.

Ura, sunci bikdob kanya boramun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubde baramun cok, sun dib tenena kum nang ababyi teleb akwe kibdarur. Ara, sunci sun dib tenena kum nang ab tonkwa kuramunyi ura, “Yuk tum aryi Teleb Uram eterebkwan,” tenena mem. Erda sun ab tonkwa kunmamunyi uki tum ara sunti teleb uki tum a kunum berekmasiriryi ati, Teleb Uram akiryok eterebkwandarur.

Yuk nang asi uram eramunyi ura, sunci tuba-tuba namin uram akwe ebkwandarur. Tonda, sun eramunyi uram nirya ara diboka kanya teneibmun cok, kikib uram akwe ebkwandarur. Ara, ninyi aryi, “Yu uram akwe enung,” eboka tatab-tatab ebdongobsingnyi ababyi, sunci, “Tola ati enmanurum,” eboka sundamnyi limdarona teleb.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, nun kwit Tikhikus bira sun dam yangaci ura, erci ni Paulus biti, “Ato-ato kurande,” eboka uram bobkirikwansir. Nun kwit Tikhikus bira nun boukwe kimnubnyi dib tenenanyi kurur ci, erci tanglona kum uca nun ab tonkwa nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi wa irmilinubnyi kurur.
Nun kwit biryi nun kuramib to uram bobkiriksiryok, sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum ebdeibkwansir ati niryi ersi sun dam bokdonokmasin.

Nun kwit Tikhikus bira nun kwit Onesimus ab milibdandoka sun Kolose atei nang dam yankwanding. Nun kwit Onesimus bira sun ateinyi kurur asi, nunci ersi boukwe weik kunubnyi kurur. Tonda, erda tanglona kum uca nun Du bisi dib tenenanyi kurur. A nang susuk aryi nun atam kuramib to nirya sunsi nukwansiring.

Tonda, ni ab tonkwa tabwe deboka dongobseinyi, nun kwit Aristarkhus biryi sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasir. Tonda, Barnabas er nai weitnyi mi si Markus bibabyi sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasir. Erci sun dam yangaci ura, sunci ersi kibdobkwandarur. Ati, niryi sunsi sirya ebdeibmasise to, sunci ersi kibdobkwandarur.

Tonda, Yesus er uruma si ara Yustus enungnyi bibabyi sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasir. Aristarkhus ab, Markus ab, Yustus ab ara Yahudi yala nang aryi deiamnyi nang kunung aryi, ni wa inuna kankan kunung ci, irmilinunung. Ni wa irmilin nang yuk nang nirya ara Yahudi yala nang kum kunung bok, a nang winiryi nang asi Yahudi yala nang kunung. A nang ara, “Ninyi nirya aryi Er Imtamnyi amwetam kun nang kibkwaming tum minola yarur,” tenen ni inun wa irmiliraning uca, ni kanya katabum eranir.

Tonda, nun kwit Epafras bibabyi sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasir. Erbabyi sun ateinyi kurur. Tonda, erci nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi wa irmilinanyi kurur. Nun kwit bira uram darab-darab erandiryok, sunti tuba-tuba molormiliransir. Ara, erci sunti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi erdeirisin uram nirya asi langdeiboka bikdobingiryi, katabum kanya boboka nun Nai Uram diboka kunubkwaming,” tenen erci sunti molormilisurur.
Tola kuma. Nun kwit bira busul weik kuboka sun Kolose atei nang ati molormilisurur. Tonda, sun Laodikia atei nang ab, sun Hierapolis atei nang ababyi ati erci busul kuboka molormilirur.
Tonda, nun kwit Lukas ninyi kwetenanyi nun boukwe kunubnyi biryi sunti, “Teleb,” ebmasir. Tonda, Demas bibabyi sunti, “Teleb,” ebmasir.

Ura, ni kwityabwe Kolose atei kurandum nang, sunci dam kuraming atei nang Laodikia nang asi, “Paulus ab, er ab tonkwa kunung nang ab aryi, ‘Teleb,’ eboka kibmasing,” ebdarur. Tonda, nun malner dib tenen ner Nimfa ab, dib tenen nang er ai buluraming nang nirya ab asi, “Paulus biryi, ‘Teleb,’ ebmasir,” ebdarur.

Ura, sunda Kolose atei kurandum dib tenen nang dam asi a kerek sengna sirya nuksingnyi ura, sun Laodikia atei kuraming dib tenen nang ababyi nukde bana teleb. Ba, niryi sun Laodikia atei nang ababyi kerek sengna ton sekeibmase ati, a kerek sengna ara sun Kolose atei nang ababyi nukde basina teleb.
Tonda, nun kwit Arkhipus bisi ato ebdarur. “Nun Du biryi kansi wa takubdeibkou ati, kanci a wa asi tanglona kum uca kunuboka inkwandum,” ebdarur.

Ni Paulus bira sun nirya asi, “Teleb,” ebmasin. A teleb eboka sekmasin ara ni taruk kobdoba aryi kerek sekeibmasin. Nira tabwe deaneinyi kunun ati, sunci niti molormilina teleb. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun nirya asi kisal dangsina teleb.

Nun kwityabwe Tesalonika atei kuboka dib tenerandum nang, teleb! Nun Paulus ab Silwanus ab Timotius ab aryi sunda nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kundarur nang asi, “Teleb,” ebmasib. Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi teleb kubdeiboka antanirdeirin dinyi karesina teleb.

Nun kwityabwe, sun nirya ara teleb akwe ukurandum ati, nunci tanglona kum uca sunti teneiransibiryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enub. Ara, nunci sunti tuba-tuba Er Imtamnyi bisi molormiliransibiryi, nunci sun nirya ati, “Ei nun Nai,” enub.

Sunci dib tenen kanya boramun ci, nun Nai Imtamnyi biti teleb dinyi akwe kundarur ati, nun teneinub. Tonda, yuk nang asi boukwe weik kumun ci, busul weik kuboka yuk nang ati teleb dinyi utotoa karerandum ara nun teneinub. Tonda, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul weik kurdeiriransing ababyi, sunci tanglona kum uca dib tenerandum. Ara, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Imtam aryi kuboka yuryandoka lebkwansir,” tenen dibde bundarur. Nunci a dinyi nirya teneiboka nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enub.

Nun kwityabwe, sunda nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi boukwe weik kusurur nang kundarur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenen wibdeibsou ati ebman. A deyok aryi, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enub.
