Nun ab sun ab tonkwa kuramaburyi, Teleb Uram lak eterebmasoubwe ara nunci uram dem aryi kum etereransoubwe. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi miliransou ba, nunci sunsi bikdob uram ton mikib uram ton akwe etereransoubwe. Ba, sunci a uram ara, “Dib en uram ati eteransing,” tenebmandau uram akikwe etereransoubwe. Ati, nunda sunti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi Teleb Uram deici namdur ati, Er Uram dobdobkwaming,” tenen bikmasuburyi, Teleb Uram ermururansoubwe. Sun nirya ara a dinyi sirya bikmarum. Tonda, nun ab sun ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ba, nunci una kuboka kuramoubwe ati sun bikmarum. Ati, nunci sunti, “Nun kwityabwe ati teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen kuramoubwe ati, sunbabyi bikmarum.

Ura, sunci Teleb Uram dobdobmandau ura, nun kuramoubwe to sunbabyi milibkalibmandau. Tonda, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi kunuramwe to sunci milirandau. Ara, ninyi aryi sunbabyi ikin dinyi takubdeibmasei bok, sunsi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karebsou ba, sun kanya kilkil kuboka Er Imtamnyi Uram sirya dobdobmandau.

Uca, sun Tesalonika atei nang aryi Teleb Uram katabum eboka dobdobmandau uca, sun Makedonia mutuk dib tenen nang ab, sun Akhaya mutuk dib tenen nang ab ababyi kekebmasei. Kekebmasei ura, akatei nang aryi sunti, “Kiklina ato nang,” tenesunung ci, akatei nang babyi ato tenenung. “Ninyi aryi mambul kubdeibsingnyi ura, nunbabyi Teleb Uram asi katabum eboka talebdobkwayeb,” tenenung. Ato tenenung ci, sunda Tesalonika nang aryi kurandum to sunbabyi neiktoto milinung.

Sunci deyok koubmandau ba, ninyi aryi Teleb Uram kekebmai uca, yuk atei-yuk atei nang bikmasici, a uram bobdoro baramnyi. Uca, sun Makedonia mutuk nang ton sun Akhaya mutuk nang ton aryi sun atei Tesalonika nang kundarur to sirya kekebmai. Nun Teleb Uram eterebde baramib ai sun eikatei-okatei nang nirya ara sun Tesalonika nang kurandum to nungsunung. Ara, sun yuk mutuk atei nang ababyi ato eboka nungsunung. “Nun kwityabwe Tesalonika nang ara katabum eboka Er Imtamnyi bisi dib tenenung.” Uca, a nang ara sunti, “Dib tenenung,” sirya bingsunung ati, nunci sunti, “Dib tenenung,” lak ena kum kunub.

Erda, nunci a nang asi lak eterebkubyi ba, sunci nunsi ato esunung. “Sun Tesalonika nang kunung to ara nun sirya bingnub. Ara, kanda Paulus ab kan kwityabwe ab aryi Teleb Uram eterebmurubmandau ba, sun Tesalonika nang aryi dobdobmai. Sirya dobdobmai ci, sun kwemdina dinyi nirya bai donokmai ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Er Iya Erebdobnyi bira ninyi nirya aryi Molonubnyi ton milinung.” Ato eboka sun yuk mutuk-yuk mutuk nang aryi sunda Tesalonika nang ati lak esunung.

Tonda, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi milindarur ci, sunci Er Imtamnyi Mi nun Du Yesus bisi dibde bundarur. Ara, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibmounyi bira, “Lebkwansir ati imtam aryi tamuryankwamar do?” tenen nun Du Yesus bisi dibde bundarur. Sunci dibde bundarutnyi bira nun Du Yesus a kunum. Erci nunsi lemsurur uca, sirya kobdob uki tum berekci ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kum wenebkwansir.
Nun kwityabwe e, nunda sun dam yanmoubwe ara talyi ati kum yanmoubwe. Erda, nunci nun Du Yesus deyok Teleb Uram etereransoubwe uca, sunci a uram diboka dib tenebmandau ara sunbabyi bikmarum.

Nunci sun Tesalonika nang atei kabul yanganmaburyi, Filipi atei tuba kuamoubwe. Kuamoubwe ba, ninyi aryi nunsi malyi uram eboka malyi kubdeiansei ara sun bikmarum. Malyi kurdeiansei bok, nunci sun atei Tesalonika yanmoubwe ura, Teleb Uram eterena ara kum taklobmoubwe. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, nunci Teleb Uram eterebmasoubwe. Ara, sun atei nang kankan ton nang ababyi nunsi malyi kurdeiriransei ababyi, nunci ilil asa kum uca nun Nai Imtamnyi Uram etereransoubwe.

Ati, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebmun ci, Er Uram kunubdarur,” ebibiryi, nunda ilil kum asa aryi kuboka ato enub. Ara, “Tola uram kum eterenub,” tenen bingdanub cok, “Dib en uram akwe eterenub,” tenen bingdanub deyok aryi, nunda ilil asa kum kuboka Teleb Uram enub. Tonda, nunci, “Co bok ilinto karebsiting,” tenen kanya kum bonub. Tonda, “Nun uram keken nang asi wanikminiktibyi,” tenen kanya ababyi kum bonub.

Tonda, nunci, “Ninyi kanya teleb kubdeibtibyi,” tenen kanya kum bonub. Erda, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi kanya asi teleb kubdeibkwayeb,” tenen Teleb Uram eterenub. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi kanya yuk-yuk lilirdeisurutnyi kurur ci. Nun kanya asi lilibmasou ura, Erci nunti, “Ni ebdeibkwan uram akwe eterebkwaming,” tenen bikoka Erci nunsi, “Teleb Uram eterebdarur,” eboka takubdeibsou. Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi takubdeibsou to akwe eterenub.

Ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi Uram etereramib ci, nunci, “Ni kwit, ni kwit, wenena uram kum ebkwankin,” kum enub. Tonda, “Co bok ilinto karebsiting,” tenen Teleb Uram kum eterenub. Erda, teleb kanya boboka Teleb Uram eterenub. A dinyi ara tola kuma. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bibabyi bingsurur.

Tonda, nunci ninyi aryi nun uram kekebingiryi nunsi, “Kisal daksiting,” tenen kanya kum bonub. Nunci sun Tesalonika atei nang ati ato kum tenesunung. Tonda, nunci, “Sun yuk atei-yuk atei nang aryi kisal daksiting,” ton kum tenenub.

Nun Du Kristus biryi, “Teleb Uram eterebda bindarur,” eboka takubdeibsou ati, nunci sunsi, “Nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus wa irmilin nang kunub ati, sunci nun ebmabyi tok nirya kunuboka yina karebsindarur,” eboka arukdeibsitibiryok, nunci sunsi ikin dinyi kum takurdeiransoubwe. Erda, nunci namin kanya boboka sunsi dirniliransoubwe. Ara, er kwin biryi er mi alok asi kalikoka dirnilirande to, nunbabyi neiktoto sunda Tesalonika nang asi dirniliransoubwe.

Nunda sunda Tesalonika nang asi boukwe weik kunub deyok aryi, nunci Teleb Uram etereransoubwe. Tonda, nunci sunti, “Una kuboka teleb kubdeibkwayeb do?” teneramoubwe. Ara, nunci kilkil kanya boramuburyi, bukman mabman nirya sunsi dirniliransoubwe. Ara, nunci sunti, “Nun kwityabwe,” teneramoubwe deyok aryi, ato kuramoubwe.

Nun ab sun ab tonkwa kuramaburyi, nunci Teleb Uram akwe kum etereransoubwe. Erda, nunci, wa busul kuboka kitingtam lukunda nirya iramoubwe sirya wa ibibyi ura, nun yina yiramoubwe. Ara, nunci, “Nun kwityabwe Tesalonika nang asi ikin dinyi takubdeibibyei,” tenen nunci, “Yina ababyi ton karebsindarur,” eboka kum moloramoubwe. Erda, nunci wa diboka ibnaryok, nun yina yiramoubwe. Ara, nunci sunsi Teleb Uram etereransoubwe talak aryi ato kuramoubwe.

Nun sunda Tesalonika atei kuboka dib tenen nang kankan kuramaburyi, nunda teleb dinyi akwe kuramoubwe. Ara, malyi kun dinyi bai donokoka, keresina kum uca teleb akwe kuramoubwe. A uram ara dib en uram akwe ati, sun nirya bikmarum. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi bibabyi bingsurur.
Er nai biryi boukwe kiboka er mabwe yuk-yuk asi dirnilirande to, nunbabyi neiktoto boukwe weik kiboka sun yuk-yuk asi diboka dirniliransoubwe to ara sun nirya bikmarum.

Ati, nunci sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum ebdeibmasoubwe. Tonda, nunci ato eboka sunsi ato ebdarabdeibmasoubwe. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira, ‘Ni erebdeibkwan nang,’ tenen namsurutnyi kurur. Ati, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibsou to kunubdarur. Tonda, Erci sunti, ‘Nira Iya Erebdobnyi amwetam kun nang kubting,’ tenesurur.” Nunci ato eboka sun kanya katabum eboka ebdarabdeiansoubwe.

Ura, sunda nun etereransoubwe uram diboka dobdobmandau ci, sunci, “Tukwetam nang aryi talyi eraming uram,” kum tenebmandau. Erda, sunci nun eterena uram ati, “Ei, a uram ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi lak esurur uram,” tenen ati, sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka dobdobmandau. Ati, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi tuba-tuba, “Ei nun Nai,” enub. A uram ara talyi uram kuma. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou uca, a uram ara mikib kiboka karebmasou asi, sun dib tenen nang aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi milindarur ati ni bikmasin.

Nun kwityabwe e, minob ura Yudea mutuk kuramwe to sun bikmarum. Ara, Yahudi yala nang ilinto aryi sun a mutuk kuramnyi dib tenen nang malyi kurdeiriramnyi. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang asi malyi kurdeiriramnyi. Ura, sunda Tesalonika nang ara sun Yudea mutuk kuboka dib tenen nang ato kurandau. Ara, sun atei kuraming nang aryi sunda dib tenen nang asi malyi kurdeiriramnyi. Ara, “Teleb Uram nun li,” tenen sun mutuk kuraming nang aryi sunda dib tenen nang asi malyi kurdeiriransei.

Sun Yahudi yala nang kankan dib tenen kum nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi obmai. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang ababyi sunci minob obmai. Tonda, sunci nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang asi yakdonokmasei. A nang ara ninyi nirya asi yu kanya boraming ci, malyi kun dinyi akwe ukuraming. Ato akwe kuraming ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ni li,” tenerur.

A nang ara nunda Teleb Uram eteren nang ati, “Bisik sekminiktibyi,” tenesunung. Ara, “Sun yuk yala nang ara Yahudi yala kum nang ara Teleb Uram kekebingnyei,” tenen sunci nun Teleb Uram eteren nang ati, “Bisik sektibyi,” tenesunung. Ara, nunci, Teleb Uram sunsi eterebtibyi ba, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunbabyi lebsute,” tenenub bok, sun Yahudi yala nang aryi, “Mem,” eboka bisik sengsunung. A nang ara tanglona kum uca malyi kuraming ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “A nang aryi malyi kun dinyi ilinto kurur ati, a kunum dakbisikmar,” tenebmar ati, Erci sunsi ukuryok diba ati wenebkwande.

Ura, nun kwityabwe, uki mitikanun mabmaburyi, nun ab sun ab tonkwa kum kuramoubwe deyok aryi, nun kanya mambul kuransir ba, nunci sunti tuba-tuba teneisunub. Ati, nunci, “Sun ab una kuboka ebdatibyi do?” tenebde kunub.

Ati, nunci, “Tesalonika atei tamurbibyi ura, sun dib tenen nang ab ebdatibyi,” teneramoubwe. Ni Paulus bira liki bitinyi aryi, “Tesalonika atei tamurbinkun,” tenebmase. Ato tenebmasiryi, anabkoubwe bok, isa sienyi Iblis biryi nun bisik sekmasou. Ba, uki mikbaryi mabmoubwe ani, tubto anabkoubwe bok, isa sienyi biryi tubto bisik sekmasou.

Nunci, “Sun ab tonkwa tubto ebdatibyi,” tenen sunda Tesalonika nang ati tuba-tuba teneisunub. Ara, sun ukurandum to deyok aryi, nun kanya kilkil weik kusurur ati ato ebmab. Ati, nunci, sunti, “Tanglona kum uca dib tenenung,” tenen aryi nun kanya kilkil kusurur. Nun Du Yesus imtam aryi kuboka tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, nunda nun Du Yesus urasintam aryi tikmabyi ura, nunci sunda Tesalonika nang erebdeiboka kisal dakwansib.
Sunda Tesalonika nang ara diboka kiklina ato nang kundarur ati ebman. Sunci katabum eboka dib tenerandum ati, nun kanya kilkil weik kuransir. Sunda nunci kisal dangsunub nang kundarur ati ebman.

A deyok aryi, nunci, “Sun Tesalonika nang kuraming to kekebtibyi,” tenen “Una kubkwayeb do?” tenebde kuramoubwe ani, nunci uram ton dodeibmoubwe. Ara, nunci, “Paulus ab Silwanus ab ara weik atei si Atena tuba kubmanumuryi, nunci nun kwit Timotius bisi Tesalonika atei bokdonokwanim,” tenebmanumwe. Ura, nunci nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam bokdonoknumwe. Timotius bira nun damnyi kurur. Erbabyi ara Er Imtamnyi wa irmilirutnyi kurur ci, erbabyi nun Du Yesus Kristus deyok Teleb Uram eterebde barur. Ati, nunci, “Nun kwit biryi sun Tesalonika nang kanya katabum erdeirbirur ba, sun Tesalonika nang ara tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebting,” tenen nun kwit bisi sun dam bokdonokmanumwe.

Ninyi aryi sunsi mambul kurdeiriransing ati, nunci, “Sun dib tenen nang kankan asi ninyi tentok ababyi kankana kubcei,” tenebmoubwe. Ato tenebmaburyi, nunci nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam bokdonokmanumwe. Ara, sunci, “Ninyi aryi nunda dib tenen nang asi malyi kubdeibmasin kum,” tenebmunyei. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi minob teneibsou to ara, “Sun dib tenen nang asi malyi kubdeibting,” tenebsou to, ninyi aryi nun dib tenen nang asi malyi kurdeiriransing. Sunci a dinyi sirya bikmarum.

Nun ab sun ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ura, ninyi aryi sunsi malyi kum kurdeiriransei bok, nunci sunsi a uram minob ebmoubwe. Ura, ato nun minob ebmoubwe to, ninyi aryi sunsi malyi kubdeibkwansing eboka etereansoubwe to sirya kunubmar ara sunbabyi bikmarum.

A deyok aryi, nira sunsi, “Tanglona kum uca dib teneraming do?” tenen nun kwit Timotius bisi sun dam bokdonokmasise. Ati, “Nun kwityabwe kuraming to minola nunuksurur,” tenen niryi ersi sun dam bokdonokmase. Ati, niryi ilil kanya boboka sunti ato teneransise, “Isa sienyi si Iblis biryi sunsi sakeibmar darib?” Tonda, “Nunci busul kuboka kouamib dib tenena asi Isa sienyi biryi kum daneibmar darib?” teneransise.

Ura, nun kwit Timotius bira sun ab tonkwa sirya ebdanmandau ura, ukuryok ara nun dam tamuryanmar. Ura, niryi ersi sun deyok ati asibdenmase uca, erci sunti, “Teleb akwe kuraming,” ebmanou. Ati, erci sunti ato ebmanou. “Sun Tesalonika nang ara tanglona kum uca dib teneraming. Tonda, sunci boukwe weik kibdandoka yuk nang ababyi boukwe weik kimnaming.” Tonda, sun tenen kanya ara, “Paulus ab Silwanus ab tonkwa ebdatibyi,” tenendarur dinyi asi erci nunsi nukmar. Ati, nunci sunti, “Tubto ebdatibyi,” tenenub to, sunbabyi neiktoto tenesindarur ati ebman.

Ati, sunci tanglona kum uca dib tenerandum uram asi nunci kekebmanumwe. A uram sirya kekebmanumwe deyok aryi nun kanya katabum tubto ebmasir. Ara, ninyi aryi nunsi mambul kurdeiriransing bok, sun deyok kekebmasinim uca, nun kanya katabum ebmasir.
A deyok aryi, nun kanya kilkil kusurur. Ara, sunci tanglona kum uca nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebmarum ati, nun kanya kilkil akwe kusurur.

Nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi tanglona kum uca, “Ei nun Nai,” eramibiryi, Erci sunsi teleb kurdeiriransou to asi nunci liliboka kum nuktibyi. Tonda, nun kanya ara kilkil weik kuransir ati nunci liliboka kum nuktibyi.

Tonda, nunda kitingtam lukunda nirya ara Er Imtamnyi bisi ebdarab eboka molonub ci, “Sun Tesalonika nang ab ebdatibyi,” eboka, “Sun dib tenen dinyi bingsunglorbinmang to asi tabakoka eterebtibyi,” eboka molonub.
Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus ab aryi miliboka bisik sengsina dinyi asi dobkabokdingnyi ura, nun ab sun ab erdana teleb.

Nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici uca, sunci tabakdongo-tabakdongo boukwe weik kimdana teleb. Tonda, sunci yuk nang ababyi tabakdongo-tabakdongo boukwe weik kimna teleb. Ara, nunci sunsi boukwe weik kusunub to, sunci yuk nang asi boukwe weik kimna teleb.

Nun Du biryi sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum erdeirisina teleb. Ara, sun, “Teleb dinyi akwe ukubkwayeb,” tenen kanya asi Erci katabum erdeirisina teleb. Sunci ato kubmunyi uca, Nun Du Yesus imtam aryi kuboka tamuryankwande uki tum berekmaci ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti ato esina teleb, “Ni urasintam aryi telebto kerebman kum kunung,” esina teleb. Tonda, Erci sunti, “Niryi wibmase nang kunung aryi teleb dinyi akwe kuraming.” esina teleb. Nun Du Yesus ab sun Er uram eryuryangan nang ab tonkwa imtam aryi kuboka tamuryankwaming ba, Erci sun Tesalonika nang ati ato ebkwansir.

Ura, nun kwityabwe e, nunci minob ura etereransoubwe to, sunci diboka ukubmun ci, tabakdongo-tabakdongo ukuna teleb. Minob ura etereransoubwe ura, nunci sunsi ato eransoubwe. “Sunci ato-ato kuboka teleb dinyi ukubmunyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, ‘Ei, Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenebkwansir,” eboka etereransoubwe. Ura, ukuryok ababyi neik uram akwe ebkwinsib ci, nunci uram ebdarab eboka, “Diboka kunubting,” tenen ebkwinsib. Sunbabyi nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kurandum ati, nunci ato eboka ebdeibkub.
Nun Du Yesus biryi takubdeibsou to, asi nunci ermuruboka, “Ato-ato kuna teleb,” eboka etereransoubwe ati sun bikmarum.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira, “Sun dib tenen nang ara ato-ato kuna teleb,” tenesurur dinyi ara sun sirya bikmarum. Ara, Erci sunti, “Niryi wibdeibmase nang ara ato kubingiryi, teleb dinyi akwe ukubting,” tenesurur. Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “‘Ner ukula yobtinyi, sal ur talyi yobnute,’ tenen kanya ara bai donokting,” tenesurur ati ebman.

Ara, sal babyi nerbabyi sundamnyi diboka kalingdaramun ci, talyi yordana tenen dinyi nirya asi bai donongna teleb. Ato kubmun ci, sunci, “Teleb dinyi ukubkwamib ati nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi wibdeibsou,” tenena teleb. Tonda, sunci ato teneina teleb. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab tukwetam nang ababyi nunti, ‘Kikib tenen dinyi akwe kuraming nang,’” tenena teleb.

Ati, sunci, “Ner talyi yobtinyi, sal talyi yobnute,” tenen malyi dinyi ukubmunyei. Sun yuk yala nang ara Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang aryi talyi yobdandoka ukuraming to, sunda dib tenen nang aryi ukubmunyei.

Ati, sunci, “Ni kanya asi kalikdankwan,” teneboka ner talyi yordana mem. Unanyi biryi, “Ni kwit ner asi yobtinyi,” ton, “Ni kwit nebnyi asi yobtinyi,” tenebdinyi bira malyi dinyi kurandiryi. Sun kwit ner kum er nebnyi kum asi ukula yobdaute ura, sunci sun kwit bisi malyi kubdeibdaute. A deyok aryi, sunci a dinyi ara luba kibmunyei, “Nun Du Yesus bira sun ato kuramingnyi nang asi diba ati wenebkwande.” Minob ura, nunci a uram asi ebdarab erdeiriransoubwe ati, sunci diboka teneibdarur.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nun dib tenen nang asi nabsou ara talyi yordankwamoubwe ati nabsou do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, Erci nunsi nabsou ara, “Nira Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibse nang ato kubingiryok, teleb dinyi akwe kunubkwaming,” tenen Erci nunsi nabsou.

A deyok aryi, sun a uram asi barwetam deibkwaming ner sal ara ninyi aryi erdeirin uram asi barwetam kum deibkwaming. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Er Kanya Roh Kudus nun kanya dam dongobsounyi biryi ebdeibsou uram asi barwetam deibkwaming. Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara, “Malyi dinyi ni li,” tenerutnyi bisi nun kanya dam karebsou ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi Uram asi barwetam kiboka malyi kun dinyi ukubtibyi do? Ato tenen kum.

Sunda sun dib tenen nang asi sun mamun boukwe weik kimdana deyok ati sunsi, “Boukwe kimdarandarur,” kum eboka kerek sekdeibkwamasib. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi a deyok ati sirya eterebmasou ati, sunci sun mamun boukwe weik kimdarandum ati ebman.

Ati, sunci nun kwityabwe Makedonia mutuk aryi kuraming dib tenen nang nirya asi boukwe kiboka teleb kurdeirirandum. Sunci ato kurandum bok, nunci ebdarab eboka, “Tabakdongo-tabakdongo boukwe weik kimna teleb,” ebdeibkwinsib.

Tonda, sunci, “Yuk nang ab antanibdeiboka kubdobkwayeb,” tenen teleb akwe kuna teleb. Tonda, sunci, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka sun yuk mabwe silib asi arukmunyei. Tonda, sunci busul kuboka sun wa yuk-yuk ina teleb. Ati, nunci sunsi minob ebdeibmoubwe to, kununa teleb.

Sun dib tenen kum nang aryi sun dib tenen nang ati, “Ei, a nang ara kikib tenen dinyi akwe kuraming,” eboka kisal dakwansing ati, ato ebdeibmasib. Tonda, sun kankan aryi ninyi tentok ababyi, “‘Yuk nang aryi karebkwaning kwaning yibkwan,’ ebcei,” tenen nunci sunsi, “Sun wa yuk-yuk diboka wa ina teleb,” ebdeibmasib.

Nun kwityabwe, sun sirya dib tenen nang kankan aryi dinung nang deyok ati uram ton ebkub. Ati, sunti, “A deyok ati sun walwal kubcei,” tenen eterebkwinsib. Sunci sun ninyi dibmangnyi ba, tukwe dongobmamunyi nang ati, “Kam tubto kum bukokwaming,” tenebmunyei. A deyok aryi, sun kanya ara mambul kubsicei. Ara, sun dib tenena kum nang aryi mambul kuraming to sun kanya mambul kubsicei. Sun dib tenena kum nang ara, “Sun diamingnyi nang ara kam tubto kum bukokwaming,” teneraming ati, sun diamingnyi nang dam kun nang aryi, “Se,” teneboka boukwe akwe aryi mambul weik kuraming.

Sun dib tenen kum nang ara ato kurande bok, nunda dib tenen nang aryi tenen kanya ara yukto kurur. Ara, nunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sun dib tenen nang dibmangnyi ababyi kam bukeibkwansir,” tenen bingnub. Ara, nun Du Yesus dibmou ani, kam bukokmou to, sun nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto kubkwaming. Ara, sirya dibmangnyi asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kam bukeibkwansir. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus biriman aryi karebsici uca, sun diamingnyi dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus bisi miliboka imtam ai wengbinkwaming.

Nun Du Yesus imtam aryi kuboka tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, nunda kam tuba kubkwamibyi nang Er ab tonkwa yuma kum ebdankwayeb. Erda, sun dib tenen nang diamingnyi asi kam bukokingnyi ura, nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa yuma ebdankwaming. A uram ara dib en uram kurur. Nun Du biryi a uram nunsi lak kibdeibsou to, nunci neik uram eboka sunsi eterebmurubmasib.

Nun Du Yesus imtam aryi kuboka tamuryangariryi, Erci arukci ba, sun dib tenen nang diamingnyi ara kam tubto bukokwaming. Ara, nun Du Yesus tamuryangaci ba, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang sienyi biryi uram weik dobkwande. Uram weik dobci ura, Er uram eryuryangananyi yuknyi biryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun dibmangnyi nang bukeibkur,” tenen, “Sun dibmangnyi nang kekebingiryi, kam bukokwaming,” tenen buena si sangkakala dobiryi, lilim weik ebkwande. Lilim weik ebkwande uca, sun dibmangnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang yuma kobdob kam bukokwaming.

Sirya kam bukoka imtam ai welebingnyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsici uca, nun kum diamibyi nang kam tuba kuramibyi nang ara aminda aryi welebinkwayeb. Welebinmabyi ura, duwa deici aryi kubibiryok, nunbabyi nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa ebdankwamib. Ato kuboka nun dib tenen nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa iya kubkwamib.
A deyok aryi, sunci a uram eterebdandoka sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum ebdeibdandarur.
Ura, nun kwityabwe, “Nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande tum ara a tum aryi tamuryankwande,” eboka nunci sunsi kum kerek seksitibyi. Sunda a deyok ati diboka sirya bikmarum ati ebmab.

Nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande uki berekwande tum ara ninyi nirya aryi kum bikwaming ara sun nirya bikmarum. Ukula donanyi bira lukunda aryi yuk nang dinyi asi lukdandoka dororande to, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande tum ababyi neiktoto kubkwande. Ara, ninyi nirya aryi bingna kum kubmangnyi bok, nun Du Yesus bira lukdandoka tamuryankwande.

Ara, sun dib tenen kum nang aryi, “Antanibdandobmab ati, teleb akwe kubdobkwamib,” ebingnyi ba, iya mambul dinyi sun dam lukdandoka yankwande. Ara, mi mundu boanci ani, deibkwanci ner ara lukdandoka mi deyok yirande to, sun dib tenen kum nang ara lukdandoka mambul weik dinyi dobdobkwaming. Ara, lebdandobman kum to mambul weik dinyi asi dobdobkwaming.

Sunda dib tenen nang ara sun dib tenen kum nang kuraming to kum kurandum. Sun dib tenen kum nang kuraming to ara walwal kuboka kunuk dam ato kuraming bok, sun dib tenerandum nang ara diboka bingna nang kurandum ati, berengna dam kuraming nang ato kundarur. Ati, sunci, “Nun Du ara minola tamuryankur do?” tenen dibde bundarur aryi nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, sun kanya dam ara lungdana kum kubkwansir.

Sun nirya ara berengna dam kun nang akwe kundarur ati ebman. Tonda, sun nirya ara kitingtam kubde ban nang kundarur. Nunda dib tenen nang ara malyi kun dinyi kum kuramib ati, kunuk dam kun nang ato kum kunub.

A deyok aryi, nun dib teneramib nang ara sun dib tenen kum nang kuraming to kubibyei. Ati, nunci wi mabmamingiryi, utotoa kum bingnaming nang ato kubibyei. Erda, nunci wi mana kum uca dibde buramibiryi, “Malyi dinyi kubibyei,” tenen nundamnyi kalingdana teleb.

Sun wi maraming nang ara lukunda aryi wi maraming. Tonda, sun anggur me ilinto yiraming nang ara lukunda aryi yibingnyi uca, luba talerande. Sun dib tenen kum nang ara berengna uram asi dib kum teneraming ba, walwal kuraming ati, wi mana nang ato kuraming. Tonda, luba talen nang aryi sundamnyi kum kalingdaming ati, sunci anggur me asi ilinto yiraming.

Sun dib tenen kum nang ara ato kuraming bok, nunda dib tenen nang ara berengna dam kubde ban nang ato kunub. Ati, nunci, “Malyi dinyi ukubibyei,” tenen nundamnyi kalingdana teleb. Sun yin doun nang aryi kuraming to, “Nun ordana nang aryi bisik ebsingnyi ba, mar obsicei,” tenen, “Nun nong kisok nirya kalikdandobkwayeb,” tenebingnyi ura, sunci ting ongoboka yin doun nang kisok kaluna si helm kaluroraming to, nun dib tenen nang ababyi nundamnyi kalingdana teleb. Ara, “Malyi kun dinyi aryi nunsi sakdeibsicei,” tenen nundamnyi kalingdana teleb. Nunda dib tenen nang aryi kalingdana dinyi ara dib tenena ton, boukwe weik kimdana ton, nun Du Yesus bisi dibde buna ton kurur. Ati, nunci diboka dib teneboka yuk nang asi boukwe weik kibibiryi, “Nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi lebkwansir,” tenen dibde buna teleb. Ato kuboka nunci tanglona kum uca nundamnyi kalingdana teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nunda dib tenen nang asi, “Ikin dinyi takubdeiboka iya wenebkwan,” kum tenebsou. Erda, Erci nunti, “Lebkwan,” tenebsou ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biriman aryi Erci nunsi lebkwansir.
Nun Du bira nun dib tenen nang ati dibmou. Ara, nun kam tuba kubkwamibyi nang ababyi, sirya dinung nang ababyi, Er tonkwa iya kam kubkwamib ati Er dibmou.

Ati, sunci a uram luba kum kuboka eterebdandoka sun kanya yuk-yuk katabum ebdeibdandarur. Sirya ukurandum ura, ni sirya bikmasin ati niryi sunsi, “Tanglona kum uca ato akwe tuba ukubdandarur,” tenen ati ebman.

Ura, nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Sun kankan aryi busul kuboka Teleb Uram etereransingnyi nang asi sunci, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenena teleb. A nang ara nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunung ci, sunsi weneransing ati ato ebman.
A nang ara sunsi, “Ato-ato kuna teleb,” eboka busul kuboka kalingnansing ati, sunci sunsi boukwe weik kiboka, “Nun naiyabwe diba,” tenena teleb. Tonda, sun nirya ara antanibdandoka tonkwa kubdarur.

Ura, nun kwityabwe, nunci ebdarab eboka, “Ato-ato kuna teleb,” en uram ton ebtabakwayeb. Ara, sunci sun, “Wa ina nun li,” tenen nang asi wenena teleb. Tonda, sunci sun mambul kanya boramingnyi nang kanya asi katabum erdeirina teleb. Sunci sun mitang nang ton yuk-yuk dinyi ataranci nang ton teleb kurdeirina teleb. Tonda, sunci sun dib tenen nang ton sun dib tenen kum nang ababyi yu uram minola kerebmunyei. Erda, sunci a nang asi boukwe kibwandarur.

Ninyi aryi sunsi malyi kurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, sunci, “Tamuboka dekeibkwan,” tenen malyi kubdeibmunyei. Erda, sunci diboka teneibmunyi ura, sun mamun teleb kurdeirirdana teleb. Tonda, sun yuk nang ababyi teleb kurdeirina teleb.
Bukman mabman nirya sun kanya ara kilkil kuna teleb.
Tanglona kum uca nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi molobdarur.

Tanglona kum uca sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ebdarur. Sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kun nang kundarur ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, “Ato dinyi kuna ara teleb,” tenesurur ati ebman.
Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karesurur berengna asi sunci tangabmunyei.
Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sun dam asi lak kimdeiriranci uram asi sunci ina ngilikmunyei.

Erda, yuk-yuk uram asi lilibdemun ci, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi karesurur uram ara dib en uram ebmang do? Tola uram ebmang do?” tenen diboka lilibdarur. Ba, sun kekebmamunyi uram ara dib en uram kubci ura, sunci a uram asi diboka kunubkwandarur.
Ba, malyi kun dinyi nirya asi bai donokmun ci, kunubmunyei.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira antanirdeirisin deyoknyi biryi sun Tesalonika nang asi karebsici uca, sunda nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi wimna nang ato kuramun ci, teleb dinyi akwe ukuna teleb. Ara, Erci tanglona kum uca sunsi diboka kaliksici ura, sun tenen kanya nirya ab sun nong ab kerebmasin kum to kuna teleb. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus imtam aryi kuboka tamuryangaci ura, Erci sunda Tesalonika nang ati, “Kerebman kum to kunung,” esina teleb.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sunsi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” eboka nabsounyi bira Er Uram diboka kunurandanyi kurur. Ati, Erci sunsi kum taklobkwansir.
Nun kwityabwe e, sunci ni Paulus ab nun kwityabwe ni ab tonkwa kunub nang ati molormilisina teleb.
Sun dib tenen nang yuk nang ab ebdanmunyi ura, sunci sun yuk-yuk asi iribdanmun ci, ato eboka ebmurubdarur. “Paulus ab nun kwityabwe er ab tonkwa kunung nang ab aryi teleb ebmasing,” ebkarebdarur.

Sun dib tenen nang yuk nang ababyi ni kerek sekmasise kerek sengna asi kekebkwaming ati, sunci a kerek sengna asi nukeibdarur. Uram ebdarab eboka, niryi sunsi ato ebkwinsin. “A kerek sengna asi kum nukeibibyi ura, nun Du Yesus biryi sunsi wenebsicei.”
Nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi tanglosina kum uca sunsi teleb kurdeirisina teleb.

Nun kwityabwe Tesalonika atei kurandum dib tenen nang, “Teleb,” ebmasib. Ni Paulus ab Silwanus ab Timotius ab aryi sun nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab dam kundarur nang ati, “Teleb,” ebmasib.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sunsi teleb kubdeiboka antanirdeirin dinyi karesina teleb.

Nun kwityabwe, nunci tanglona kum uca nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik eboka, “Ei nun Nai,” ena ara kikib. Sun Tesalonika nang ara dib tenerandum ci, tabakdongoboka-tabakdongoboka dib tenerandum ati, nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” ena kikib. Tonda, sunci sun mamun asi boukwe weik kimdarandum ci, tabakdongoboka-tabakdongoboka boukwe weik kimdarandum. A deyok aryi, nunci, “Ei nun Nai,” ena kikib.

Sunci ato kurandum ati, nunci sun yuk atei-yuk atei nang aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dib tenenung nang ab ebdandoka sun Tesalonika nang asi kisal dangsibiryi, nunci nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi sun kurandum to nungnamib. Ara, nunci sunsi ato eboka nungkarenub, “Sun Tesalonika nang ara tanglona kum uca dib teneraming. Ara, ninyi aryi, ‘Obkwayeb,’ tenen tuba-tuba domkiringmangnyi uca, mambul dinyi ilinto kurdeirinung bok, sun Tesalonika nang aryi tanglona kum uca dib tenenung.” Ato eboka nungkarenub.

A dinyi nirya asi eibmabibiryok, nunci ato tenen bingnub. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi kanya nirya asi diboka lilirdeirisurutnyi bira kikib tenen dinyi akwe karesurur. A dinyi ara laktoto kurur.” A deyok aryi, sirya kobdob uki tum berekci ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun Tesalonika nang asi ato ebkwansir. “Ninyi aryi sunsi malyi kurdeiriransei bok, sunci tanglona kum uca Nisi dib teneranindau ara Ni bikman. Malyi kurdeiriransei bok, sunci tanglona kum uca dib tenerandau. Dib tenerandau ci, sunci Nira Imtamnyi biti, ‘Erebdeibsici ura, Er Imtamnyi amwetam kun nang kibkwayeb,’ tenerandau ati Ni bikman. A deyok aryi, Niryi sunsi erebdeiboka Ni amwetam kun nang kibdeibkwansin.” Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira kikib tenen dinyi akwe karesurutnyi biryi ato ebkwansir.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira kikib tenen dinyi akwe karesurur. A deyok aryi, Erci sun malyi kurdeiriransing nang asi weneboka malyi kurdeirin dinyi tamurkarebkwande.

Tonda, ninyi aryi malyi kurdeiriransingnyi nang asi Erci lebkwansir. Ara, nun Du Yesus imtam aryi kuboka Er mikib ab uk buk milil ato kankan aryi yuryangaci ura, Er uram eryuryangan nang mikib nang ilinto Ersi milibmangnyi ba, tamuryankwande tum aryi Erci sun ab nun ab tonkwa lebkwansir.

Milil uk ato kankan yuryangaci ura, nun Du Yesus biryi sun Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun li,” tenen nang asi bita wenebkwande. Tonda, sun nun Du Yesus biryi karebsou Teleb Uram kum kunuramingnyi nang asi Erci wenebkwande.

Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ara nun Du Yesus biryi iya mambul dinyi takubdeiboka wenebkwande. Nun Du bira a nang asi yakdonokoka abdiryi, sunsi ato ebkwande. “Nira Iya Mikibnyi ton Iya Mililnyi urasintam kubmunyei bindobdarur.” Ato eboka Erci sunsi iya yakdonokwande.

Nun Du tamuryankwande uki tum berekci ura, Erci ato kubkwande ati ebman. A uki tum berekmaci ura, nun Du Yesus biryi, “Er Imtamnyi biryi wibmou uca, teleb kun nang kankan aryi tiknyi ba, ninyi nirya aryi Ni si weik ebnunung,” tenen tamuryankwande. Tonda, “‘Naie, nonge, nun Du Yesus sirya lemyanmasir,’ ebkwanunung,” tenen nun Du Yesus nun dam yuryankwande. Sunda Tesalonika nang ababyi nunci ebmurubmasoubwe uram dib tenerandau ati, nun Du Yesus biryi sunbabyi lebkwansir ati ebman.

Ato teneibibiryok, nunci sunti tuba-tuba molormiliransib. Ati, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunti, ‘Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenen nabmasou to, sunci Er Uram asi diboka kunubting,” tenen nunci sunti molormiliransib. Tonda, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Er mikib biriman aryi karebci uca, sunci dib tenen kanya boboka, ‘Teleb dinyi akwe ukubkwayeb,’ tenen kubkwaming.” Ato tenenub ci, nunci sunti molormiliransib.

Molormiliransibiryok, nunci, “Nun Du biryi karebmou uca, nun kwityabwe tanglona kum uca dib tenenung ati, ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus si weik ena teleb,” tenenub. Tonda, nunci sunti, “Nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kunung ati, ninyi aryi sunsi kisal dangna teleb,” teneransib. Ara, ninyi aryi, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab aryi sun Tesalonika nang asi tanglona kum uca teleb kurdeiriransing,” tenen nun Nai Imtamnyi si ab nun Du Yesus Kristus si weik ena teleb.
Ura, ni kwityabwe, Nun Du Yesus Kristus tamuryankwande tum deyok ati ni uram ton ebkwan. Tonda, “Nun Du bira nun dib tenen nang asi Er dam aminda bulubdeibkwansir,” tenen uram ton ebkwan.

Sunci sun kanya dam ola kankana kusina mem. Ara, ninyi aryi, “Asing kum dinmab bok, nun Du Yesus sirya tamuryanmar,” ebingnyi ura, sunci a uram diba tenena mem. Ati, ninyi aryi, “A uram ara dib en uram. Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi ato eboka eterebnou,” ebingnyi ababyi, sunci a uram asi diba tenena mem. Tonda, ninyi aryi, “A uram ara dib en uram. Ninyi aryok ato eboka eterebmasing,” ebingnyi ababyi, sunci diba tenena mem. Tonda, ninyi aryi, “Er Paulus biryi ato eboka kerek sekmou,” ebingnyi ababyi, sunci diba tenena mem. Nira Paulus biryi, “Nun Du Yesus kum tamuryau,” ebmasin. Nunci Ersi tuba dibde bunub.

Ba, ninyi aryi ebingnyi tola ati yuk-yuk uram enmangnyi ura, sunci diba tenebmunyei. Nun Du Yesus kabul kum tamuryanmaci talak ara ninyi ilinto aryi sun diba teneramingnyi ara taklobkwaming. Tonda, iya malyi kunanyi bira Iblis milin nang bomenengnanyi yuma menengyaci ura, nun Du Yesus bira aminda tam tamuryankwande. Anyi bira iya malyi kunanyi bisi nun Du Yesus biryi kum daneibkwande. A dinyi ara bisik sekmanto kum.

Nun Du bira kum yanabde bok, a iya malyi kunanyi biryi dub erebdeibdandoka ato ebkwande. “Nira ninyi molonung dinyi nirya outam kiboka eitotonyi kunun ati, yuk molon dinyi kum molobkwan,” eboka erdamnyi erebdeibdankwande. Tonda, erci Er Imtamnyi Uram malyi kiboka abdiryi, Bait Allah ai wengbindoka erebdob sokon burbindoka ato ebkwande. “Nira Allah a kunum. Ati, ninyi nirya aryi nisi molobnindarur.” ebkwande.
Ni Paulus ab sun Tesalonika nang ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ba, niryi a dinyi nirya asi eterebmasise. Sunci a eterebmasise uram asi tuba teneibdarur do?

A iya malyi kunanyi bira ukuryok talak aryi lak kum kibdanmar. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebci uca, bisik sengna dinyi ton aryi, anyi bisi bisik sengdur. Unato dinyi ersi bisik sengnande ara sun sirya bikmarum. Niryi sunsi a deyok ati minob eterebmasise ati ato ebman. Ani, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kiknibkwande uki tum berekci uca, a iya malyi kunanyi lak kibdankwande.

Iya malyi kunanyi ukuryok lak kum kibmar bok, ukuryok ababyi isa sienyi si Iblis ab, er milin nang ab, iniboka malyi dinyi ilinto kuraming. Malyi kunanyi bisik sengnanyi bira tanglona kum uca bisik sekwande.

Ura, aminda aryi iya malyi kunanyi bisi bisik sengnanyi bisi kisibdobci uca, iya malyi kunanyi lak kibkwande. Anyi sirya lak kibdaci bok, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande. Er milil weik kunanyi kuboka tamuryangaci tum aryi nun Du biryi anyi bisi uram dem aryok oboka kum daneibkwande.

Iya malyi kunanyi lak kibkwande ara ato kuboka lak kibkwande. Isa sienyi Iblis biryi karebci uca, anyi bira mikib kuboka ilil tenen dinyi ilinto kiknibkwande. Ara, erci, “Ninyi nirya aryi nisi miliboka ni uram asi kunubniting,” tenen ilil tenen dinyi mitik kum kiknibkwande. Ara, ninyi ilinto wanikminikwande ati, erci ilil tenen dinyi utotoa kiknibkwande.

Tonda, anyi biryi malyi dinyi utotoa kiknibkwande. Ato kuboka erci ninyi ilinto asi wanikminikwande. Sun iya malyi kunanyi biryi wanikminikwande nang asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kum daneibkwande. A nang ara nun Nai biryi karebsou dib en uram ati, “Nun li,” teneraming ati, nun Du Yesus biryi sunsi kum lebkwande. Erda, Erci sunsi kum daneibkwande.

Tonda, a nang ara dib en uram ati, “Nun li,” teneraming deyok aryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Wenebkwan,” tenen a nang asi wanikminikmou. Ara, Erci sunti, “Dib en uram dib tenebingnyei,” tenen, “Niryi sunsi lebnyei,” tenerande. Uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmou uca, a nang ara katabum eboka tola uram dib tenenung.

Ato kubingnyi ba, sun dib en uram, “Nun li,” tenen nang asi, “Wenebkwan,” tenen Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wanikminikwande. Tonda, sun, “Malyi kun dinyi akwe ukubkwayeb,” tenen nang asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kum lebkwande. Erda, Erci, “Dib en uram bikingnyei,” tenen sunsi wanikminikwansir.

Ura, nun kwityabwe, sunda nun Du Yesus biryi boukwe kusurur nang kundarur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Lebkwan,” tenen sunsi minob wibsou ati, nunci nun Nai bisi tuba-tuba, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kimnub. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni Kanya Roh Kudus asi ninyi kanya dam dongobnyi uca, Erci sun kanya asi danguboka bitabdeibci uca, teleb akwe kubkwaming,” tenen sunsi wibsou. Tonda, Erci, “Dib en uram deici aryi Niryi sunsi lebkwan,” tenen sunsi wibsou.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Lebkwan,” tenen sunsi nabmasou. Ara, Teleb Uram deib aryi sunsi nabsou ati ebman. Ati, Erci, “Ni Mi Yesus Kristus borur milil ato dobdobkwaming,” tenen sunsi nabsou.

Ati, nun kwityabwe, sun kanya katabum eboka nun etereransoubwe uram asi diboka talebnurubdobdarur. Ara, uram deib aryi etereransoubwe dinyi ab, kerek sengna umbura kerek sengnansoubwe dinyi ab, diboka talebdarur.

Nun Du Yesus Kristus ab, nun Nai Imtamnyi ab aryi sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum erdeirisina teleb. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira nunsi boukwe kimsurutnyi kurur. Erda tanglona kum uca nun kanya iya teleb kimdeirisurutnyi kurur. Erda teleb kanya borutnyi biryi karebsou uca, nunci, “Teleb dinyi karebkwansir,” tenen Ersi dibde bunub. Ati, sunci, “Nun Nai ab, nun Du Yesus ab aryi nun kanya katabum ebdeiriransiring,” tenen katabum ebdeibdandarur. Tonda, sunci teleb dinyi akwe ukubmun ci, Teleb Uram akwe ebdarur.

Ura, nun kwityabwe, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi nunti molormilisina teleb. Ara, nunci ninyi ilinto asi Er Imtamnyi Uram eterebibyi ba, Er Imtamnyi Uram dib tenebkwaming ati molobmilibsindarur. Tonda, yuk nang ababyi Teleb Uram asi eterebmurubkwaming ati molormilindarur. Ba, sunci, “Nunci nun Du Yesus deyok Teleb Uram dobdobmoubwe to, yuk nang ababyi nun Du Yesus deyok uram dib tenena teleb,” tenen molobmilibsindarur.
Molobmilisumunyi ba, sunci, “Sun malyi kun nang ara nun kwityabwe asi dubdengnyei,” eboka molobdarur. Ninyi nirya ara Er Imtamnyi Uram asi dorona kum kunung ati ato ebman.

Malyi kun nang ara nunsi dumdesingnyei bok, nun Du Yesus bira tanglona kum uca nunsi iya milisurur. Erci sun kanya yuk-yuk asi katabum ebdeibdiryok, sunsi kalikwansir. Malyi kunanyi biryi bisik sekoka sunsi dubdendesici ababyi Erci kalikwansir.
Sunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kundarur ati, nunci sunti ato teneirisunub. “Sunda nun ebdeibmasoubwe to kununung. Tonda, aminda ababyi kunubkwaming,” tenesunub.

Ura, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsici ura, sunci ato teneina teleb. “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi boukwe weik kimsurur ati, nunci Er Uram asi kunubkwayeb.” Tonda, sunci ato teneina teleb, “Nun Du Kristus biryi tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramwe to, nunbabyi tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi Uram asi kunubkwayeb. Ninyi aryi nunsi dumdesingnyi ababyi, ato kubkwayeb.” Sunci ato teneina teleb ati ebman.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sun wa ina ati sulbalyi nang asi sunci kisibdobdarur. Tonda, sun nun ebdeibmasoubwe uram asi kum kunuramingnyi nang ababyi kisibdobdarur. Nunci uram ebdarab ebibiryok, nun Du Yesus Kristus si deib aryi ato ebdeibkwinsib.

Sunci, “Una kuboka kubkwayeb,” tenen walwal kum kurandum. Erda, sunci, “Ninyi ara wa ina ati sulbalyi kubingnyei,” tenen bikmarum. Nunda sun ab tonkwa kuramaburyok, nunci busul kuboka Teleb Uram etereransoubwe. Tonda, busul kuboka wa bita iramuburyi, nunda yina yiramoubwe. A deyok aryi, sunci nun kuramoubwe to asi, “Ato-ato kuboka busul kuramnyi,” teneboka kununa teleb.
Ara, yuk nang aryi talyi karebsin yina ara kum yiramoubwe. Erda, “Sunsi ikin bobminikibyei,” tenen kitingtam lukunda nirya wa bita ibnaryok, yina yiramoubwe.

Nunda Teleb Uram eterebde ban nang kunub ati, “Yina karebsindarur,” eboka molona ara kikib kubte. Kikib kubte bok, nunci ato eboka kum moloramoubwe. Ara, “Nun ukuramib to kunubkwaming,” tenen ato kuramoubwe.
Nun ab sun ab tonkwa kuramoubwe ba, nunci ato ebdeibmasoubwe. “Sun wa ina sulbalyi nang asi yina karebmunyei,” ebmasoubwe.
Sun kankan ara wa ina sulbalyi kun nang kunung ati nun kekebmoubwe. A nang ara yibinkirikoka yuk mabwe silib nang asi, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka arungnaming cok, diboka kuna kum nang kunung.

Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ati nunci ato ebdeibkwamib. “Sun kanya darab-darab eboka busul kuboka wa ibnaryok, sun dinyi asi yina teleb.” Uram ebdarab ebdeibibirok, nun Du Yesus Kristus si deib aryi nunci sun ato kuramingnyi nang ati ato wenebmab.
Ura, nun kwityabwe, sunci teleb dinyi kurandum ara tanglona kum uca iya kununa teleb.

A kerek sengna umbura ebdeibmasib uram asi kum kekebingnyi nang ati uram ton ebkwinsib. Sunci sun dib tenen nang yuk nang asi lak kibdeiboka, “Anyi bira nun Du Yesus Uram kum kekerur,” ena teleb. Sunci a nang aryi kisibdobdarur. Sun ab tonkwa kubmunyei. Alyi kibkwandur ati ato kubdarur.
Ato ebman bok, sunci a nang asi bimsa yarina mem. Erda, sunci, “Nun kwit,” teneboka abmunci, sun kanya namibdongoboka, “A uram asi kunubdum,” eboka wenebkwandarur.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira antanirdeirisina deyoknyi biryi sunsi tuba-tuba antanirdeirisina teleb. Antanirdeirisin dinyi utotoa asi Erci sunsi karesina teleb. Nun Du bira sun ab tonkwa kuna teleb.

Ni Paulus biryi ni taruk kobdob aryi kerek sekoka, “Ni kwityabwe,” ebmasin. Ni Paulus biryi a kerek sengna asi diboka kerek sekeibmasin bikwandum ati, sunci ni kerek sengnun to asi liliboka bikwandarur. Yuk kerek sengna ababyi ato kuboka sengnun. A deyok aryi, sunci, “Er Paulus biryi a kerek sengna asi kerek sekmou do? Yuknyi biryi kerek sekmou do?” tenen kankana kubsicei. Tonda, “A uram ara dib en uram do? Tola uram do?” tenen kankana kubsicei. Sunci niryi kerek sengnun to asing eibmamun ba, kankana kum kubkwansir. Erda, sunci, “Er Paulus biryi kerek sekmou,” tenen bikwandum.
Nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi sun nirya asi tanglona kum uca teleb kurdeirisina teleb.

Teleb ni kwit Timotius. Ni Paulus biryi a kerek sengna kerek sekeibkwinkin. Kanbabyi nun Du Yesus Kristus diboka dib tenerum ati, niryi kanti, “Ni eterena uram diboka kekenurur mi,” tenerankin. Ni Paulus bira nun Du biryi ebdeibmanou Uram Teleb asi ermuruboka lak eterenunyi kunun. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi ninyi Lemsurutnyi ab, nun Du Kristus Yesus nun dibde bunubnyi ab aryi takubdeibmanirei to, niryi Teleb Uram ermuruboka lak eterenunyi kunun. Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Kristus Yesus ab aryi Timotius kanti, “Nun mi,” tenen kisal dangkina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai ab, nun Du ab aryi kanti bico teneboka kan kanya asi teleb kurdeirikina teleb!

Timotius, kanda Efesus atei tuba kuna teleb. Ara, minob ura Makedonia mutuk binkwansiryi ebdeibmakise to, ukuryok tubto ebdeibmakin. Ara, niryi, “Efesus atei ara yuk nang aryi tola uram etereraming,” tenen deyok aryi niryi kansi, “Timotius, kanda Efesus atei a kubdum,” ebdeibmakin. Ati, kanci, “Tola uram eterena asi takdarur,” eboka sun Efesus nang atei kuramingnyi tola uram eteren nang asi wenebdum.

Ato eboka weneramin ci, a nang asi ato eboka wenenkwandum. “Malyi nunung eterena dinyi ara takdarur,” eboka eterenkwandum. Tonda, sun aibweyabwe aryi mi yal dangnamnyi deyok ababyi dirlilina mem. Ninyi aryi ato uram liliramingnyi ura, malyi deyok atikwe lulurdaraming. Ba, dib en uram ara diboka kum kekeboka Er Imtamnyi biryi dib tenena biriman aryi karesurur lemsin dinyi ara malyi kimsiniraming.

Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to ara lulurdana uram kuma. Erda, Erci, “Ninyi aryi yuk nang asi boukwe weik kubting,” tenen erdeirisurur. Ara, teleb kanya boboka abibiryi, “Malyi kun dinyi ara sirya bai donokmab,” tenebkwanub. Tonda, kanya wilimna kanya ara bai donokoka abibiryi, nunci Er Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebibiyi ura, yuk nang asi boukwe weik kibkwanub.
Ninyi ton nang ara sundamnyi wanikminikdanmai uca, ato tenen kanya tuba kum boraming. Erda, sunci malyi kubingiryok, talyi uram akwe etereraming ati ebman.

A nang ara sundamnyi bingna nang kiknirdanung ci, ato erdanung. “Er Musa biryi ebdeibmasou uram lilibde eterenub nang kunub,” erdaraming. Sunci akata kuboka ato erdaraming bok, sunda er Musa biryi ebdeibmasou uram deyok ara bita kum bingnung. A nang ara, “Musa Uram ara ato-ato kurur,” eraming asi, sunci etereramingnyi uram deyok ababyi bita kum bingnung.
Er Musa biryi ebdeibmasou uram ara teleb uram akwe kurur ara nun bingnub. Ara, er Musa Uram deyok asi diboka etereranting ura, a uram teleb akwe kurur.

Er Musa biryi ebdeibmasou uram ara sun Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunung nang asi tatab-tatab eboka kum wenesurur. Erda, sun malyi kun nang akwe tatab-tatab eboka wenerur. Ara, sun er Musa Uram yan yaniraming nang ab, sun kalingna nang uram asi kekena kum nang ab, sun Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun Nai,” tenen kum nang ab, sun malyi kuramingnyi nang ab asi er Musa Uram aryi tatab-tatab eboka wenerur. Tonda, sun, “Malyi kubkwan,” tenen kanya bon nang ab, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram teneina kum nang ab, sun nai sun kwin kobdoba asi oramingnyi nang ab, sun ninyi obmangnyi nang ab. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang nirya asi er Musa biryi ebdeibmasou uram aryi tatab-tatab eboka wenerur.

Tonda, sun ner sal talyi yordana nang ab, sun sal nang sun mamun yordana nang ab, sun, “Nun wa ibsiting,” tenen ninyi ukula boduknurban nang ab, sun tola uram en nang ab, sun yuk nang asi tola ati tatab-tatab en nang ab. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ababyi er Musa Uram aryi tatab-tatab eboka wenerur. Tonda sun yuk malyi kun dinyi kuboka dib eteren uram asi yan yaniramingnyi nang ababyi er Musa Uram aryi tatab-tatab eboka wenerur.

Teleb uram ara ninyi kanya berengdeirin uram ababyi ato eboka eteresurur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira Er si weik enubnyi biryi ni Paulus bisi a Teleb Uram asi ebdeibnou. Ara, “Teleb Uram ermuruboka lak eterebdum,” eboka Erci nisi arukmanou.

Ni Paulus biryi nun Du Kristus Yesus bisi, “Ei ni Du,” enun. Nun Du bira nisi mikib karenurutnyi biryi niti, “Busulnyi,” tenen, “Teleb Uram ermuruna eterebkwandur,” tenen tikeibmanou ati, niryi Ersi, “Ei ni Du,” enun.

Minob ura niryi nun Du Yesus bisi ina ngilingnanse asi, Erci nisi bico tenen teleb kubdeibnou. Tonda, niryi sun Ersi dib tenen nang asi, “Obkwan,” tenen domkiringnanse asi, Erci nisi teleb kubdeibmanou. Tonda, nira yu weik kuranse bok, nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi bico tenebmanou. Nira nun Du Yesus bisi dib kum teneransiryi, walwalnyi kuranse deyok aryi a malyi dinyi nirya kuranse. Ati, nun Du biryi niti, “Er walwal aryi malyi kuramwe,” tenen bico tenebnou ura, Erci nisi teleb kubdeibnou.

Nun Du biryi niti, “Ni mi,” tenen kisal dangna dinyi ilinto langdeiboka kareboka abnou ci, Erci nisi dib tenen kanya ton boukwe weik tenen kanya ton langdeiboka karebmanou. A dinyi ara nun Du Kristus Yesus biryok karesurur.

Niryi a ebkun uram ara ninyi nirya aryi kekeboka dib tenena teleb. Ara ato, nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi, “Malyi kun nang asi teleb kubdeiboka lebkwan,” tenen tukwetam yuryanmasou. A malyi kun nang kankan ara ni Paulus bira bisibkaboka iya malyi kun dinyi ilinto kuransinyi kunun.

Nira iya malyi kunanyi kuranse bok, nun Du Yesus biryi nisi bico tenebmanou. Nun Du biryi teneiboka iya malyi kunanyi bisi telebnyi bito kubdeibmanou. Ara, ninyi nirya aryi, “Nun Du bira sun iya malyi kun nang ababyi ola u kum dokom erur,” tenen bikwamnyi ati, Erci ni iya malyi kuransinyi bisi bico tenebmanou. Tonda, sun aminda kubkwamnyi nang ababyi ni kunun to diliboka dib tenebingnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi ab tonkwa kuboka iya kam kubkwamnyi ati, Erci nisi minob bico tenebmanou.

Ati, nun Nai Iya Erebdobnyi bira nun kalingsurutnyi bisi si weik ena teleb. Minob yuma kobdob talak aryi kuboka aminda sirya kobdob talak ababyi Erci nunsi kalingsurur. Erda dibman kumnyi kurur ci, iya kam kurur. Nun Nai bira ninyi asing aryi eirina kumnyi kurur. Nun Nai Er kikwa iya mikibnyi kurur. Ato eboka nunci nun Nai bisi si weik ebkwayeb. Ukuryok aryi kuboka aminda sirya kobdob talak ababyi Ersi si weik erena teleb. Amin.

Timotius ni mi, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram minob bikoka ermururaming nang aryi kan deyok ati minob ebdeiankei to asi, kanya teneibdemin ci, diboka kunubdum tenen ati ebmakin. Ara, kanda yin doun nang aryi ilil asa kum uca sun ordana nang asi bisik sengnaming to, kanbabyi ilil asa kum uca sun tola uram eteren nang asi bisik sekdum. Ati, kanci nun Du Kristus Yesus bisi milibmin ci, a dib en uram asi teneiboka talebnurubdobmin ci, sun tola uram eteren nang asi bisik sekdum.

Bisik sekmin ci, kanci tanglona kum uca dib en uram asi dib tenebmin ci, teleb akwe kubkwandum. Ati, kanci kandamnyi biti, “Malyi kun dinyi bai donokman,” tenen tuba-tuba bikdankwandim ati, kanci teleb akwe kubkwandum. Ninyi ton nang ara dib teneamnyi ani, dangubokmai uca, “Teleb dinyi ara tuba ukuna nun li,” tenebyi ura, sunci dib uram dib tenena ababyi nirya taklobyi.

A wanikminikdanmai nang kankan ara ninyi si Himeneus ab, Aleksander ab ton kuranding. A nang ara dib tenen dinyi nirya asi taklobmarei ura, Er Imtamnyi si ab nun Du Yesus si ab asi ina ngilikmarei. Ba, ni Paulus biryi a nang bitinyi asi, “Iblis taruk dam karebse ara sunci ina ngilingnanding dinyi asi taklobtiring,” tenebmasiryi, sun dib tenen nang kankan aryi kuboka yakdonoksiryi, isa sienyi si Iblis taruk dam karebmase.

Yuma kobdob ebdeibkun uram asi kan kekerum. Sun dib tenen nang aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi moloramingiryi, sunci ninyi nirya ati diboka molormilina teleb. Ninyi nirya ati teneiboka molormiliramingiryi, sunci miliboka, “Ei nun Nai,” ena asi luba kibingnyei.

Sun weik sien nang ati kanya teneiboka molormilina teleb. Tonda, sun ninyi kalingna nang yuk nang ababyi molormilina teleb. Ara, “Nun sien nang telebto kalingsitingnyi uca, nun nirya ara antaniboka teleb akwe kubtibyi,” tenebibiryi, nunci nun sien nang ati molormilina teleb. Ura, teleb akwe kubibiryi, nunci Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsurur to nirya kunuboka kerebmasin kum dinyi kununa teleb. Ato tenebibiryi, nunci nun sien nang ati molormilina teleb.
Ato eboka molormilina ara teleb akwe kurur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi ninyi Lemsurutnyi biryi ato molona asi kekebmaci ura, Er kanya kilkil kubkwandur.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ninyi nirya asi lebdobtinyi,” tenesurur. Tonda, Erci, “Ninyi yuk-yuk aryi bikdobtingiryi, dib en uram dib tenebting,” tenesurur. A deyok aryi nunda dib tenen nang aryi ninyi nirya ati molormilina teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi bikwa iya mikibnyi kurur. Tonda, Nun Du Kristus Yesus bikwa ninyi kan Er Imtamnyi kan noutam kuboka mururdeirisurutnyi kurur. Nun Du tentoknyi bira ninyi kimdanmounyi biryi nunda tukwetam nang ab Er Imtamnyi ab asi antanirdeirisurur.

Nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi, “Ninyi nirya leboka teleb kubdeibtinyi,” tenen, “Obningnyi ababyi ni teleb,” tenebmou ura, dibmou. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi takubdeibmou to, nun Du biryi, “Ninyi nirya lebtinyi,” tenen dibmou. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukuryok ara teleb uki tum kurur,” tenesurur ci, Er tenen kanya ara, “Ninyi nirya asi Er Kristus Yesus biriman aryi lebtinyi,” tenen kanya asi nunsi lak kimdeirisurur.

Ninyi nirya a uram kekebwaming ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi ni Paulus bisi, “Ni uram ermuruboka lak eterebde barandum,” eboka tikeibnou. Ara, niryi sun Yahudi yala kum nang yuk-yuk asi eterebkwan ati, Erci nisi tikeibnou. Ara, niryi, “Nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenebdarur,” eboka, “Dib en uram diboka kekebdarur,” eboka eterebkwan ati, Erci nisi takubdeibnou. Tola kuma. Er Imtamnyi biryi ato eboka tikeibnou.

Ura, sun dib tenen nang dantam-dantam kuramunyi nang aryi, “Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molobkwayeb,” tenen atei yuk-yuk buluboka wekmamun ci, Er Imtamnyi bisi molobkwamamunyi ura, ato kubkwandarur. Sun sal nang aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi molobkwamangnyi ura, sunci, “Malyi dinyi kubkwan,” tenen kanya bobingnyei. Tonda, “Lulubtinyi,” tenen kanya bobingnyei. Erda, sunci, “Malyi kun dinyi ara sirya bai donokman,” teneboka sun taruk lakoka erebdeibingiryi, Er Imtamnyi si weik eboka molona teleb.

Ura, “Sun dib tenen nerabwe ara una kuboka kubkwaming do?” tenen dinyi ara niryi uram ton ebkwan. Kweirya amuma-amuma dobingnyei ati ebman. Ara, emas aryi kiknin dinyi ton, dengna weik keil yuk dinyi ababyi kweirya dobingnyei. Tonda, dengna weik dekmai ci, ongon aling ababyi ongobingnyei. Tonda, “Ni kisok otong asi una kuboka bitabdeibkwan do?” tenen akwe kubingnyei. Ati, sun nerabwe ara, “Teleb-teleb kubibyi uca, sal nang kanya ara nunsi kanya nunungte,” tenebingnyei.
Erda, sun nerabwe ara, “Er Imtamnyi bisi milinun,” eboka lak eramingnyi nerabwe kikniboka, “Er Imtamnyi biryi niti teleb tenebnuti,” tenen Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsurur to kununa teleb.
Sun nerabwe ara, “Bikdobtibyi,” tenebingiryi, sun sal nang ati, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen sun sal nang aryi eterebkwamingnyi dib en uram asi kekena teleb.

Ni Paulus bira, “Nerabwe ara sal asi dib en uram eterebingnyei,” ebmasin. Tonda, nerabwe ara sal asi, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka arukingnyei. Nerabwe ara uram kilikoka dib en uram asi kekebde buna teleb.

Er Imtamnyi biryi yuma kobdob talak aryi nun aibwe Adam ab nun tat Hawa ab asi kiknibmou. Ara, sal asi minob kiknibmou ura, ner ara aminda kiknibmou. A deyok aryi niryi, “Nerabwe ara sal asi dib en uram eterebingnyei,” ebman.

Tonda, isa sienyi Iblis biryi, “Sakeibtinyi,” tenen tola uram ebmou ura, Adam biryi er uram minob kum dobdobmou. Erda, er ner Hawa biryi tola uram minob dobdobmou ci, Er Imtamnyi Uram ara yan yanibmou. A deyok aryi, niryi, “Nerabwe ara sal nang asi eteren uram eterebingnyei,” ebman.

Ato kurur bok, nerabwe ara mi mundu boboka mi deibingnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi lebkwande. Ara, tanglona kun uca Er Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebingiryi, sun yuk nang asi boukwe weik kubingnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nerabwe ababyi teleb kubdeibkwande. Ara, “Nidamnyi kalikdandobkwan,” tenebingiryi Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsurur to kunubingnyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi nerabwe ababyi teleb kubdeibkwande.
“Sun dib tenen nang kalingna wa ara teleb wa kurur. Unanyi biryi, ‘Sun dib tenen nang asi kalingnanyi kibtinyi,’ tenebdinyi bira teleb wa ingkiringdur.” A dib en uram ara tola uram kuma.

A deyok aryi sun dib tenen nang asi kalikwamingnyi nang ara teleb kun nang akwe wibdeibkwanung. Ner tentok don nang akwe sun dib tenen nang asi kalikwanung. Tonda, yu uram minola kum eramingnyi nang akwe tikeibkwanung. Tonda, “Nidamnyi bibabyi kalikdankwan,” tenen nang aryi sun dib tenen nang asi kalingna teleb. Ara, sun yuk nang aryi sunti, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen nang akwe sun dib tenen nang asi kalingna teleb. Sun dib tenen nang asi kalikwamingnyi nang ara ninyi du dongon nang kubingiryi, dib en uram eterena ati diboka bikting. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang akwe tikeibkwanung.

Anggur me ilinto yirandinyi bira tingdeina mem. Tonda, “Yu uram ebtinyi,” tenen kanya borandinyi bibabyi tikeibmunyei. Erda, namin kanya bon nang ab, ninyi lemdeirin nang ab akwe tingdeirina teleb. Tonda, “Co bok ilinto talebtinyi,” tenen kum nang asi tingdeirina teleb.

Sun ner mabwe kobdob asi diboka kalingnamingnyi nang ara sun dib tenen nang asi kalingna teleb. Sun mabwe nermabwe aryi, “Nun nai,” teneboka sun nai uram diboka kekeramingnyi nang asi tingdeirina teleb.

Sun ner mabwe kobdob asi diboka kum kalingnamingnyi nang ara sun dib tenen nang asi kalikwaming do? Ato tenen kum. Sun ner mabwe kobdob asi diboka kalingna kum kuramingnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi mabwe ababyi diboka kum kalingkwanung ati ebman.

Tonda, Nun Du Kristus Yesus bisi ukuryok dib tenebmarinyi bibabyi tingdeina mem. Ara, “Ukuryok milibmarinyi bisi tikeibibyi asi windaranci uca, isa sienyi Iblis biryi minob sakeibmou to tubto minola sakeibcei,” tenen ukuryok dib tenebmarinyi bira tingdeina mem.

Sun dib tenen nang ab sun dib tenen kum nang ababyi sunti, “Nun nai,” eramingnyi nang akwe tikeibkwandarur. Ara, “Sun dib tenen kum nang aryi, ‘Anyi malinyi,’ eboka tatab-tatab ebing uca, Iblis biryi minola sakeibcei,” tenebmun cok, ninyi nirya aryi sunti, “Nun naiyabwe,” eramingnyi nang akwe tikeibkwandarur.

Ara, sunci, “Sun utotoa kum nang asi bongkaren nang asi tikeibkwayeb,” ebdamunyi ura, sunci neiktoto teleb kun nang akwe wibdeibmun ci, tikeibkwandarur. Ara, yuk nang aryi sunti, “Nun naiyabwe,” teneramingnyi nang akwe tingdeirina teleb. Wiliboka kanya bon nang asi tikeibmunyei. Tonda, anggur me ilinto yin nang ababyi tikeibmunyei. Tonda, “Co bok ilinto labtalebtinyi,” tenen nang ababyi tikeibmunyei.

Erda, dib en uram asi diboka taleramingnyi nang asi tikeibkwandarur. Ara, minob ura kum bingnamoubwe uram ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ukuryok lak kibsou uram asi diboka taleramingnyi nang asi wibdeiboka tikeibkwandarur. A nang ara sun kanya aryi, “Malyi kun dinyi bai donokman,” tenebdandoka teleb dinyi akwe kuramingnyi ura, ur wibdeiboka tikeibkwandarur.

Sun utotoa kum nang asi bongkaren nang asi tingdeirina kabul talak ara sun dib tenen nang aryi sun tikeibkwamingnyi nang kuramingnyi to diblilibkwanung. Sun malyi deyok ton kum ura, sun dib tenen nang aryi sunti, “Nun kalingna nang wa ur irmilibnung,” ebingnyi ura, a nang asi tingdeirina teleb.

Sun utotoa kum nang asi bongkaren nang nerabwe neiktoto ara yuk nang aryi, “Nun kwin,” teneramingnyi nerabwe akwe kubkwanung. A nerabwe ara, “Yuk nang asi sakeibtibyi,” tenen talakdona mem. Erda, sundamnyi kalikdandoka busul akwe kuboka milibkwanung.

Sun utotoa kum nang asi bongkaren nang ara ner tentok doamingyi nang akwe kubkwanung. Ner bitinyi don nang asi tikeibmunyei. Tonda, a nang ara, “ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka sun mining ner mabwe asi diboka kalikwanung.

Sun busul kuboka dirnilina nang ati ninyi nirya aryi, “Teleb kun nang,” ebkwaming. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ara alyi kum kubkwande. Erda, sunci yuk nang asi, “Nun Du Kristus Yesus bisi dib tenenun,” eboka abingiryi, ilil kum asa aryi Teleb Uram eterebkwaming.
Ni kwit Timotius, “Nira kan dam minola yatinyi,” tenebman ci, niryi kansi, “Ato-ato kubdum,” eboka a kerek sengna biriman aryi ebdeibmakin.

Ara, ni ola kum yanyi ura, Timotius kanci ni ebdeibkwaman uram bikoka abmin ci, “Sun dib tenen nang kankan asi una kuboka kubkwanub do?” tenen bikwandim ati, kerek sekeibmakin. Nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi dib tenen nang ara Er Imtamnyi ai ato kunub. Er Imtamnyi bira nun kankan asi iya kurur ati ato ebman. Nunda er iya kam kurutnyi biryi nabsou nang ara Er Imtamnyi ai ato kunub. Nunda Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou dib uram asi erebdeiboka diboka talenub ati ebman.

Ura, nun dib tenenub uram deyok ara diboka, “Naie,” tenen dinyi kurur. A uram deyok ara minob talak ara kum bingdamoubwe asi, Er Imtamnyi biryi ukuryok aryi lak kibdeibsou. Ara, nun Du Kristus Yesus deyok ati Erci nunsi lak kibdeibsou. Nun Du deyok ati lak kibdeibsou uram ara ninyi tentok ababyi, “Tola uram aca,” ebman kum. Erda, dib en uram akwe kurur. Nun dib tenena uram deyok ara ato eboka lak enub,
“Nun Du bira ninyi kibdandoka Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou.
‘Erda malyi kun kumnyi kurur,’ eboka Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi lak kibdeibsou.
Erda Erdamnyi lak kibdamunyi bisi sun Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang aryi asing eibmai.
Nun Du uram Teleb Uram eterebde baramnyi ba, sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang nirya kekeramnyi.
Ba, nun Du bisi sun im dangna tukwe dangna nang aryi dib tenenung.
Nun Du bisi nun Nai biryi boweleboka imtam ai erebdeibmou,” enub.

Sirya kobdob talak ara ninyi ton nang aryi dib uram dib teneramingnyi ani, dib tenena dinyi taklobkwaming. A nang ara tola uram taleboka isa aryi kikniboka eterena uram akwe milibkwaming. Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara a dinyi minob bingdurnyi biryi ebdaraboka ato eteresurur.
A nang ara wiliboka kanya bobingiryi, tola uram akwe eterebkwaming. Dib en uram nirya asi singirdeiriramingnyi uca, sunci, “Tola uram eterenub ababyi malyi dinyi kum kunub,” tenebde kunung.

A nang ara, “Ner dona mem,” eboka etereraming. Tonda, “Yuk-yuk yina yina mem,” eboka etereraming. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi yina nirya kiknibmou ura, ninyi karebsou asi, a nang aryi, “Yina mem,” eboka etereraming. Ato eboka etereraming bok, nunda dib tenen nang aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi karebsou yina utotoa asi ur yibkwanub ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi dib en uram diboka bingnub ci, dib tenenub nang ati, “Yina-yina ur yinub,” tenesurur. Ara, nunci Ersi, “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kibdobibyi ura, ur yinkwamoubwe ati, nun Nai biryi yina-yina nirya karebmasou.

Er Imtamnyi biryi kiknibmou dinyi nirya ara teleb dinyi akwe kiknibmou. Erci kiknibmou dinyi ara ninyi aryi “Yina mem,” ena mem. Er Imtamnyi bisi “Ei nun Nai,” eboka kibdobibiryi, yina-yina nirya asi yin dinyi ara mem ton kum kurur.

Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Yina ur yibdarur,” ebmou deyok aryi, yina-yina nirya ara ur yibkwanub. Tonda, nunci yibkubyi ura, Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Ei nun Nai,” enub deyok aryi yina nirya ara mem dinyi ton kum kusurur.

Ni kwit Timotius, kanci a ebdeibman uram asi ebmurubmin ci, ner dona deyok ton, yina-yina ur yina deyok ton ati, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” eboka kanci nun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi wenebdum. Ato kubminyi uca, kanda nun Du Kristus Yesus Er wa irmilinanyi diboka kubkwandum. Nun dib teneramib Teleb Uram ara kanbabyi diboka kunurandim eterena uram asi kanci tuba-tuba teneiriramin ci, nun Du Yesus wa ibmilibdum.
Ura, nunung uram ab ninyi wise kikniramnyi kwemdina uram ab ara kekebminyei. Erda, kanci busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi Uram tuba-tuba teneibdeboka kununkwandum.

Sun olahraga don nang ara olahraga tuba-tuba doramingnyi uca, sun nong mikib kurande. Ato kuboka nunda dib tenen nang kuramib to ara neiktoto kunub. Nunci Er Imtamnyi Uram asi tuba-tuba teneibdeboka kunuramibyi uca, nun dib tenen kanya ara mikib kubkwansurur. Ura, olahraga kimna ara teleb dinyi kurur bok, Er Imtamnyi Uram asi tuba-tuba kununa ara iya teleb dinyi kurur. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Uram asi tuba-tuba kunuramibyi ura, ukuryok talak ababyi teleb akwe kuramibyi ani, aminda diamibyi talak ababyi teleb akwe kubkwamib.
A ebne uram ara dib en uram asi ebman ati, ninyi nirya aryi a uram asi dib teneboka dorona teleb.

A deyok aryi a uram asi teneibibiryi, nunci tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi arungsurur to asi kununub. Ara, “Er Imtamnyi diboka kam kurutnyi biryi teleb kubdeibkwansir,” tenen nunci busul kuboka, “Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunubtibyi,” tenen wa ina weik iramib. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi nirya ati, “Lebtinyi,” tenerur ci, Erci nunda sun Ersi dib tenen nang asi yuma udikum deiboka lemsurur.
Ni kwit Timotius, kanci a ebdeibmakin wenena uram nirya asi lak eboka etererandum.

Ninyi tentok ababyi kansi ina ngilikicei. Ninyi tentok ababyi kanti, “Kamnyi bica,” tenen kan eterebkwandim uram bai donokcei. Erda, kan teleb ukuraminyi to asing eibkingiryi, sunci, “Nunbabyi miliboka teleb dinyi ukubkwayeb,” ena teleb. Ati, kanci uram ton ebkwamaminyi ura, teleb uram akwe ebkwandum. Tonda, kanci sun yuk nang asi teleb akwe kubdeibkwandum. Tonda, kanci busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsurur to kunubkwandum. Tonda kanci utotota malyi tenen dinyi bai donokoka teleb dinyi akwe teneibde ukunkwandum.

Ni kum yanmanyi talak ara kanci ato kunkwandum. Sun dib tenen nang aryi kekeraminyi ura, Timotius kanda tanglona kum kuboka Er Imtamnyi Uram minob kerek sekamnyi uram asi nukmurubde barandum. Kanci sun dib tenen nang asi tuba-tuba yan memeramin ci, “Ato-ato kuna teleb,” eboka etererandum.

Er Imtamnyi biryi Er uram ebdeibmou to, sun dib tenen nang kalingna nang aryi ebmuruboka Timotius kanti, “Er Imtamnyi wa ibkwandum,” ebmakei. A ebmurubmakei uram ara kanci luba kibminyei. Tonda, sun kalingna nang aryi kanti, “Er Imtamnyi biryi Er mikib karebkwande,” tenebmai ci, sun taruk kan deici deibdongoboka kisal karebmakei dinyi ara luba kibminyei. Ati, kanci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi Er mikib karebnou,” tenen Er Imtamnyi biryi takubdeibnou wa asi diboka kunubkwandum.
Kanci a nirya bita dibniliboka busul kuboka a ebmanto nirya kunubkwandum. Ba, ninyi nirya aryi kanti, “Er Imtamnyi wa telebto irmilirur,” tenen ato bikwanking ati kubkwandum.

Ni kwit Timotius, kanci, “Teleb dinyi akwe kubkwan,” tenen kandamnyi kalikdarum. Tonda, “Dib en uram akwe eterebkwan,” tenen kan silalum kalikdarum. Tanglona kum uca ato kuraminyi ura, kanci kandamnyi ababyi lebdandoka kan eterena uram asi kekebkwamingnyi nang ababyi lebdeibkwandim.

Timotius, kanci sun wise nang asi wenenmaminyi ura, yu uram eboka kerebminyei. Erda kanci, “Ni naiyabwe,” tenen namin uram aryi eboka abmin ci, yan memebkwandum. Tonda, sun kam nang ati kanci neiktoto, “Ni kwityabwe,” tenen namin uram eboka yan memebkwandum.

Ba, sun wise nerabwe ara kanci, “Ni kwinyabwe,” tenebmin ci, yan memebkwandum. Tonda, sun kam nerabwe ara, “Ni malnerabwe,” tenen namin uram aryi eboka abmin ci, yan memebkwandum. Ara, “Kerebmanin kum to kubniryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenen dinyi akwe kunubkwan,” teneramin cok, yan memebkwandum.
Sun sulyi nerabwe ati, “Ni kwinyabwe,” tenebmin ci, sun ataranci tok kareboka dibnilibkwandum. Sun diboka ataranci nerabwe ara ersi kalikoka kubmanto mi iya ton kum nerabwe ati ato ebman.

Bok, sun mabwe nermabwe ab tonkwa kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara dibnilibminyei. Erda, sun sulyi nerabwe deiamingnyi mabwe nermabwe ara sun kwinyabwe wise dangnyi ura, sunci sun kwinyabwe asi dibnilibkwanung. Tonda, sun sulyi nerabwe mabwe aryi mabwe wise dangnyi ura, sunci sun tat bisi dibnilibkwanung. Kanda Timotius biryi sunsi ato etereboka, “Sunci sun kwinyabwe sun tatyabwe sun ataranci tok kareboka diboka dibnilibdarur,” eboka eterebdum. Ebmin ba, kanci ato eboka eterebdum. “‘Nun mitik talak ara nun kwinyabwe aryi nunsi dirniliransei ati, ukuryok ara sun wise sirya danmang ura, nunci sunsi dibnilibkwayeb,’ tenebkwandarur. Ato kubmunyi uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi, ‘Ei ni mabwe,’ tenebkwansurur.” Ato eboka eterebkwandum.

Ba, sun kalikoka dibnilibmanto mabwe iya ton kum kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara, “Unanyi biryi nisi kalikwanir do?” tenen Er Imtamnyi bikwe dibde bunung. Ato kun nerabwe ara, “Er Imtamnyi biryi yina karebsute,” tenen kitingtam lukunda nirya molonung. Ati, sun ato kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara kanci, “Ni kwinyabwe,” tenen sun ataranci tok karebkwandum.

Bok, sun Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde buna kum sulyi nerabwe ara sunci, “Ni kanya teleb teneranyi tok akwe kubkwan,” teneraming. Sun ato kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara tukwetam dinyi akwe teneraming ati, malyi kuraming. Sun nong ara kam tuba kuramingnyi bok, sun kanya ara sirya diaminyi nerabwe kuramingiryi.
Ati, Timotius, kanci sunsi ato eboka wenenkwandum. “Malyi dinyi tentok ababyi ukubmunyei. Erda, kerebmasin kum to kuboka teleb dinyi akwe kubdarur,” eboka wenenkwandum.

Bok, unanyi-unaner aryi dib tenen nang ner sal sun dam kuramingnyi nang asi kum dirniliramingnyi nang ara malyi dinyi kuramingiryi. Tonda, unanyi-unaner aryi dib tenen ner sal sun mining ai ninyi asi kum dibnilibmingnyi ura, anyi kum a ner kum ara iya malyi kunung. Sun ato kun nang ara nun taleramib dib en uram asi bai donongnun ci, kunung ati ebman. Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram kum bingdamingnyi nang ara malyi kunung cok, sun mining mabwe ai ninyi asi dirnilinung. Bok, dib tenen nang aryi sun mining mabwe nermabwe asi kum dibnilibingyi nang ara bisibkaboka iya malyito dinyi kunung ci.

Ura, “Sulyi nerabwe asi yina kareboka dibnilibkwayeb,” tenen sun si yuk-yuk kerek sengna teleb. Kerek sekwamamunyi ura, sulyi nerabwe ena atikwe sun si nirya kerek sekmunyei. Erda, sun ninyi tentok doamingnyi nerabwe asi sun kwalina ara enam puluh baryi sirya kwaliamingnyi nerabwe akwe kerek sekwandarur.

Ara, ninyi nirya aryi, “A ner ara teleb dinyi kun akwe kurur,” ebingnyi ura, sun ato kuramingnyi nerabwe asi si sekoka abmun ci, dirnilina teleb. Ara, sun mabwe nermabwe diboka kalikoka nerdeiramingnyi nerabwe ab, sun yuk nang asi du dongoramingnyi nerabwe ab, sun luknubdob kanya boboka sun dib tenen nang yuk nang asi dirniliramingnyi nerabwe ab, sun mambul kun nang asi dirniliramingnyi nerabwe ab, sun teleb dinyi yuk-yuk diboka kuramingnyi nerabwe ab asi si sekoka dibnilibkwandarur. Sun ato kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara sunsi kalingna mabwe kum kuramingnyi asi sun dib tenen nang aryi yina kareboka dibnilibkwanung.

Sun ninyi dobmanto sulyi nerabwe ara si dongoryangangnyi ababyi si kerek sengna mem. Sun ninyi dobmanto nerabwe ara ninyi ur dobkwanung. Ninyi kum dobmangnyi ura, sunci, “Ninyi kum dobkwan ati, nira nun Du Yesus bikwa milibkwan,” eamingiryok, tola ati ebloboka aminda ara sun kanya danguci ura, “Ninyi dobnute,” tenebkwanung ati si kerek sengna mem.
A nerabwe ara, “Ninyi kum dobkwan,” eboka katabum uram ebmai ani, aminda aryi sun uram ebloboka sal doramingiryi deyok aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi karebkwande wenen dinyi dobdobkwaming.

Tonda, ninyi dobmanto sulyi nerabwe ara ninyi kum dobingnyi ura, ninyi ai yubwa talyi wekirikingnyei. Ato kubkirikoka sunci talyi uram ebingnyei, tonda yuk nang ati talakdobingnyei. Sulyi nerabwe ara ai yubwa talyi wekirikingiryi, sunci sun yuk nang deyok asi dodeibdandoka, “Ato-ato kubdarur,” ebingnyei. Tonda, ebman kum dinyi asi ebkirikingnyei.

A deyok aryi, niryi sun ninyi dobmanto sulyi nerabwe ati, “Ninyi ur dobkwanung,” ebman. Ura, ninyi doboka mabwe deibting ura, sunci sun mining mabwe silib kalingna teleb. Ato kubingnyi uca, sun nunti, “Malyi uram ebtibyi,” tenesunung nang aryi tatab-tatab kum ebsiting.
Ton sulyi nerabwe ara dib uram asi deibloboka isa sienyi Iblis uram asi milibmai ci, sirya wanikminikdanmai.

Sun dib tenen nerabwe ati ato ebdeibkwan. Sun duner kum, sun weitner kum asi ara sulyi ner kuranci ura, er ai ninyi aryi kwaning kareboka dibnilibkwanung. “Sun dib tenen nang yuk nang aryi ni kwin kum, ni duner kum, ni weitner kum asi dirnilina teleb,” teneboka ikin bobingnyei. Erda, er mining ai ninyi aryi dibnilibkwanung. Ba, sun dib tenen nang aryi dibnilibkwamingnyi sulyi nerabwe ara sun dibnilibmanto nang iya ton kum kuramingnyi sulyi nerabwe asi sun dib tenen nang aryi dibnilibkwanung.

Sun dib tenen nang asi busul kuboka kalingnamingnyi nang ati sun dib tenen nang aryi, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen dengna bitinyi dinyi tabakoka karebkwanung. Sun ninyi kalingna nang kankan asi dib uram etereraming nang ati adikum ebman.
Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi ato eboka eteresurur.
“Bisam sapi ara gandum du yan yanisitaboka kala longnande bisam ara gandum du ur yibkwandur. Er ungar ara aling kolo aryi tunirdeirin kum. A sapi ara wa irande ati, ur yibkwandur.”
Tonda, “Wa inanyi bira dengna kikib dorona teleb.” Ato kuboka sun dib tenen nang asi busul kuboka kalingnamingnyi nang aryi dengna kikib doronkwanung ati ebman.
Ninyi tentok aryi kalingnanyi bisi tatab-tatab ebci asi kanci dib tenebminyei. Ninyi bitinyi kum winiryi kum “Dib,” eboka tatab-tatab ebingnyi uca, er deyok asi lilibkwandum.

Sun malyi kubmangnyi dinyi asi kum taklobmangnyi ura, kanci dib tenen nang ab dib tenen nang kalingna nang ababyi wenebkwandum. Ara, sun dib tenen nang bulubmangnyi urasintam aryi tikeiboka kanci a nang asi wenebkwandum. Sun dib tenen nang nirya aryi ilil kuboka, “Malyi dinyi nirya asi bai donokwan,” tenebkwaming ati ato kubkwandum.

Kanda Timotius biryi a ebdeibman uram asi diboka kununa teleb. Nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Kristus Yesus ab aryi a ebdeibmakin uram asi kekebmaniring. Tonda, sun Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang ababyi kekebmaning. Ati, kanci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi wenebnicei,” tenen a ebdeibmakin uram taklobminyei. Ati, kanci, “Ni kwit bica,” tenen kanya akwe boboka teleb kubdeibminyei. Tonda, kanci, “Malinyi bica,” tenen kanya akwe boboka wenebminyei. Erda, kanci, “Ninyi urasin kum wibkwan,” tenen kanya bobmin ci, sun dib tenen nang asi diboka kalikwandum.

“Sun dib tenen nang asi kaliktinyi,” ebmangnyi nang asi minola tikeibmunyei. Kanci bingna kum dinyi kubmin cok, malinyi bisi tikeibmunyi ura, ninyi aryi kanda ersi tikeibmaminyi bibabyi kerebkingnyei tenen ato ebman. Kanci tanglona kum uca, malyi tenen dinyi nirya bai donokmin ci, teleb dinyi akwe kununa teleb.

Ni kwit Timotius, kanda me sirik dem yina ara mem. Erda anggur du yung me ton mitikanun tabakdongobmin ci, yibkwandum. Ba, kan mundu u yirankir dinyi ab yuk yun talerankir dinyi ab asi kwetebkwankir ati anggur du yung me mitikanun tabakdongoboka yina teleb.

Sun malyi kun nang ati uram ton ebkwinkin. Ton nang malyi kun dinyi ara minola lak kubmar. Sun malyi deyok lilin nang aryi a nang deyok lilibmang kum uca, sun malyi kun dinyi laktoto kurur. Ura, yuk nang malyi kun dinyi ara aminda aryi lak kubkwande. Ara, sun malyi deyok lilin nang aryi sirya lilibmang ani, a nang malyi deyok lak kibwande.

Ato kuboka, ninyi aryi teleb kun nang neiktoto kurur. Ton nang aryi teleb kuramingnyi dinyi ara ninyi nirya aryi bingnaming. Ba, sun yuk nang aryi teleb kuramingnyi dinyi ara ninyi aminda aryi lak kubkwande. Lak kum kuranci teleb kun dinyi ababyi malyi kun dinyi ababyi iya inibmanto kum kurur. Erda aminda lak kibkwande.

Sun ikin wa bon nang kankan asi dib tenebingnyi nang ara sun wa arungdeirisingnyi nang asi ina ngilina mem. Erda, sunci sun arungdeirisina nang yuk-yuk asi, “Nun nai,” tenen er uram kunubkwanung. Ba, “Nun arungdeirisinanyi bisi ina ngilikeibyi ura, sun dib tenena kum nang aryi Er Imtamnyi si ina ngilikingnyei,” tenebkwanung. Tonda, sun ikin wa bon nang ara, “Sun dib tenena kum nang aryi dib eterena uram ati malyi uram ebingnyei,” tenen sun arungdeirisina nang uram asi diboka kekebkwanung.

Sun arungdeirisinanyi bibabyi nun Du Kristus Yesus milinanyi kuranci ura, sun er uram kekeboka kunubde wa iramingnyi nang aryi ersi ina ngilikingnyei. Ara, “Nun arungdeirisinanyi bibabyi nuntonyi kurur ati, nunci erti, ‘Nun nai,’ tenebibyei,” ebingnyei. Erda, sunci boukwe weik kiboka, “Nun nai bibabyi Kristus milinanyi kurur ati, nunci kilkil kuboka er wa asi ibmilibkwayeb,” tenena teleb. Dib tenenanyi wa irmilinung ati, sunci busul dinyi tabakoka wa ibkwanung. A ebne uram ara Timotius kanci weneboka eterebkwandum.

Ura, unanyi-unaner aryi ninyi etereramingiryi, nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi eteresurur Teleb Uram to kum etereramingnyi ura, anyi-aner ara wingdana akwe kurur. Unanyi-unaner aryi nun dib teneramib eterena uram asi deibloboka yuk uram asi eterebci ura, walwal akwe kurur. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ara, “Yuk nang ab talyi deyok asi liliboka lulurdana uram ebdatibyi,” tenen malyi kuraming. Lulurdana uram etereramingnyi uca, sun uram kekebmangnyi nang ara sun kanya dam yu bobdandoka sun mamun lulurdaraming. Tonda, tonyi biryi yuknyi bisi, “Malinyi,” tuba-tuba tenerdaraming. Tonda, talyi ati, “Malinyi,” ebdandoka tatab-tatab ebdaraming.

A nang ara lulurdana akwe kuramingiryi, iya malyi kanya boboka tola uram akwe taleraming. A nang ara, “Er Imtamnyi bisi milinub,” ebingiryok, “Ninyi aryi co bok ab yuk bona bon dinyi ab ilinto ton dekoka karebsiting,” teneraming.
Er Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenesurur to diboka kunubibyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi iya teleb dinyi ara ninyi kanya kilkil kurdeirin dinyi karesurur. Ato ebman asi tukwetam bona asi kum ebman.

Nun kwinyabwe aryi nunsi yuk-yuk asi mundu boboka deibmasei ura, nunda nong dem deibmasei ara bona bon dinyi utotoa ara ton kum boyanmoubwe. Ani, aminda dibkwamibyi talak ababyi neiktoto kubkwamib. Nun dibmabyi ura, tukwetam bona utotoa ara ton kum bobinkwayeb.
A deyok aryi nunci, “Bona labtalebtibyi,” tenebibyei. Erda, nun ataransici tok yina ab ongon aling ab sirya nun taruk dam kuransici ura, nunci, “Nun kanya kilkil kubmasir,” tenena teleb.

Nunda ato tenebkwamab bok, sun “Bona ilinto labtalebtinyi,” tenebmangnyi nang ara ola sakwaming. Ara, “Bona bon dinyi labtalebtinyi,” tenena akwe kuramingiryi, bikdob dinyi ara kanya kum teneirdena kum uca, sunci sundamnyi iya mambul dinyi boyankwaming.

“Co bok labtalebtinyi,” tenena deyok aryi, malyi kun dinyi yuk dinyi ilinto anarur. Ton ninyi mikbaryi nang ara, “Co bok labtalebtinyi,” tenebmai uca, dib en uram asi deibloboka wanikminikdanmai. Ura, sunci sundamnyi mambul weik dinyi bobminikdanmai.

Sun yuk ara ato kunung bok, Timotius kan Er Imtamnyi bisi milinanyi kurum ati, kanci a nang aryi malyi kuraming to ara ukubminyei. Erda, kanci, “Malyi kun dinyi bai donokwan,” tenebmin ci, busul kuboka Er Imtamnyi kanya teleb kurdeirin dinyi akwe kunubdum. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi aruksou uram asi kunubdum. Tonda, kanci nun Du Yesus bisi dib teneramin ci, sun yuk nang asi boukwe kimnandum. Tonda, mambul dinyi kan dam yangakici ababyi, kanci katabum kanya boboka abmin ci, tanglona kum kubkwandum. Tonda, kanci namin kanya tuba-tuba bonkwandum.

Ati, kanci mikib weik kuboka nun dib tenenub uram asi diboka talebnurubdobkwandum. Olahraga donanyi bira, “Piala kirdeirin moyok karebniting,” tenen mikib kuboka cung barande to, kanci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi iya kam kun dinyi karebnute,” tenen Er Imtamnyi Uram asi mikib kuboka kunubkwandum. Ato kuraminyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kansi ebdeibmakou to, kanci iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwandim. Ara, ninyi ilinto kekenmai bok, Timotius kanci, “Nira Kristus milibkwan,” eboka lak ebmumwe ba, Er Imtamnyi biryi kansi, “Iya kam kun dinyi karebkwankin,” ebdeibmakou. Ati, ukuryok kanci, “Er Imtamnyi ab tonkwa iya kuna teleb,” tenen dib en uram asi diboka talebnurubdobkwandum.

Ni kwit Timotius, kanci nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi arukdeibmasou uram asi diboka teneibde kunuboka abmin ci, malyi kun dinyi nirya asi bai donokwandum. Kerebmakin kum to kuboka kuraminyi ba, nun Du Kristus Yesus tamuryankwande. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi ton, bisam ton, yuk dinyi nirya asi, kam kurdeirisurutnyi biryi ni ebdeibmakin uram sirya kekebmanir ati, kanci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi wenebnicei,” tenen Er uram asi diboka kekebdum. Tonda, nun Du Kristus Yesus bira Pontius Pilatus urasintam tikmou ci, dib en uram asi lak ebmunyi bibabyi kekebmanir. Ati, kanci, “Nibabyi neiktoto katabum eboka abniryi, dib en uram asi talebnurubkwan,” tenen ni ebdeibmakin uram kunubkwandim.

Nun Du Kristus Yesus tamuryankwande uki tum ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenebci tum ara kunubkwande. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsici ura, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande. Utotoa nirya ara Ersi kum atarande bok, Nun Nai bira teleb akwe kurutnyi kurur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira iya erebdob sienyi kurur ati, sun weik sien nang nirya ara Er amwetam kun nang ato kunung. Erda, Iya Erebdobnyi kurur ati, sun erebdob nang nirya ara luknubdob nang ato kunung.

Er Imtamnyi bikwa iya dibman kumnyi kurur. Er kurur ai ara milil weik berengna dam kurur. Ninyi tentok ababyi a berengna asi asing kum eirinung. Akai ara iya milil ai kurur ati, ninyi asing aryi eibman kum. Nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb. Erda iya mikibnyi kurur ati, ninyi aryi Er si tuba-tuba weik ena teleb. Amin.

Timotius, kanci sun tukwetam bona ilinto boramingnyi nang asi ato eboka wenebkwandum. “Sunci wingdana mem. Tukwetam bona talena ara tiya talen dinyi akwe kurur. Arub aryi taleramibyi bona ara ambutum ara wanikminiksicei. A deyok aryi, sunci, ‘Tukwetam bona talenub aryi teleb akwe kubkwamib,’ tenebmunyei. Erda, sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde buna teleb. Ara, ‘Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira utotoa nirya langdeiboka karesurutnyi biryi nun kanya teleb kubkwansir,’ tenen Ersi dibde bukdarur.” Timotius, kanci a nang asi ato eboka wenebdum.

Ebmin cok, kanci ton ato eboka eterebkwandum. Sun bona bon nang ara, “Busul kuboka co bok ilinto tabakoka labtalebkwan,” tenebmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Teleb dinyi asi langdeiboka ukubkwan,” tenen busul kubdarur. Sun bona bon nang ara te ol nang ato kuboka abmun ci, sun ataranci nang asi muna langdeiboka karebokdarur.

Ba, sunci ato kuramingnyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi aminda aryi iya kam bukeibkwande. Ati, sun bona bon nang aryi, “Nun bona ara talyi karebibyei,” tenebingnyei. Erda, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi iya teleb kubdeibkwansir,” tenen sun ataranci nang asi diboka teleb kurdeirina teleb.

Timotius, Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kansi ebdeibmakou to ara kanci diboka kalikwandum. Tola ati eterena uram asi kanci bai donokwandum. Ninyi aryi a uram ati, “Bikdob uram,” eraming asi, a uram ara tola uram akwe kurur ati ebman. A uram ara talyi uram ton lulurdana uram akwe kurur ati, kanci bai donokwandum.
Ninyi ton nang ara a tola uram dib tenebmai ci, “Bikdob uram talebmab,” eboka lak ebmai ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi dib en uram ara deiblobmai.
Timotius, Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kan ab kan ab tonkwa kuboka dib teneraming nang ab asi, “Ni mabwe,” tenen sunsi teleb kurdeirisina teleb.
Ni Paulus biryi a kunum kerek sekeibmakin.

Teleb ni kwit Timotius. Ni Paulus biryi kansi boukwe kuboka, “Ni mi kobdob atonyi,” tenekunun ci, kerek sengna ton kerek sekeibmakin. Ni Paulus bira nun Du Kristus Yesus biryi bokdonoknounyi kunun ati ebman. Nun Du biryi nisi bokdonoknou uca, niryi Teleb Uram lak eboka eterebde banun. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi niti teleb tenebnou to kunuboka nun Du biryi nisi nabsou uca, nira Er bokdonoknounyi to kuboka Teleb Uram eterebde banun. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi ato eboka ebdeibsou, “Sunda Ni Mi Kristus Yesus ab tonkwa antanibmunyi ura, Niryi sunsi iya kam bukeibkwansin,” ebdeibsou. Ati, niryi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibmasou to lak eboka eterenun ara iya kam kurdeirisin uram Teleb Uram asi eterebde banun.
