Ba, bona bon kumnyi, ongon aling malyi ongororandinyi bira, “Kanda otam tikdum!” erandum. Tonda, “Kanda, sokon teleb ai ara buna mem, erda ai amsuna ai ni yan donokman ai asi bukdum,” erandum.

Sunci ato kurandum dinyi ara malyito dinyi kurandum ati ebman. Ati, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “Bona bonanyi bisi dobdobkwan, ba bona bon kumnyi bira dokdonokwan,” tenerandum ara malyito tenen dinyi kurandum. Sunci ato kuboka ninyi urasintam meimnandum ci, sunci bikdob dinyi kum kurandum. Erda, malyi kanya bon nang ato kiboka sun dib tenen nang ara, “Anyi telebnyi, onyi malinyi,” tenerdarandum se.

Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang, ni boukwe kimsunun nang, kekebnindarur! Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ninyi wibdeibsou ara unato nang asi wibdeibsou do? Ninyi aryi, “Tukwetam bun nang aca,” teneramingnyi nang bona bon kum nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibmasou ati ebman. Ara, “A nang asi dib tenen dinyi langdeiboka karebnyi uca, sunci dib tenen dinyi mitik kum bobkwaming,” tenen Erci nunsi wibdeibmasou. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun Ersi boukwe weik kun nang ati ebdeiamwe to, Erci nunti, “A nang asi ni amwetam kun nang kibdeibnyi uca, iya kam kun dinyi dobdobkwaming,” tenen wibdeibmasou.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun bona bon kum nang asi wibdeibmou. Ba, sunda dib tenen nang kurandum cok, sunci sun bona bon kum nang ati, “Ato nang ara nun li,” tenen ina ngilingnandum se! Sun bona bon nang ara sun bona bon kum nang asi teleb kurdeirirandum do? Ato kum kurandum. Sun bona bon nang ara sun bona bon kum nang asi mambul kurdeirandum se! Sun bona bon nang ara bico tenena kum uca sun bona bon kum kurandum nang asi talyi ati tatab-tatab eboka malyi deyok lilin nang dam bobaraming.

Sun bona bon nang ara nun Du sunsi taleboka Arungdeirisurutnyi si, iya erebdob si asi ina ngilingnaming ati ebman. Ati, sun dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus Erebdobnyi amwetam kurandum bok, unato ati sunci a bona bon nang yuk nang asi malyi kurdeirin nang asi, “Nun kwit,” eboka kirandum do?
Sunci ato kubmunyei. Erda, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” ebmou uram asi kunubdarur. A uram deyok kobdob tenen dinyi ara ato kurur,
“Sundamnyi boukwe kurdarandum to kuboka,
yuk nang ababyi neiktoto boukwe kibdarur.”
A uram ara Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi kerek sekamwe to, sunci teneibdeboka kunubdarur. Ato kuramunyi uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam ara teleb dinyi kubkwandum.

Bok, sunci ninyi talyi boukwe tenena kum uca urasin meiboka, “Anyi bisi dobdobkwan, ba onyi bira dokdonokwan,” teneramunyi ura, sunci malyito tenen dinyi kuramunci. Ato tenen kuramunyi dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” ebdeibmasou uram asi yan yanirandum.

Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram yuk-yuk ebsou bok, a uram deyok ara tentok akwe kurur. Ati, nunci Er Imtamnyi arungsina uram yuk-yuk kunubtibiryok, arungna uram tentok asi kum kunubtibyi ba, nunda Er Imtamnyi arungsina uram tentok asi kum yan yanibmab. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram deyok nirya asi yan yanibiryi.
Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi,
“Sal kum ner kum ukula yordana mem,” ebsou cok, Erci, “Ninyi ordana mem,” en uram ababyi ebsou.
Asi, nunci ner ukula yon dinyi kum ukuramibyi bok, ninyi obtibyi ura, nunci Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram deyok nirya asi yan yanibmabibiryi.

Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Malyi kun dinyi takloboka abingiryi, ninyi kanya lemdeirin dinyi sirya dobdobingiryi,” tenen “Ukubdarur-ukuna mem,” en uram nunti karebsou. Ura, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi Er arungsina uram ara ninyi kanya lemdeirisin uram deici aryi nun malyi kun dinyi lilibkwansir,” teneramun cok, uram teleb akwe eramun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubde bindarur.

Ara, ato deyok ati ebman. Nunci, “Yuk nang asi bico tenena kum uca sun malyi kun dinyi bita liliboka wenebtibyi,” teneramibyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi neiktoto bico tenena kum uca nun malyi kun dinyi liliboka wenebkwansir ati ebman. Ato ebman bok, nun Nai bira bico weik tenesurutnyi kurur. Ati, sun yuk nang asi bico tenen nang asi nun Nai biryi wenena kum kubkwande. Erda, Erci a nang asi bico tenen lebkwande.

Ni kwityabwe, ton nang ara sundamnyi ati, “Nunda dib tenen nang kunub,” erdaramingiryok, Er Imtamnyi Uram kum kunuraming. Ato tenen dinyi ara diboka dib tenen dinyi kurur do? Ato tenen kum. Nunci Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa kum kubibyi uca, ato tenen dinyi aryi nunsi lebkwansute do? Ato tenen kum.

Ati, sun kankan nang aryi sal kum ner kum aryi ongon aling kum ongoranci kum, kwaning ataranci kum asi sunci, “Da birum. Kan yuk aryi tin ongon aling asi da bindoka ingkirikoka ongobdobdum. Ba, yina ara da bindoka ingkirikoka yinmaminyi ba, boubkurur,” ebdiryok, erci boukwe kimna kum uca, ato nang sun nong bulub dinyi karena kum kubci ura, Er Imtamnyi Uram asi diboka kunubmariryi do? Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kisal daksute do? Ato kum kubsute.

Ura, ato kuboka nun dib tenen dinyi ababyi neiktoto kurur. Ara, sibambol dem deici aryi dib tenebibiryok, Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kum kunubibyi ura, nunda Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka dib kum teneramibiryi. Ba, nun dib tenen dinyi ara din dinyi ato kubkwansir.

Ato ebman bok, ton nang aryi ato ebting, “Ni kwit e, kanda dib tenenanyi kurum ba, nira Er Imtamnyi Uram kununanyi kunun,” ebting. Asi, ni Yakobus biryi sun ato ebmating nang asi uram dekeibtinyi. Dib tenen dinyi yuk, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunun dinyi yuk kurura kuma. Erda, a bitinyi dinyi nirya ara tentok kurur. Ati, kanci Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa kum uca dib tenerandim do? Ato tenen kum. Ba, nira dib tenena kum uca Er Imtamnyi Uram kununun do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramibyi deib aryi nun dib tenen dinyi lak kimdeirirura.

Ati, sunbabyi, “Er Iya Erebdobnyi tentok a kurur,” tenen dib tenendarur do? Diboka tenebmarum bok, ato tenen dinyi dem aryok sunsi kum lebkwansir. Ato dinyi ara isa mer ababyi, “Er Iya Erebdobnyi tentok a kurur,” tenen bingnung ci, sunda, “Weik wenena kareboka wenebminiksicei,” tenen ilil weik aryi sun sirim asa kuraming.

Sunda talyi dinyi akwe tenen nang se! Dib tenena ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa ab, ara yuk-yuk kuma. Erda, antaniboka tentok dinyi kurur ati ebman. Dib tenena dem ara kikiman kum dinyi akwe kurur. Ba, din dinyi ato kurur. Ati, niryi sunti, “Dib en uram bikoka lak ebkwanting,” tenen a dinyi lak kibkwinsin.

Ati, niryi nun aibwe Abraham biryi kubmou dinyi asi kikliboka uram ton ebkwan. Nun aibwe Abraham bisi Er Imtamnyi biryi una deyok aryi, “Ni urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunurandanyi,” tenen kisal dakmou do? Nun aibwe biryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa kum uca dib teneramwe deyok aryi, kisal dakmou do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, nun aibwe biryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubmou ci, er mi Ishak bisi, “Er Imtamnyi biti dama deiboka obkwan,” tenen karebmou deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi ersi kisal dakmou.

Ura, nun aibwe bira Er Imtamnyi bisi dib teneramuryi, erci Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramwe. Er dib teneramwe dinyi ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramwe dinyi ab, ara yuk-yuk kum kuramwe. Erda, antaniboka kurandei. Dib tenen dinyi dem ara sungloninto kurur bok, Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa aryi sunglon dinyi dangdongoraming to dinyi kurur.
Nun aibwe biryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuramwe ara Er Imtamnyi Uram sekeibwe to kunubmou.
“Nun aibwe Abraham biryi Er Imtamnyi bisi dib tenebmou uca, Er Imtamnyi biryi erti, ‘Ni urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kurandanyi,’ tenen ersi kisal dakmou ci, nun aibwe biti, ‘Ni kwit,’ eboka namnamwe.”

A kiklina uram deici aryi nunci ato dinyi tenen bikdobkwanub. Dib tenena dem deici aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” eboka kum dorosurur. Erda, dib tenena dinyi ab Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa ab deici aryi Erci nunsi dorosurur.

Tonda, yuk minob kunuamwe dinyi aryi doboka neik uram atikwe eterebtabakwinsin. Ara ato. Talyi yortamwe ner si Rahab bibabyi Er Imtamnyi biryi unato dinyi deici aryi, “Ni nebnyi,” teneboka dobdobmou do? Er dib tenen dinyi dem deici aryi dobdobmou do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, a ner aryi sun Israel yala nang aryi ninyi bitinyi bokdeibmai ba, sun wengbinkwamnyi atei meimbinmarei nang asi, “Sun ordana nang aryi a bitinyi nang eiboka obingnyei,” tenen er ai deici tam inibdeibmou. Ani, lebdeibmou ci, yuk bisik kuboka bokdeibmou ba, bindobmarei deyok aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni nebnyi,” teneboka dobdobmou.

Ato kuboka ninyi nong ara isin kum kuransute ura, kam kum kurantibyi. Dib tenena dinyi ababyi neiktoto kurur. Dib tenen dinyi dem ara din dinyi ato kurur. Ba, dib tenen dinyi ab, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunun dinyi ab, antanibdeibtibyi ura, isin neb-neb en dinyi ato kurur.

Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Sun kankan aryi ninyi ilinto aryi, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi Uram dib en uram bingnub ati, nunda dib en uram eteren nang kibdatibyi,” teneboka ererdaranduma mem. Sun ato kuboka sundamnyi ererdeirirandum nang nirya asi niryi ato ebkwinsin, “Sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka dib en uram eteren nang kibdamunyei.” Ato kuramunyi asi, Er Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nirya kunuraming to diboka lilirdeirisurutnyi biryi Erci nunda ninyi eteren nang kunuramib to tabakoka lilirdeirisurur. Ati, Erci, “Dib en uram diboka etereraming do kum do?” tenen nunda ninyi eteren nang asi tabakoka lilirdeirisurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun dib en uram diboka kum etereraming nang asi tabakoka wenebkwande. Sunci a dinyi sirya bikmarum. A deyok aryi, sunci, “Ninyi eteren nang kibtibyi,” tenen talyi erebdamunyei.

Nun tukwetam nang nirya ara malyi deyok ilinto kunub deyok aryi, nunci, “Teleb dinyi kunubtinyi,” teneramib bok, teleb dinyi nirya kum kunuramib, erda ton tuba sukloboka abibiryi, malyi uram tuba eramib. Bok, sun malyi uram ena kalikdandoka sun silalum kalingdaroramingnyi nang ara sun nong nirya ababyi diboka kalingdaraming deyok aryi, malyi dinyi yuk dinyi ababyi bisik sengdaroraming.

Nun silalum ara diboka kalikdandobkwayeb ati ebman. Bisam kuda boyiban nang ara, “Bisam kuda bobinkwayeb,” tenen kuda u ngar-gnarya bisik asi dangurtalin tabwe birirdongonung. Ara, “Nun kanya aryi, ‘A bisik asi bobisurur,’ teneboka dangubtalebkwayeb,” tenen tabwe birirdongoraming. Ato kuboka nunbabyi neiktoto nun mining silalum diboka kalikdandobibyi uca, nunci nun nong nirya asi kalikdandoka yuk malyi kun dinyi kisibdonokibyi ara caknam kubkwansurur.

Tonda, ninyi silalum ara weik mekwan deici yibarande co ngun-ngun dangurdeirin co lase ato kurur. Weik co ngun-ngun ara ilil weik mekwan yibarande asi dangurdeirin co lase mitik dinyi biriman aryi dangubtaleboka bobaraming. Ara, ibalya mikib aryi dordongonmaci bok, co ngun-ngun bobananyi biryi, “A bis birura, o bis birura,” tenen dangurtalerandiryok, dangurdeirin co lase mitikto dinyi biriman aryi dangurtalerande.

Ato kuboka nun ninyi silalum ababyi neiktoto akwe kusurur ati ebman. Nun silalum ara mitikto dinyi bonub bok, nunci nundamnyi erebdandoka nun silalum biriman aryi deyok weik yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi anasurur. Tonda, nun silalum ara uk buk abde barande dinyi ato kusurur. Mitikto uk buk nun aryi abmaci uca, lengkerekoka abdiryi, bai mutuk weik asi yalibde yirande to kusurur. Ati, nunci malyi uram tentok ababyi ebibyi uca, yu tenen dinyi ilinto anasurur.

Silalum deib aryi nunci malyi kun dinyi ilinto kouramib ati, ninyi silalum ara uk buk abde barande dinyi ato kusurur. Nun nong bonub dinyi kankan aryi nun silalum ara erebkaboka malyi dinyi ilinto kunubde ban dinyi kusurur. Malyi kun dinyi ara nun silalum biriman aryi deyok koubci uca, a malyi kun dinyi ara nong nirya dakdongobsici ba, nun nong kanya nirya malyi kibdeibsici ura, nunci nun yan taruk ab, yuk nong dinyi biriman ababyi, malyi dinyi kunub. Nun tukwetam kubde baramibyi talak nirya ara silalum deyok kouna deyok aryi, dakdongobsici uca, malyi kun dinyi tabangdongordaramib. Silalum aryi malyi deyok koun dinyi ara ilila uk mekwan sienyi si Iblis biryi deyok kourande ati ebman.

Ura, bai bisam yuk-yuk ab, bai kam yuk-yuk ab, ara ninyi aryi tabwe deboka winiramnyi ani, ukuryok ababyi tabwe deboka winiraming. Tonda, imtam yibarande maka yuk-yuk ababyi ninyi aryi tomoboka winiraming. Mundu aryi yibarande dinyi ababyi ninyi aryi tomoboka winiraming. Tonda, ilila mekwan umbura kurande mekinaya ab, yuk dinyi ab ababyi, ninyi aryi tomoboka winiraming.

Bok, ninyi silalum ara ninyi tentok aryi tabwe deboka winibmanto kum kusurur. Ninyi tentok ababyi ninyi silalum kalikdanman kum kurur. Ninyi silalum ara kwatima silalum ato kurur. Ara, nunci silalum umbura ara yu dinyi mitik kum langkariksou deyok aryi, silalum biriman aryi malyi uram anabsici uca, yuk nang asi malyi kibminikdandoka ordanub.

Nun silalum biriman aryi nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik enub. Ba, neik silalum biriman aryok nunci ninyi sumnamib. Ara, Er Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nirya asi Er kurur to kikniasou bok, nunci silalum deib aryi nun mamun asi, “Malinyi,” erdaramib.
Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Neik silalum biriman aryok kisal dangna uram ton, sumna uram ton anasurur. Ato kununa ara malyi dinyi kusurur ati ebman.
Me u tentok me aryok yin me teleb ab, sik me ab tonkwa ton anarur do? Ato ton kum kurur. Erda me teleb u yuk anaboka yuryibarur ura, malyi me sik me u yuk anaboka yuryibarur.

Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang. Tonda, co kwarang aryi kuboka co zaitun du ton moubdongobte do? Ato ton kum kurur. Tonda, co si anggur aryi kuboka ara co du moubdongobte do? Ato ton kum kurur. Tonda, malyi me u aryi kuboka teleb me ton anabte do? Ato ton kum kurur. Ati, sunci a dinyi teneibdeboka sun silalum kalikdandoka malyi uram ebmunyei. Erda, Teleb Uram akwe ebdandarur tenen ato ebman.

Ni kwityabwe, sun kuranduma kankan dam, “Nunda bikdob dinyi tenen bingna nang kunub,” tenerdaramunyi nang ton kuramunyi ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubdarur. Ati, sunci bikdob dinyi teneiramunyi uca, sun du moubsiri ba, luknubdob kanya bobdarur. Ato kubmunyi ura, yuk nang aryi sunti, “Bikdob dinyi tenen bingna nang diboka kunung,” tenen bikwansing.

Ba, sunci, “Yuk nang dinyi asi ni dobdobtinyi,” tenen yu kanya bormururamun ci, “Nidamnyi erebdeibdankwan,” teneramunyi ura, sunci sundamnyi ati erebdandoka, “Nunda bikdob dinyi bingna nang kunub,” eboka kisal dakdamunyei. Sunci ato kubmunyi ura, sun kisal dangdaramunci eramunyi uram ara dib ati kum ebkwandum. Erda, tola erebdankwandum.

Yu kanya tenena ton, sundamnyi ati wingdana ton, ara Er Imtamnyi biryi karesurur bikdob tenen dinyi aryi kum anarur. Erda, ato dinyi ara tukwetam nang kanya tam aryi anasurur. Ara, ninyi aryi malyi tenen kanya aryi anarur. Tonda, isa aryi, “Ato kubdum,” ebsici uca, anasurur.
Ara, yu tenen kanya ab, sundamnyi ererdeirirdan tenen kanya ab kubmaci dikum ara ninyi aryi antanirdana kum uca sun mamun malyi kiminingdaraming.

Bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi karesurur bikdob dinyi ara ato kum kusurur. Erda, a bikdob dinyi ara iya teleb dinyi kurur. Tonda, antanirdeirirdan dinyi kurur. Tonda, namin kanya akwe bon dinyi kurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunun dinyi kurur. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubde ban dinyi kurur. Tonda, langdeiboka bico kimdan dinyi kurur. Tonda, teleb du moun dinyi kurur. Er Imtamnyi biryi karesurur bikdob dinyi dobdobmangnyi nang ara ninyi urasin meimna kum dinyi kurur. Erda, udikum tenen kanya boboka teleb dinyi akwe kunubde banung.
Ura, sun yuk nang ab antanirdeirirdaramingnyi nang ati Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde banung,” tenen langdeiboka teleb kurdeirirur.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci unato ati kerebdandoka sun mamun ordarandum do? Sun mamun kererdaran dinyi ab ordan dinyi ab ara sun mining kanya dam aryi anasurur ati ebman. Ara, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “A dinyi dobdobtinyi, o dinyi dobdobtinyi,” tenen malyi kanya borandum deyok aryi, sunci sun mamun kerebdandoka ordarandum se.

Sunci, “A dinyi dobdobtibyi, o dinyi dobdobtibyi,” tenen ingkiringnandum bok, sunci kum dororandum. Dorona kum kuramunyi ati, sunci yu kanya boboka yuk nang asi kereboka diboka ordarandum. Sunci ingkiringdonmamunyi dinyi ara unato aryi kum dororandum do? Sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Nai, a dinyi karebsurum, o dinyi karebsurum,” eboka molorona kum kurandum aryi, sunci sun ingkiringnandum dinyi kum dororandum.

Ba, sunci Er Imtamnyi bisi moloboka, “Nai, a dinyi karebsurum, o dinyi karebnurum,” erandum ababyi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun molona kum kunusurur. Ara, sunci malyi kanya borandum cok, molorandum deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun molon dinyi kum kunurdeisurur. Ati, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi nun molona sirya kunubci ura, Erci nunsi karebsute dinyi dobdobmatibyi biriman aryi malyi dinyi akwe kunubmurubkwayeb,” tenerandum ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi sun molona kum kunurdeisurur.

Sunda Er Imtamnyi bisi diboka milirmuruna kum nang kundarur se! Sunci malyi kun nang ati, “Nun kwityabwe,” teneboka abmun ci, milibmunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi bisi takloboka sunda Er ordana nang kimdarandum. Sunci a dinyi tenen bikmarum do kum do?

Sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi kerek sekamwe to ara kum bingdarur do? Er Imtamnyi Uram ara ato esurur, “Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara nun kanya dam aryi kusurur ati, nunci yu tenen dinyi nirya ati, ‘Nun li,’ teneramib,” esurur. Ara, talyi ati ato esurur do? Ato tenen kum.
Tonda, Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangna dinyi ilinto karebtabakoka dakmurubde basurur. A deyok aryi, Er Imtamnyi Uram umbura aryi ato esurur.
“Er Imtamnyi biryi sun ererdaramingnyi nang asi bisik sengdur. Ba, sun luknubdongob kanya bon nang asi Erci bico tenesurur.”
A deyok aryi, sunci sun kanya luknubdongobdandoka Er Imtamnyi Uram kunuboka abmun ci, isa sienyi bisi bisik sekmunyi uca, er ilil aryi bindobkwandur.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci Er Imtamnyi dam yandobmunyi uca, Er Imtamnyi bibabyi sun dam yankwansurur. Sunda malyi dinyi kunurandum nang se. Sunci malyi kun dinyi takloboka teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur. Ara, sunci taruk me ilingnamingnyi nang ato kubmunyi uca, du moubkwansir. Tonda, sun kanya bitinyi bon nang se. Sunci, “Malyi kun dinyi taklobkwayeb,” teneboka abmun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur.

Ati, sunci, “Se, Er Imtamnyi biryi nunsi talya wenebkwansir,” tenen mambul kanya bobdarur. Tonda, asimaka sangna mot ngunguboka sebde bindarur. Kilkil kanya boboka akwi turandum dinyi ara danguboka, “Se, nun malyi dinyi kuramoubwe,” tenen engen kanya bobdarur.
Sunci sundamnyi ati luknubdongobdamun ci, nun Nai Arungdeirisurutnyi bisi si weik ebdarur. Ato kubmunyi uca, nun Nai biryi sunsi leboka erebdeibkwansir.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci sun mamun ati malyi uram erdana mem. Unanyi-unaner aryi sun kwit sun ka asi malyi uram ebingnyi nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” esurur uram asi yan yaniramingiryi. Tonda, sun kwit sun ka aryi kuramingnyi to liliboka, “Malyi kun nang kunung se,” tenen nang ababyi ara Er Imtamnyi biryi, “Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” en uram asi yan yaniramingiryi. Sun ato kuboka yan yaniramingnyi nang ara sundamnyi erebdandoka Er Imtamnyi arungdansir uram asi, “A uram ara malyi talyi en dinyi aca,” tenen ina ngilingnamingiryi. Ati, sunci Er Imtamnyi arungsina uram ati, “Malyi uram aca,” teneboka sunci Er Imtamnyi arungsina uram asi kununa nang kum kurandum. Erda, sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka Er Imtamnyi biryi arungsin uram asi lilibda ukurderandum nang kibdanmarum.

“Ukubdarur-Ukuna mem,” ena deyoknyi bira tentokwe kurur. Tonda, malyi kun dinyi lilina deyoknyi bira tentok kurur. Tukwetam nang ati ato kum ebman. Erda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biti ato ebman. Nun Nai bira ninyi lemdeirisina ati mikibnyi kurur. Tonda, ninyi wenena mikibnyi kurur. Asi, sun tukwetam nang kurandum ati, unato ati sunci yuk nang aryi kuramingnyi dinyi lilirandum do?

Ni kwityabwe, kekendarur. Ton nang ara ato tenen erandum, “Arub kum ambutum kum ara nunci akatei kum okatei kum bindoka kubkwayeb.” Tonda, sunci, “Akatei kum okatei kum bindoka kwalina tentok kuboka abibiryi, dengna dinyi yuk-yuk kareboka dekdobibyi ura, co bok ilinto doronmabyi ani, nun atei tamuryankwayeb,” erandum.

Ato eramun bok, ara talyi ati erandum. Ara, ambutum kubkwamasici dinyi ara nun kum bingnub. Ati, sunci, “Ambutum kubde binkwamab ara kam tuba kubkwamab do kum do?” tenen dinyi ara kanya kum teneirderandum do? Tonda sunci, “Nun tukwetam kam kubde baramib ara tiya ati kunmab,” tenen kum teneirdarandum. Nun tukwetam aryi kam kubde baramib ara tulum ato tiya anaraboka lak kiabci ani, kum danarorande. Ato kuboka nun ninyi ababyi tiya akwe kunub.
Ati, sunci ato ebkwamandaute ara kikiman, “Yuk wa-yuk wa dobkwayeb ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi teleb tenen milibsici uca, nun kam tuba kuramibiryi, nunci a wa kum, o wa kum ibkwayeb,” tenebkwandarur.

Ba, ukuryok ara sunci, “Nun Nai biryi milibsici ba, ibkwayeb,” tenena kum kurandum. Ato kuboka sunci, “Yuk wa-yuk wa ibkwayeb,” eboka sundamnyi erebdandoka kisal dangdarandum. Ato kun dinyi ara malyito dinyi kurur ati ebman.

Ura, nunci, “Ato-ato kuboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubkwanub,” tenen dinyi bingnamibiryok, a teleb dinyi kununa kum kuramibyi ura, ato dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi urasintam ara malyi kun dinyi kurur.
Sun bona bon nang ara kekendarur. Engen kanya bobdarur se. Sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi weneboka absiriryi, mambul weik kubdeibkwansir,” tenen asimaka sangna mot sebde kurorandarur.
Sun bona bon dinyi ilinto talerandum ara a nirya ara ola kum dankwande. Ba, sun ongon aling teleb namin dinyi tuba ongorandum ara ola lubminikoka tarakwande.

Dengna weik keil si emas ab perak ab talerandum dinyi ababyi ola kum dankwande. Sunci a dinyi nirya buluboka talerandum ci, yuk nang asi dengna kikiman kum karerandum ati, sun malyi kun dinyi sirya lak kibmasir. Sunci bona bon dinyi ilinto udikum deiboka bulurandum deyok aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi weik wenena aryi wenebkwansir. Ara, sirya kobdob uki tum berekmaci ura, sun malyi kun dinyi ara lak kibkwande ba, sunci sun kanya dam aryi, “Se nai e, nun bona bon dinyi ilinto buluramoubwe ara malyi dinyi kuramaburyi,” tenebkwandum. A, “Se,” tenen dinyi aryi sun kanya asi lukwansir ba, uk angnande to kuboka sun kanya ab, sun nong ab nirya yibkwansir.

Kekendarur. Sun wa irmilin nang aryi sun wa tuboka gandum du dangsunung nang asi sunci dengna kikiman dinyi kum karerandum ati, a nang sun kanya ara mambul kanya weik boboka, “Se,” eboka namnaming. Ato eboka namnaming dinyi ara nun Nai Iya Mikibnyi biryi sirya kekerur.

Sun bona bon nang ara yuk nang asi bico tenena kum uca sundamnyi bikwe kanya teneirdarandum ci, teleb yina-yina langdeiboka yirandum. Tonda, sunci, “Nun kanya teleb tenebdobibyi tok kunubkwayeb,” tenen sun dam nang akwe dirnilirdarandum. Sunda ninyi aryi, “A bisam ara ola yibdobkwayeb,” tenen winiraming bisam ato kurdarandum ati ebman. Ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir cok, Erci neiktoto sunti, “Yina yin dinyi langdeiboka yibmang,” tenen obkwansir ati ebman.

Sun bona bon nang ara teleb kun nang asi tatab-tatab eboka wenerandum. A nang ara wenebmanto deyok ton kum kuraming bok, sun dam nang aryi libdandobman kum kunung asi suncok talyi tam tatab-tatab eboka abmun ci, wenerorandum.

Ni kwityabwe dib tenen nang, sunci sun kanya lamakdongoboka, “Nun Du Arungdeirisurutnyi yankwande,” tenen dibde bunkwandarur. Nun Du yangana dibde buna ara kwaning wa iroraming nang aryi kuraming to kubdarur. Kwaning wa ibdamingnyi nang ara co keta talak aryi, “Muryi talak dobci ura, yibdobkwan kwaning wa,” tenen wa iamingiryi, muryi talak dona ati dibde buraming to kuboka, sunbabyi nun Du yangana ati ato kubdarur.
Ati, nun Du tamuryankwande uki tum ara dam kubmar deyok aryi, sun kanya katabum erdeirirdaramun ci, lamakdongoboka dibde bunkwandarur.

Ni kwityabwe, sunci sun mamun tatab-tatab erdana mem. Tatab-tatab erdamunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi tatab-tatab eboka wenebsicei. Nun Du bira nun malyi kun dinyi lilina deyoknyi kurur ara ola yankwande talak dam kubmar.

Ni kwityabwe, minob ura nun aibweyabwe Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang aryi lamakloboka Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde buramnyi. Ninyi aryi a nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi bongdonongnamwe nang asi mambul kurdeiriramnyi ababyi sunci namin kanya boramiryok, tanglona kum uca dibde buramnyi. Ura, sunci nun aibweyabwe ati, “Nun kiklisina ato nang,” tenen sun kunuramnyi to milibdarur.

Sun tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde bun nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi kisal dangna nang kunung ati ebman. Nun aibwe Ayub ukuramwe dinyi ara sun nirya bingdarur. Ayub bira er dib tenen dinyi ati ukubdenmou dinyi deyok aryi mambul weik kuramwe bok, erci tanglona kum uca Er Imtamnyi bisi dibde buramwe. Ani, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira bico weik tenerutnyi ton boukwe weik kimsurutnyi kurur aryi nun aibwe bisi leboka teleb kibdeibmou. A kuramwe to sun nirya bikmarum.

Ura ni kwityabwe, udikum kobdob tenen dinyi ara ato. Sunci, “Yuk nang aryi ni en uram asi dib tenebniting,” teneboka abmun ci, sunci ninyi si ab, mutuk si ab si siboka uram ebdarab ebmunyei. Tonda, imtam ai si siboka, tonda im dangna tukwe dangna ai si siboka, yuk dinyi-yuk dinyi si siboka uram ebdarab ebmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Ni uram dib tenebniting,” teneramunyi ura, “Yo, ato kubmar,” dem ena teleb. Tonda, “Kum, ato kum kubmar,” ena teleb. Ba, sunci ato kum eramunyi ura, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebkwansir.

Ura, sun kankan dam mambul kanya borandinyi kum, boranci ner kum kuranci ura, anyi kum a ner kum aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Nai, lebnurum!” eboka molorona teleb. Ba, sun kankan dam kilkil kanya bonanyi kum, bon ner kum kunmaci ura, anyi kum a ner kum aryi Er Imtamnyi si weik ereboka mot semna teleb.

Ura, sun kankan dam u yinanyi kum, u yin ner kum kunmaci ura, anyi kum a ner kum aryi, “Ni Er Imtamnyi bisi molobmilibniting,” tenebmaci ura, sun dib tenen nang kalingna nang asi namna teleb. Ba, a ninyi kalingna nang aryi nun Du Arungdeirisurutnyi si siboka co yung tong teleb dinyi doboka sun u yibmaci nang asi dikdongobkwanung. Dikdongobingiryi, sunci sun u yin nang ati molobmiliboka Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Nai, kwetebdum,” eboka molobkwanung.

Ura, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi biryi dib ati lebkwande,” teneboka molobmangnyi ura, nun Du Arungdeirisurutnyi biryi sun u yin nang asi taruk taleboka kwetebkwande. Ba, a yun yinmaci nang aryi Er Imtamnyi urasintam asi malyi kun dinyi kunuamingnyi ura, sunci sun malyi kun dinyi lak ebingnyi ba, nun Nai biryi sun malyi dinyi kiliboka abdiryi, sun u yinmaci dinyi kwetebkwande.

A deyok aryi, sunci, “Yun nakibdobkwayeb,” teneboka abmun ci, sun malyi kun dinyi lak ebdandoka sun mamun molobmilibdandarur. Ba, sun yun ara kwetebkwansurur. Ara, sun Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb kun nang aryi molormilina ara mikib weik kurur ati ebman. Nun Nai biryi ato molormilina diboka kekebkwandur.
Nun aibwe Elia bira nun tukwetam nang kuramib atonyi kuramuryok, erci Er Imtamnyi bisi, “Nai, mo bisik sekdum,” eboka diboka molobmou uca, kwalina winiryi wala nabaryi ara mo iya mitika kum cemnamwe.
Ani, nun aibwe biryi, “Mo tubto cebdur,” tenen Er Imtamnyi bisi tubto molobmou ba, nun Nai biryi karebmou uca, mo tubto cebmou uca, kwaning nong mabmou.

Ni kwityabwe, sun kankan aryi ninyi tentok aryi malyi kun dinyi kubmariryi dib en uram takloboka sundamnyi wanikminikdanmangnyi bok, sunci a nang asi, “Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobting,” tenen ersi wenebmamunyi ba, er malyi kun dinyi taklobmaci ura, sunci anyi kanya asi boboka lebdeibmamunci. Ura sunci a dinyi asi diboka bobkwandarur, “Unanyi biryi wanikminikdanmarinyi bisi wenenmaci uca, er malyi kun dinyi taklobmaci ura, iya dina wenebmanto bok, asi boboka er kanya lebdeibmariryi. Ura, tonda anyi malyi kun dinyi asi Er Imtamnyi biryi sirya kilibmar,” tenen bikwandarur.

Ni Petrus bira nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi bokdonoknounyi kunun ci, Teleb Uram eterebde bananyi biryi sun dib tenen nang asi “Teleb,” eboka kibmasin. Sunda Er Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibsou nang im dangna tukwe dangna mutuk dantam-dantam nirya bindoka tingbinsekmandau nang asi kibmasin. Ara, sunda Pontus mutuk kurandum nang ab, Galatia mutuk kurandum nang ab, Kapadokia mutuk kurandum nang ab, Asia mutuk kurandum nang ab, Bitinia mutuk kurandum nang nirya asi niryi kibdobmasin.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi minob uca bikansou to, Erci sunti, “Ni mabwe nermabwe kibdeibkwan,” tenen minob wibdeibsou. Tonda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sunsi Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kibdeibsou uca, sunda teleb dinyi akwe kunubde barandum. Tonda, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus Uram kunubkwandau ba, nun Du Yesus ining aryi sun malyi kun dinyi kilibkwansou ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi minob wibdeibsou.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun nirya asi kisal dangsina teleb. Tonda, Erci antanibdeibsici uca, kilkil kanya langdeiboka karesina teleb.

Nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ena teleb. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus Er Nai kobdob asi si weik ena teleb. Nun Nai bira nunti iya bico teneransou ci, Erci nun malyi tenen dinyi kilibkaboka ukuryok tenen kanya kiknibminikoka dongobdeibsou ba, nunci iya kam kun dinyi dibde bunub. Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus kam bukokmou uca, nunda ukuryok tenen kanya boboka nunci nun Du Yesus bisi katabum eboka dibde bunub. A deyok aryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi si weik ena teleb.

Nun Nai biryi, “Iya kam kun dinyi karebkwan,” tenen ukuryok tenen kanya nunti dongobdeibsou. A iya kam kun dinyi ara nun Nai biryi imtam ai asi kalingsurur ati, waningminingsina dinyi kum kurur ci, kum daneibman kum kurur.

Sunci dib teneboka dibde burandum uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi diboka kalingsurur. Erci sunsi tuba-tuba kaliksici ura, nun Du Yesus tamuryankwande uki tum berekde ba, nun Nai biryi kiknibminikansou lemsina lak kibdeiboka karebkwansir.

Sunci a berekwande uki tum dibde buramun ba, sun kanya kilkil weik kusurur. Sunsi uki mitikanun kuramun bok, ninyi aryi, “Dib tenena taklobting,” tenen sunsi mambul dinyi ilinto takurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, sun kanya ara iya kilkil weik kusurur.

A mambul dinyi takurdeiriransing ara talyi dinyi kuma. Erda, sun dib tenena asi katabum erdeirin dinyi ati ato kurur. Ara, ninyi aryi mambul dinyi takurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, sunci tanglona kum uca dib tenebmururamun ci, sunci, “Nunci diboka dib tenenub,” tenen bingnandum. Sun dib tenena ara bikdob dinyi dengna weik dinyi ato kurur ati ebman. Dengna weik keil si emas dengna ara mitik to. Ba, sun dib tenena ara bisibkaboka dengna iya weik dinyi ato kurur. Keil sirik asi bingnande emas ara uk ai dabmangnyi ba, keil sirik ara uk leiboka koroksakdobci ura, emas lak kimnande to, sun dib tenena ababyi neiktoto kurande. Ara, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul kurdeiriransing ba, sun dib tenena lak kimnansir. Uca, nun Du Yesus Kristus imtam aryi kuboka yuryaci ura, Erci, “Ni kwityabwe, tanglona kum uca, dib teneranindau,” eboka sunsi diboka kisal dakoka erebdeibkwansir.
Nun Du bisi asing kum eirirandau cok, sunci Ersi boukwe weik kurandum. Asing kum eiriramun cok, sunci nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum ba, sun kanya ara langdeiboka kilkil weik kusurur.
Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi sun dib tenen nang kanya lebdeiboka sun dibde burandum dinyi iya kam kun dinyi karebkwansir ati, sun kanya kilkil weik kusurur.

Ura, sun minob talak aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang aryi a lemdeirisin dinyi ati minob bikoka lak etereramnyi. A nang ara sun ukuryok kurandum nang ati ato eboka lak etereramnyi. “Er Imtamnyi biryi sun aminda kubde binkwaming nang asi kisal dakwande,” eboka eterermururamiryi, sunci busul kuboka a lemdeirisina deyok ati diblilibde baramnyi.

Ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kunanyi Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus biryi sunsi minob uca etereramuryi, nun Du Yesus Kristus biti ato ebde baramwe. “Yuma kobdob ara ninyi aryi Ersi mambul dinyi weik takubdeibingnyi ura, aminda tam aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi Ersi iya weik erebdeibkwande,” ebde baramwe. Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi sunsi ato eboka etereramwe uca, sunci a uram ati, “Una talak aryi a dinyi kubkwande do?” tenen, “Una kuboka kubkwande do?” tenen ingkirikde baramnyi.

Ingkirikde baramnyi bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi ato eboka lak kibdeibmou. “A lemdeirisin dinyi ara sun kurandum talak aryi kum kunubdeibkwan. Erda, sun aminda kubkwaming nang talak aryi kunubdeibkwan,” eboka sunda ukuryok a talak kurandum dib tenen nang ati ato ebde baramwe. Ara, sun a dinyi minob bikoka etereramnyi nang ati Erci ato kum ebde baramwe. Ura, a lemdeirisina ara sun Teleb Uram eterebde baramingnyi nang aryi sun ukuryok kurandum nang ati lak eterebde baransei. Ara, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus imtam aryi kuboka bokwetebmounyi biryi milibde baramwe uca, Teleb Uram eterebde baransei ci, lemdeirisin dinyi ati lak etereransei. A lemdeirisin dinyi ara ilil weik tenen dinyi kurur ati, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang ababyi, “Naie, a dinyi kunubdeibkwande ara nunbabyi diblilibtibyi,” tenenung ati ebman.

A deyok aryi, sunci, “Nun Du bisi tanglona kum uca milibkwayeb,” tenen sun tenen dinyi nirya kalikdamun ci, sundamnyi kiknibminikdandarur. Tonda, sunci, “Wanikminikibyei,” tenen sun kanya yuk-yuk asi nurubdobmun ci, kalikdandobdarur. Ato kuramun ci, sunci, “Nun Du Yesus Kristus yuryangaci ura, Erci nunsi lebkwansir,” tenen katabum eboka dibde bukdarur.

Ati, sunci, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi mabwe nermabwe kunub,” tenen nun Nai Imtamnyi Uram diboka kunubde bindarur. Sunda minob ura nun Nai Imtamnyi bira walwal kurandau ura, “Malyi dinyi kubtibyi,” tenen dinyi akwe kurandau ati, ukuryok ababyi tubto a dinyi kanya teneiboka kunubde bimunyei.

Erda, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi dam kun nang kibmun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur. Ara, “Nun Nai nun nabsounyi bira iya teleb dinyi akwe kurutnyi kurur to, nunda Er dam kun nang ababyi neiktoto teleb dinyi akwe kunubkwayeb,” tenen kununa teleb.
Er Imtamnyi Uram kerek sengna umbura aryi ato kerek sekmou,
“Ni Imtamnyi bira teleb dinyi akwe kununun deyok aryi, sun Ni dam kun nang ababyi teleb dinyi akwe kunubdarur.”
Ato ebdeibmasou deyok aryi, nunci teleb dinyi kununa teleb ati ebman.

Ura, sunci Er Imtamnyi bira ninyi urasin meiboka, “Anyi bisi dobdobkwan ba, onyi bira yakdonokwan,” kum tenesurur ci, sun ninyi yuk-yuk malyi kuramingnyi to kuboka wenebkwansiranyi bisi ilil kanya bobdarur. Sunci tukwetam tiya atei kuramunyi ura, malyi kun nang aryi kuraming to milibde bimunyei.

Ati, sunci, “Nun aibweyabwe aryi etereransei dinyi ara talyi dinyi asi kunubde binamoubwe asi nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi lebdeibmasou ati, a talyi dinyi tubto kunubibyei,” tenena teleb. Ati, sunci ato dinyi tenen asi bikdobdarur. Nun Du biryi nunsi lebdeibmasou dinyi ara tiya kurande dinyi si emas perak dinyi dekeiboka kum lebdeibmasou.

Erda, nun Du Yesus Kristus Er ining ara, “Iya weik dengna,” tenen dinyi biriman aryi Erci nunsi lebdeibmasou. Nun Du Kristus biryi nunsi lebdeibmasou ara Er Imtamnyi dama deirin domba ato deiboka nunsi lebdeibmasou. A domba ara malyi domba kum kuramwe. Erda, Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirin dinyi iya teleb dinyi kuramwe ati ebman.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi yuma kobdob aryi imtam tukwetam kum kikniamuryok, Erci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Ninyi Lemsinanyi kibkwan,” tenen wibdeibmou. Ura, yuma kobdob talak aryi wibdeibmou ani, nun Nai biryi karebsou uca, sirya kobdob talak kubmou bok, nun Du Yesus bira ukuryok ninyi kibdanmou. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi sunda sirya kobdob talak aryi kurandum nang ababyi lebdeibkwansou ati, Erci Erdamnyi lak kibdanmou.

Ura, nun Du biryi sunsi sirya lebdeibsou biriman aryi sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dib tenerandum. Nun Du dibmou asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi kam bukeibmou ura, iya erebdeibmou. Kam bukeibmou uca, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dib teneramun ci, sunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi iya kam kun dinyi karebkwansir,” tenen dibde bundarur.

Sunci dib en uram asi kunubde barandum uca, sunci sun kanya dam aryi malyi kun dinyi kilirkarongne nang ato kurandum. Sunci malyi kun dinyi kilirkarong kanya borandum uca, sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi diboka boukwe kimnandum. Ato kurandum ura, sunci sun kwityabwe asi sunglona kum uca sun kanya nirya aryi boukwe kimdarandum.

Ato kubkwandum ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, Erci sun malyi tenen dinyi kilibkaboka ukuryok tenen dinyi sun kanya dam dongobdeibmasou. A ukuryok tenen dinyi dongobdeibmasou ara tiya ati kum dongobdeibmasou. Erda, iya ati dongobdeibmasou. Erci, dongobdeibmasou dinyi ara tukwetam yala tiya dinyi ato asi sun kanya dam kum koubdeibmasou. Erda, sun kanya dam koubdeibmasou dinyi ara Er Imtamnyi Uram aryi iya mikib dinyi ton iya kunubkwande dinyi ton asi koubdeibmasou. A deyok aryi, sunci sun mamun boukwe kimdana teleb.
Er Imtamnyi Uram kerek sengna umbura aryi a deyok ati ato eteresurur.
“Ninyi nirya ara sungsunga tiya kurande ato kunung.
Tonda, co keta bol telebto dinyi kurande bok, tiya atikwe kurande.
Nun tukwetam nang ababyi neiktoto kunub.
Ara, nun nong bol telebto kuransir bok, tiya atikwe kunub.
Sungsunga ara ola yalangnande ba, co keta ara ola kulursangnande to, nun tukwetam nang ababyi ola dimnamib.
Bok, Er Imtamnyi Uram ara tiya dinyi kum kurur.
Erda, tanglona kum uca iya kubmurubkwande,” ebmou.
Ba, a uram ara nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram kurur asi nunci sun nirya asi lak etereransoubwe.

Ni kwityabwe, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ukuryok tenen dinyi sun kanya dam dongobdeibmasou deyok aryi, sunci sun yu kanya boramunyi malyi kun dinyi nirya bai donokdarur. Tonda, tola uram en dinyi nirya bai donokdarur. Tonda, “Ninyi aryi kisal daksiting ati, teleb dinyi kun nang ato kiknibdankwayeb,” tenen dinyi nirya bai donokdarur. Tonda, yuk nang ati bimsa yarin dinyi ab, tola ati eboka tatab-tatab en dinyi ababyi nirya bai donokdarur.

Bai donokmunyi ura, alok mabwe nermabwe ukuryok deibmang mabwe nermabwe ato kuramun ci, sunci, “Mum dinin dinyi yibtibyi,” teneraming to akwe kubdarur. Mum dinin dinyi sirik ati kum ebman. Erda, kebdeiboka Er Imtamnyi Uram kekena ati ato ebman. Ati, sunci, “Er Imtamnyi Uram kekeramibyi uca, nun dib tenena ara tabakdongoboka-tabakdongoboka mikib kibkwansir,” tenen Er Imtamnyi Uram asi tuba-tuba kekebdarur. Kekebde baramunyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi iya kam kun dinyi karebkwansir.
Nun Du bira ninyi teleb kimdeirisinanyi kurur ati sunci eirirandum. Nun Du biti ato eirirandum deyok aryi, sunci Er Imtamnyi Uram diboka kekermuruna teleb.

Ura, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Ai dona eremna keil atonyi, nun iya kam kurdeirisurutnyi,” teneboka nun Du Yesus dam yangana teleb. Ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus biti, “Bai donongna keil atonyi aca,” tenen dokdonokmai bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Dengna weik keil, iya teleb keil,” tenen nun Du Yesus bisi wibdeibmou.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sun nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenen nang ababyi ai don keil ato kurandum ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira ukuryok ai dobde barandiryi, sunda dib tenen nang ati, “Ni dobde baran ai umbura aryi iya kubkwaming,” teneransir. Ato teneboka ai dobde barandiryi, Erci sunda ai don keil ato nang asi keil ai dukoka dobdeibde baransir. Akai ara Er Imtamnyi biti ninyi dama deirin ai ato doransir ba, sunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kurandum ci, Er Imtamnyi kan ninyi kan noutam kuboka antanirdeirin nang ato kurandum ci, sunci sun kanya dam aryi Er Imtamnyi bisi dama deirirandum. Sun deirirandum dama ara nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi doboka nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam aryi deirirande uca, nun Nai kanya kilkil weik kurur.
Er Imtamnyi kerek sengna umbura aryi nun Du Yesus Kristus biti ato kerek sekamwe.
“Dirandum. Nira Imtamnyi biryi mutuk Sion dub asi ai doraniryi, ai kisok eremna keil tentok asi erebdeibkwan.
A keil ara Nira Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibmase keil ara iya teleb keil kurur.
Ba, unanyi-unaner aryi a ai kisok eremna keil bitonyi bisi dib teneramingnyi ara iya alyi kum kubminikwansir,” kerek sekamwe.
Sunda dib tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus biti, “Dengna weik keil atonyi,” tenerandum. Ba, sun dib kum tenen nang ara nun Du Yesus biti, “Bai donokman keil aca,” teneraming.
“Sun tukwetam kuboka ai don nang ara anyi biti, ‘Bai donokman keil aca,’ teneramnyi.
Ato teneramnyi bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Erti, ‘Iya teleb keil,’ tenen ai kisok eremna keil kibdeibmou.”
Tonda, nun Du Yesus keil atonyi biti Er Imtamnyi kerek sengna umbura aryi ato erur.
“A keil ara ninyi yiban bisik libmaci aryi yan dum dukoka maryibaramingnyi ato kubkwaming,” ebmou.

“Yandum dukoka maryibaraming,” ebmar ara nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ati, “Nun li,” teneraming ati ato ebmar. Er Imtamnyi biryi minob uca teneamwe uca, a nang ara Teleb Uram dokdonokingiryi, sunci keil yan dum dukoka tukwetam marbaraming nang ato kunung ati ebman.

Ura, ni kwityabwe, sunda a kuraming nang ato kum kurandum. Erda, sunda nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi wibdeibsou nang kundarur. Sunda Er Imtamnyi biti ninyi dama deirin ai wa in nang kuboka abmun ci, Er Imtamnyi weik Sienyi amwetam nang kundarur. Sunda Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kuboka abmun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunun nang kundarur. Sunda Er Imtamnyi bisi milin nang kundarur. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunda malyi dinyi kurandau nang asi kunuk dam aryi kuboka naboka absou ci, lebdeibsou ura, Er milil weik berengnanyi dam boyanmasou. Ati, sunci, “Nun Nai biryi ato-ato kuboka teleb kimdeirisurur,” eboka Er si weik ebkwandum ati, nun Nai biryi sunsi nabmasou.

Sun minob ura Er Imtamnyi milin kum nang kurandau. Ani, ukuryok ara nun Nai biryi karebsou uca, sunda Er Imtamnyi milin nang kurandum. Minob ura Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi bico kum teneransou. Ani, ukuryok ara nun Nai biryi sunsi bico tenesurur.

Ni kwityabwe ni boukwe weik kusunun nang. Sunci, “Im dangna mutuk tukwe dangna mutuk yuk-yuk tingyandoka kuraming nang ato kuramibiryi, malyi nang kankan asi kuramib,” teneramun ci, sun kurandum atei nang aryi malyi kun dinyi kuraming ara milibmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Malyi kun dinyi kunubtibyi,” tenen kanya nirya ara bai donokdarur. “Malyi dinyi kunubtibyi,” tenen dinyi aryi sun dib tenen nang kanya asi malyi kibdeiboka wanikminiksicei.

Ati, sunda Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang kankan asi kuramun ci, sunci teleb dinyi akwe kunubde bindarur. Ba, a nang aryi sunti, “Malyi dinyi kunung,” eboka tatab-tatab ebsingnyei. Erda, sun dib tenen nang aryi teleb kurandum to asing eibsingnyi ura, sunci sunti, “Teleb dinyi akwe kununung,” ebsingiryi, sunsi miliboka nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ebkwaming. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi yuryangaci uki tum berekci ura, sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ati walwal nang ababyi sun dib tenen nang asi kisal dangsina teleb ati ebman.

Ura, sunci sun tukwetam kuramingnyi kalingdansing nang yuk-yuk aryi uram ebdeibsingnyi tok asi kunubdarur. Ara, nun Du Yesus biryi nunsi arukdeibmasou to, sunci sun tukwetam kuramingnyi kalingsin nang ebdeibsingnyi tok kunubdarur. Ara, tukwetam kuboka weik sien nang iya mikib taleramingnyi nang uram asi kekebdarur.

Tonda, weik sien nang amwetam bun nang aryi ebdeibsingnyi uram ababyi kunubdarur. Weik sienyi biryi er amwetam nang asi tingdeirirande ara, “Sun malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang ara wenebingnyi ura, teleb dinyi kunuramingnyi nang asi kisal dakwanung,” tenen tingdeiriraming.

Sien nang aryi ebdeibsingnyi tok kunubde baramunyi uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi teleb tenesurur tok kununkwandum. Er Imtamnyi biryi nunti teleb tenesurur dinyi ara ato. Sien nang uram kunubde baramingiryi, teleb dinyi akwe kunubde baramingnyi uca, sun walwal nang aryi tola ati tatab-tatab eramingnyi uram ababyi kilikingiryi, tatab-tatab ebman kum kubkwaming.

Ati, sunci, “Nunda lebdandob nang kunub,” tenen kundarur. Lebdandob nang ato kuramun ci, sunci, “Nun kanya aryi teleb kuransici dinyi ur kunubde binkwayeb,” tenen malyi kun dinyi kunubmunyei. Erda, sunci Er Imtamnyi wa irmilin nang ato kuramun cok, Er Imtamnyi Uram kunubde bindarur.

Ninyi nirya ara sunci, “Ni nai, ni kwin,” tenena teleb. Tonda, sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi boukwe kibdandarur. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biti sunci, “Iya erebdob sienyi,” tenen ilil kanya bobdarur. Tonda, sun tukwetam kalingnansingnyi weik sien nang ati sunci, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenen sun ebdeibsingnyi uram kunubde bindarur.

Sun yuk nang aryi ikin wa takurdeiriransing nang ara sun arungsin nang ati, “Nun naiyabwe,” teneramun ci, sun eransingnyi tok kunubde bindarur. Ara, sun arungsin nang teleb nang ababyi sun yu kimsina nang ababyi sunci, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenena teleb.

Ara, talyi ati kulab-kulab eboka mambul kurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, sunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi niti bingnurur,” tenen namin kanya bormuruna teleb. Ato kuramunyi uca, nun Nai biryi sunsi kisal dakwansir.

Ura, sunci malyi kun dinyi kubmamunyi uca, kulab-kulab onmasingnyi ura, nun Nai biryi sunsi kisal dakwansir do? Kum. Erda, sunci teleb dinyi kunuramunyi uca, mambul dinyi takubdeibsingnyi asi tanglona kum uca namin kanya boramunyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kisal dakwansir.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi nabdeibmasou ara, “Mambul dinyi dobdobingnyi ababyi, teleb dinyi akwe kunubmurubting,” tenen nabmasou ati ebman. Ninyi aryi minob uca nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi mambul kurdeiriramnyi ara Erci nunda dib tenen nang ati, “Lebdeibkwan,” tenen mambul dinyi bormururamwe. Ati, nun Du Yesus bira nunti kiklisina atonyi kuramuryi, mambul dinyi bormururamwe ati, nunda Er milin nang ababyi neiktoto ninyi aryi mambul dinyi takurdeiriransingnyi asi bobmurubkwayeb.
“Nun Du bira malyi dinyi ton kum kunuramwe.
Tonda, tola uram ababyi ton kum eramwe.”

Ninyi aryi nun Du Yesus bisi, “Malinyi,” eboka ina ngilingmai ababyi, Erci tamuboka sunsi ton kum kerebmou. Tonda, mambul dinyi takubdeirinmai ababyi, Erci sunsi, “Aminda dekoka obkwansin,” eboka uram ton kum dekeibmou. Erda, nun Du Yesus biryi Er kanya luknubdongoboka mambul dinyi bormururamuryi, Erci, “Ni Nai malyi kun dinyi nirya diboka liliboka wenerutnyi biryi niti bingnurur,” tenen nun Nai Imtamnyi taruk dam deibdongobmou.

Nun Du biryi co lase deici bing dakmai ara, Erci nun malyi kun dinyi ati, “Kilibkwan,” tenen iya mambul dinyi bobmou. Ati, nunci, “Malyi kun dinyi kuna aryi dian nang ato kuramoubwe,” tenen nun malyi kun dinyi taklobkwamoubwe ati, nun Du Yesus biryi nunti dibmasou. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi akwe kunubkwamoubwe ati, nun Du Yesus biryi, “Lebdeibkwan,” tenen dilaka ilinto dobdobmou uca, Erci sun kanya malyi kuransou dinyi asi kwetebmasou.

Minob ura sun nirya ara malyi dinyi akwe kunurandau deyok aryi, waningdaming domba ato kurandau. Ani, ukuryok ara sunci nun Du Yesus domba kalingnanyi dam yanmarum ati ebman. Ara, sunci sun malyi kun dinyi takloboka sun kanya yuk-yuk asi kalingsurutnyi dam yandobmarum.

Ura, nerabwe ababyi sun akenyabwe uram kekena teleb. Er akenyi bira nun Du Yesus uram Teleb Uram ati, “Ni li,” tenenanyi kuranci ababyi, er ner aryi teleb dinyi akwe kununa teleb. Teleb dinyi akwe kunuranci uca, er akenyi biryi asing eiboka erbabyi, “Teleb Uram dib tenebkwan,” teneboka nun Du Yesus bisi milinanyi kibkwante. Er ner aryi uram deib aryi kum eterebci ababyi erci kikliboka teleb dinyi akwe kunuranci uca, er akenyi dib tenenanyi kibte.

Ara, sun nerabwe aryi, “Talyi yon dinyi ton, malyi kun dinyi yuk dinyi kununa nun li,” tenen teleb dinyi akwe kununa teleb. Tonda, sunci Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun Nai biryi malyi kun dinyi nirya ara wenerur,” tenen ilil kanya bona teleb. Ato kuboka teleb dinyi akwe kuramunyi asi sun akenyabwe aryi asing eibsingnyi ura, sunbabyi nun Du Yesus bisi milin nang kibwanung.

Ati, sun nerabwe ara baitam dinyi ninyi asing eiboka kanya teleb kimna dinyi ati kweirya-kweirya kimna mem. Ara, “Ni kisok otong tabwe kouboka telebto kubdeibkwan,” tenen dinyi ukuna mem. Tonda, “Teleb aling dengna weik aling akwe ongobkwan,” tenena mem. Tonda, “Dengna weik keil si emas karakwan,” tenen kum. A kweirya don dinyi nirya ara ninyi kanya asi teleb kimdeirin dinyi kurur bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi kanya ara baitam kweirya don dinyi ara teleb kum tenesurur.

Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun nerabwe ara kanya tam iya bikdob kweirya asi dobdobting tenesurur. A dinyi kunubkwamunyi ara ato dinyi asi kunubkwandarur, “Namin kanya boboka teleb kanya akwe bona teleb.” Nun nong bol teleb kimdeirin dinyi ara tiya dinyi akwe kurur bok, ukuryok kanya boboka Er Imtamnyi urasintam teleb kurandum dinyi asi iya kunubkwande kweirya asi dobdobkwandarur.

Sun minob kuramnyi dib tenen nerabwe ara teleb kanya boramnyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi dibde buramiryi, sun akenyabwe uram kunubde baramnyi. Ato kuboka sunci sundamnyi Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi telebto kimdeirirdaramnyi.

Ato kuboka nun tat Sara bira sunti kiklirdeirin ner ato kuramwe. Erci er akenyi Abraham bisi, “Ni akenyi,” eboka er akenyi eramwe uram ebman tok kunubde baramwe. Ura, sunda ukuryok kurandum dib tenen nerabwe ababyi nun tat Sara er nermabwe ato kurandum. Ati, sunbabyi nun tat kuramwe to teleb dinyi akwe kunuramun ci, ilil kum kanya bobdarur. Ato kuramunyi ura, sunci Sara er nermabwe ato diboka kuramunci.

Ba, sun akenyabwe ababyi neiktoto kuboka bikdob kanya boboka sun nerabwe dam tonkwa kuramun ci, sun nerabwe ati, “Ni ner,” tenebdarur. Ati, sunci, “Nerabwe ara mitang ninyi yala ati dirnilibkwan,” tenen sun nerabwe asi kalingna teleb. Tonda, sunci, “Dib tenen nerabwe babyi, sal nang babyi iya kam kun dinyi tonkwa dobdobkwayeb,” tenen sunci sun nerabwe asi dirnilina teleb. Ati, sunci, “Ni ner asi diboka kum dibnilibnyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi bisik sekoka nun moloramibyi to kum kunubsicei,” tenen sunci sun nerabwe asi diboka dirnilina teleb.

Ura ni kwityabwe, sirya kobdob ebkwinsin uram ara ato. Sun nirya ara neik kanya boboka antanibdandoka kubdarur. Sun mambul kubmaci nang ati bico tenebdarur. Tonda, sunci, “Nunda duweityabwe ato kunub,” tenen boukwe kibdandarur. Tonda, namin kanya boboka abmun ci, sunci sundamnyi luknubdandoka teleb akwe kunubde bindarur.

Ninyi aryi sunsi malyi kimdeiriransingnyi ababyi, sunci tamuboka malyi kibdeibmunyei. Tonda, “Malinyi,” eboka ina ngilingnansingnyi ababyi, sunci tamuboka, “Malinyi,” ebmunyei. Erda, a nang aryi sun malyi kimdeiriransingnyi ababyi, namin kanya boramun ci, teleb kimdeirina teleb. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi nabmasou ara, “Sun malyi kimdeiriramingnyi nang ababyi teleb kubdeibkwaming,” tenen nabmasou. Ati, sunci, “Nun Nai biryi iya kam kun dinyi karesina teleb,” tenen sun malyi kimdeiriransingnyi nang ababyi teleb kibdeibdarur.
Er Imtamnyi kerek sengna umbura aryi ato eteresurur.
“Unanyi-unaner aryi, ‘Mangkau akwe kuranyi ani,
uki weik kubniryok asi wau louboka dibkwan,’ teneramingnyi ura,
‘Uki-uki nirya kuraniryi, teleb akwe kubkwan,’ teneramingnyi ura,
a nang ara sun silalum kalikdandoka malyi dinyi ebingnyei. Sun sibambol aryi tola uram ebingnyei.
A nang ara sun malyi kun dinyi takloboka teleb dinyi akwe kununa teleb.
Tonda, ‘Yuk nang ab antaniboka teleb akwe kubdobkwayeb,’ tenen teleb akwe tenen dinyi ingkirikoka dorona teleb.
Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sun teleb dinyi kunuramingnyi nang asi asing diransir ba, Er kanya kilkil kurur.
Tonda, nun Nai biryi a nang aryi molona asi diboka amol kekerur.
Bok, sun malyi dinyi kunuramingnyi nang ati Erci asing dirandiryok, ‘Malyi dinyi ni li,’ tenerur.”
Ura, sunci teleb dinyi akwe kunuramunyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi kalikwansir. Ati, sunci, “Unanyi biryi sunsi malyi kibdeibsute do?” tenen ilil kanya bobmunyei.

Ba, sunci teleb dinyi akwe kurandum deyok aryi, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul dinyi takubdeibsingnyi ababyi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi miliboka sunsi teleb kubdeibkwansir. A nang aryi, “Mambul dinyi takubdeibkwayeb,” eransingnyi bok, sunci ilil kanya boboka sirim talesina mem.

Erda, sunci nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Iya Mikibnyi,” tenen ilil kanya boboka erebdeibdarur. Ara, ninyi aryi sunsi, “Unato ati dibde bundarur do?” eboka asibdesingnyi ababyi, sunci ukurlona kum uca kanya luknubdongoboka uram kisal dakdobmunyi ura, sun dibde buramunyi dinyi iya kam kun dinyi asi lak eterena teleb.

Ara, namin kanya ab, luknubdongob kanya ab boboka abmun ci, sunci a nang asi lak eterena teleb. Ati, sunci teleb dinyi akwe kuramunyi uca, “Malyi kun dinyi kum kuramoubwe,” tenerdan kanya bona teleb. Sunda nun Du Yesus dam kun nang kuramun ci, teleb dinyi akwe kunuramunyi uca, sun tola ati tatab-tatab eransingnyi nang ara alyi kubkwande.

Nunda teleb dinyi akwe kunuramibyi asi ninyi aryi mambul kurdeiriransingnyi ara telebto dinyi kusurur. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ato dinyi nunti teleb tenesurur deyok aryi, mambul dinyi bona ababyi nunti teleb dinyi kusurur. Bok, nunci malyi kun dinyi kunubibyi ba, ninyi aryi weneboka mambul kurdeiriransingnyi dinyi ara nunti teleb kum kubdeibkwansurur. Erda, malyito kubdeibkwansurur ati ebman.

Nun Du Kristus bira nun malyi kun dinyi ati, “Kilibkwan,” teneboka aburyi, liki tentok aryi mambul dinyi bobmou ura, dibmou. Nun Du bira Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi akwe kunuramunyi kuramuryi, Erci nunda malyi kun nang ati, “Er Imtamnyi dam kun nang kibdeibkwan,” tenen dibmou. Nun Du Yesus bira ninyi aryi obmai ara Er nong sirik asi obmai ba, dibmou bok, kam bukeibmou tam ara Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi kam bukeibmou.
Ura, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus mikib milibmou uca, nun Du Yesus bira Er ordana nang minob uca tabwe deamnyi nang asi binmou ura, Erci, “Niryi muna kibdongobman,” eboka lak erbinmou.

A nang ara minob uca Er Imtamnyi Uram kum kunuramnyi asi nun Du Yesus biryi, “Niryi muna kibdongobman,” erbinmou. Minob ura nun aibwe Nuh biryi ilila co ngun-ngun doramwe ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun yuk nang ati, “Sun malyi kun dinyi taklobkwaming do kum do?” tenen dibde buramwe bok, a nang ara tanglona kum uca, “Er Imtamnyi Uram kekena nun li,” teneramnyi. Ato tuba teneramnyi ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebmou uca, ilila me obmou uca, a nang nirya asi me yibmou. A malyi kun nang nirya asi me yibmou bok, nun Nai biryi Nuh mabwe silib antaniboka ninyi inbaryok lebdeibmou. Ara, ilila me noutam kuramnyi asi Er Imtamnyi biryi sunsi lebdeibmou.

A ilila me obmou ara nun dib tenen nang me dongoransing me ati kiklibdeiboka kubmou. Ninyi me dongoransing ara nun Du Yesus biryi nun dib tenen nang asi lebdeibmasou dinyi asi lak itinto kurdeirin dinyi kurur ati ebman. Ninyi me dongon me ara, “Nun nong nining kubmaci ati me kekwayeb,” teneramib ato dinyi kuma. Erda, nunci, “Malyi dinyi nirya sirya bai donokmoubwe,” tenen bikdandoka nunci me dongona biriman aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi bisi, “Malyi dinyi tubto kunubibyei,” enub. Ati, nun Du Yesus Kristus kam bukokmou deyok aryi, Erci me dongona biriman aryi nunsi lemdeirisurur.

Nun Du bira imtam ai welebinmou ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi siriktam kuboka burur. Sun Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang nirya ara nun Du Yesus biti, “Iya Erebdobnyi,” tenen Er Uram akwe kunubde baraming. Tonda, sun imtam tukwetam kuramingnyi sien nang nirya ab mikib nang nirya ab asi Erci muna kibdongoboka er amwetam kuboka Er Uram akwe keken nang kibdeibmou.

Ura, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira tukwetam kuramwe ba, mambul dinyi boramuryi, nun malyi kun dinyi nirya kum daneibmou. Ati, sunci sundamnyi kiknibminikdandoka a dinyi teneibdarur. Ara, “Nunbabyi nun Du Yesus Kristus kubmou to kuboka miliboka abibiryi, mambul dinyi boramibyi uca, nun kanya dam aryi malyi tenen dinyi tuba kum kunubkwayeb,” tenebkwanub.
Ato tenebibyi uca, nunci tukwetam kam tuba kuramibiryi, nun malyi tenen dinyi ara iya kuna mem. Erda, Er Imtamnyi biryi erdeirisurur to asi kununkwanub.

Sunda minob ura Er Imtamnyi Uram walwal nang kurandau ci, sun kanya aryok malyi tenerandau dinyi akwe kunurandau. Ara, “Sal ner talyi yobdatibyi,” tenen dinyi kunurandau. Tonda, anggur du yung me ilinto yiboka walina talerandau uca, sun kwityabwe ab tonkwa malyi kun dinyi ilinto kurandau. Tonda, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi “Iya malyi kurur,” tenen dinyi kunuboka sunci kwemdina molorandau. Sunda minob ura ato dinyi ilinto kurandau ati, sunci, “Nun malyi dinyi kuramoubwe ara a kunum sirya taklobmoubwe,” tenebmunyi ura, tubto kunubde bana kum kunkwandarur.

Ba, sunci sun malyi kurandau dinyi taklobmandau ci, sun malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang asi tuba kum milirandum ati, a nang aryi, “Naie, unato ati nun malyi kunuramib to tuba kum miliraming do?” teneransing. Ati, sunci ninyi kanya aryi malyi tenen dinyi langdeiboka kum kunubde barandum deyok aryi, a malyi kun nang aryi sunda, “Malyi nang se,” eboka ina ngilingnansing.

Ina ngilingnansing bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi wenebkwande. Ara, Erda minola yaci ura, kam nang ton, dian nang ton, sun malyi kun dinyi lilibkwandanyi biryi sunsi, “Se, unato ati sunci ni uram kunun nang asi ina ngilingdarur do?” eboka sunsi wenebkwande.

A deyok aryi nun Du Yesus kam bukokmounyi biryi sun minob uca Er Imtamnyi bisi miliramnyi bok, nun Du uram Teleb Uram ara kekena kum kuramiryi, diamnyi nang ati Teleb Uram lak etererbinmou. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi ninyi nirya wenebkwande to kuboka a nang ababyi sun malyi kuramnyi dinyi liliboka sun nong asi wenebmou ba, sirya diamnyi. Ba, a sirya diamingnyi nang ababyi sun kanya dam aryi Er Imtamnyi biryi ebdeibsou to kunubde binkwaming ati, nun Du Yesus biryi a nang ababyi Teleb Uram lak etererbinmou.

Im dangna tukwe dangna kurande dinyi nirya ara sirya kobdob kubkwande talak dam kubmar. Ati, sunci sun tenen dinyi kalikdamun ci, sun kanya darabdongoboka malyi kun dinyi bai donokdarur. Ura, sunci, “Nunda nundamnyi kalikdandoka nun Nai bisi molobibyi uca, Erci nun molona kekebkwansir,” tenen sunci sundamnyi kalikdandarur.

Tonda, sunci kalingdana bikdob dinyi ara sun mamun diboka boukwe weik kimdana teleb. Sun mamum boukwe weik kibdamunyi uca, ninyi aryi sunsi malyi dinyi ilinto kurdeirisingnyi ababyi, sunci a dinyi tuba kanya kum teneibkwandum.
Tonda, sun kum eiriramunyi atei nang aryi sunsi yandobingnyi ura, “Du dongona nun li se,” tenena mem. Erda, sun kanya loboka a nang ababyi yina karena teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Yuk nang asi dibnilibkwanung,” tenen nun nirya asi mikib dinyi yuk-yuk karebmasou. A deyok aryi, nunci busul kuboka nun Nai biryi mikib karebmasou tok kuboka yuk nang asi dirnilina teleb. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi langdeiboka karebde basurur dinyi yuk-yuk asi nunci likniboka bokoka karerdana teleb.

Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi silalum caknam karebsici ba, uram eramingnyi nang ara sun silalum caknam aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram eterena teleb. Ba, nun Nai biryi kwaning kareboka yuk nang asi dirnilin mikib karebsici nang ara Er Imtamnyi biryi karebmasou mikib deici aryi yuk nang asi dirnilina teleb. Ba, nun Nai biryi nunsi nun Du Yesus Kristus biriman aryi mikib yuk-yuk karebmasou ara nunci nun Nai Imtamnyi si weik ebkwayeb ati karebmasou. Nun Du bira a mikib yuk-yuk asi dobdobmou ci, nun dib tenen nang asi bongdeirisurur ati, nunci Er si tanglona kum uca tuba-tuba weik ena teleb. Amin.

Ura, ni kwityabwe boukwe weik kusunun nang. Ninyi aryi sun dib tenen nang asi mambul kurdeiriransingnyi uca, sunci, “Naie, unato ati mambul kurdeiriransing do?” tenen kum. Sunda nun Du Yesus bisi milin nang asi mambul kurdeirisina ara, “Nun li,” tenen dinyi kuma ati ebman.

Erda, ninyi aryi sunsi mambul dinyi kurdeiriransingnyi ara sunci, “Nun Du Kristus bisi mambul kurdeiriramnyi to, nun Er milin nang ababyi neiktoto mambul kurdeirisinung,” tenena teleb. Ato teneramun ci, sunci kilkil kanya bona teleb. Ukuryok mambul kurdeiriransingnyi ababyi, kilkil kanya boramunyi uca, aminda ababyi kilkil kanya bobkwandum ati ebman. Ara, nun Du Yesus Iya Mikibnyi biryi imtam aryi kuboka yuryangaci ura, sunsi kisal dakwansici uca, sun kilkil kubkwansir.

Ninyi aryi sun Kristus milin nang kuramunyi deyok aryi, “Nun li,” tenen ina ngiliksingnyi ati, sun kanya mambul kusina mem. Erda, sunci, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nunsi kisal dangsurur,” tenen kilkil kanya bona teleb. Ara, ninyi aryi ina ngiliksingnyi ababyi, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus ara sun dam iya kusururci erebdeibkwansir ati, sun kanya kilkil kusina teleb.

Ninyi aryi sunsi mambul kimdeiriransingnyi ara ninyi diboka obmarum deyok aryi, mambul kimdeirisingnyei. Tonda, yuk nang dinyi ukula dobmarum deyok aryi, mambul kimdeirisingnyei. Tonda, malyi kun dinyi yuk dinyi kubmarum deyok aryi, mambul kimdeirisingnyei. Tonda, talyi uram yukmarum deyok aryi, mambul kimdeirisingnyei.

Ba, ninyi aryi sunti, “Se, Kristus milin nang ara nun li,” tenen malyi kibdeibsingnyi ura, sun alyi kuna mem. Erda, sunci, “Nunda nun Du Yesus Kristus si lak en nang kunub,” tenen kilkil kanya boramun ci, Er Imtamnyi bisi si weik ena teleb.

Ukuryok kuramib talak ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi Er mabwe nermabwe asi malyi kun dinyi lilibkaliboka wenebkwansir talak kubmar. Ati, Er Imtamnyi biryi nun Nai uram diboka kunubde baramibyi nang asi deyok kouboka malyi kun dinyi ati wenebkwansir. Ato kubsici ati, nun Nai uram Teleb Uram asi, “Nun li,” tenen nang ara mitikanun wenebkwande do? Ato tenen kum. Erda, Erci a malyi kun nang asi bisibkaboka diba ati wenebkwande.
Tonda, Er Imtamnyi kerek sengna aryi ato eboka eteresurur.
Sun Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunun nang ababyi mambul dinyi ilinto boraming bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi kum lebkwana ato kuranci ba, mambul ilinto dobkwamingnyi ani, lebkwansir.
Ura, sun, “Er Imtamnyi Uram kununa nun li,” tenen nang ton sun malyi kun nang ton ara Er Imtamnyi biryi lebdeibkwante do? Ato tenen kum. Sunda iya malyi limdon wenebkwande.

A deyok aryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi karebsou uca, mambul dinyi boramunyi nang ara nun Nai biti, “Nun Kikniansounyi bira Er Uram erlona kumnyi biryi nunsi kalingsurur,” tenen sun mambul boramunyi dinyi ababyi nun Nai taruk dam deirina teleb. Sun kurandum to nirya nun Nai taruk dam deiriramun ci, sunci tanglona kum uca teleb dinyi kunubmurubde bindarur.

Ura, sun kankan kuramingnyi dib tenen nang kalingsina nang asi uram ton ebdeibkwinsin. Ara, ni Petrus bibabyi dib tenen nang kalingsinanyi kunun ci, niryi darab-darab ebsiniryi, sunda ni ab tonkwa ninyi kalingnamib nang asi uram ton ebdeibkwinsin. Nun Du Kristus mambul dinyi boramwe asi niryi asing eibmase to asi, “Diba,” eboka lak eterenanyi kunun ati, sunci ni uram diboka kekebnindarur. Tonda, nun Du Yesus bira Iya Erebdobnyi kurandiryi imtam aryi kuboka yuryangaci ura, Erci, “Ni dam kunanyi,” tenen nibabyi erebdeibkwanir. Ati, sunci a dinyi ati teneramun ci, ni yan memesin uram kekebnindarur.

Sunci sun dib tenen nang kalingnamun ci, “Nunda Er Imtamnyi biryi domba wininanyi bito nang tikeibmasou,” teneramun ci, sun dib tenen nang asi diboka kalikmilibdarur. Ati, sunci sulbalyi kanya boboka Er Imtamnyi domba asi kalikmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Busul kanya boboka kalikwayeb,” tenen Er Imtamnyi domba asi kalingna teleb. Ato kuramunyi uca, sunci Er Imtamnyi biryi takubdeibmasou to kunubkwandum. Ati, sunci, “Co bok ilinto dobdobtibyi uca, sun dib tenen nang kalikwantibya,” tenen kum. Erda, sunci busul kuboka kalingna teleb.

Nun Nai biryi takubdeibsou uca, sun dib tenen nang asi kalikwandum ci, sunci sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka sun dib tenen nang asi arung-arung ena mem. Erda, kiklina nang ato kuboka abmun ci, sunci Er Imtamnyi domba mer asi diboka kalikdarur.

Busul kuboka kalingnamunyi ba, nun Du Yesus Kristus bira domba kalingna deyoknyi imtam aryi kuboka yuryangaci ura, Erci sunsi erebdeiboka dengna weik dinyi karebkwansir ati ebman. A dengna weik dinyi ara wanikminikman kum kubkwansir iya kubkwande dinyi asi karebkwansir.

Ato kuboka sun kankan kuramingnyi kam nang ababyi neiktoto sun wise nang uram asi kekebdarur. Sun nirya ara luknubdob kanya boramun ci, yuk nang ati, “Nun naiyabwe,” tenena teleb. Er Imtamnyi Kerek Sengna umbura aryi ato eteresurur.
“Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sundamnyi ererdeirirdan nang ati, ‘Ni li,’ tenen bisik sengminingdur.
Ba, sun luknubdob kanya bon nang ati Erci, ‘Ni mabwe nermabwe,’ tenen dorosurur,” eboka sekdeibmou.

Ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi mikib aryi mambul dinyi ilinto karebsici uca, sunci yu kanya bobmunyei. Erda, sunci, “Nun Nai,” tenen sundamnyi luknubdongobdandarur. Sundamnyi luknubdongobdamunyi uca, nun Nai biryi sunsi erebdeibkwansir, Ara, nun Nai biryi karebkwansir tum berekci ura, Erci sunsi erebdeibkwansir.
Sun kanya dam aryi mambul kubdeibsici dinyi nirya ara nun Nai Imtamnyi taruk dam deibdarur ati ebman. Ba, nun Nai biryi sunti bico tenesurur deyok aryi, sunsi kalikwansurura.

Ura, sunci sun kanya darabdobmun ci, malyi kun dinyi bai donokmunyi ura, kalikdandarur. Isa sienyi si Iblis bira nun ordananyi biryi, “Sakeibtinyi,” tenen ingkirikde yibasurur. Ninyi on kam si singa ara nguru-nguru eboka, “Oyibtinyi,” tenen yibinkirikoka ingkiringkiringnande to, isa sienyi Iblis bibabyi neiktoto er obmanto nang ati yibinkirikoka ingkiringkiringsurur.

Ati, sunci sun dib tenen dinyi asi katabum eboka tikokmunyi ura, isa sienyi bisi bisik sekdarur. Ura, sunci ato tenebdarur, “Nun kwityabwe im dangna tukwe dangna dantam nirya aryi kuraming dib tenen nang ababyi neiktoto mambul dinyi boraming.” Sunci ato tenen bikmun ci, kanya katabum eboka dib tenebmurubdarur.

Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi bira langdeiboka kisal dangsurutnyi biryi sunsi katabum erdeirisina teleb. Nun Nai biryi nunsi nabdeibmasou ara, “Ni Mi Kristus dam kun nang kibdeibnyi uca, Niryi sunsi erebdeiboka iya kam kun dinyi karebkwan,” tenen nabdeibmasou. Ara, uki mitikanun kuboka mambul dinyi bobmunyi ura, Erci sunsi teleb kibdeibsiryi, lulungna kum uca mikib weik kibdeibkwansir.
Nun Nai bira tanglona kum uca iya mikibnyi kurmurutnyi kubdur. Amin.

Ura, ni Petrus biryi, “Ato-ato kerek sekeibdum,” ebman uca, nun kwit Silwanus biryi a kerek sengna sekeibmasir. Nun kwit Silwanus bira wa irlona kumnyi kurur ati ebman. Nunci sunsi bumang uram eboka kerek sekeibmasinim. Ara, “Sun kanya katabum ebdeibkwanim,” tenen kerek sekeibmasinim. Tonda, “Nun Nai Imtamnyi bira langdeiboka kisal dangsurur ati diboka bikwaming,” tenen kerek sekeibmasinim. “A uram katabum eboka talebkwaming,” tenen lak eboka kerek sekeibmasinim. Ati, nun Nai biryi sunsi kisal dangsurur ati, sunci katabum eboka dib tenebmurubdarur.

Ura, ni kwityabwe. A kunum sirya kerek sekeibmasinim. Sun weik atei Babilon aryi kuramingnyi dib tenen nang aryi sunsi, “Teleb,” ebmasing. Babilon atei sirik ati kum ebmasin. Erda, kebdeiboka Babilon doraming atei ati ebman. Nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun akatei asi kuramingnyi dib tenen nang sun ab tonkwa wibdeibmasou ati ebman. Tonda, nun kwit Markus ni boukwe weik kununyi bibabyi sun nirya asi kibdobmasir.

Sunci sun mamum teleb ebdandarur. Ara, nunda dib tenen nang aryi, “Kibdandobkwayeb,” tenen irirdanub to, sunci sun mamun irirdana teleb. Ura, sunda nun Du Yesus Kristus dam kurandum nang nirya asi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi antanibdeibsici uca, kilkil kanya karesina teleb.

Ni Simon Petrus bira nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi bokdonoknou ba, nun Du Yesus wa irmilinanyi kunun ci, sun dib tenen nang ati kerek sekeibkwinsin. Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira nun Nai Imtamnyi bitonyi kuboka Iya Erebdobnyi biryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe kibdeibkwan,” tenen ninyi Lemsurutnyi kurur. A deyok aryi, nun Du Yesus biryi karebsou uca, sunda minob ura Er Imtamnyi bira walwal nang kurandau ababyi danguboka nun Du Yesus bisi dib tenerandum. Ara, nunda Teleb Uram erbana nang ara diboka dib tenenub to, sunbabyi neiktoto nun Du Yesus bisi diboka dib tenerandum.

Ni kwityabwe ab ni kwinyabwe ab, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Ni mabwe nermabwe,” tenen sunsi kisal dangsina teleb. Tonda, nun Nai biryi sunsi antanibdeiboka sun kanya teleb akwe kurdeirisina teleb. Ara, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi ab nun Du Yesus Kristus ab dam kun nang kuramun ci, diboka biktabakmunyi uca, nun Nai biryi sunsi kisal dangsina ab, teleb kanya kurdeirisina ab langdeiboka karesina teleb.

Nun Du bira iya mikibnyi biryi karebmasou uca, nunci, “Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi ato-ato kuboka teleb dinyi kunubkwanub,” tenen nirya bingnub. Ba, nunci nun Nai nabsounyi dam kun nang kiboka Ersi bingnub uca, nunci Er urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kununub. Nun Nai bira iya mililnyi ab iya teleb kurutnyi biryi nunti kiknibminikmasou uca, nunci bikdobibyi ura, Er urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubde banub ati ebman.

Nun Nai biryi a dinyi nirya kiknibminiksou uca, Erci nunsi, “Ato-ato lebde binkwansin,” eboka nunti ebdeibsou uram yuk-yuk asi karebmasou. A ebdeibsou uram yuk-yuk ara iya Teleb Uram ton bikdob uram kurur. Ati, sunci a erdeirisin uram yuk-yuk asi dib teneramunyi uca, sunci nun Nai Imtamnyi bito nang kibmun ci, iya kam kubkwandum. Ato kuramunyi uca, sunci, “Nun malyi tenen dinyi ara nun kanya ab nong ab nirya kum dasicei,” tenen sun kanya aryi malyi tenen dinyi asi takloboka iya kam kun dinyi asi dobdobdarur.

A deyok aryi, sunci busul kuboka, “Nun Du bisi dib teneramibiryi, ninyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kununa ababyi kubkwayeb,” tenen kubdarur. Tonda, “Ninyi urasintam aryi teleb kuramibiryi, nun Nai Imtamnyi dam kuboka Ersi bingdona ababyi biktabakwayeb,” tenen kubdarur.

Tonda, sunci nun Nai bisi tabakoka bingnamun ci, sunci, “Malyi dinyi kubibyei,” tenen sun kanya nurubdobkwandarur. Tonda, sun kanya nururoramun ci, sunci tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus bisi milibdarur. Tonda, tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus bisi miliramun ci, sunci Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubdarur.

Tonda, Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunuramun ci, sunci sun kwityabwe dib tenen nang asi boukwe kibdeibdarur. Tonda, sun dib tenen nang asi boukwe kimdeiriramun cok, sunci ninyi nirya asi boukwe kibdarur.
A dinyi nirya ara sun kanya dam tabakdongoboka kunuramunyi ura, talyi kum kubkwandum. Erda, sunci ato kuboka nun Du Yesus Kristus bisi tabakdongoboka bingdoramunyi ura, du weik moubkwansir.

Bok, a dinyi nirya sun kanya dam kum kuransici nang ara asing kuanci nang aryi utotoa asing diboka eirkatana kum kuraming nang ato kunung. Sun ato kuramingnyi nang ara, “Nun malyi kuramoubwe dinyi ara nun Nai biryi sirya kilibmasou,” tenena ara luba kimnung aryi nun Nai biti du moun kum nang kunung.

A deyok aryi, ni kwityabwe, sunci a dinyi nirya teneramun ci, sundamnyi busul kuboka kalikdandarur. Ara, sunci, “Nun Nai biryi nunsi wibdeiboka nabmasou ara tabakoka lak kibsute,” tenen busul kubtabakoka nun Nai dam kun nang kubde bindarur. Ato kuramunyi ura, sunci tanglona kum uca nun Du Yesus bisi milibkwandum.

Ato kuramunyi uca, aminda aryi nun Du Yesus Kristus Ninyi Lemsurutnyi biryi sunsi aminda aryi, “Ni dam yandarur,” eboka kibdobkwansir. Ara, nun Du Yesus iya weik sienyi kuboka tanglona kum uca kalikwansir ai wengbinkwandum ba, Erci, “Ni kwityabwe, ni kwinyabwe,” tenen sunsi diboka kibdobkwansir.

Ati, niryi, “A uram luba kibingnyei,” tenen sunsi ato ebmasin cok, aminda ababyi tamuboka ebde binkwansin. Sunci a ebmasin dinyi nirya sirya bingdarur ci, dib en uram katabum eboka talerandum bok, niryi, “Busul kuboka nun Du Yesus bisi diboka milibde binkwaming,” tenen sunsi tabakdongoboka ebde binkwansin.
Ni kanya teleb tenenun to, ni kam tuba kunmaryi talak aryi niryi a uram asi tamuboka ebde binkwansin.
Ato ebman ara, nun Du Yesus Kristus biryi, “Minola dibkwandim,” eboka nisi lak kibdeibmanou ba, bikdase. Ati, uki mitikanun kubde banmabyi ani, dibkwan ara nidamnyi sirya bikdanman.
Ati, niryi, “Ni sirya dibnyi ababyi, a eterena uram nirya ara tuba-tuba teneibkwanung,” tenen busul kuboka abniryi, a eterena uram asi tamuboka eterebde binkwansin.

Nunci sunsi, “Nun Du Yesus Kristus bira iya mikibnyi ton, milil weiknyi kuboka tamuryankwansir,” eboka etereransoubwe ara nunung uram kum etereransoubwe. Erda, nunci nun Du Yesus milil asi asing eiramoubwe to, nunci nun Du Yesus deyok ati dib en uram akwe etereransoubwe. Ara, nun Du Yesus tukwetam tuba kuramwe talak aryi nun winiryi nang Er ab tonkwa mutuk kon welebmaburyi, asing dinmoubwe uca, nun Du Yesus bira Erdamnyi milil weiknyi lak kibdanmou.

A talak aryi nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun Du Yesus bisi mikib ab milil ab karebmou ati ebman. Ura, nun Nai Iya Erebdobnyi biryi nun Du Yesus biti ato lak ebmou. “Anyi bira Ni Mi, ni boukwe weik kununyi kurur. Erda Ni Mi, Ni kanya iya teleb kunurur Mi kurur,” ebmou.
Ato ebmou ara, nunda nun Du Yesus ab tonkwa iya teleb mutuk kon kubmoubwe nang winiryi aryi nun amol kekebmoubwe bok, imtam aryi kuboka uram ato ebmou.

Ato ebmoubwe asi, nunsi sun Er Imtamnyi Uram ebdeibmaci to lak etereramnyi nang aryi eransei uram ababyi iya dib en uram kurur deyok aryi nunsi katabum erdeirisurur. Ati, sunci a uram ati, “Kunuk ai berengdeirisurur uram,” tenen diboka diblilibdarur. A uram asi diboka dibnilibmunyi uca, nun Du bira kurya ulul atonyi anamyandoka abdiryi, sun kanya yuk-yuk asi berekeibkwansir.
A uram ara ninyi tenen kanya aryi kum anaramwe ba, uram ermurunanyi biryi, “Lak kibdeibkwan,” tenen kanya ababyi kum anaramwe. Yuma kobdob iya bikwamunyi dinyi ara ato.

Er Imtamnyi Uram ara tukwetam nang tenen kanya aryi kum anaramwe ati ebman. Erda, Er Imtamnyi Kanya Roh Kudus aryi tek deib aryi erkareramwe uca, Er Imtamnyi bisi wa irmilin nang aryi a uram asi ermururamnyi ati ebman.

Sun Israel yala nang minob kuramnyi nang kankan ababyi tola uram eteren nang kuramnyi to, ukuryok sun dib tenen nang kuranduma kankan ababyi tola uram eteren nang kubkwaming ati ebman. A nang ara iniboka tola uram asi etereraming bok, sun uram keken nang aryi, “A nang etereransing uram ara tola uram asi etereransing,” tenen ara ola kum bikwaming. A tola uram ara ninyi kanya bowaningminingdur uram kurur asi eterenung ati ebman. A nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus biti, “Nun Nai Lebsounyi, erebdob Arungdeirisurutnyi,” tuba kum tenebkwaming. Erda, sunci nun Du Yesus biti, “Anyi nun li,” ebkwaming. Ato ebingnyi uca, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi weneboka minola kum daneibkwande.

Tonda, a tola uram eteren nang ara alyi kun kum asa aryi, “Talyi yobdatibyi,” tenen malyi kun dinyi utotoa kubkwaming. Ukubkwaming ba, ninyi ilinto aryi miliboka neik malyi kun dinyi kubkwaming. Dib tenen nang kankan asi ninyi ilinto aryi ato kuboka malyi kubkwaming deyok aryi, sun dib tenen kum nang aryi, “Sun Kristus milin nang ara malyi dinyi akwe kunung se,” eboka tatab-tatab ebkwansing.

Tonda, a tola uram eteren nang aryi sun tula kiringna deyok aryi, “Nun uram kekesin nang aryi co bok ilinto karebsiting,” tenen sun kanya aryok nunung kuna liboka utotoa eterebkwansing. Bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi minob talak aryi kuboka a nang ati, “Diboka wenebkwan,” teneramwe deyok aryi, Erci sunsi minola kum daneibkwande.

Minob ura, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang kankan ara ton nang aryi Er Imtamnyi biti, “Nun li,” tenen malyi kubmai. Ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang ati, “Ni amwetam kun nang kunung ati Niryi wenena kum kubkwan, erda boukwe kubkwan,” kum tenebmou. Erda, Erci a nang ara Er uram eryuryangan nang asi ilila uk mekwan dam yakdonokmou. Ura, nun Nai biryi, “Sirya kobdob talak aryi weik wenena wenebkwan,” tenebmou ci, a nang asi tabwe deboka iya kunuk mutuk dam yakdonokmou. Ura, nun Nai biryi Er Uram eryuryangan nang ati, “Diboka wenebkwan,” tenerur bok, Erci nun tukwetam malyi kuramingnyi nang kankan kuboka tola uram eteresin nang asi wenena kum kubkwande tenebmarum do? Ato tenen kum.

Tonda, sun minob talak kuramnyi nang aryi Er Imtamnyi Uram kum kunuramnyi ura, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang ababyi wenebmou. Ara, nun Nai biryi ilila on me karebmou uca, ninyi nirya me yibsekmou. Yuk nang ara nirya me yibsekmou bok, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi nun aibwe Nuh ab er mabwe nermabwe ab ninyi inbaryi nang ab lebdeiboka kalikmou. Nun aibwe Nuh bira, “Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunubdarur,” eboka eterermururamunyi biti ato ebman.

Tonda, sun minob Sodom atei ab Gomora atei ab kuramnyi nang aryi malyi kun dinyi kuramnyi ababyi, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sunsi wenebmou. Ara, nun Nai biryi imtam aryi uk mo karebmou ba, akatei bitinyi asi ai ab ninyi ab uk aryi nirya yibsekmou. A wenebmou dinyi ara nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi sun Er Uram kununa kum kuramingnyi nang nirya asi aminda neiktoto kuboka weik wenen dinyi karebdiryok, sunsi diba ati wenebkwande to lak kimsurur.

Ura, Sodom atei nang ab Gomora atei nang nirya asi wenebmou bok, nun Nai biryi nun aibwe Lot bisi lebdeibmou. Nun aibwe Lot bira Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunuramunyi biti ato ebman. Nun aibwe bira Sodom atei ab Gomora atei tingyandoka kuramuryi, erci a nang aryi talyi yordan dinyi ati, “Se, malyito kuraming,” tenen mambul weik kanya boramwe. Ato kuramwe ba, nun Nai biryi lebdeibmou ba, nun aibwe bira akatei nang ab tonkwa kum dibmai.

Nun aibwe Lot bira Er Imtamnyi urasintam aryi teleb dinyi kunuramunyi kuramuryi, sun Sodom atei nang ab Gomora atei nang ab tonkwa tuba-tuba kuramnyi. Ato kuramwe uca, nun aibwe biryi sun akatei nang malyi kun dinyi nirya asi asing eiriramuryi, uram kekeramwe aryi er kanya teleb ara mambul weik doramwe.

Ato kuboka nun Nai Imtamnyi bira sun Er Uram kunuramingnyi nang ara lebde baransir. Ara, ninyi aryi mambul kimdeiriransingnyi ababyi yuk dinyi aryi mambul kimdeiriransici ababyi nun Nai biryi lebde baransir. Ba, sun malyi dinyi kuramingnyi nang ati Erci wenebde barur. Ani, weik wenen tum berekci ura, Erci sunsi weik wenena kareboka wenebkwande.

Ara, sun, “Talyi yordan dinyi akwe kunubde binkwayeb,” tenen malyi kuramingnyi nang asi Er Imtamnyi biryi nunukoka wenebkwande. Tonda, sun nun Nai kalingsurutnyi biti, “Er Uram kununa nun li,” teneramingnyi nang ababyi Erci nunukoka wenebkwande.
A malyi kun nang ara sundamnyi ererdeirirdaraming ci, sunci akata doboka sun imtam kuboka Uram eryuryangan nang ababyi ina ngilingnaming.

A nang ara tukwetam nang kuramingiryok, imtam kuboka Uram erban nang asi ina ngilingnaming. Ina ngilingnaming bok, Er Imtamnyi Uram eryuryangan nang ara mikib weik kuraming nang ababyi, a tola uram eteren nang asi nun Nai Imtamnyi urasintam aryi ina ngilingna kum kunung.

A tola uram eteren nang ara sun bita kum bingnamingnyi bok, “Nunda diboka bingnub,” teneboka abingiryi, talyi ati ina nglilingnaming. A nang ara bai bisam yua kanya boboka ato kunung aryi, ninyi kanya kum bonung deyok aryi, sun kanya aryi malyi teneramingnyi to akwe kubde banung. Bai bisam yua ara ninyi aryi obde yiramingnyi uca, ola kum danarande to, a tola uram eteren nang ababyi ola kum dankwaming. Ara, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi a nang asi diba ati wenebci uca, bai bisam kum danarande to minola dibsekwaming.

A nang ara yuk nang asi malyi kimdeiriraming ati, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi dekoka malyi kibdeibkwande. A nang ara alyi kanya ara kum bonung ci, “Yina ilinto yibibiryi, ner talyi yobtibyi,” teneboka kitingtam berengnande nirya ababyi sun kanya aryi malyi tenen dinyi laktoto kubde banung. A malyi kun nang ara kam kuramingnyi talak ara sun dib tenen nang ab tonkwa kwaliramun cok, sun kankan dam alyi weik dinyi akwe kunuraming ati ebman.

A nang ara, “Ner talyi yobtibyi,” tenen nerabwe asi asing lingdon kanya akwe boraming. Tonda, sunda, “Nun malyi kunub to ara taklobkwayeb,” kum tenenung. Tonda, sun wise kanya borona kum nang asi sunci bowaningminingnaming. Tonda, sunci, “Bona-bona ilinto talebtibyi,” tenen kanya akwe kunung. A nang ara iya malyi kun nang kunung ati, nun Nai biryi sunsi diba ati wenebkwande.

A nang ara udikum bisik tuba kum banung. Erda, bisik wanikminikmai ura, minob kuramnyi talak aryi tola uram eteren deyoknyi Beor mi Bileam bisi milin nang kunung. Anyi bira, “Dengna ilinto karebningnyi uca, malyi uram ebkwan,” tenena akwe kuramwe.

Ato kuboka, “Malyi uram ebkwan,” teneramwe asi er boyibaramwe bisam keledai aryi ersi wenebmou. Keledai ara ninyi uram eramib to kum erur bok, Er Imtamnyi biryi karebmou uca, ninyi uram ato eboka Bileam bisi wenebmou. Ara, keledai aryi bikdob uram eboka wenebmou uca, tola uram eterenanyi biryi er talyi tenen dinyi asi bisik sekmou.

A tola uram eteren nang ara me u dam cemnande to talyi tam kunung. Tonda, duwa asi ibalya aryi uboka bobde bindobci ura, mo kum cemnande ato, talyi tam kunung. Ba, nun Nai Imtamnyi biryi, “Iya kunuk ilinto ai yakdonokwan,” tenen a nang asi wenen sokon kiknibminikamwe.

A nang ara sundamnyi erebdeibdandoka talyi uram akwe eterenung. Sunci ninyi kanya aryi, “Talyi yobdatibyi,” tenen dinyi akwe kunuboka, “Talyi yordana ara mem kum,” eboka eterebingnyi uca, ninyi ilinto aryi, “Nunbabyi talyi yobdatibyi,” teneraming. Ato kuboka sunci sun ukuryok, “Tola uram asi bai donokoka lebdandobtibyi,” tenen dib tenebkalibmangnyi nang ababyi bowaningminingnaming ati ebman.

A nang ara, “Nun eterena milibmunyi uca, tabwe lobdeibsou nang ato kubkwandum,” eboka sun milin nang asi ebdeibingiryok, sunbaramnyi tabwe lobdeibsou nang kum kuraming ati ebman. Erda, malyi kun dinyi aryi sun kanya asi mikib kuboka talerur ati, malyi kun dinyi aryi tabwe deansou nang ato kunung. Ninyi kanya asi mikib kuboka taleranci dinyi ara ninyi kanya asi tabwe demnande ati ebman.

A nang ara nun Du Yesus Kristus ninyi Lemsinanyi bikdobmai ura, sunci, “Malyi kun nang aryi kunung to tuba kum kunubkwayeb,” tenen minob lemdarorbinmai cok, sunci tubto danguboka, “Malyi kun dinyi tubto kurantibyi,” tenen kunubmai uca, malyi kun dinyi asi sunsi muna kibdongobmou.
